GE07mbh_06_u:001.000-0001_02: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet
GE07mbh_06_u:001.000-0002_04: namo vai brahmanidhaye vāsiṣṭhāya namo namaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:001.001d-0003_02: kathaṃ vā kauravāḥ sarve bhīmasene camūpatau
GE07mbh_06_u:001.001d-0004_01: niveśaṃ cakrire yoddhuṃ tan me śaṃsa mahāmate
GE07mbh_06_u:001.004c: āśaṃsanto jayaṃ yuddhe vadhaṃ vābhimukhā raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:001.004d-0005_01: pūrvabhāge tu kṣetrasya sthitāḥ pratyaṅmukhā yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:001.008a: yāvat tapati sūryo hi jambūdvīpasya maṇḍalam
GE07mbh_06_u:001.009c: paryākrāmanta deśāṃś ca nadīḥ śailān vanāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:001.011a: saṃjñāś ca vividhās tās tās teṣāṃ cakre yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:001.015c: dadhmuḥ sarve mahāśaṅkhān bherīr jaghnuḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:001.016a: tataḥ prahṛṣṭāṃ svāṃ senām abhivīkṣyātha pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:001.017c: dadhmatuḥ puruṣavyāghrau divyau śaṅkhau rathe sthitau
GE07mbh_06_u:001.019a: yathā siṃhasya nadataḥ svanaṃ śrutvetare mṛgāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:001.020a: udatiṣṭhad rajo bhaumaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:001.021c: vyukṣan sarvāṇy anīkāni tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_06_u:001.022c: vinighnaṃs tāny anīkāni vidhamaṃś caiva tad rajaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:001.023a: ubhe sene tadā rājan yuddhāya mudite bhṛśam
GE07mbh_06_u:001.024a: tayos tu senayor āsīd adbhutaḥ sa samāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:001.025d-0007_01: tatas te samayaṃ yuddhe syāt prītiś ca parasparam
GE07mbh_06_u:001.026c: dharmāṃś ca sthāpayām āsur yuddhānāṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:001.027a: nivṛtte caiva no yuddhe prītiś ca syāt parasparam
GE07mbh_06_u:001.027c: yathāpuraṃ yathāyogaṃ na ca syāc chalanaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:001.028a: vācā yuddhe pravṛtte no vācaiva pratiyodhanam
GE07mbh_06_u:001.028c: niṣkrāntaḥ pṛtanāmadhyān na hantavyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:001.029a: rathī ca rathinā yodhyo gajena gajadhūrgataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:001.030c: samābhāṣya prahartavyaṃ na viśvaste na vihvale
GE07mbh_06_u:001.031a: pareṇa saha saṃyuktaḥ pramatto vimukhas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:001.031c: kṣīṇaśastro vivarmā ca na hantavyaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:001.032a: na sūteṣu na dhuryeṣu na ca śastropanāyiṣu
GE07mbh_06_u:001.034a: niviśya ca mahātmānas tatas te puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:002.001a: tataḥ pūrvāpare saṃdhye samīkṣya bhagavān ṛṣiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:002.003a: vaicitravīryaṃ rājānaṃ sa rahasyaṃ bravīd idam
GE07mbh_06_u:002.003c: śocantam ārtaṃ dhyāyantaṃ putrāṇām anayaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:002.004a: rājan parītakālās te putrāś cānye ca bhūmipāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:002.005c: kālaparyāyam ājñāya mā sma śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:002.006a: yadi tv icchasi saṃgrāme draṣṭum enaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:002.006c: cakṣur dadāni te hanta yuddham etan niśāmaya
GE07mbh_06_u:002.007c: yuddham etat tv aśeṣeṇa śṛṇuyāṃ tava tejasā
GE07mbh_06_u:002.008a: tasminn anicchati draṣṭuṃ saṃgrāmaṃ śrotum icchati
GE07mbh_06_u:002.008c: varāṇām īśvaro dātā saṃjayāya varaṃ dadau
GE07mbh_06_u:002.009a: eṣa te saṃjayo rājan yuddham etad vadiṣyati
GE07mbh_06_u:002.010c: kathayiṣyati te yuddhaṃ sarvajñaś ca bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_06_u:002.011a: prakāśaṃ vā rahasyaṃ vā rātrau vā yadi vā divā
GE07mbh_06_u:002.011c: manasā cintitam api sarvaṃ vetsyati saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:002.012a: nainaṃ śastrāṇi bhetsyanti nainaṃ bādhiṣyate śramaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:002.012c: gāvalgaṇir ayaṃ jīvan yuddhād asmād vimokṣyate
GE07mbh_06_u:002.013a: ahaṃ ca kīrtim eteṣāṃ kurūṇāṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:002.013c: pāṇḍavānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ prathayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:002.014a: diṣṭam etat purā caiva nātra śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:002.014c: na caiva śakyaṃ saṃyantuṃ yato dharmas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:002.015a: evam uktvā sa bhagavān kurūṇāṃ prapitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:002.015c: punar eva mahābāhuṃ dhṛtarāṣṭram uvāca ha
GE07mbh_06_u:002.016a: iha yuddhe mahārāja bhaviṣyati mahān kṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:002.017a: śyenā gṛdhrāś ca kākāś ca kaṅkāś ca sahitā balaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:002.018a: atyugraṃ ca prapaśyanti yuddham ānandino dvijāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:002.019c: kahvāḥ prayānti madhyena dakṣiṇām abhito diśam
GE07mbh_06_u:002.020a: ubhe pūrvāpare saṃdhye nityaṃ paśyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:002.021c: trivarṇāḥ parighāḥ saṃdhau bhānum āvārayanty uta
GE07mbh_06_u:002.023a: alakṣyaḥ prabhayā hīnaḥ paurṇamāsīṃ ca kārttikīm
GE07mbh_06_u:002.024a: svapsyanti nihatā vīrā bhūmim āvṛtya pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:002.025c: praṇādaṃ yudhyato rātrau raudraṃ nityaṃ pralakṣaye
GE07mbh_06_u:002.026a: devatāpratimāś cāpi kampanti ca hasanti ca
GE07mbh_06_u:002.026c: vamanti rudhiraṃ cāsyaiḥ svidyanti prapatanti ca
GE07mbh_06_u:002.028a: kokilāḥ śatapatrāś ca cāṣā bhāsāḥ śukās tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:002.028c: sārasāś ca mayūrāś ca vāco muñcanti dāruṇāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:002.030c: āsīd rudhiravarṣaṃ ca asthivarṣaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:002.031a: yā caiṣā viśrutā rājaṃs trailokye sādhusaṃmatā
GE07mbh_06_u:002.031c: arundhatī tayāpy eṣa vasiṣṭhaḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:002.032a: rohiṇīṃ pīḍayann eṣa sthito rājañ śanaiścaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:002.032c: vyāvṛttaṃ lakṣma somasya bhaviṣyati mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_06_u:003.001a: kharā goṣu prajāyante ramante mātṛbhiḥ sutāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:003.002c: kravyādān pakṣiṇaś caiva gomāyūn aparān mṛgān
GE07mbh_06_u:003.003c: dviśīrṣāś ca dvipucchāś ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ paśavo 'śivāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:003.005a: tathaivānyāś ca dṛśyante striyaś ca brahmavādinām
GE07mbh_06_u:003.005c: vainateyān mayūrāṃś ca janayantyaḥ pure tava
GE07mbh_06_u:003.006a: govatsaṃ vaḍavā sūte śvā sṛgālaṃ mahīpate
GE07mbh_06_u:003.007a: striyaḥ kāś cit prajāyante catasraḥ pañca kanyakāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:003.007c: tā jātamātrā nṛtyanti gāyanti ca hasanti ca
GE07mbh_06_u:003.010c: viṣvagvātāś ca vānty ugrā rajo na vyupaśāmyati
GE07mbh_06_u:003.011a: abhīkṣṇaṃ kampate bhūmir arkaṃ rāhus tathāgrasat
GE07mbh_06_u:003.011c: śveto grahas tathā citrāṃ samatikramya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_06_u:003.013c: maghāsv aṅgārako vakraḥ śravaṇe ca bṛhaspatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:003.014c: śukraḥ proṣṭhapade pūrve samāruhya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:003.015c: aindraṃ tejasvi nakṣatraṃ jyeṣṭhām ākramya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_06_u:003.016b-0010_01: rohiṇīṃ pīḍayaty evam ubhau ca śaśibhāskarau
GE07mbh_06_u:003.018c: pañcaśīrṣā yavāś caiva śataśīrṣāś ca śālayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:003.019a: pradhānāḥ sarvalokasya yāsv āyattam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_06_u:003.019c: tā gāvaḥ prasnutā vatsaiḥ śoṇitaṃ prakṣaranty uta
GE07mbh_06_u:003.021a: agnivarṇā yathā bhāsaḥ śastrāṇām udakasya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:003.021c: kavacānāṃ dhvajānāṃ ca bhaviṣyati mahān kṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:003.021d-0011_02: kurūṇāṃ vaiśase rājan pāṇḍavaiḥ saha bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:003.023c: raudraṃ vadati saṃrabdhaḥ śoṇitaṃ chardayan muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:003.026a: kṛttikāsu grahas tīvro nakṣatre prathame jvalan
GE07mbh_06_u:003.026c: vapūṃṣy apaharan bhāsā dhūmaketur iva sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:003.027a: triṣu pūrveṣu sarveṣu nakṣatreṣu viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:003.030c: utpātameghā raudrāś ca rātrau varṣanti śoṇitam
GE07mbh_06_u:003.032c: phenāyamānāḥ kūpāś ca nardanti vṛṣabhā iva
GE07mbh_06_u:003.033a: adya caiva niśāṃ vyuṣṭām udaye bhānur āhataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:003.036c: velām udvartayanti sma kṣobhayantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:003.037a: vṛkṣān unmathya vānty ugrā vātāḥ śarkarakarṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:003.037c: patanti caityavṛkṣāś ca grāmeṣu nagareṣu ca
GE07mbh_06_u:003.038a: pītalohitanīlaś ca jvalaty agnir huto dvijaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:003.038e: sparśā gandhā rasāś caiva viparītā mahīpate
GE07mbh_06_u:003.039a: dhūmāyante dhvajā rājñāṃ kampamānā muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:003.040c: gṛdhrāḥ paripatanty ugrā vāmaṃ maṇḍalam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:003.042c: rudanti dīnās turagā mātaṅgāś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:003.042d-0014_03: ete cānye ca bahava utpātā ghoradarśanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:003.043a: etac chrutvā bhavān atra prāptakālaṃ vyavasyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:003.043c: yathā lokaḥ samucchedaṃ nāyaṃ gaccheta bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:003.044c: diṣṭam etat purā manye bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:003.046a: iha kīrtiṃ pare loke dīrghakālaṃ mahat sukham
GE07mbh_06_u:004.001a: evam ukto munis tattvaṃ kavīndro rājasattama
GE07mbh_06_u:004.003a: sṛjate ca punar lokān neha vidyati śāśvatam
GE07mbh_06_u:004.003c: jñātīnāṃ ca kurūṇāṃ ca saṃbandhisuhṛdāṃ tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:004.004a: dharmyaṃ deśaya panthānaṃ samartho hy asi vāraṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:004.004c: kṣudraṃ jñātivadhaṃ prāhur mā kuruṣva mamāpriyam
GE07mbh_06_u:004.005a: kālo 'yaṃ putrarūpeṇa tava jāto viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:004.005c: na vadhaḥ pūjyate vede hitaṃ naitat kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:004.006a: hanyāt sa eva yo hanyāt kuladharmaṃ svakāṃ tanum
GE07mbh_06_u:004.008a: luptaprajñaḥ pareṇāsi dharmaṃ darśaya vai sutān
GE07mbh_06_u:004.008c: kiṃ te rājyena durdharṣa yena prāpto 'si kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_06_u:004.009a: yaśo dharmaṃ ca kīrtiṃ ca pālayan svargam āpsyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:004.009c: labhantāṃ pāṇḍavā rājyaṃ śamaṃ gacchantu kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:004.009d-0016_01: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ ca bhīmaṃ ca vārayiṣyāmi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:004.010c: ākṣipya vākyaṃ vākyajño vākpathenāpy ayāt punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:004.011a: yathā bhavān veda tathāsmi vettā; bhāvābhāvau viditau me yathāvat
GE07mbh_06_u:004.011c: svārthe hi saṃmuhyati tāta loko; māṃ cāpi lokātmakam eva viddhi
GE07mbh_06_u:004.012a: prasādaye tvām atulaprabhāvaṃ; tvaṃ no gatir darśayitā ca dhīraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:004.012c: na cāpi te vaśagā me maharṣe; na kalmaṣaṃ kartum ihārhase mām
GE07mbh_06_u:004.013a: tvaṃ hi dharmaḥ pavitraṃ ca yaśaḥ kīrtir dhṛtiḥ smṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:004.013c: kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca mānyaś cāsi pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:004.013d-0017_01: kuruṣva kāryaṃ yat satyaṃ tvatto mānyo na vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:004.014a: vaicitravīrya nṛpate yat te manasi vartate
GE07mbh_06_u:004.015c: tāni sarvāṇi bhagavañ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:004.016c: puṇyā gandhāś cāhutīnāṃ pravānti; jayasyaitad bhāvino rūpam āhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:004.017a: gambhīraghoṣāś ca mahāsvanāś ca; śaṅkhā mṛdaṅgāś ca nadanti yatra
GE07mbh_06_u:004.017c: viśuddharaśmis tapanaḥ śaśī ca; jayasyaitad bhāvino rūpam āhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:004.018a: iṣṭā vācaḥ pṛṣṭhato vāyasānāṃ; saṃprasthitānāṃ ca gamiṣyatāṃ ca
GE07mbh_06_u:004.018c: ye pṛṣṭhatas te tvarayanti rājan; ye tv agratas te pratiṣedhayanti
GE07mbh_06_u:004.019a: kalyāṇavācaḥ śakunā rājahaṃsāḥ; śukāḥ krauñcāḥ śatapatrāś ca yatra
GE07mbh_06_u:004.019c: pradakṣiṇāś caiva bhavanti saṃkhye; dhruvaṃ jayaṃ tatra vadanti viprāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:004.020a: alaṃkāraiḥ kavacaiḥ ketubhiś ca; mukhaprasādair hemavarṇaiś nṝṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:004.020c: bhrājiṣmatī duṣpratiprekṣaṇīyā; yeṣāṃ camūs te vijayanti śatrūn
GE07mbh_06_u:004.021a: hṛṣṭā vācas tathā sattvaṃ yodhānāṃ yatra bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:004.021c: na mlāyante srajaś caiva te taranti raṇe ripūn
GE07mbh_06_u:004.023c: sadā yodhāś ca hṛṣṭāś ca yeṣāṃ teṣāṃ dhruvaṃ jayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:004.024a: anv eva vāyavo vānti tathābhrāṇi vayāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_06_u:004.026a: alpāyāṃ vā mahatyāṃ vā senāyām iti niścitam
GE07mbh_06_u:004.027a: eko dīrṇo dārayati senāṃ sumahatīm api
GE07mbh_06_u:004.027c: taṃ dīrṇam anudīryante yodhāḥ śūratamā api
GE07mbh_06_u:004.028c: apām iva mahāvegas trastā mṛgagaṇā iva
GE07mbh_06_u:004.029c: dīrṇā ity eva dīryante yodhāḥ śūratamā api
GE07mbh_06_u:004.029e: bhītān bhagnāṃś ca saṃprekṣya bhayaṃ bhūyo vivardhate
GE07mbh_06_u:004.030a: prabhagnā sahasā rājan diśo vibhrāmitā paraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:004.030c: naiva sthāpayituṃ śakyā śūrair api mahācamūḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:004.031b-0018_01: śaknoti na samādhātuṃ dīrṇām indrasamo yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:004.032c: jaghanya eṣa vijayo yo yuddhena viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:004.032e: mahādoṣaḥ saṃnipātas tato vyaṅgaḥ sa ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:004.033c: pañcāśad api ye śūrā mathnanti mahatīṃ camūm
GE07mbh_06_u:004.033e: atha vā pañca ṣaṭ sapta vijayanty anivartinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:004.035a: na bāhulyena senāyā jayo bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:004.035c: adhruvo hi jayo nāma daivaṃ cātra parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:004.035e: jayanto hy api saṃgrāme kṣayavanto bhavanty uta
GE07mbh_06_u:005.001a: evam uktvā yayau vyāso dhṛtarāṣṭrāya dhīmate
GE07mbh_06_u:005.002a: sa muhūrtam iva dhyātvā viniḥśvasya muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:005.004c: na ca śāmyanti nighnanto vardhayanto yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_06_u:005.005a: bhaumam aiśvaryam icchanto na mṛṣyante parasparam
GE07mbh_06_u:005.005c: manye bahuguṇā bhūmis tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:005.006a: bahūni ca sahasrāṇi prayutāny arbudāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:005.007a: deśānāṃ ca parīmāṇaṃ nagarāṇāṃ ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:005.007c: śrotum icchāmi tattvena yata ete samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:005.009a: yathāprajñaṃ mahāprājña bhaumān vakṣyāmi te guṇān
GE07mbh_06_u:005.011a: trasānāṃ khalu sarveṣāṃ śreṣṭhā rājañ jarāyujāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:005.011c: jarāyujānāṃ pravarā mānavāḥ paśavaś ca ye
GE07mbh_06_u:005.013c: ṛkṣāś ca vānarāś caiva saptāraṇyāḥ smṛtā nṛpa
GE07mbh_06_u:005.014c: ete grāmyāḥ samākhyātāḥ paśavaḥ sapta sādhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:005.015a: ete vai paśavo rājan grāmyāraṇyāś caturdaśa
GE07mbh_06_u:005.017a: udbhijjāḥ sthāvarāḥ proktās teṣāṃ pañcaiva jātayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:005.019a: ya etāṃ veda gāyatrīṃ puṇyāṃ sarvaguṇānvitām
GE07mbh_06_u:005.019c: tattvena bharataśreṣṭha sa lokān na praṇaśyati
GE07mbh_06_u:005.020a: bhūmau hi jāyate sarvaṃ bhūmau sarvaṃ praṇaśyati
GE07mbh_06_u:005.020c: bhūmiḥ pratiṣṭhā bhūtānāṃ bhūmir eva parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:005.021a: yasya bhūmis tasya sarvaṃ jagat sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_06_u:006.001c: tathā janapadānāṃ ca ye cānye bhūmim āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:006.002a: pramāṇaṃ ca pramāṇajña pṛthivyā api sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:006.003c: jagat sthitāni sarvāṇi samāny āhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:006.004a: bhūmir āpas tathā vāyur agnir ākāśam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:006.005a: śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca raso gandhaś ca pañcamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:006.005c: bhūmer ete guṇāḥ proktā ṛṣibhis tattvavedibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:006.005d-0020_01: śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca rasaś cāpi prakīrtitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:006.006a: catvāro 'psu guṇā rājan gandhas tatra na vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:006.006c: śabdaḥ sparśaś ca rūpaṃ ca tejaso 'tha guṇās trayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:006.006e: śabdaḥ sparśaś ca vāyos tu ākāśe śabda eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:006.007a: ete pañca guṇā rājan mahābhūteṣu pañcasu
GE07mbh_06_u:006.008a: anyonyaṃ nābhivartante sāmyaṃ bhavati vai yadā
GE07mbh_06_u:006.008f-0021_01: bhāvaṃ na ca bhajantas te nāśaṃ gacchanti nānyathā
GE07mbh_06_u:006.009c: sarvāṇy aparimeyāni tad eṣāṃ rūpam aiśvaram
GE07mbh_06_u:006.010a: tatra tatra hi dṛśyante dhātavaḥ pāñcabhautikāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:006.011a: acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvā na tāṃs tarkeṇa sādhayet
GE07mbh_06_u:006.011c: prakṛtibhyaḥ paraṃ yat tu tad acintyasya lakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:006.013c: puraiś ca vividhākārai ramyair janapadais tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:006.015a: yathā ca puruṣaḥ paśyed ādarśe mukham ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:006.016a: dvir aṃśe pippalas tatra dvir aṃśe ca śaśo mahān
GE07mbh_06_u:006.016e: āpas tato 'nyā vijñeyā eṣa saṃkṣepa ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:006.016f-0022_01: tato 'nya ucyate cāyam enaṃ saṃkṣepataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_06_u:007.001a: ukto dvīpasya saṃkṣepo vistaraṃ brūhi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:007.001e: tasya pramāṇaṃ prabrūhi tato vakṣyasi pippalam
GE07mbh_06_u:007.002a: evam uktaḥ sa rājñā tu saṃjayo vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:007.002d-0024_01: sthitā samudram ākramya avarūḍhā bhavaṃs tataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.003a: himavān hemakūṭaś ca niṣadhaś ca nagottamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.003c: nīlaś ca vaiḍūryamayaḥ śvetaś ca rajataprabhaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.005a: tatra puṇyā janapadās tāni varṣāṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:007.006a: idaṃ tu bhārataṃ varṣaṃ tato haimavataṃ param
GE07mbh_06_u:007.010c: ūrdhvam antaś ca tiryak ca lokān āvṛtya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_06_u:007.011a: tasya pārśve tv ime dvīpāś catvāraḥ saṃsthitāḥ prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:007.011c: bhadrāśvaḥ ketumālaś ca jambūdvīpaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:007.011d-0028_01: ketumālaś caturthaś ca meroḥ paścimataḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.012c: sa vai vicintayām āsa sauvarṇān prekṣya vāyasān
GE07mbh_06_u:007.013c: aviśeṣakaro yasmāt tasmād enaṃ tyajāmy aham
GE07mbh_06_u:007.014c: candramāś ca sanakṣatro vāyuś caiva pradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:007.017a: tatra brahmā ca rudraś ca śakraś cāpi sureśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.018a: tumburur nāradaś caiva viśvāvasur hahā huhūḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.019c: tatra gacchanti bhadraṃ te sadā parvaṇi parvaṇi
GE07mbh_06_u:007.020a: tasyaiva mūrdhany uśanāḥ kāvyo daityair mahīpate
GE07mbh_06_u:007.021a: tasmāt kubero bhagavāṃś caturthaṃ bhāgam aśnute
GE07mbh_06_u:007.023a: tatra sākṣāt paśupatir divyair bhūtaiḥ samāvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.024c: tribhir netraiḥ kṛtoddyotas tribhiḥ sūryair ivoditaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.025c: paśyanti na hi durvṛttaiḥ śakyo draṣṭuṃ maheśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.027a: puṇyā puṇyatamair juṣṭā gaṅgā bhāgīrathī śubhā
GE07mbh_06_u:007.027e: tayā hy utpāditaḥ puṇyaḥ sa hradaḥ sāgaropamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.028a: tāṃ dhārayām āsa purā durdharāṃ parvatair api
GE07mbh_06_u:007.029a: meros tu paścime pārśve ketumālo mahīpate
GE07mbh_06_u:007.030a: āyur daśa sahasrāṇi varṣāṇāṃ tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:007.034a: tatra kṛṣṇā narā rājaṃs tejoyuktā mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.035a: nīlāt parataraṃ śvetaṃ śvetād dhairaṇyakaṃ param
GE07mbh_06_u:007.035b-0030_01: hiraṇmayaṃ ca śvetādreḥ paraṃ varṣaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:007.035b-0030_02: kuruvarṣaṃ tato rājañ śṛṅgavat parvatāt param
GE07mbh_06_u:007.035c: varṣam airāvataṃ nāma tataḥ śṛṅgavataḥ param
GE07mbh_06_u:007.036c: ilāvṛtaṃ madhyamaṃ tu pañca varṣāṇi caiva ha
GE07mbh_06_u:007.038c: evam eṣā mahārāja parvataiḥ pṛthivī citā
GE07mbh_06_u:007.039a: hemakūṭas tu sumahān kailāso nāma parvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.039c: yatra vaiśravaṇo rājā guhyakaiḥ saha modate
GE07mbh_06_u:007.039d-0031_01: tatra devo mahādevo nityam āste sahomayā
GE07mbh_06_u:007.040a: asty uttareṇa kailāsaṃ mainākaṃ parvataṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:007.041a: tasya pārśve mahad divyaṃ śubhaṃ kāñcanavālukam
GE07mbh_06_u:007.041c: ramyaṃ bindusaro nāma yatra rājā bhagīrathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.041e: dṛṣṭvā bhāgīrathīṃ gaṅgām uvāsa bahulāḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.042a: yūpā maṇimayās tatra cityāś cāpi hiraṇmayāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.042c: tatreṣṭvā tu gataḥ siddhiṃ sahasrākṣo mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.043e: naranārāyaṇau brahmā manuḥ sthāṇuś ca pañcamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.044a: tatra tripathagā devī prathamaṃ tu pratiṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_06_u:007.045c: jambūnadī ca sītā ca gaṅgā sindhuś ca saptamī
GE07mbh_06_u:007.047a: dṛśyādṛśyā ca bhavati tatra tatra sarasvatī
GE07mbh_06_u:007.047c: etā divyāḥ sapta gaṅgās triṣu lokeṣu viśrutāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.048a: rakṣāṃsi vai himavati hemakūṭe tu guhyakāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.048c: sarpā nāgāś ca niṣadhe gokarṇe ca tapodhanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.049a: devāsurāṇāṃ ca gṛhaṃ śvetaḥ parvata ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:007.049c: gandharvā niṣadhe śaile nīle brahmarṣayo nṛpa
GE07mbh_06_u:007.050a: ity etāni mahārāja sapta varṣāṇi bhāgaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:007.052a: yāṃ tu pṛcchasi mā rājan divyām etāṃ śaśākṛtim
GE07mbh_06_u:007.052c: pārśve śaśasya dve varṣe ubhaye dakṣiṇottare
GE07mbh_06_u:007.052d-0034_01: anyāni pañca varṣāṇi galāntaṃ kalpitāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:007.052e: karṇau tu nāgadvīpaṃ ca kaśyapadvīpam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:008.001a: meror athottaraṃ pārśvaṃ pūrvaṃ cācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:008.002a: dakṣiṇena tu nīlasya meroḥ pārśve tathottare
GE07mbh_06_u:008.003c: puṣpāṇi ca sugandhīni rasavanti phalāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:008.004a: sarvakāmaphalās tatra ke cid vṛkṣā janādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:008.004c: apare kṣīriṇo nāma vṛkṣās tatra narādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:008.005a: ye kṣaranti sadā kṣīraṃ ṣaḍrasaṃ hy amṛtopamam
GE07mbh_06_u:008.005c: vastrāṇi ca prasūyante phaleṣv ābharaṇāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:008.008c: teṣāṃ te kṣīriṇāṃ kṣīraṃ pibanty amṛtasaṃnibham
GE07mbh_06_u:008.009a: mithunaṃ jāyamānaṃ vai samaṃ tac ca pravardhate
GE07mbh_06_u:008.009f-0037_01: mṛtyuś ca samakālaṃ ca tayor mithunayugmayoḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:008.010e: jīvanti te mahārāja na cānyonyaṃ jahaty uta
GE07mbh_06_u:008.011c: te nirharanti hi mṛtān darīṣu prakṣipanti ca
GE07mbh_06_u:008.012a: uttarāḥ kuravo rājan vyākhyātās te samāsataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:008.012c: meroḥ pārśvam ahaṃ pūrvaṃ vakṣyāmy atha yathātatham
GE07mbh_06_u:008.012d-0038_01: bhadrāśvaṃ nāma varṣaṃ tu puro vai gandhamādanāt
GE07mbh_06_u:008.013a: tasya pūrvābhiṣekas tu bhadrāśvasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:008.015a: tatra te puruṣāḥ śvetās tejoyuktā mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:008.020a: yojanānāṃ sahasraṃ ca śataṃ ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:008.021a: aratnīnāṃ sahasraṃ ca śatāni daśa pañca ca
GE07mbh_06_u:008.022a: patamānāni tāny urvyāṃ kurvanti vipulaṃ svanam
GE07mbh_06_u:008.022c: muñcanti ca rasaṃ rājaṃs tasmin rajatasaṃnibham
GE07mbh_06_u:008.023a: tasyā jambvāḥ phalaraso nadī bhūtvā janādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:008.023c: meruṃ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā saṃprayāty uttarān kurūn
GE07mbh_06_u:008.024a: pibanti tad rasaṃ hṛṣṭā janā nityaṃ janādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:008.024c: tasmin phalarase pīte na jarā bādhate ca tān
GE07mbh_06_u:008.026a: tathā mālyavataḥ śṛṅge dīpyate tatra havyavāṭ
GE07mbh_06_u:008.028c: brahmalokāc cyutāḥ sarve sarve ca brahmavādinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:008.029a: tapas tu tapyamānās te bhavanti hy ūrdhvaretasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:008.030a: ṣaṣṭis tāni sahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭir eva śatāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:008.031a: ṣaṣṭiṃ varṣasahasrāṇi ṣaṣṭim eva śatāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:009.001a: varṣāṇāṃ caiva nāmāni parvatānāṃ ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:009.001c: ācakṣva me yathātattvaṃ ye ca parvatavāsinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:009.002c: varṣaṃ ramaṇakaṃ nāma jāyante tatra mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:009.003c: ratipradhānāś ca tathā jāyante tatra mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:009.004a: daśa varṣasahasrāṇi śatāni daśa pañca ca
GE07mbh_06_u:009.005c: varṣaṃ hairaṇvataṃ nāma yatra hairaṇvatī nadī
GE07mbh_06_u:009.007c: āyuṣpramāṇaṃ jīvanti śatāni daśa pañca ca
GE07mbh_06_u:009.008a: śṛṅgāṇi vai śṛṅgavatas trīṇy eva manujādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:009.008c: ekaṃ maṇimayaṃ tatra tathaikaṃ raukmam adbhutam
GE07mbh_06_u:009.009c: tatra svayaṃprabhā devī nityaṃ vasati śāṇḍilī
GE07mbh_06_u:009.010c: varṣam airāvataṃ nāma tasmāc chṛṅgavataḥ param
GE07mbh_06_u:009.011a: na tatra sūryas tapati na te jīryanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:009.011c: candramāś ca sanakṣatro jyotir bhūta ivāvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:009.016a: aṣṭacakraṃ hi tad yānaṃ bhūtayuktaṃ manojavam
GE07mbh_06_u:009.017a: sa prabhuḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vibhuś ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:009.017c: saṃkṣepo vistaraś caiva kartā kārayitā ca saḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:009.018a: pṛthivy āpas tathākāśaṃ vāyus tejaś ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_06_u:009.018c: sa yajñaḥ sarvabhūtānām āsyaṃ tasya hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:009.018d-0042_01: sthitaḥ sthānasahasreṣu vyāpya vai sa carācaram
GE07mbh_06_u:009.019c: dhyānam anvagamad rājā putrān prati janādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:009.020a: sa vicintya mahārāja punar evābravīd vacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:009.020e: sṛjate ca punaḥ sarvaṃ neha vidyati śāśvatam
GE07mbh_06_u:009.021c: devā vaikuṇṭha ity āhur vedā viṣṇur iti prabhum
GE07mbh_06_u:010.001a: yad idaṃ bhārataṃ varṣaṃ yatredaṃ mūrchitaṃ balam
GE07mbh_06_u:010.002a: yatra gṛddhāḥ pāṇḍusutā yatra me sajjate manaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:010.002c: etan me tattvam ācakṣva kuśalo hy asi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:010.003a: na tatra pāṇḍavā gṛddhāḥ śṛṇu rājan vaco mama
GE07mbh_06_u:010.003c: gṛddho duryodhanas tatra śakuniś cāpi saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:010.004c: ye gṛddhā bhārate varṣe na mṛṣyanti parasparam
GE07mbh_06_u:010.005a: atra te varṇayiṣyāmi varṣaṃ bhārata bhāratam
GE07mbh_06_u:010.005c: priyam indrasya devasya manor vaivasvatasya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:010.006a: pṛthoś ca rājan vainyasya tathekṣvākor mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:010.007d-0043_01: kuśikasya ca durdharṣa gādheś caiva mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:010.007d-0043_02: somakasya ca durdharṣa dilīpasya tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:010.008c: sarveṣām eva rājendra priyaṃ bhārata bhāratam
GE07mbh_06_u:010.009a: tat te varṣaṃ pravakṣyāmi yathāśrutam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_06_u:010.009c: śṛṇu me gadato rājan yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_06_u:010.010a: mahendro malayaḥ sahyaḥ śuktimān ṛkṣavān api
GE07mbh_06_u:010.010c: vindhyaś ca pāriyātraś ca saptaite kulaparvatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:010.011a: teṣāṃ sahasraśo rājan parvatās tu samīpataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:010.012c: āryā mlecchāś ca kauravya tair miśrāḥ puruṣā vibho
GE07mbh_06_u:010.013a: nadīḥ pibanti bahulā gaṅgāṃ sindhuṃ sarasvatīm
GE07mbh_06_u:010.013c: godāvarīṃ narmadāṃ ca bāhudāṃ ca mahānadīm
GE07mbh_06_u:010.014a: śatadruṃ candrabhāgāṃ ca yamunāṃ ca mahānadīm
GE07mbh_06_u:010.015a: nadīṃ vetravatīṃ caiva kṛṣṇaveṇāṃ ca nimnagām
GE07mbh_06_u:010.015c: irāvatīṃ vitastāṃ ca payoṣṇīṃ devikām api
GE07mbh_06_u:010.017a: gomatīṃ dhūtapāpāṃ ca vandanāṃ ca mahānadīm
GE07mbh_06_u:010.018a: rathasthāṃ śatakumbhāṃ ca sarayūṃ ca nareśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:010.019a: śatāvarīṃ payoṣṇīṃ ca parāṃ bhaimarathīṃ tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:010.019c: kāverīṃ culukāṃ cāpi vāpīṃ śatabalām api
GE07mbh_06_u:010.021a: pūrvābhirāmāṃ vīrāṃ ca bhīmām oghavatīṃ tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:010.022c: puruhīṃ pravarāṃ menāṃ moghāṃ ghṛtavatīṃ tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:010.023a: dhūmatyām atikṛṣṇāṃ ca sūcīṃ chāvīṃ ca kaurava
GE07mbh_06_u:010.024a: śaśikāntāṃ śivāṃ caiva tathā vīravatīm api
GE07mbh_06_u:010.024c: vāstuṃ suvāstuṃ gaurīṃ ca kampanāṃ sahiraṇvatīm
GE07mbh_06_u:010.027a: vidiśāṃ kṛṣṇaveṇṇāṃ ca tāmrāṃ ca kapilām api
GE07mbh_06_u:010.028a: śīghrāṃ ca picchilāṃ caiva bhāradvājīṃ ca nimnagām
GE07mbh_06_u:010.028c: kauśikīṃ nimnagāṃ śoṇāṃ bāhudām atha candanām
GE07mbh_06_u:010.029c: carakṣāṃ mahirohīṃ ca tathā jambunadīm api
GE07mbh_06_u:010.030a: sunasāṃ tamasāṃ dāsīṃ trasām anyāṃ varāṇasīm
GE07mbh_06_u:010.032a: brahmāṇīṃ ca mahāgaurīṃ durgām api ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:010.034c: kumārīm ṛṣikulyāṃ ca brahmakulyāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:010.035a: sarasvatīḥ supuṇyāś ca sarvā gaṅgāś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:010.035b-0045_01: brahmāṇīṃ ca mahāgaurīṃ suvaśyām api bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:010.035c: viśvasya mātaraḥ sarvāḥ sarvāś caiva mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:010.036a: tathā nadyas tv aprakāśāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:010.036c: ity etāḥ sarito rājan samākhyātā yathāsmṛti
GE07mbh_06_u:010.037a: ata ūrdhvaṃ janapadān nibodha gadato mama
GE07mbh_06_u:010.038a: śūrasenāḥ kaliṅgāś ca bodhā maukās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:010.039c: uttamaujā daśārṇāś ca mekalāś cotkalaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:010.041a: jaṭharāḥ kukkuśāś caiva sudāśārṇāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:010.043a: ādirāṣṭrāḥ sukuṭṭāś ca balirāṣṭraṃ ca kevalam
GE07mbh_06_u:010.043c: vānarāsyāḥ pravāhāś ca vakrā vakrabhayāḥ śakāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:010.044a: videhakā māgadhāś ca suhmāś ca vijayās tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:010.044c: aṅgā vaṅgāḥ kaliṅgāś ca yakṛllomāna eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:010.046a: aparandhrāś ca śūdrāś ca pahlavāś carmakhaṇḍikāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:010.048a: andhrāś ca bahavo rājann antargiryās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:010.048d-0049_01: antargiryās tathā caiva bahirgiryās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:010.049c: puṇḍrā bhārgāḥ kirātāś ca sudoṣṇāḥ pramudās tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:010.050c: dugūlāḥ pratimatsyāś ca kuśalāḥ kunaṭās tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:010.052c: abhīsārā kulūtāś ca śaivalā bāhlikās tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:010.056a: oṣṭrāḥ puṇḍrāḥ sasairandhrāḥ pārvatīyāś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:010.061c: kulindāḥ kulakāś caiva karaṇṭhāḥ kurakās tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:010.062c: ādidāyāḥ sirālāś ca stūbakā stanapās tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:010.064c: sakṣaddruhaḥ kuntalāś ca hūṇāḥ pāratakaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:010.066c: khaśikāś ca tukhārāś ca pallavā girigahvarāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:010.067c: aupakāś ca kaliṅgāś ca kirātānāṃ ca jātayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:010.067d-0050_01: kāraskarāś ca vaṃśāś ca āndhrāś ca dramiḍās tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:010.067d-0050_02: colāś caiva tathā pāṇḍyāś cerāś caiva susiṃhalāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:010.068b-0051_01: ete cānye janapadāḥ prācyodīcyās tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:010.069c: duhyed dhenuḥ kāmadhuk ca bhūmiḥ samyag anuṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_06_u:010.070c: te tyajanty āhave prāṇān rasāgṛddhās tarasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:010.072c: na cāpi tṛptiḥ kāmānāṃ vidyate ceha kasya cit
GE07mbh_06_u:010.073c: sāmnā dānena bhedena daṇḍenaiva ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_06_u:010.074a: pitā mātā ca putraś ca khaṃ dyauś ca narapuṃgava
GE07mbh_06_u:011.001c: pramāṇam āyuṣaḥ sūta phalaṃ cāpi śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_06_u:011.002c: ācakṣva me vistareṇa harivarṣaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:011.003c: kṛtaṃ tretā dvāparaṃ ca puṣyaṃ ca kuruvardhana
GE07mbh_06_u:011.004a: pūrvaṃ kṛtayugaṃ nāma tatas tretāyugaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_06_u:011.006c: dvisahasraṃ dvāpare tu śate tiṣṭhati saṃprati
GE07mbh_06_u:011.007a: na pramāṇasthitir hy asti puṣye 'smin bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:011.007c: garbhasthāś ca mriyante 'tra tathā jātā mriyanti ca
GE07mbh_06_u:011.008b-0052_01: prajāyante ca jātāś ca śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:011.012c: lubdhāś cānṛtakāś caiva puṣye jāyanti bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:011.013a: īrṣyā mānas tathā krodho māyāsūyā tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:011.013c: puṣye bhavanti martyānāṃ rāgo lobhaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:012.001a: jambūkhaṇḍas tvayā prokto yathāvad iha saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:012.001c: viṣkambham asya prabrūhi parimāṇaṃ ca tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:012.002c: śākadvīpaṃ ca me brūhi kuśadvīpaṃ ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:012.003a: śālmalaṃ caiva tattvena krauñcadvīpaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:012.003c: brūhi gāvalgaṇe sarvaṃ rāhoḥ somārkayos tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:012.004a: rājan subahavo dvīpā yair idaṃ saṃtataṃ jagat
GE07mbh_06_u:012.004c: sapta tv ahaṃ pravakṣyāmi candrādityau grahāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:012.008a: śākadvīpaṃ ca vakṣyāmi yathāvad iha pārthiva
GE07mbh_06_u:012.008c: śṛṇu me tvaṃ yathānyāyaṃ bruvataḥ kurunandana
GE07mbh_06_u:012.009d-0054_01: śalmaliś ca kuśa[ḥ] krauñco dviguṇo hy uttarottaram
GE07mbh_06_u:012.010a: tatra puṇyā janapadā na tatra mriyate janaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:012.010c: kuta eva hi durbhikṣaṃ kṣamātejoyutā hi te
GE07mbh_06_u:012.011c: ukta eṣa mahārāja kim anyac chrotum icchasi
GE07mbh_06_u:012.012c: uktas tvayā mahābhāga vistaraṃ brūhi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:012.013c: ratnākarās tathā nadyas teṣāṃ nāmāni me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_06_u:012.014e: yato meghāḥ pravartante prabhavanti ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:012.015c: yatra nityam upādatte vāsavaḥ paramaṃ jalam
GE07mbh_06_u:012.016a: uccair girī raivatako yatra nityaṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:012.017a: uttareṇa tu rājendra śyāmo nāma mahāgiriḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:012.018a: sumahān saṃśayo me 'dya proktaṃ saṃjaya yat tvayā
GE07mbh_06_u:012.018c: prajāḥ kathaṃ sūtaputra saṃprāptāḥ śyāmatām iha
GE07mbh_06_u:012.019c: gauraḥ kṛṣṇaś ca varṇau dvau tayor varṇāntaraṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_06_u:012.020a: śyāmo yasmāt pravṛtto vai tat te vakṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:012.020c: āste 'tra bhagavān kṛṣṇas tat kāntyā śyāmatāṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:012.023c: jaladhārāt paro rājan sukumāra iti smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:012.024a: raivatasya tu kaumāraḥ śyāmasya tu maṇīcakaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:012.025a: parivārya tu kauravya dairghyaṃ hrasvatvam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:012.026a: śāko nāma mahārāja tasya dvīpasya madhyagaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:012.026c: tatra puṇyā janapadāḥ pūjyate tatra śaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:012.027a: tatra gacchanti siddhāś ca cāraṇā daivatāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:012.027c: dhārmikāś ca prajā rājaṃś catvāro 'tīva bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:012.028a: varṇāḥ svakarmaniratā na ca steno 'tra dṛśyate
GE07mbh_06_u:012.029a: prajās tatra vivardhante varṣāsv iva samudragāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:012.029c: nadyaḥ puṇyajalās tatra gaṅgā ca bahudhāgatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:012.030a: sukumārī kumārī ca sītā kāverakā tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:012.030c: mahānadī ca kauravya tathā maṇijalā nadī
GE07mbh_06_u:012.031c: sahasrāṇāṃ śatāny eva yato varṣati vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:012.032a: na tāsāṃ nāmadheyāni parimāṇaṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:012.032c: śakyate parisaṃkhyātuṃ puṇyās tā hi saridvarāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:012.033c: magāś ca maśakāś caiva mānasā mandagās tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:012.035e: śūdrās tu mandage nityaṃ puruṣā dharmaśīlinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:012.036a: na tatra rājā rājendra na daṇḍo na ca daṇḍikāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:012.036c: svadharmeṇaiva dharmaṃ ca te rakṣanti parasparam
GE07mbh_06_u:012.037a: etāvad eva śakyaṃ tu tasmin dvīpe prabhāṣitum
GE07mbh_06_u:013.001a: uttareṣu tu kauravya dvīpeṣu śrūyate kathā
GE07mbh_06_u:013.001c: yathāśrutaṃ mahārāja bruvatas tan nibodha me
GE07mbh_06_u:013.002d-0057_01: ikṣūdaś ca surodaś ca sarpiḥkṣīrodadhis tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:013.004a: gauras tu madhyame dvīpe girir mānaḥśilo mahān
GE07mbh_06_u:013.005a: tatra ratnāni divyāni svayaṃ rakṣati keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.006b-0058_01: saṃpūjyate hi plakṣaś ca svadī[?dvī]pakhyātikṛd yathā
GE07mbh_06_u:013.006c: saṃpūjyate śalmaliś ca dvīpe śālmalike nṛpa
GE07mbh_06_u:013.008e: mokṣibhiḥ saṃstuto nityaṃ prabhur nārāyaṇo hariḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.009a: kuśadvīpe tu rājendra parvato vidrumaiś citaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.010a: dyutimān nāma kauravya tṛtīyaḥ kumudo giriḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.010c: caturthaḥ puṣpavān nāma pañcamas tu kuśeśayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.011a: ṣaṣṭho harigirir nāma ṣaḍ ete parvatottamāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.012c: tṛtīyaṃ vai rathākāraṃ caturthaṃ pālanaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:013.013a: dhṛtimat pañcamaṃ varṣaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ varṣaṃ prabhākaram
GE07mbh_06_u:013.014c: viharanti ramante ca na teṣu mriyate janaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.015a: na teṣu dasyavaḥ santi mlecchajātyo 'pi vā nṛpa
GE07mbh_06_u:013.015c: gauraprāyo janaḥ sarvaḥ sukumāraś ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_06_u:013.018c: mainākāt parato rājan govindo girir uttamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.019a: govindāt tu paro rājan nibiḍo nāma parvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.019c: paras tu dviguṇas teṣāṃ viṣkambho vaṃśavardhana
GE07mbh_06_u:013.020a: deśāṃs tatra pravakṣyāmi tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_06_u:013.024c: tatra nityaṃ nivasati svayaṃ devaḥ prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.025a: taṃ paryupāsate nityaṃ devāḥ sarve maharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.027a: viprāṇāṃ brahmacaryeṇa satyena ca damena ca
GE07mbh_06_u:013.028a: eko janapado rājan dvīpeṣv eteṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:013.028c: uktā janapadā yeṣu dharmaś caikaḥ pradṛśyate
GE07mbh_06_u:013.029a: īśvaro daṇḍam udyamya svayam eva prajāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.029c: dvīpān etān mahārāja rakṣaṃs tiṣṭhati nityadā
GE07mbh_06_u:013.030a: sa rājā sa śivo rājan sa pitā sa pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.031a: bhojanaṃ cātra kauravya prajāḥ svayam upasthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:013.031c: siddham eva mahārāja bhuñjate tatra nityadā
GE07mbh_06_u:013.032a: tataḥ paraṃ samā nāma dṛśyate lokasaṃsthitiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.032c: caturaśrā mahārāja trayas triṃśat tu maṇḍalam
GE07mbh_06_u:013.034a: tasyāhaṃ parimāṇaṃ tu na saṃkhyātum ihotsahe
GE07mbh_06_u:013.034c: asaṃkhyātaḥ sa nityaṃ hi tiryag ūrdhvam adhas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:013.035a: tatra vai vāyavo vānti digbhyaḥ sarvābhya eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:013.035c: asaṃbādhā mahārāja tān nigṛhṇanti te gajāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.036c: te śanaiḥ punar evāśu vāyūn muñcanti nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.037a: śvasadbhir mucyamānās tu diggajair iha mārutāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.037c: āgacchanti mahārāja tatas tiṣṭhanti vai prajāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.038a: paro vai vistaro 'tyarthaṃ tvayā saṃjaya kīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.039a: uktā dvīpā mahārāja grahān me śṛṇu tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.041c: ṣaṣṭim āhuḥ śatāny asya budhāḥ paurāṇikās tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:013.042a: candramās tu sahasrāṇi rājann ekādaśa smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.043a: sūryas tv aṣṭau sahasrāṇi dve cānye kurunandana
GE07mbh_06_u:013.043c: viṣkambheṇa tato rājan maṇḍalaṃ triṃśataṃ samam
GE07mbh_06_u:013.044e: etat pramāṇam arkasya nirdiṣṭam iha bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:013.045a: sa rāhuś chādayaty etau yathākālaṃ mahattayā
GE07mbh_06_u:013.046a: ity etat te mahārāja pṛcchataḥ śāstracakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_06_u:013.046c: sarvam uktaṃ yathātattvaṃ tasmāc chamam avāpnuhi
GE07mbh_06_u:013.047a: yathādṛṣṭaṃ mayā proktaṃ saniryāṇam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_06_u:013.047c: tasmād āśvasa kauravya putraṃ duryodhanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:013.048e: āyur balaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca tasya tejaś ca vardhate
GE07mbh_06_u:013.049c: prīyante pitaras tasya tathaiva ca pitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:013.050a: idaṃ tu bhārataṃ varṣaṃ yatra vartāmahe vayam
GE07mbh_06_u:013.050c: pūrvaṃ pravartate puṇyaṃ tat sarvaṃ śrutavān asi vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:014.001-0059_03: dṛṣṭvā tu samare rājan kṣaṇenaiva samāgataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:014.001a: atha gāvalgaṇir dhīmān samarād etya saṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:014.005a: yasya vīryaṃ samāśritya dyūtaṃ putras tavākarot
GE07mbh_06_u:014.005c: sa śete nihato rājan saṃkhye bhīṣmaḥ śikhaṇḍinā
GE07mbh_06_u:014.007c: na hato jāmadagnyena sa hato 'dya śikhaṇḍinā
GE07mbh_06_u:014.008a: mahendrasadṛśaḥ śaurye sthairye ca himavān iva
GE07mbh_06_u:014.010a: pāṇḍavānāṃ mahat sainyaṃ yaṃ dṛṣṭvodyantam āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:014.011a: parirakṣya sa senāṃ te daśarātram anīkahā
GE07mbh_06_u:014.012a: yaḥ sa śakra ivākṣobhyo varṣan bāṇān sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:014.012c: jaghāna yudhi yodhānām arbudaṃ daśabhir dinaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:014.013a: sa śete niṣṭanan bhūmau vātarugṇa iva drumaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:014.013c: tava durmantrite rājan yathā nārhaḥ sa bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:015.001a: kathaṃ kurūṇām ṛṣabho hato bhīṣmaḥ śikhaṇḍinā
GE07mbh_06_u:015.001c: kathaṃ rathāt sa nyapatat pitā me vāsavopamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.002a: katham āsaṃś ca me putrā hīnā bhīṣmeṇa saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:015.003c: mahārathe naravyāghre kim u āsīn manas tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:015.004a: ārtiḥ parā māviśati yataḥ śaṃsasi me hatam
GE07mbh_06_u:015.005a: ke taṃ yāntam anupreyuḥ ke cāsyāsan purogamāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.008c: kṛtinaṃ taṃ durādharṣaṃ samyag yāsyantam antike
GE07mbh_06_u:015.010c: pātayām āsa kaunteyaḥ kathaṃ tam ajitaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:015.012a: pāṇḍavānāṃ mahat sainyaṃ yaṃ dṛṣṭvodyantam āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:015.013a: parikṛṣya sa senāṃ me daśarātram anīkahā
GE07mbh_06_u:015.014a: yaḥ sa śakra ivākṣayyaṃ varṣaṃ śaramayaṃ sṛjan
GE07mbh_06_u:015.014c: jaghāna yudhi yodhānām arbudaṃ daśabhir dinaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.015a: sa śete niṣṭanan bhūmau vātarugṇa iva drumaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.015c: mama durmantritenāsau yathā nārhaḥ sa bhārataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.017c: kathaṃ ca nājayad bhīṣmo droṇe jīvati saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:015.018c: bhīṣmaḥ praharatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kathaṃ sa nidhanaṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.019c: bhīṣmo vinihato yuddhe devair api durutsahaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.020a: yaḥ spardhate raṇe nityaṃ jāmadagnyaṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_06_u:015.021c: saṃjayācakṣva me vīraṃ yena śarma na vidmahe
GE07mbh_06_u:015.023a: yac chikhaṇḍimukhāḥ sarve pāṇḍavā bhīṣmam abhyayuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.023c: kaccin na kuravo bhītās tatyajuḥ saṃjayācyutam
GE07mbh_06_u:015.025c: nighnan pararathān vīro dānavān iva vajrabhṛt
GE07mbh_06_u:015.027a: hayān gajān padātāṃś ca rathāṃś ca tarasā bahūn
GE07mbh_06_u:015.029a: bhīṣmo yad akarot karma samare saṃjayārihā
GE07mbh_06_u:015.030c: pṛṣṭhataḥ ke parān vīrā upāsedhan yatavratāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.031a: ke purastād avartanta rakṣanto bhīṣmam antike
GE07mbh_06_u:015.031c: ke 'rakṣann uttaraṃ cakraṃ vīrā vīrasya yudhyataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.032a: vāme cakre vartamānāḥ ke 'ghnan saṃjaya sṛñjayān
GE07mbh_06_u:015.033c: samūhe ke parān vīrān pratyayudhyanta saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:015.034a: rakṣyamāṇaḥ kathaṃ vīrair gopyamānāś ca tena te
GE07mbh_06_u:015.035c: kathaṃ prahartum api te śekuḥ saṃjaya pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.036a: yasmin dvīpe samāśritya yudhyanti kuravaḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.036c: taṃ nimagnaṃ naravyāghraṃ bhīṣmaṃ śaṃsasi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:015.037a: yasya vīrye samāśvasya mama putro bṛhadbalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.037c: na pāṇḍavān agaṇayat kathaṃ sa nihataḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.038a: yaḥ purā vibudhaiḥ sendraiḥ sāhāyye yuddhadurmadaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.038c: kāṅkṣito dānavān ghnadbhiḥ pitā mama mahāvrataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.039c: śokaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca dainyaṃ ca prājahāt putralakṣmaṇi
GE07mbh_06_u:015.041c: hataṃ śāṃtanavaṃ śrutvā manye śeṣaṃ balaṃ hatam
GE07mbh_06_u:015.042a: dharmād adharmo balavān saṃprāpta iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.042c: yatra vṛddhaṃ guruṃ hatvā rājyam icchanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.043c: ambārtham udyataḥ saṃkhye bhīṣmeṇa yudhi nirjitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.044c: hataṃ śaṃsasi bhīṣmaṃ me kiṃ nu duḥkham ataḥ param
GE07mbh_06_u:015.045d-0061_01: na hato yo mahābuddhiḥ sa hato 'dya śikhaṇḍinā
GE07mbh_06_u:015.048a: ke vīrās tam amitraghnam anvayuḥ śatrusaṃsadi
GE07mbh_06_u:015.048c: śaṃsa me tad yathā vṛttaṃ yuddhaṃ bhīṣmasya pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.049a: yoṣeva hatavīrā me senā putrasya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:015.049c: agopam iva codbhrāntaṃ gokulaṃ tad balaṃ mama
GE07mbh_06_u:015.050c: parāsikte ca vas tasmin katham āsīn manas tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:015.051a: jīvite 'py adya sāmarthyaṃ kim ivāsmāsu saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:015.052a: agādhe salile magnāṃ nāvaṃ dṛṣṭveva pāragāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.052c: bhīṣme hate bhṛśaṃ duḥkhān manye śocanti putrakāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.053c: yac chrutvā puruṣavyāghraṃ hataṃ bhīṣmaṃ na dīryate
GE07mbh_06_u:015.054a: yasminn astraṃ ca medhā ca nītiś ca bharatarṣabhe
GE07mbh_06_u:015.054c: aprameyāṇi durdharṣe kathaṃ sa nihato yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:015.055a: na cāstreṇa na śauryeṇa tapasā medhayā na ca
GE07mbh_06_u:015.055c: na dhṛtyā na punas tyāgān mṛtyoḥ kaś cid vimucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:015.056c: yatra śāṃtanavaṃ bhīṣmaṃ hataṃ śaṃsasi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:015.059a: nāhaṃ sveṣāṃ pareṣāṃ vā buddhyā saṃjaya cintayan
GE07mbh_06_u:015.059c: śeṣaṃ kiṃ cit prapaśyāmi pratyanīke mahīkṣitām
GE07mbh_06_u:015.060c: yatra śāṃtanavaṃ hatvā rājyam icchanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.061a: vayaṃ vā rājyam icchāmo ghātayitvā pitāmaham
GE07mbh_06_u:015.062a: etad āryeṇa kartavyaṃ kṛcchrāsv āpatsu saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:015.062c: parākramaḥ paraṃ śaktyā tac ca tasmin pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_06_u:015.064a: kathaṃ yuktāny anīkāni kathaṃ yuddhaṃ mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.064c: kathaṃ vā nihato bhīṣmaḥ pitā saṃjaya me paraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.065a: duryodhanaś ca karṇaś ca śakuniś cāpi saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.065c: duḥśāsanaś ca kitavo hate bhīṣme kim abruvan
GE07mbh_06_u:015.067a: prāviśan kitavā mandāḥ sabhāṃ yudhi durāsadām
GE07mbh_06_u:015.068a: ke 'jayan ke jitās tatra hṛtalakṣā nipātitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.068c: anye bhīṣmāc chāṃtanavāt tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:015.069a: na hi me śāntir astīha yudhi devavrataṃ hatam
GE07mbh_06_u:015.069c: pitaraṃ bhīmakarmāṇaṃ śrutvā me duḥkham āviśat
GE07mbh_06_u:015.070a: ārtiṃ me hṛdaye rūḍhāṃ mahatīṃ putrakāritām
GE07mbh_06_u:015.071b-0062_01: taṃ vimagnaṃ naravyāghraṃ bhīṣmaṃ śaṃsasi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:015.071c: dṛṣṭvā vinihataṃ bhīṣmaṃ manye śocanti putrakāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.072c: tasmān me sarvam ācakṣva yad vṛttaṃ tatra saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:015.073c: apanītaṃ sunītaṃ vā tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:015.074a: yat kṛtaṃ tatra bhīṣmeṇa saṃgrāme jayam icchatā
GE07mbh_06_u:015.074c: tejoyuktaṃ kṛtāstreṇa śaṃsa tac cāpy aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:015.075c: krameṇa yena yasmiṃś ca kāle yac ca yathā ca tat
GE07mbh_06_u:015.075d-0063_01: yac ca yasmiṃś ca kāle ca vṛttaṃ yac ca yathā ca tat
GE07mbh_06_u:016.001c: na tu duryodhane doṣam imam āsaktum arhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:016.002a: ya ātmano duścaritād aśubhaṃ prāpnuyān naraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:016.002c: enasā tena nānyaṃ sa upāśaṅkitum arhati
GE07mbh_06_u:016.003a: mahārāja manuṣyeṣu nindyaṃ yaḥ sarvam ācaret
GE07mbh_06_u:016.004c: anubhūtaḥ sahāmātyaiḥ kṣāntaṃ ca suciraṃ vane
GE07mbh_06_u:016.005a: hayānāṃ ca gajānāṃ ca śūrāṇāṃ cāmitaujasām
GE07mbh_06_u:016.005c: pratyakṣaṃ yan mayā dṛṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ yogabalena ca
GE07mbh_06_u:016.006a: śṛṇu tat pṛthivīpāla mā ca śoke manaḥ kṛthāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:016.006c: diṣṭam etat purā nūnam evaṃbhāvi narādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:016.007c: yasya prasādād divyaṃ me prāptaṃ jñānam anuttamam
GE07mbh_06_u:016.008a: dṛṣṭiś cātīndriyā rājan dūrāc chravaṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:016.011a: teṣv anīkeṣu yat teṣu vyūḍheṣu ca vidhānataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:016.012c: anīkāni ca sarvāṇi śīghraṃ tvam anucodaya
GE07mbh_06_u:016.014a: nātaḥ kāryatamaṃ manye raṇe bhīṣmasya rakṣaṇāt
GE07mbh_06_u:016.014c: hanyād gupto hy asau pārthān somakāṃś ca sasṛñjayān
GE07mbh_06_u:016.015a: abravīc ca viśuddhātmā nāhaṃ hanyāṃ śikhaṇḍinam
GE07mbh_06_u:016.015c: śrūyate strī hy asau pūrvaṃ tasmād varjyo raṇe mama
GE07mbh_06_u:016.016a: tasmād bhīṣmo rakṣitavyo viśeṣeṇeti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:016.016c: śikhaṇḍino vadhe yattāḥ sarve tiṣṭhantu māmakāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:016.018a: arakṣyamāṇaṃ hi vṛko hanyāt siṃhaṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_06_u:016.019a: vāmaṃ cakraṃ yudhāmanyur uttamaujāś ca dakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:016.020c: yathā na hanyād gāṅgeyaṃ duḥśāsana tathā kuru
GE07mbh_06_u:016.021a: tato rajanyāṃ vyuṣṭāyāṃ śabdaḥ samabhavan mahān
GE07mbh_06_u:016.024e: tava rājendra putrāṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:016.024f-0064_03: tvadīyānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca śastravanti mahānti ca
GE07mbh_06_u:016.026c: atīva śuśubhe tatra pitā te pūrṇacandravat
GE07mbh_06_u:016.027c: yodhāḥ praharaṇaiḥ śubhraiḥ sveṣv anīkeṣv avasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:016.028a: gajā rathāḥ padātāś ca turagāś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:016.029c: sveṣāṃ caiva pareṣāṃ ca dyutimantaḥ sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:016.031c: saṃnaddhās teṣu te vīrā dadṛśur yuddhakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:016.034a: śrutāyudhaś ca kāliṅgo jayatsenaś ca pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:016.034c: bṛhadbalaś ca kauśalyaḥ kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:016.045c: yugānte samupetau dvau dṛśyete sāgarāv iva
GE07mbh_06_u:016.046a: naiva nas tādṛśo rājan dṛṣṭapūrvo na ca śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:017.000-0067_01: ubhayoḥ senayos tatra dṛṣṭvā ca kurupāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_06_u:017.000-0067_02: animittāny atho brūhi kuśalo hy asi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:017.002c: dīpyamānāś ca saṃpetur divi sapta mahāgrahāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:017.003c: jvalantyā śikhayā bhūyo bhānumān udito divi
GE07mbh_06_u:017.006c: yuyudhāte tavārthāya yathā sa samayaḥ kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:017.008a: idaṃ vaḥ kṣatriyā dvāraṃ svargāyāpāvṛtaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:017.008c: gacchadhvaṃ tena śakrasya brahmaṇaś ca salokatām
GE07mbh_06_u:017.009a: eṣa vaḥ śāśvataḥ panthāḥ pūrvaiḥ pūrvatarair gataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:017.010a: nābhāgo hi yayātiś ca māndhātā nahuṣo nṛgaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:017.010b-0068_01: arjunaḥ sagaro vainyo ye cānye kṣatriyottamāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:017.010c: saṃsiddhāḥ paramaṃ sthānaṃ gatāḥ karmabhir īdṛśaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:017.011c: yad ājau nidhanaṃ yāti so 'sya dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:017.013a: sa tu vaikartanaḥ karṇaḥ sāmātyaḥ saha bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:017.014a: apetakarṇāḥ putrās te rājānaś caiva tāvakāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:017.015c: tāny anīkāny aśobhanta rathair atha padātibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:017.019b-0069_01: putrāś ca tava rājendra sārohā sarathā gajaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:017.020a: sa tu govāsanaḥ śaibyaḥ sahitaḥ sarvarājabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:017.020e: padmavarṇas tv anīkānāṃ sarveṣām agrataḥ sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:017.022a: śalyo bhūriśravāś caiva vikarṇaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:017.026c: kṣemadhanvā sumitraś ca tasthuḥ pramukhato rathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:017.027c: prakarṣann iva senāgraṃ māgadhaś ca nṛpo yayau
GE07mbh_06_u:017.028a: tad aṅgapatinā guptaṃ kṛpeṇa ca mahātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:017.032a: ṣaṣṭyā rathasahasrais tu nāgānām ayutena ca
GE07mbh_06_u:017.035c: āsthitaḥ samare rājan meghastha iva bhānumān
GE07mbh_06_u:017.036c: bhagadatto yayau rājā yathā vajradharas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:017.039a: droṇena vihito rājan rājñā śāṃtanavena ca
GE07mbh_06_u:018.003c: kṣaṇena khaṃ diśaś caiva śabdenāpūritaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:018.004a: putrāṇāṃ tava durdharṣa pāṇḍavānāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:018.007a: sveṣāṃ caiva pareṣāṃ ca samadṛśyanta bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:018.010a: pṛṣṭhagopās tu bhīṣmasya putrās tava narādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:018.013a: śālvā matsyās tathāmbaṣṭhās trigartāḥ kekayās tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:018.015c: māgadho yena nṛpatis tad rathānīkam anvayāt
GE07mbh_06_u:018.016a: rathānāṃ cakrarakṣāś ca pādarakṣāś ca dantinām
GE07mbh_06_u:018.018a: akṣauhiṇyo daśaikā ca tava putrasya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:019.001a: akṣauhiṇyo daśaikāṃ ca vyūḍhāṃ dṛṣṭvā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:019.002a: yo veda mānuṣaṃ vyūhaṃ daivaṃ gāndharvam āsuram
GE07mbh_06_u:019.002c: kathaṃ bhīṣmaṃ sa kaunteyaḥ pratyavyūhata pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:019.004c: saṃhatān yodhayed alpān kāmaṃ vistārayed bahūn
GE07mbh_06_u:019.005a: sūcīmukham anīkaṃ syād alpānāṃ bahubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:019.005c: asmākaṃ ca tathā sainyam alpīyaḥ sutarāṃ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:019.006a: etad vacanam ājñāya maharṣer vyūha pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_06_u:019.007a: eṣa vyūhāmi te rājan vyūhaṃ paramadurjayam
GE07mbh_06_u:019.008a: yaḥ sa vāta ivoddhūtaḥ samare duḥsahaḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:019.008c: sa naḥ puro yotsyati vai bhīmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:019.012a: na hi so 'sti pumāṃl loke yaḥ saṃkruddhaṃ vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_06_u:019.013c: caran vegena mahatā samudram api śoṣayet
GE07mbh_06_u:019.014a: kekayā dhṛṣṭaketuś ca cekitānaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:019.014c: eta tiṣṭhanti sāmātyāḥ prekṣakās te nareśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:019.014d-0073_01: bhīmasenaṃ tadā rājan darśayan sa mahābalam
GE07mbh_06_u:019.015c: bruvāṇaṃ tu tathā pārthaṃ sarvasainyāni māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:019.016a: evam uktvā mahābāhus tathā cakre dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:019.016c: vyūhya tāni balāny āśu prayayau phalgunas tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:019.018c: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca dhṛṣṭaketuś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:019.019c: bhrātṛbhiḥ saha putraiś ca so 'bhyarakṣata pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:019.021a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pāñcālyas teṣāṃ goptā mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:019.024c: bṛhadbhiḥ kuñjarair mattaiś caladbhir acalair iva
GE07mbh_06_u:019.027c: bhrātṛbhiḥ saha putraiś ca so 'bhyarakṣad yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_06_u:019.028a: tvadīyānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca ratheṣu vividhān dhvajān
GE07mbh_06_u:019.028d-0074_01: dhvajāgre ruvato bhīmaṃ kapes tasya punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:019.028d-0074_03: dṛṣṭvā ca bhīṣayām āsa virāvair vānareśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:019.031c: rājānam anvayuḥ paścāc calanta iva parvatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:019.033a: tam arkam iva duṣprekṣyaṃ tapantaṃ raśmimālinam
GE07mbh_06_u:019.033c: na śekuḥ sarvato yodhāḥ prativīkṣitum antike
GE07mbh_06_u:019.034a: vajro nāmaiṣa tu vyūho durbhidaḥ sarvatomukhaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:019.035a: yaṃ prativyūhya tiṣṭhanti pāṇḍavās tava vāhinīm
GE07mbh_06_u:019.037a: viṣvagvātāś ca vānty ugrā nīcaiḥ śarkarakarṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:019.037c: rajaś coddhūyamānaṃ tu tamasāc chādayaj jagat
GE07mbh_06_u:019.039c: niṣprabho 'bhyudiyāt sūryaḥ saghoṣo bhūś cacāla ha
GE07mbh_06_u:019.040a: nirghātā bahavo rājan dikṣu sarvāsu cābhavan
GE07mbh_06_u:019.040c: prādurāsīd rajas tīvraṃ na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:020.001a: sūryodaye saṃjaya ke nu pūrvaṃ; yuyutsavo hṛṣyamāṇā
GE07mbh_06_u:020.001c: māmakā vā bhīṣmanetrāḥ samīke; pāṇḍavā vā bhīmanetrās tadānīm
GE07mbh_06_u:020.002a: keṣāṃ jaghanyau somasūryau savāyū; keṣāṃ senāṃ śvāpadā vyābhaṣanta
GE07mbh_06_u:020.002c: keṣāṃ yūnāṃ mukhavarṇāḥ prasannāḥ; sarvaṃ hy etad brūhi tattvaṃ yathāvat
GE07mbh_06_u:020.003a: ubhe sene tulyam ivopayāte; ubhe vyūhe hṛṣṭarūpe narendra
GE07mbh_06_u:020.004a: ubhe sene bṛhatī bhīmarūpe; tathaivobhe bhārata durviṣahye
GE07mbh_06_u:020.004c: tathaivobhe svargajayāya sṛṣṭe; tathā hy ubhe satpuruṣāryagupte
GE07mbh_06_u:020.005a: paścānmukhāḥ kuravo dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ; sthitāḥ pārthāḥ prāṅmukhā yotsyamānāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:020.005c: daityendraseneva ca kauravāṇāṃ; devendraseneva ca pāṇḍavānām
GE07mbh_06_u:020.006a: śukro vāyuḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ; dhārtarāṣṭrāñ śvāpadā vyābhaṣanta
GE07mbh_06_u:020.006c: gajendrāṇāṃ madagandhāṃś ca tīvrān; na sehire tava putrasya nāgāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:020.007a: duryodhano hastinaṃ padmavarṇaṃ; suvarṇakakṣyaṃ jātibalaṃ prabhinnam
GE07mbh_06_u:020.007c: samāsthito madhyagataḥ kurūṇāṃ; saṃstūyamāno bandibhir māgadhaiś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:020.008a: candraprabhaṃ śvetam asyātapatraṃ; sauvarṇī srag bhrājate cottamāṅge
GE07mbh_06_u:020.008c: taṃ sarvataḥ śakuniḥ pārvatīyaiḥ; sārdhaṃ gāndhāraiḥ pāti gāndhārarājaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:020.009a: bhīṣmo 'grataḥ sarvasainyasya vṛddhaḥ; śvetacchatraḥ śvetadhanuḥ saśaṅkhaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:020.009c: śvetoṣṇīṣaḥ pāṇḍureṇa dhvajena; śvetair aśvaiḥ śvetaśailaprakāśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:020.010a: tasya sainyaṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāś ca sarve; bāhlīkānām ekadeśaḥ śalaś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:020.010c: ye cāmbaṣṭhāḥ kṣatriyā ye ca sindhau; tathā sauvīrāḥ pañcanadāś ca śūrāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:020.011a: śoṇair hayai rukmaratho mahātmā; droṇo mahābāhur adīnasattvaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:020.011c: āste guruḥ prayaśāḥ sarvarājñāṃ; paścāc camūm indra ivābhirakṣan
GE07mbh_06_u:020.012a: vārddhakṣatriḥ sarvasainyasya madhye; bhūriśravāḥ purumitro jayaś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:020.012c: śālvā matsyāḥ kekayāś cāpi sarve; gajānīkair bhrātaro yotsyamānāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:020.013a: śāradvataś cottaradhūr mahātmā; maheṣvāso gautamaś citrayodhī
GE07mbh_06_u:020.013c: śakaiḥ kirātair yavanaiḥ pahlavaiś ca; sārdhaṃ camūm uttarato 'bhipāti
GE07mbh_06_u:020.015a: saṃśaptakānām ayutaṃ rathānāṃ; mṛtyur jayo vārjunasyeti sṛṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:020.015c: yenārjunas tena rājan kṛtāstrāḥ; prayātā vai te trigartāś ca śūrāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:020.016a: sāgraṃ śatasahasraṃ tu nāgānāṃ tava bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:020.016c: nāge nāge rathaśataṃ śataṃ cāśvā rathe rathe
GE07mbh_06_u:020.017a: aśve 'śve daśa dhānuṣkā dhānuṣke daśa carmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:020.017c: evaṃ vyūḍhāny anīkāni bhīṣmeṇa tava bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:020.017d-0076_01: devair api na śakyeta balaṃ kṣobhayituṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_06_u:020.018a: avyūhan mānuṣaṃ vyūhaṃ daivaṃ gāndharvam āsuram
GE07mbh_06_u:020.020a: anantarūpā dhvajinī tvadīyā; narendra bhīmā na tu pāṇḍavānām
GE07mbh_06_u:020.020c: tāṃ tv eva manye bṛhatīṃ duṣpradhṛṣyāṃ; yasyā netārau keśavaś cārjunaś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:021.002a: vyūhaṃ bhīṣmeṇa cābhedyaṃ kalpitaṃ prekṣya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:021.003a: dhanaṃjaya kathaṃ śakyam asmābhir yoddhum āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:021.005a: te vayaṃ saṃśayaṃ prāptāḥ sasainyāḥ śatrukarśana
GE07mbh_06_u:021.005c: katham asmān mahāvyūhād udyānaṃ no bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_06_u:021.007c: jayanty alpatarā yena tan nibodha viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:021.008a: tat tu te kāraṇaṃ rājan pravakṣyāmy anasūyave
GE07mbh_06_u:021.008c: nāradas tam ṛṣir veda bhīṣmadroṇau ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_06_u:021.011a: tyaktvādharmaṃ ca lobhaṃ ca mohaṃ codyamam āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:021.011c: yudhyadhvam anahaṃkārā yato dharmas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:021.012a: evaṃ rājan vijānīhi dhruvo 'smākaṃ raṇe jayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:021.012c: yathā me nāradaḥ prāha yataḥ kṛṣṇas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:021.012d-0077_01: yatra kṛṣṇaś ca vedātmā sarvasarveśvaro hariḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:021.012d-0077_02: jayas tatra mahābāho yathā me prāha nāradaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:021.013c: anyathā vijayaś cāsya saṃnatiś cāparo guṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:021.014c: puruṣaḥ sanātanatamo yataḥ kṛṣṇas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:021.015a: purā hy eṣa harir bhūtvā vaikuṇṭho 'kuṇṭhasāyakaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:021.015c: surāsurān avasphūrjann abravīt ke jayantv iti
GE07mbh_06_u:021.016a: anu kṛṣṇaṃ jayemeti yair uktaṃ tatra tair jitam
GE07mbh_06_u:021.016c: tatprasādād dhi trailokyaṃ prāptaṃ śakrādibhiḥ suraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:021.017a: tasya te na vyathāṃ kāṃ cid iha paśyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:021.017c: yasya te jayam āśāste viśvabhuk tridaśeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:022.001a: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā svāṃ senāṃ samacodayat
GE07mbh_06_u:022.006a: samucchritaṃ dāntaśalākam asya; supāṇḍuraṃ chatram atīva bhāti
GE07mbh_06_u:022.006c: pradakṣiṇaṃ cainam upācaranti; maharṣayaḥ saṃstutibhir narendram
GE07mbh_06_u:022.007a: purohitāḥ śatruvadhaṃ vadanto; maharṣivṛddhāḥ śrutavanta eva
GE07mbh_06_u:022.007c: japyaiś ca mantraiś ca tathauṣadhībhiḥ; samantataḥ svasty ayanaṃ pracakruḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:022.008a: tataḥ sa vastrāṇi tathaiva gāś ca; phalāni puṣpāṇi tathaiva niṣkān
GE07mbh_06_u:022.008c: kurūttamo brāhmaṇasān mahātmā; kurvan yayau śakra ivāmarebhyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:022.010c: dhanurdharo yasya samaḥ pṛthivyāṃ; na vidyate no bhavitā vā kadā cit
GE07mbh_06_u:022.011a: udvartayiṣyaṃs tava putrasenām; atīva raudraṃ sa bibharti rūpam
GE07mbh_06_u:022.011c: anāyudho yaḥ subhujo bhujābhyāṃ; narāśvanāgān yudhi bhasma kuryāt
GE07mbh_06_u:022.012a: sa bhīmasenaḥ sahito yamābhyāṃ; vṛkodaro vīrarathasya goptā
GE07mbh_06_u:022.013a: samīkṣya senāgragataṃ durāsadaṃ; pravivyathuḥ paṅkagatā ivoṣṭrāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:022.015a: ya eṣa goptā pratapan balastho; yo naḥ senāṃ siṃha ivekṣate ca
GE07mbh_06_u:022.015c: sa eṣa bhīṣmaḥ kuruvaṃśaketur; yenāhṛtās triṃśato vājimedhāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016a: etāny anīkāni mahānubhāvaṃ; gūhanti meghā iva gharmaraśmim
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016c: etāni hatvā puruṣapravīra; kāṅkṣasva yuddhaṃ bharatarṣabheṇa saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0004: parājayāya śatrūṇāṃ durgāstotram udīraya saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0005: evam ukto 'rjunaḥ saṃkhye vāsudevena arjuna uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0006: avatīrya rathāt pārthaḥ stotram āha kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0007: oṃ namas te siddhasenāni ārye mandaravāsini
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0009: bhadrakāli namas tubhyaṃ mahākāli namo 'stu te
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0010: caṇḍi caṇḍe namas tubhyaṃ tāriṇi varavarṇini
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0021: tvaṃ brahmavidyā vidyānāṃ mahānidrā ca dehinām
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0023: svāhākāraḥ svadhā caiva kalā kāṣṭhā sarasvatī
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0024: sāvitri vedamātā ca tathā vedānta ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0026: jayo bhavatu me nityaṃ tvatprasādād raṇe raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0028: nityaṃ vasasi pātāle yuddhe jayasi dānavān
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0029: tvaṃ jambhanī mohinī ca māyā hrīḥ śrīs tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0030: saṃdhyā prabhāvatī caiva sāvitrī jananī tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0032: bhūtir bhūtimatāṃ saṃkhye vīkṣyase siddhacāraṇaiḥ saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0037: ajeyas tvaṃ raṇe 'rīṇām api vajrabhṛtaḥ svayam
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0039: labdhvā varaṃ tu kaunteyo mene vijayam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0042: ya idaṃ paṭhate stotraṃ kalya utthāya mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0044: na cāpi ripavas tebhyaḥ sarpādyā ye ca daṃṣṭriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0045: na bhayaṃ vidyate tasya sadā rājakulād api
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0046: vivāde jayam āpnoti baddho mucyati bandhanāt
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0047: durgaṃ tarati cāvaśyaṃ tathā corair vimucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0048: saṃgrāme vijayen nityaṃ lakṣmīṃ prāpnoti kevalām
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0050: etad dṛṣṭaṃ prasādāt tu mayā vyāsasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0051: mohād etau na jānanti naranārāyaṇāv ṛṣī
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0054: dvaipāyano nāradaś ca kaṇvo rāmas tathānaghaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0055: avārayaṃs tava sutaṃ na cāsau tad gṛhītavān
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0056: yatra dharmo dyutiḥ kāntir yatra hrīḥ śrīs tathā matiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:022.016d-001_0057: yato dharmas tataḥ kṛṣṇo yataḥ kṛṣṇas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:022.017a: keṣāṃ prahṛṣṭās tatrāgre yodhā yudhyanti saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:022.017c: udagramanasaḥ ke 'tra ke vā dīnā vicetasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:022.018a: ke pūrvaṃ prāharaṃs tatra yuddhe hṛdayakampane
GE07mbh_06_u:022.018c: māmakāḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ vā tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:022.020a: ubhayoḥ senayos tatra yodhā jahṛṣire mudā
GE07mbh_06_u:022.022c: kuñjarāṇāṃ ca nadatāṃ sainyānāṃ ca prahṛṣyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:023.001c: māmakāḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva kim akurvata saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:023.001d-002_0001: śrīrāmacandrāya namaḥ | śrīkṛṣṇāya namaḥ | oṃ namaḥ |
GE07mbh_06_u:023.001d-002_0004: aśocyān anvaśocas tvaṃ prajñāvādāṃś ca bhāṣase (Gītā
GE07mbh_06_u:023.001d-002_0005: 11ab) iti bījam | sarvadharmān parityajya mām ekaṃ
GE07mbh_06_u:023.001d-002_0011: namaḥ | na cainaṃ kledayanty āpo na śoṣayati mārutaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:023.001d-002_0014: iti madhyamābhyāṃ namaḥ | nityaḥ sarvagataḥ sthāṇur acalo 'yaṃ
GE07mbh_06_u:023.001d-002_0016: paśya me pārtha rūpāṇi śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ (Gītā
GE07mbh_06_u:023.001d-002_0020: nainaṃ chindanti śastrāṇi nainaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:023.001d-002_0023: iti śirase svāhā | acchedyo 'yam adāhyo 'yam akledyo 'śoṣya
GE07mbh_06_u:023.001d-002_0028: oṃ pārthāya pratibodhitāṃ bhagavatā nārāyaṇena svayaṃ
GE07mbh_06_u:023.001d-002_0035: sa bhavatu śubhado me vāsudevaḥ pratiṣṭhaḥ || (2)
GE07mbh_06_u:023.001d-002_0037: pārtho vatsaḥ sudhīr bhoktā dugdhaṃ gītāmṛtaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:023.002a: dṛṣṭvā tu pāṇḍavānīkaṃ vyūḍhaṃ duryodhanas tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:023.004c: yuyudhāno virāṭaś ca drupadaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:023.005c: purujit kuntibhojaś ca śaibyaś ca narapuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:023.006a: yudhāmanyuś ca vikrānta uttamaujāś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:023.006c: saubhadro draupadeyāś ca sarva eva mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:023.007a: asmākaṃ tu viśiṣṭā ye tān nibodha dvijottama
GE07mbh_06_u:023.007c: nāyakā mama sainyasya saṃjñārthaṃ tān bravīmi te
GE07mbh_06_u:023.007d-0086_01: sainye mahati ye sarve netāraḥ śūrasaṃmatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:023.008a: bhavān bhīṣmaś ca karṇaś ca kṛpaś ca samitiṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:023.008c: aśvatthāmā vikarṇaś ca saumadattis tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:023.009a: anye ca bahavaḥ śūrā madarthe tyaktajīvitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:023.010c: paryāptaṃ tv idam eteṣāṃ balaṃ bhīmābhirakṣitam
GE07mbh_06_u:023.011c: bhīṣmam evābhirakṣantu bhavantaḥ sarva eva hi
GE07mbh_06_u:023.013a: tataḥ śaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca paṇavānakagomukhāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:023.014a: tataḥ śvetair hayair yukte mahati syandane sthitau
GE07mbh_06_u:023.014c: mādhavaḥ pāṇḍavaś caiva divyau śaṅkhau pradadhmatuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:023.017a: kāśyaś ca parameṣvāsaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:023.018c: saubhadraś ca mahābāhuḥ śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_06_u:023.019c: nabhaś ca pṛthivīṃ caiva tumulo vyanunādayan
GE07mbh_06_u:023.021a: hṛṣīkeśaṃ tadā vākyam idam āha mahīpate
GE07mbh_06_u:023.021c: senayor ubhayor madhye rathaṃ sthāpaya me 'cyuta
GE07mbh_06_u:023.022c: kair mayā saha yoddhavyam asmin raṇasamudyame
GE07mbh_06_u:023.025c: uvāca pārtha paśyaitān samavetān kurūn iti
GE07mbh_06_u:023.026a: tatrāpaśyat sthitān pārthaḥ pitṝn atha pitāmahān
GE07mbh_06_u:023.026c: ācāryān mātulān bhrātṝn putrān pautrān sakhīṃs tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:023.027a: śvaśurān suhṛdaś caiva senayor ubhayor api
GE07mbh_06_u:023.027c: tān samīkṣya sa kaunteyaḥ sarvān bandhūn avasthitān
GE07mbh_06_u:023.029a: sīdanti mama gātrāṇi mukhaṃ ca pariśuṣyati
GE07mbh_06_u:023.029c: vepathuś ca śarīre me romaharṣaś ca jāyate
GE07mbh_06_u:023.030a: gāṇḍīvaṃ sraṃsate hastāt tvak caiva paridahyate
GE07mbh_06_u:023.030c: na ca śaknomy avasthātuṃ bhramatīva ca me manaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:023.031c: na ca śreyo 'nupaśyāmi hatvā svajanam āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:023.032a: na kāṅkṣe vijayaṃ kṛṣṇa na ca rājyaṃ sukhāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:023.032c: kiṃ no rājyena govinda kiṃ bhogair jīvitena vā
GE07mbh_06_u:023.033a: yeṣām arthe kāṅkṣitaṃ no rājyaṃ bhogāḥ sukhāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:023.033c: ta ime 'vasthitā yuddhe prāṇāṃs tyaktvā dhanāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:023.034a: ācāryāḥ pitaraḥ putrās tathaiva ca pitāmahāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:023.034c: mātulāḥ śvaśurāḥ pautrāḥ syālāḥ saṃbandhinas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:023.035a: etān na hantum icchāmi ghnato 'pi madhusūdana
GE07mbh_06_u:023.035c: api trailokyarājyasya hetoḥ kiṃ nu mahīkṛte
GE07mbh_06_u:023.036a: nihatya dhārtarāṣṭrān naḥ kā prītiḥ syāj janārdana
GE07mbh_06_u:023.037a: tasmān nārhā vayaṃ hantuṃ dhārtarāṣṭrān sabāndhavān
GE07mbh_06_u:023.037c: svajanaṃ hi kathaṃ hatvā sukhinaḥ syāma mādhava
GE07mbh_06_u:023.038a: yady apy ete na paśyanti lobhopahatacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:023.039a: kathaṃ na jñeyam asmābhiḥ pāpād asmān nivartitum
GE07mbh_06_u:023.040c: dharme naṣṭe kulaṃ kṛtsnam adharmo 'bhibhavaty uta
GE07mbh_06_u:023.045a: aho bata mahat pāpaṃ kartuṃ vyavasitā vayam
GE07mbh_06_u:023.046c: dhārtarāṣṭrā raṇe hanyus tan me kṣemataraṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_06_u:024.002a: kutas tvā kaśmalam idaṃ viṣame samupasthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:024.003a: klaibyaṃ mā sma gamaḥ pārtha naitat tvayy upapadyate
GE07mbh_06_u:024.004a: kathaṃ bhīṣmam ahaṃ saṃkhye droṇaṃ ca madhusūdana
GE07mbh_06_u:024.005a: gurūn ahatvā hi mahānubhāvāñ; śreyo bhoktuṃ bhaikṣam apīha loke
GE07mbh_06_u:024.005c: hatvārthakāmāṃs tu gurūn ihaiva; bhuñjīya bhogān rudhirapradigdhān
GE07mbh_06_u:024.006a: na caitad vidmaḥ kataran no garīyo; yad vā jayema yadi vā no jayeyuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:024.006c: yān eva hatvā na jijīviṣāmas; te 'vasthitāḥ pramukhe dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:024.007c: yac chreyaḥ syān niścitaṃ brūhi tan me; śiṣyas te 'haṃ śādhi māṃ tvāṃ prapannam
GE07mbh_06_u:024.008a: na hi prapaśyāmi mamāpanudyād; yac chokam ucchoṣaṇam indriyāṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:024.008c: avāpya bhūmāv asapatnam ṛddhaṃ; rājyaṃ surāṇām api cādhipatyam
GE07mbh_06_u:024.009c: na yotsya iti govindam uktvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva ha
GE07mbh_06_u:024.010a: tam uvāca hṛṣīkeśaḥ prahasann iva bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:024.010c: senayor ubhayor madhye viṣīdantam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:024.011a: aśocyān anvaśocas tvaṃ prajñāvādāṃś ca bhāṣase
GE07mbh_06_u:024.012a: na tv evāhaṃ jātu nāsaṃ na tvaṃ neme janādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:024.012c: na caiva na bhaviṣyāmaḥ sarve vayam ataḥ param
GE07mbh_06_u:024.013a: dehino 'smin yathā dehe kaumāraṃ yauvanaṃ jarā
GE07mbh_06_u:024.013c: tathā dehāntaraprāptir dhīras tatra na muhyati
GE07mbh_06_u:024.015a: yaṃ hi na vyathayanty ete puruṣaṃ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:024.016a: nāsato vidyate bhāvo nābhāvo vidyate sataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:024.016c: ubhayor api dṛṣṭo 'ntas tv anayos tattvadarśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:024.017a: avināśi tu tad viddhi yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
GE07mbh_06_u:024.017c: vināśam avyayasyāsya na kaś cit kartum arhati
GE07mbh_06_u:024.019a: ya enaṃ vetti hantāraṃ yaś cainaṃ manyate hatam
GE07mbh_06_u:024.019c: ubhau tau na vijānīto nāyaṃ hanti na hanyate
GE07mbh_06_u:024.020a: na jāyate mriyate vā kadā cin; nāyaṃ bhūtvā bhavitā vā na bhūyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:024.020c: ajo nityaḥ śāśvato 'yaṃ purāṇo; na hanyate hanyamāne śarīre
GE07mbh_06_u:024.021a: vedāvināśinaṃ nityaṃ ya enam ajam avyayam
GE07mbh_06_u:024.021c: kathaṃ sa puruṣaḥ pārtha kaṃ ghātayati hanti kam
GE07mbh_06_u:024.022a: vāsāṃsi jīrṇāni yathā vihāya; navāni gṛhṇāti naro 'parāṇi
GE07mbh_06_u:024.022c: tathā śarīrāṇi vihāya jīrṇāny; anyāni saṃyāti navāni dehī
GE07mbh_06_u:024.023a: nainaṃ chindanti śastrāṇi nainaṃ dahati pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:024.023c: na cainaṃ kledayanty āpo na śoṣayati mārutaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:024.026a: atha cainaṃ nityajātaṃ nityaṃ vā manyase mṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:024.026c: tathāpi tvaṃ mahābāho nainaṃ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:024.027a: jātasya hi dhruvo mṛtyur dhruvaṃ janma mṛtasya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:024.027c: tasmād aparihārye 'rthe na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:024.029a: āścaryavat paśyati kaś cid enam; āścaryavad vadati tathaiva cānyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:024.029c: āścaryavac cainam anyaḥ śṛṇoti; śrutvāpy enaṃ veda na caiva kaś cit
GE07mbh_06_u:024.030a: dehī nityam avadhyo 'yaṃ dehe sarvasya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:024.030c: tasmāt sarvāṇi bhūtāni na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:024.031a: svadharmam api cāvekṣya na vikampitum arhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:024.031c: dharmyād dhi yuddhāc chreyo 'nyat kṣatriyasya na vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:024.032c: sukhinaḥ kṣatriyāḥ pārtha labhante yuddham īdṛśam
GE07mbh_06_u:024.033a: atha cet tvam imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ na kariṣyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:024.033c: tataḥ svadharmaṃ kīrtiṃ ca hitvā pāpam avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:024.035a: bhayād raṇād uparataṃ maṃsyante tvāṃ mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:024.035c: yeṣāṃ ca tvaṃ bahumato bhūtvā yāsyasi lāghavam
GE07mbh_06_u:024.036c: nindantas tava sāmarthyaṃ tato duḥkhataraṃ nu kim
GE07mbh_06_u:024.037a: hato vā prāpsyasi svargaṃ jitvā vā bhokṣyase mahīm
GE07mbh_06_u:024.038c: tato yuddhāya yujyasva naivaṃ pāpam avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:024.039a: eṣā te 'bhihitā sāṃkhye buddhir yoge tv imāṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_06_u:024.039c: buddhyā yukto yayā pārtha karmabandhaṃ prahāsyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:024.040c: svalpam apy asya dharmasya trāyate mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_06_u:024.042a: yām imāṃ puṣpitāṃ vācaṃ pravadanty avipaścitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:024.047a: karmaṇy evādhikāras te mā phaleṣu kadā cana
GE07mbh_06_u:024.047c: mā karmaphalahetur bhūr mā te saṅgo 'stv akarmaṇi
GE07mbh_06_u:024.048a: yogasthaḥ kuru karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:024.048c: siddhyasiddhyoḥ samo bhūtvā samatvaṃ yoga ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:024.048d-0088_01: yasya sarve samārambhā nirāśīrbandhanās tv iha
GE07mbh_06_u:024.048d-0088_02: tyāge yasya hutaṃ sarvaṃ sa tyāgī sa ca buddhimān
GE07mbh_06_u:024.049a: dūreṇa hy avaraṃ karma buddhiyogād dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:024.050c: tasmād yogāya yujyasva yogaḥ karmasu kauśalam
GE07mbh_06_u:024.051a: karmajaṃ buddhiyuktā hi phalaṃ tyaktvā manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:024.052c: tadā gantāsi nirvedaṃ śrotavyasya śrutasya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:024.053c: samādhāv acalā buddhis tadā yogam avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:024.054c: sthitadhīḥ kiṃ prabhāṣeta kim āsīta vrajeta kim
GE07mbh_06_u:024.055a: prajahāti yadā kāmān sarvān pārtha manogatān
GE07mbh_06_u:024.057a: yaḥ sarvatrānabhisnehas tat tat prāpya śubhāśubham
GE07mbh_06_u:024.057c: nābhinandati na dveṣṭi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_06_u:024.059c: rasavarjaṃ raso 'py asya paraṃ dṛṣṭvā nivartate
GE07mbh_06_u:024.060a: yatato hy api kaunteya puruṣasya vipaścitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:024.061a: tāni sarvāṇi saṃyamya yukta āsīta matparaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:024.061c: vaśe hi yasyendriyāṇi tasya prajñā pratiṣṭhitā
GE07mbh_06_u:024.066a: nāsti buddhir ayuktasya na cāyuktasya bhāvanā
GE07mbh_06_u:024.066c: na cābhāvayataḥ śāntir aśāntasya kutaḥ sukham
GE07mbh_06_u:024.067c: tad asya harati prajñāṃ vāyur nāvam ivāmbhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:024.069a: yā niśā sarvabhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī
GE07mbh_06_u:024.069c: yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:024.070a: āpūryamāṇam acalapratiṣṭhaṃ; samudram āpaḥ praviśanti yadvat
GE07mbh_06_u:024.070c: tadvat kāmā yaṃ praviśanti sarve; sa śāntim āpnoti na kāmakāmī
GE07mbh_06_u:024.071a: vihāya kāmān yaḥ sarvān pumāṃś carati niḥspṛhaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:024.072a: eṣā brāhmī sthitiḥ pārtha naināṃ prāpya vimuhyati
GE07mbh_06_u:025.001a: jyāyasī cet karmaṇas te matā buddhir janārdana
GE07mbh_06_u:025.001c: tat kiṃ karmaṇi ghore māṃ niyojayasi keśava
GE07mbh_06_u:025.002c: tad ekaṃ vada niścitya yena śreyo 'ham āpnuyām
GE07mbh_06_u:025.003a: loke 'smin dvividhā niṣṭhā purā proktā mayānagha
GE07mbh_06_u:025.004c: na ca saṃnyasanād eva siddhiṃ samadhigacchati
GE07mbh_06_u:025.005a: na hi kaś cit kṣaṇam api jātu tiṣṭhaty akarmakṛt
GE07mbh_06_u:025.005c: kāryate hy avaśaḥ karma sarvaḥ prakṛtijair guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:025.006a: karmendriyāṇi saṃyamya ya āste manasā smaran
GE07mbh_06_u:025.008a: niyataṃ kuru karma tvaṃ karma jyāyo hy akarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:025.008c: śarīrayātrāpi ca te na prasidhyed akarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:025.011a: devān bhāvayatānena te devā bhāvayantu vaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:025.012a: iṣṭān bhogān hi vo devā dāsyante yajñabhāvitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:025.012c: tair dattān apradāyaibhyo yo bhuṅkte stena eva saḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:025.013c: bhuñjate te tv aghaṃ pāpā ye pacanty ātmakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_06_u:025.015c: tasmāt sarvagataṃ brahma nityaṃ yajñe pratiṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_06_u:025.016c: aghāyur indriyārāmo moghaṃ pārtha sa jīvati
GE07mbh_06_u:025.017a: yas tv ātmaratir eva syād ātmatṛptaś ca mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:025.017c: ātmany eva ca saṃtuṣṭas tasya kāryaṃ na vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:025.018a: naiva tasya kṛtenārtho nākṛteneha kaś cana
GE07mbh_06_u:025.018c: na cāsya sarvabhūteṣu kaś cid arthavyapāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:025.019a: tasmād asaktaḥ satataṃ kāryaṃ karma samācara
GE07mbh_06_u:025.019c: asakto hy ācaran karma param āpnoti pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:025.021a: yad yad ācarati śreṣṭhas tat tad evetaro janaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:025.021c: sa yat pramāṇaṃ kurute lokas tad anuvartate
GE07mbh_06_u:025.022a: na me pārthāsti kartavyaṃ triṣu lokeṣu kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:025.022c: nānavāptam avāptavyaṃ varta eva ca karmaṇi
GE07mbh_06_u:025.023a: yadi hy ahaṃ na varteyaṃ jātu karmaṇy atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:025.024a: utsīdeyur ime lokā na kuryāṃ karma ced aham
GE07mbh_06_u:025.024c: saṃkarasya ca kartā syām upahanyām imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:025.025a: saktāḥ karmaṇy avidvāṃso yathā kurvanti bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:025.028c: guṇā guṇeṣu vartanta iti matvā na sajjate
GE07mbh_06_u:025.029c: tān akṛtsnavido mandān kṛtsnavin na vicālayet
GE07mbh_06_u:025.031a: ye me matam idaṃ nityam anutiṣṭhanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:025.032a: ye tv etad abhyasūyanto nānutiṣṭhanti me matam
GE07mbh_06_u:025.033a: sadṛśaṃ ceṣṭate svasyāḥ prakṛter jñānavān api
GE07mbh_06_u:025.033c: prakṛtiṃ yānti bhūtāni nigrahaḥ kiṃ kariṣyati
GE07mbh_06_u:025.034c: tayor na vaśam āgacchet tau hy asya paripanthinau
GE07mbh_06_u:025.036a: atha kena prayukto 'yaṃ pāpaṃ carati pūruṣaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:025.036c: anicchann api vārṣṇeya balād iva niyojitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:025.037c: mahāśano mahāpāpmā viddhy enam iha vairiṇam arjuna uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:025.037d-0089_01: bhavaty eṣa kathaṃ kṛṣṇa kathaṃ caiva śrībhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:025.037d-0089_02: kim ātmakaḥ kim ācāras tan mamācakṣva
GE07mbh_06_u:025.037d-0089_03: eṣa sūkṣmaḥ paraḥ śatrur dehinām indriyaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:025.037d-0089_07: harṣam asya nivartyaiṣa śokam asya dadāti ca
GE07mbh_06_u:025.037d-0089_08: bhayaṃ cāsya karoty eṣa mohayaṃs tu muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:025.037d-0089_09: sa eṣa kaluṣaḥ kṣudraś chidraprekṣī dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:025.040c: etair vimohayaty eṣa jñānam āvṛtya dehinam
GE07mbh_06_u:025.041a: tasmāt tvam indriyāṇy ādau niyamya bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:025.042a: indriyāṇi parāṇy āhur indriyebhyaḥ paraṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:025.042c: manasas tu parā buddhir yo buddheḥ paratas tu saḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:025.043a: evaṃ buddheḥ paraṃ buddhvā saṃstabhyātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:026.001a: imaṃ vivasvate yogaṃ proktavān aham avyayam
GE07mbh_06_u:026.002c: sa kāleneha mahatā yogo naṣṭaḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_06_u:026.003a: sa evāyaṃ mayā te 'dya yogaḥ proktaḥ purātanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:026.003c: bhakto 'si me sakhā ceti rahasyaṃ hy etad uttamam
GE07mbh_06_u:026.004a: aparaṃ bhavato janma paraṃ janma vivasvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:026.004c: katham etad vijānīyāṃ tvam ādau proktavān iti
GE07mbh_06_u:026.005a: bahūni me vyatītāni janmāni tava cārjuna
GE07mbh_06_u:026.005c: tāny ahaṃ veda sarvāṇi na tvaṃ vettha paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_06_u:026.006a: ajo 'pi sann avyayātmā bhūtānām īśvaro 'pi san
GE07mbh_06_u:026.007a: yadā yadā hi dharmasya glānir bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:026.009a: janma karma ca me divyam evaṃ yo vetti tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:026.009c: tyaktvā dehaṃ punarjanma naiti mām eti so 'rjuna
GE07mbh_06_u:026.011a: ye yathā māṃ prapadyante tāṃs tathaiva bhajāmy aham
GE07mbh_06_u:026.012a: kāṅkṣantaḥ karmaṇāṃ siddhiṃ yajanta iha devatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:026.012c: kṣipraṃ hi mānuṣe loke siddhir bhavati karmajā
GE07mbh_06_u:026.013c: tasya kartāram api māṃ viddhy akartāram avyayam
GE07mbh_06_u:026.014a: na māṃ karmāṇi limpanti na me karmaphale spṛhā
GE07mbh_06_u:026.014c: iti māṃ yo 'bhijānāti karmabhir na sa badhyate
GE07mbh_06_u:026.015a: evaṃ jñātvā kṛtaṃ karma pūrvair api mumukṣubhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:026.015c: kuru karmaiva tasmāt tvaṃ pūrvaiḥ pūrvataraṃ kṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:026.016a: kiṃ karma kim akarmeti kavayo 'py atra mohitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:026.016c: tat te karma pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvā mokṣyase 'śubhāt
GE07mbh_06_u:026.017a: karmaṇo hy api boddhavyaṃ boddhavyaṃ ca vikarmaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:026.017c: akarmaṇaś ca boddhavyaṃ gahanā karmaṇo gatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:026.018a: karmaṇy akarma yaḥ paśyed akarmaṇi ca karma yaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:026.018c: sa buddhimān manuṣyeṣu sa yuktaḥ kṛtsnakarmakṛt
GE07mbh_06_u:026.020c: karmaṇy abhipravṛtto 'pi naiva kiṃ cit karoti saḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:026.021c: śārīraṃ kevalaṃ karma kurvan nāpnoti kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_06_u:026.022c: samaḥ siddhāv asiddhau ca kṛtvāpi na nibadhyate
GE07mbh_06_u:026.032a: evaṃ bahuvidhā yajñā vitatā brahmaṇo mukhe
GE07mbh_06_u:026.032c: karmajān viddhi tān sarvān evaṃ jñātvā vimokṣyase
GE07mbh_06_u:026.035a: yaj jñātvā na punar moham evaṃ yāsyasi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_06_u:026.035c: yena bhūtāny aśeṣeṇa drakṣyasy ātmany atho mayi
GE07mbh_06_u:026.036a: api ced asi pāpebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ pāpakṛttamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:026.038a: na hi jñānena sadṛśaṃ pavitram iha vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:026.040c: nāyaṃ loko 'sti na paro na sukhaṃ saṃśayātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:027.001a: saṃnyāsaṃ karmaṇāṃ kṛṣṇa punar yogaṃ ca śaṃsasi
GE07mbh_06_u:027.001c: yac chreya etayor ekaṃ tan me brūhi suniścitam
GE07mbh_06_u:027.003a: jñeyaḥ sa nityasaṃnyāsī yo na dveṣṭi na kāṅkṣati
GE07mbh_06_u:027.003c: nirdvaṃdvo hi mahābāho sukhaṃ bandhāt pramucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:027.004a: sāṃkhyayogau pṛthag bālāḥ pravadanti na paṇḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:027.004c: ekam apy āsthitaḥ samyag ubhayor vindate phalam
GE07mbh_06_u:027.005a: yat sāṃkhyaiḥ prāpyate sthānaṃ tad yogair api gamyate
GE07mbh_06_u:027.005c: ekaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ ca yogaṃ ca yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati
GE07mbh_06_u:027.006a: saṃnyāsas tu mahābāho duḥkham āptum ayogataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:027.008a: naiva kiṃ cit karomīti yukto manyeta tattvavit
GE07mbh_06_u:027.008c: paśyañ śṛṇvan spṛśañ jighrann aśnan gacchan svapañ śvasan
GE07mbh_06_u:027.009a: pralapan visṛjan gṛhṇann unmiṣan nimiṣann api
GE07mbh_06_u:027.010a: brahmaṇy ādhāya karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:027.010c: lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatram ivāmbhasā
GE07mbh_06_u:027.011a: kāyena manasā buddhyā kevalair indriyair api
GE07mbh_06_u:027.012a: yuktaḥ karmaphalaṃ tyaktvā śāntim āpnoti naiṣṭhikīm
GE07mbh_06_u:027.013c: navadvāre pure dehī naiva kurvan na kārayan
GE07mbh_06_u:027.014a: na kartṛtvaṃ na karmāṇi lokasya sṛjati prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:027.015a: nādatte kasya cit pāpaṃ na caiva sukṛtaṃ vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:027.016a: jñānena tu tad ajñānaṃ yeṣāṃ nāśitam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:027.017d-0090_01: smaranto 'pi muhus tv etat spṛśanto 'pi svakarmaṇi
GE07mbh_06_u:027.017d-0090_02: saktā api na sajjanti paṅke ravikarā iva
GE07mbh_06_u:027.018c: śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:027.019a: ihaiva tair jitaḥ sargo yeṣāṃ sāmye sthitaṃ manaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:027.019c: nirdoṣaṃ hi samaṃ brahma tasmād brahmaṇi te sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:027.020a: na prahṛṣyet priyaṃ prāpya nodvijet prāpya cāpriyam
GE07mbh_06_u:027.021a: bāhyasparśeṣv asaktātmā vindaty ātmani yat sukham
GE07mbh_06_u:027.022a: ye hi saṃsparśajā bhogā duḥkhayonaya eva te
GE07mbh_06_u:027.022c: ādyantavantaḥ kaunteya na teṣu ramate budhaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:027.023c: kāmakrodhodbhavaṃ vegaṃ sa yuktaḥ sa sukhī naraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:027.027a: sparśān kṛtvā bahir bāhyāṃś cakṣuś caivāntare bhruvoḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:027.028c: vigatecchābhayakrodho yaḥ sadā mukta eva saḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:027.029c: suhṛdaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ jñātvā māṃ śāntim ṛcchati
GE07mbh_06_u:028.001a: anāśritaḥ karmaphalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:028.001c: sa saṃnyāsī ca yogī ca na niragnir na cākriyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:028.002a: yaṃ saṃnyāsam iti prāhur yogaṃ taṃ viddhi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_06_u:028.002c: na hy asaṃnyastasaṃkalpo yogī bhavati kaś cana
GE07mbh_06_u:028.003a: ārurukṣor muner yogaṃ karma kāraṇam ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:028.004a: yadā hi nendriyārtheṣu na karmasv anuṣajjate
GE07mbh_06_u:028.005c: ātmaiva hy ātmano bandhur ātmaiva ripur ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:028.009c: sādhuṣv api ca pāpeṣu samabuddhir viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_06_u:028.010a: yogī yuñjīta satatam ātmānaṃ rahasi sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:028.011a: śucau deśe pratiṣṭhāpya sthiram āsanam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:028.014c: manaḥ saṃyamya maccitto yukta āsīta matparaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:028.016a: nātyaśnatas tu yogo 'sti na caikāntam anaśnataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:028.018c: niḥspṛhaḥ sarvakāmebhyo yukta ity ucyate tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:028.019a: yathā dīpo nivātastho neṅgate sopamā smṛtā
GE07mbh_06_u:028.021a: sukham ātyantikaṃ yat tad buddhigrāhyam atīndriyam
GE07mbh_06_u:028.021c: vetti yatra na caivāyaṃ sthitaś calati tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:028.022a: yaṃ labdhvā cāparaṃ lābhaṃ manyate nādhikaṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:028.022c: yasmin sthito na duḥkhena guruṇāpi vicālyate
GE07mbh_06_u:028.025c: ātmasaṃsthaṃ manaḥ kṛtvā na kiṃ cid api cintayet
GE07mbh_06_u:028.026a: yato yato niścarati manaś cañcalam asthiram
GE07mbh_06_u:028.026c: tatas tato niyamyaitad ātmany eva vaśaṃ nayet
GE07mbh_06_u:028.027a: praśāntamanasaṃ hy enaṃ yoginaṃ sukham uttamam
GE07mbh_06_u:028.030a: yo māṃ paśyati sarvatra sarvaṃ ca mayi paśyati
GE07mbh_06_u:028.030c: tasyāhaṃ na praṇaśyāmi sa ca me na praṇaśyati
GE07mbh_06_u:028.031a: sarvabhūtasthitaṃ yo māṃ bhajaty ekatvam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:028.031c: sarvathā vartamāno 'pi sa yogī mayi vartate
GE07mbh_06_u:028.032c: sukhaṃ vā yadi vā duḥkhaṃ sa yogī paramo mataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:028.033a: yo 'yaṃ yogas tvayā proktaḥ sāmyena madhusūdana
GE07mbh_06_u:028.033c: etasyāhaṃ na paśyāmi cañcalatvāt sthitiṃ sthirām
GE07mbh_06_u:028.034a: cañcalaṃ hi manaḥ kṛṣṇa pramāthi balavad dṛḍham
GE07mbh_06_u:028.034c: tasyāhaṃ nigrahaṃ manye vāyor iva suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_06_u:028.035c: abhyāsena tu kaunteya vairāgyeṇa ca gṛhyate
GE07mbh_06_u:028.036a: asaṃyatātmanā yogo duṣprāpa iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:028.037b-0091_01: lipsamānaḥ satāṃ mārgaṃ pramūḍho brahmaṇaḥ pathi
GE07mbh_06_u:028.037c: aprāpya yogasaṃsiddhiṃ kāṃ gatiṃ kṛṣṇa gacchati
GE07mbh_06_u:028.039a: etan me saṃśayaṃ kṛṣṇa chettum arhasy aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:028.039c: tvad anyaḥ saṃśayasyāsya chettā na hy upapadyate
GE07mbh_06_u:028.040a: pārtha naiveha nāmutra vināśas tasya vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:028.040c: na hi kalyāṇakṛt kaś cid durgatiṃ tāta gacchati
GE07mbh_06_u:028.041a: prāpya puṇyakṛtāṃl lokān uṣitvā śāśvatīḥ samāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:028.042a: atha vā yoginām eva kule bhavati dhīmatām
GE07mbh_06_u:028.042c: etad dhi durlabhataraṃ loke janma yad īdṛśam
GE07mbh_06_u:028.043c: yatate ca tato bhūyaḥ saṃsiddhau kurunandana
GE07mbh_06_u:028.044a: pūrvābhyāsena tenaiva hriyate hy avaśo 'pi saḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:028.046c: karmibhyaś cādhiko yogī tasmād yogī bhavārjuna
GE07mbh_06_u:028.047c: śraddhāvān bhajate yo māṃ sa me yuktatamo mataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:029.001a: mayy āsaktamanāḥ pārtha yogaṃ yuñjan madāśrayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:029.001c: asaṃśayaṃ samagraṃ māṃ yathā jñāsyasi tac chṛṇu
