GE07mbh_06_u:029.002a: jñānaṃ te 'haṃ savijñānam idaṃ vakṣyāmy aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:029.002c: yaj jñātvā neha bhūyo 'nyaj jñātavyam avaśiṣyate
GE07mbh_06_u:029.003a: manuṣyāṇāṃ sahasreṣu kaś cid yatati siddhaye
GE07mbh_06_u:029.003c: yatatām api siddhānāṃ kaś cin māṃ vetti tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:029.004a: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:029.004c: ahaṃkāra itīyaṃ me bhinnā prakṛtir aṣṭadhā
GE07mbh_06_u:029.005a: apareyam itas tv anyāṃ prakṛtiṃ viddhi me parām
GE07mbh_06_u:029.006c: ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:029.007a: mattaḥ parataraṃ nānyat kiṃ cid asti dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:029.007c: mayi sarvam idaṃ protaṃ sūtre maṇigaṇā iva
GE07mbh_06_u:029.008c: praṇavaḥ sarvavedeṣu śabdaḥ khe pauruṣaṃ nṛṣu
GE07mbh_06_u:029.009a: puṇyo gandhaḥ pṛthivyāṃ ca tejaś cāsmi vibhāvasau
GE07mbh_06_u:029.010a: bījaṃ māṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ viddhi pārtha sanātanam
GE07mbh_06_u:029.010c: buddhir buddhimatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham
GE07mbh_06_u:029.012a: ye caiva sāttvikā bhāvā rājasās tāmasāś ca ye
GE07mbh_06_u:029.012c: matta eveti tān viddhi na tv ahaṃ teṣu te mayi
GE07mbh_06_u:029.013a: tribhir guṇamayair bhāvair ebhiḥ sarvam idaṃ jagat
GE07mbh_06_u:029.013c: mohitaṃ nābhijānāti mām ebhyaḥ param avyayam
GE07mbh_06_u:029.014a: daivī hy eṣā guṇamayī mama māyā duratyayā
GE07mbh_06_u:029.014c: mām eva ye prapadyante māyām etāṃ taranti te
GE07mbh_06_u:029.015a: na māṃ duṣkṛtino mūḍhāḥ prapadyante narādhamāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:029.016c: ārto jijñāsur arthārthī jñānī ca bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:029.017c: priyo hi jñānino 'tyartham ahaṃ sa ca mama priyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:029.018a: udārāḥ sarva evaite jñānī tv ātmaiva me matam
GE07mbh_06_u:029.018c: āsthitaḥ sa hi yuktātmā mām evānuttamāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_06_u:029.019a: bahūnāṃ janmanām ante jñānavān māṃ prapadyate
GE07mbh_06_u:029.019c: vāsudevaḥ sarvam iti sa mahātmā sudurlabhaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:029.020c: taṃ taṃ niyamam āsthāya prakṛtyā niyatāḥ svayā
GE07mbh_06_u:029.021a: yo yo yāṃ yāṃ tanuṃ bhaktaḥ śraddhayārcitum icchati
GE07mbh_06_u:029.021c: tasya tasyācalāṃ śraddhāṃ tām eva vidadhāmy aham
GE07mbh_06_u:029.022a: sa tayā śraddhayā yuktas tasyā rādhanam īhate
GE07mbh_06_u:029.022c: labhate ca tataḥ kāmān mayaiva vihitān hi tān
GE07mbh_06_u:029.023a: antavat tu phalaṃ teṣāṃ tad bhavaty alpamedhasām
GE07mbh_06_u:029.023c: devān devayajo yānti madbhaktā yānti mām api
GE07mbh_06_u:029.024a: avyaktaṃ vyaktim āpannaṃ manyante mām abuddhayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:029.025c: mūḍho 'yaṃ nābhijānāti loko mām ajam avyayam
GE07mbh_06_u:029.026c: bhaviṣyāṇi ca bhūtāni māṃ tu veda na kaś cana
GE07mbh_06_u:029.028a: yeṣāṃ tv antagataṃ pāpaṃ janānāṃ puṇyakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:029.029c: te brahma tad viduḥ kṛtsnam adhyātmaṃ karma cākhilam
GE07mbh_06_u:029.030a: sādhibhūtādhidaivaṃ māṃ sādhiyajñaṃ ca ye viduḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:029.030c: prayāṇakāle 'pi ca māṃ te vidur yuktacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:030.001a: kiṃ tad brahma kim adhyātmaṃ kiṃ karma puruṣottama
GE07mbh_06_u:030.001c: adhibhūtaṃ ca kiṃ proktam adhidaivaṃ kim ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:030.005a: antakāle ca mām eva smaran muktvā kalevaram
GE07mbh_06_u:030.005c: yaḥ prayāti sa madbhāvaṃ yāti nāsty atra saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:030.006a: yaṃ yaṃ vāpi smaran bhāvaṃ tyajaty ante kalevaram
GE07mbh_06_u:030.006c: taṃ tam evaiti kaunteya sadā tadbhāvabhāvitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:030.007a: tasmāt sarveṣu kāleṣu mām anusmara yudhya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:030.009a: kaviṃ purāṇam anuśāsitāram; aṇor aṇīyāṃsam anusmared yaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:030.009c: sarvasya dhātāram acintyarūpam; ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt
GE07mbh_06_u:030.010a: prayāṇakāle manasācalena; bhaktyā yukto yogabalena caiva
GE07mbh_06_u:030.010c: bhruvor madhye prāṇam āveśya samyak; sa taṃ paraṃ puruṣam upaiti divyam
GE07mbh_06_u:030.011a: yad akṣaraṃ vedavido vadanti; viśanti yad yatayo vītarāgāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:030.011c: yad icchanto brahmacaryaṃ caranti; tat te padaṃ saṃgraheṇa pravakṣye
GE07mbh_06_u:030.012a: sarvadvārāṇi saṃyamya mano hṛdi nirudhya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:030.013a: om ity ekākṣaraṃ brahma vyāharan mām anusmaran
GE07mbh_06_u:030.013c: yaḥ prayāti tyajan dehaṃ sa yāti paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_06_u:030.014a: ananyacetāḥ satataṃ yo māṃ smarati nityaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:030.016c: mām upetya tu kaunteya punarjanma na vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:030.019a: bhūtagrāmaḥ sa evāyaṃ bhūtvā bhūtvā pralīyate
GE07mbh_06_u:030.020c: yaḥ sa sarveṣu bhūteṣu naśyatsu na vinaśyati
GE07mbh_06_u:030.021a: avyakto 'kṣara ity uktas tam āhuḥ paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_06_u:030.021c: yaṃ prāpya na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama
GE07mbh_06_u:030.022a: puruṣaḥ sa paraḥ pārtha bhaktyā labhyas tv ananyayā
GE07mbh_06_u:030.022b-0097_01: yaṃ prāpya na punarjanma labhante yogino 'rjuna
GE07mbh_06_u:030.022c: yasyāntaḥsthāni bhūtāni yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
GE07mbh_06_u:030.023a: yatra kāle tv anāvṛttim āvṛttiṃ caiva yoginaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:030.023c: prayātā yānti taṃ kālaṃ vakṣyāmi bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:030.024a: agnir jyotir ahaḥ śuklaḥ ṣaṇmāsā uttarāyaṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:030.024c: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahmavido janāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:030.025a: dhūmo rātris tathā kṛṣṇaḥ ṣaṇmāsā dakṣiṇāyanam
GE07mbh_06_u:030.025c: tatra cāndramasaṃ jyotir yogī prāpya nivartate
GE07mbh_06_u:030.026a: śuklakṛṣṇe gatī hy ete jagataḥ śāśvate mate
GE07mbh_06_u:030.027a: naite sṛtī pārtha jānan yogī muhyati kaś cana
GE07mbh_06_u:030.028a: vedeṣu yajñeṣu tapaḥsu caiva; dāneṣu yat puṇyaphalaṃ pradiṣṭam
GE07mbh_06_u:030.028c: atyeti tat sarvam idaṃ viditvā; yogī paraṃ sthānam upaiti cādyam
GE07mbh_06_u:030.028d-0098_02: antar bahir na sāvasthā na yasyāṃ bhāsate vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:031.001a: idaṃ tu te guhyatamaṃ pravakṣyāmy anasūyave
GE07mbh_06_u:031.004a: mayā tatam idaṃ sarvaṃ jagad avyaktamūrtinā
GE07mbh_06_u:031.004c: matsthāni sarvabhūtāni na cāhaṃ teṣv avasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:031.005a: na ca matsthāni bhūtāni paśya me yogam aiśvaram
GE07mbh_06_u:031.005c: bhūtabhṛn na ca bhūtastho mamātmā bhūtabhāvanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:031.006d-0100_02: bhūtaprakṛtim āsthāya sahaiva ca vinaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:031.007c: kalpakṣaye punas tāni kalpādau visṛjāmy aham
GE07mbh_06_u:031.008a: prakṛtiṃ svām avaṣṭabhya visṛjāmi punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:031.008c: bhūtagrāmam imaṃ kṛtsnam avaśaṃ prakṛter vaśāt
GE07mbh_06_u:031.009a: na ca māṃ tāni karmāṇi nibadhnanti dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:031.011a: avajānanti māṃ mūḍhā mānuṣīṃ tanum āśritam
GE07mbh_06_u:031.012c: rākṣasīm āsurīṃ caiva prakṛtiṃ mohinīṃ śritāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:031.013a: mahātmānas tu māṃ pārtha daivīṃ prakṛtim āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:031.014a: satataṃ kīrtayanto māṃ yatantaś ca dṛḍhavratāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:031.014c: namasyantaś ca māṃ bhaktyā nityayuktā upāsate
GE07mbh_06_u:031.015a: jñānayajñena cāpy anye yajanto mām upāsate
GE07mbh_06_u:031.016a: ahaṃ kratur ahaṃ yajñaḥ svadhāham aham auṣadham
GE07mbh_06_u:031.016c: mantro 'ham aham evājyam aham agnir ahaṃ hutam
GE07mbh_06_u:031.017a: pitāham asya jagato mātā dhātā pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:031.017c: vedyaṃ pavitram oṃkāra ṛk sāma yajur eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:031.018a: gatir bhartā prabhuḥ sākṣī nivāsaḥ śaraṇaṃ suhṛt
GE07mbh_06_u:031.018c: prabhavaḥ pralayaḥ sthānaṃ nidhānaṃ bījam avyayam
GE07mbh_06_u:031.019a: tapāmy aham ahaṃ varṣaṃ nigṛhṇāmy utsṛjāmi ca
GE07mbh_06_u:031.019c: amṛtaṃ caiva mṛtyuś ca sad asac cāham arjuna
GE07mbh_06_u:031.020a: traividyā māṃ somapāḥ pūtapāpā; yajñair iṣṭvā svargatiṃ prārthayante
GE07mbh_06_u:031.020c: te puṇyam āsādya surendralokam; aśnanti divyān divi devabhogān
GE07mbh_06_u:031.021a: te taṃ bhuktvā svargalokaṃ viśālaṃ; kṣīṇe puṇye martyalokaṃ viśanti
GE07mbh_06_u:031.021c: evaṃ trayīdharmam anuprapannā; gatāgataṃ kāmakāmā labhante
GE07mbh_06_u:031.022a: ananyāś cintayanto māṃ ye janāḥ paryupāsate
GE07mbh_06_u:031.023c: te 'pi mām eva kaunteya yajanty avidhipūrvakam
GE07mbh_06_u:031.024a: ahaṃ hi sarvayajñānāṃ bhoktā ca prabhur eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:031.024c: na tu mām abhijānanti tattvenātaś cyavanti te
GE07mbh_06_u:031.025a: yānti devavratā devān pitṝn yānti pitṛvratāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:031.025c: bhūtāni yānti bhūtejyā yānti madyājino 'pi mām
GE07mbh_06_u:031.026a: patraṃ puṣpaṃ phalaṃ toyaṃ yo me bhaktyā prayacchati
GE07mbh_06_u:031.027a: yat karoṣi yad aśnāsi yaj juhoṣi dadāsi yat
GE07mbh_06_u:031.027c: yat tapasyasi kaunteya tat kuruṣva madarpaṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:031.029a: samo 'haṃ sarvabhūteṣu na me dveṣyo 'sti na priyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:031.029c: ye bhajanti tu māṃ bhaktyā mayi te teṣu cāpy aham
GE07mbh_06_u:031.030a: api cet sudurācāro bhajate mām ananyabhāk
GE07mbh_06_u:031.030c: sādhur eva sa mantavyaḥ samyag vyavasito hi saḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:031.031c: kaunteya pratijānīhi na me bhaktaḥ praṇaśyati
GE07mbh_06_u:031.032a: māṃ hi pārtha vyapāśritya ye 'pi syuḥ pāpayonayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:031.032c: striyo vaiśyās tathā śūdrās te 'pi yānti parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_06_u:031.033a: kiṃ punar brāhmaṇāḥ puṇyā bhaktā rājarṣayas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:031.033c: anityam asukhaṃ lokam imaṃ prāpya bhajasva mām
GE07mbh_06_u:031.034a: manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru
GE07mbh_06_u:032.001a: bhūya eva mahābāho śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:032.002a: na me viduḥ suragaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:032.002c: aham ādir hi devānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:032.003a: yo mām ajam anādiṃ ca vetti lokamaheśvaram
GE07mbh_06_u:032.004a: buddhir jñānam asaṃmohaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ damaḥ śamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:032.004c: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ bhavo 'bhāvo bhayaṃ cābhayam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:032.005a: ahiṃsā samatā tuṣṭis tapo dānaṃ yaśo 'yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:032.005c: bhavanti bhāvā bhūtānāṃ matta eva pṛthagvidhāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:032.006a: maharṣayaḥ sapta pūrve catvāro manavas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:032.006c: madbhāvā mānasā jātā yeṣāṃ loka imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:032.007a: etāṃ vibhūtiṃ yogaṃ ca mama yo vetti tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:032.008a: ahaṃ sarvasya prabhavo mattaḥ sarvaṃ pravartate
GE07mbh_06_u:032.008c: iti matvā bhajante māṃ budhā bhāvasamanvitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:032.009c: kathayantaś ca māṃ nityaṃ tuṣyanti ca ramanti ca
GE07mbh_06_u:032.010c: dadāmi buddhiyogaṃ taṃ yena mām upayānti te
GE07mbh_06_u:032.012a: paraṃ brahma paraṃ dhāma pavitraṃ paramaṃ bhavān
GE07mbh_06_u:032.012c: puruṣaṃ śāśvataṃ divyam ādidevam ajaṃ vibhum
GE07mbh_06_u:032.013a: āhus tvām ṛṣayaḥ sarve devarṣir nāradas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:032.013c: asito devalo vyāsaḥ svayaṃ caiva bravīṣi me
GE07mbh_06_u:032.014a: sarvam etad ṛtaṃ manye yan māṃ vadasi keśava
GE07mbh_06_u:032.014c: na hi te bhagavan vyaktiṃ vidur devā na dānavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:032.016a: vaktum arhasy aśeṣeṇa divyā hy ātmavibhūtayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:032.016c: yābhir vibhūtibhir lokān imāṃs tvaṃ vyāpya tiṣṭhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:032.017a: kathaṃ vidyām ahaṃ yogiṃs tvāṃ sadā paricintayan
GE07mbh_06_u:032.017c: keṣu keṣu ca bhāveṣu cintyo 'si bhagavan mayā
GE07mbh_06_u:032.018c: bhūyaḥ kathaya tṛptir hi śṛṇvato nāsti me 'mṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:032.019a: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi divyā hy ātmavibhūtayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:032.019c: prādhānyataḥ kuruśreṣṭha nāsty anto vistarasya me
GE07mbh_06_u:032.020c: aham ādiś ca madhyaṃ ca bhūtānām anta eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:032.021a: ādityānām ahaṃ viṣṇur jyotiṣāṃ ravir aṃśumān
GE07mbh_06_u:032.021c: marīcir marutām asmi nakṣatrāṇām ahaṃ śaśī
GE07mbh_06_u:032.022c: indriyāṇāṃ manaś cāsmi bhūtānām asmi cetanā
GE07mbh_06_u:032.023c: vasūnāṃ pāvakaś cāsmi meruḥ śikhariṇām aham
GE07mbh_06_u:032.024a: purodhasāṃ ca mukhyaṃ māṃ viddhi pārtha bṛhaspatim
GE07mbh_06_u:032.024c: senānīnām ahaṃ skandaḥ sarasām asmi sāgaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:032.025a: maharṣīṇāṃ bhṛgur ahaṃ girām asmy ekam akṣaram
GE07mbh_06_u:032.028a: āyudhānām ahaṃ vajraṃ dhenūnām asmi kāmadhuk
GE07mbh_06_u:032.028c: prajanaś cāsmi kandarpaḥ sarpāṇām asmi vāsukiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:032.029a: anantaś cāsmi nāgānāṃ varuṇo yādasām aham
GE07mbh_06_u:032.029c: pitṝṇām aryamā cāsmi yamaḥ saṃyamatām aham
GE07mbh_06_u:032.030a: prahlādaś cāsmi daityānāṃ kālaḥ kalayatām aham
GE07mbh_06_u:032.030c: mṛgāṇāṃ ca mṛgendro 'haṃ vainateyaś ca pakṣiṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:032.031a: pavanaḥ pavatām asmi rāmaḥ śastrabhṛtām aham
GE07mbh_06_u:032.031c: jhaṣāṇāṃ makaraś cāsmi srotasām asmi jāhnavī
GE07mbh_06_u:032.032a: sargāṇām ādir antaś ca madhyaṃ caivāham arjuna
GE07mbh_06_u:032.034a: mṛtyuḥ sarvaharaś cāham udbhavaś ca bhaviṣyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:032.034c: kīrtiḥ śrīr vāk ca nārīṇāṃ smṛtir medhā dhṛtiḥ kṣamā
GE07mbh_06_u:032.035a: bṛhatsāma tathā sāmnāṃ gāyatrī chandasām aham
GE07mbh_06_u:032.035d-0101_01: oṣadhīnāṃ yavaś cāsmi dhātūnām asmi kāñcanam
GE07mbh_06_u:032.035d-0101_02: saurabheyo gavām asmi snehānāṃ sarpir apy aham
GE07mbh_06_u:032.036a: dyūtaṃ chalayatām asmi tejas tejasvinām aham
GE07mbh_06_u:032.037c: munīnām apy ahaṃ vyāsaḥ kavīnām uśanā kaviḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:032.038a: daṇḍo damayatām asmi nītir asmi jigīṣatām
GE07mbh_06_u:032.038c: maunaṃ caivāsmi guhyānāṃ jñānaṃ jñānavatām aham
GE07mbh_06_u:032.039a: yac cāpi sarvabhūtānāṃ bījaṃ tad aham arjuna
GE07mbh_06_u:032.039c: na tad asti vinā yat syān mayā bhūtaṃ carācaram
GE07mbh_06_u:032.040c: eṣa tūddeśataḥ prokto vibhūter vistaro mayā
GE07mbh_06_u:032.041a: yad yad vibhūtimat sattvaṃ śrīmad ūrjitam eva vā
GE07mbh_06_u:032.041c: tat tad evāvagaccha tvaṃ mama tejoṃśasaṃbhavam
GE07mbh_06_u:032.042a: atha vā bahunaitena kiṃ jñātena tavārjuna
GE07mbh_06_u:032.042c: viṣṭabhyāham idaṃ kṛtsnam ekāṃśena sthito jagat
GE07mbh_06_u:033.001c: yat tvayoktaṃ vacas tena moho 'yaṃ vigato mama
GE07mbh_06_u:033.002a: bhavāpyayau hi bhūtānāṃ śrutau vistaraśo mayā
GE07mbh_06_u:033.003a: evam etad yathāttha tvam ātmānaṃ parameśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:033.003c: draṣṭum icchāmi te rūpam aiśvaraṃ puruṣottama
GE07mbh_06_u:033.004a: manyase yadi tac chakyaṃ mayā draṣṭum iti prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:033.004c: yogeśvara tato me tvaṃ darśayātmānam avyayam
GE07mbh_06_u:033.005a: paśya me pārtha rūpāṇi śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:033.006a: paśyādityān vasūn rudrān aśvinau marutas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:033.007c: mama dehe guḍākeśa yac cānyad draṣṭum icchasi
GE07mbh_06_u:033.008a: na tu māṃ śakyase draṣṭum anenaiva svacakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_06_u:033.008c: divyaṃ dadāmi te cakṣuḥ paśya me yogam aiśvaram
GE07mbh_06_u:033.009a: evam uktvā tato rājan mahāyogeśvaro hariḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:033.009c: darśayām āsa pārthāya paramaṃ rūpam aiśvaram
GE07mbh_06_u:033.012c: yadi bhāḥ sadṛśī sā syād bhāsas tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:033.015a: paśyāmi devāṃs tava deva dehe; sarvāṃs tathā bhūtaviśeṣasaṃghān
GE07mbh_06_u:033.015c: brahmāṇam īśaṃ kamalāsanastham; ṛṣīṃś ca sarvān uragāṃś ca divyān
GE07mbh_06_u:033.016c: nāntaṃ na madhyaṃ na punas tavādiṃ; paśyāmi viśveśvara viśvarūpa
GE07mbh_06_u:033.017a: kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ ca; tejorāśiṃ sarvato dīptimantam
GE07mbh_06_u:033.017c: paśyāmi tvāṃ durnirīkṣyaṃ samantād; dīptānalārkadyutim aprameyam
GE07mbh_06_u:033.018a: tvam akṣaraṃ paramaṃ veditavyaṃ; tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam
GE07mbh_06_u:033.018c: tvam avyayaḥ śāśvatadharmagoptā; sanātanas tvaṃ puruṣo mato me
GE07mbh_06_u:033.019c: paśyāmi tvāṃ dīptahutāśavaktraṃ; svatejasā viśvam idaṃ tapantam
GE07mbh_06_u:033.020a: dyāvāpṛthivyor idam antaraṃ hi; vyāptaṃ tvayaikena diśaś ca sarvāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:033.020c: dṛṣṭvādbhutaṃ rūpam idaṃ tavograṃ; lokatrayaṃ pravyathitaṃ mahātman
GE07mbh_06_u:033.021a: amī hi tvā surasaṃghā viśanti; ke cid bhītāḥ prāñjalayo gṛṇanti
GE07mbh_06_u:033.021c: svastīty uktvā maharṣisiddhasaṃghāḥ; stuvanti tvāṃ stutibhiḥ puṣkalābhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:033.022a: rudrādityā vasavo ye ca sādhyā; viśve 'śvinau marutaś coṣmapāś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:033.022c: gandharvayakṣāsurasiddhasaṃghā; vīkṣante tvā vismitāś caiva sarve
GE07mbh_06_u:033.023a: rūpaṃ mahat te bahuvaktranetraṃ; mahābāho bahubāhūrupādam
GE07mbh_06_u:033.023c: bahūdaraṃ bahudaṃṣṭrākarālaṃ; dṛṣṭvā lokāḥ pravyathitās tathāham
GE07mbh_06_u:033.024c: dṛṣṭvā hi tvāṃ pravyathitāntarātmā; dhṛtiṃ na vindāmi śamaṃ ca viṣṇo
GE07mbh_06_u:033.025a: daṃṣṭrākarālāni ca te mukhāni; dṛṣṭvaiva kālānalasaṃnibhāni
GE07mbh_06_u:033.025c: diśo na jāne na labhe ca śarma; prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa
GE07mbh_06_u:033.026a: amī ca tvāṃ dhṛtarāṣṭrasya putrāḥ; sarve sahaivāvanipālasaṃghaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:033.026c: bhīṣmo droṇaḥ sūtaputras tathāsau; sahāsmadīyair api yodhamukhyaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:033.027a: vaktrāṇi te tvaramāṇā viśanti; daṃṣṭrākarālāni bhayānakāni 06,033.027b*0102_01
GE07mbh_06_u:033.027c: ke cid vilagnā daśanāntareṣu; saṃdṛśyante cūrṇitair uttamāṅgaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:033.028a: yathā nadīnāṃ bahavo 'mbuvegāḥ; samudram evābhimukhā dravanti
GE07mbh_06_u:033.028c: tathā tavāmī naralokavīrā; viśanti vaktrāṇy abhivijvalanti
GE07mbh_06_u:033.029a: yathā pradīptaṃ jvalanaṃ pataṃgā; viśanti nāśāya samṛddhavegāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:033.029c: tathaiva nāśāya viśanti lokās; tavāpi vaktrāṇi samṛddhavegāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:033.030a: lelihyase grasamānaḥ samantāl; lokān samagrān vadanair jvaladbhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:033.030c: tejobhir āpūrya jagat samagraṃ; bhāsas tavogrāḥ pratapanti viṣṇo
GE07mbh_06_u:033.031a: ākhyāhi me ko bhavān ugrarūpo; namo 'stu te devavara prasīda
GE07mbh_06_u:033.031c: vijñātum icchāmi bhavantam ādyaṃ; na hi prajānāmi tava pravṛttim
GE07mbh_06_u:033.032a: kālo 'smi lokakṣayakṛt pravṛddho; lokān samāhartum iha pravṛttaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:033.032c: ṛte 'pi tvā na bhaviṣyanti sarve; ye 'vasthitāḥ pratyanīkeṣu yodhāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:033.033a: tasmāt tvam uttiṣṭha yaśo labhasva; jitvā śatrūn bhuṅkṣva rājyaṃ samṛddham
GE07mbh_06_u:033.033c: mayaivaite nihatāḥ pūrvam eva; nimittamātraṃ bhava savyasācin
GE07mbh_06_u:033.034a: droṇaṃ ca bhīṣmaṃ ca jayadrathaṃ ca; karṇaṃ tathānyān api yodhavīrān
GE07mbh_06_u:033.034c: mayā hatāṃs tvaṃ jahi mā vyathiṣṭhā; yudhyasva jetāsi raṇe sapatnān
GE07mbh_06_u:033.035a: etac chrutvā vacanaṃ keśavasya; kṛtāñjalir vepamānaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:033.035c: namaskṛtvā bhūya evāha kṛṣṇaṃ; sagadgadaṃ bhītabhītaḥ praṇamya
GE07mbh_06_u:033.036a: sthāne hṛṣīkeśa tava prakīrtyā; jagat prahṛṣyaty anurajyate
GE07mbh_06_u:033.036c: rakṣāṃsi bhītāni diśo dravanti; sarve namasyanti ca siddhasaṃghāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:033.037a: kasmāc ca te na nameran mahātman; garīyase brahmaṇo 'py ādikartre
GE07mbh_06_u:033.037c: ananta deveśa jagannivāsa; tvam akṣaraṃ sad asat tatparaṃ yat
GE07mbh_06_u:033.038a: tvam ādidevaḥ puruṣaḥ purāṇas; tvam asya viśvasya paraṃ nidhānam
GE07mbh_06_u:033.038c: vettāsi vedyaṃ ca paraṃ ca dhāma; tvayā tataṃ viśvam anantarūpa
GE07mbh_06_u:033.039a: vāyur yamo 'gnir varuṇaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ; prajāpatis tvaṃ prapitāmahaś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:033.039c: namo namas te 'stu sahasrakṛtvaḥ; punaś ca bhūyo 'pi namo namas te
GE07mbh_06_u:033.040a: namaḥ purastād atha pṛṣṭhatas te; namo 'stu te sarvata eva sarva
GE07mbh_06_u:033.040b-0105_01: na hi tvad anyaḥ kaś cid apīha deva
GE07mbh_06_u:033.040c: anantavīryāmitavikramas tvaṃ; sarvaṃ samāpnoṣi tato 'si sarvaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:033.041a: sakheti matvā prasabhaṃ yad uktaṃ; he kṛṣṇa he yādava he sakheti
GE07mbh_06_u:033.041c: ajānatā mahimānaṃ tavedaṃ; mayā pramādāt praṇayena vāpi
GE07mbh_06_u:033.042c: eko 'tha vāpy acyuta tatsamakṣaṃ; tat kṣāmaye tvām aham aprameyam
GE07mbh_06_u:033.043a: pitāsi lokasya carācarasya; tvam asya pūjyaś ca gurur garīyān
GE07mbh_06_u:033.043c: na tvatsamo 'sty abhyadhikaḥ kuto 'nyo; lokatraye 'py apratimaprabhāva
GE07mbh_06_u:033.044a: tasmāt praṇamya praṇidhāya kāyaṃ; prasādaye tvām aham īśam īḍyam
GE07mbh_06_u:033.044c: piteva putrasya sakheva sakhyuḥ; priyaḥ priyāyārhasi deva soḍhum
GE07mbh_06_u:033.044d-0106_04: dhātā vidhātā ca vibhur bhavaś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:033.044d-0106_08: vibho tataḥ sarvam idaṃ tvam eva
GE07mbh_06_u:033.044d-0106_09: aty adbhutaṃ karma na duṣkaraṃ te
GE07mbh_06_u:033.045a: adṛṣṭapūrvaṃ hṛṣito 'smi dṛṣṭvā; bhayena ca pravyathitaṃ mano me
GE07mbh_06_u:033.045c: tad eva me darśaya deva rūpaṃ; prasīda deveśa jagannivāsa
GE07mbh_06_u:033.046a: kirīṭinaṃ gadinaṃ cakrahastam; icchāmi tvāṃ draṣṭum ahaṃ tathaiva
GE07mbh_06_u:033.046c: tenaiva rūpeṇa caturbhujena; sahasrabāho bhava viśvamūrte
GE07mbh_06_u:033.047a: mayā prasannena tavārjunedaṃ; rūpaṃ paraṃ darśitam
GE07mbh_06_u:033.047c: tejomayaṃ viśvam anantam ādyaṃ; yan me tvad anyena na dṛṣṭapūrvam
GE07mbh_06_u:033.048a: na vedayajñādhyayanair na dānair; na ca kriyābhir na tapobhir ugraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:033.048c: evaṃrūpaḥ śakya ahaṃ nṛloke; draṣṭuṃ tvad anyena kurupravīra
GE07mbh_06_u:033.049a: mā te vyathā mā ca vimūḍhabhāvo; dṛṣṭvā rūpaṃ ghoram īdṛṅ mamedam
GE07mbh_06_u:033.049c: vyapetabhīḥ prītamanāḥ punas tvaṃ; tad eva me rūpam idaṃ prapaśya
GE07mbh_06_u:033.050a: ity arjunaṃ vāsudevas tathoktvā; svakaṃ rūpaṃ darśayām āsa bhūyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:033.050c: āśvāsayām āsa ca bhītam enaṃ; bhūtvā punaḥ saumyavapur mahātmā
GE07mbh_06_u:033.051a: dṛṣṭvedaṃ mānuṣaṃ rūpaṃ tava saumyaṃ janārdana
GE07mbh_06_u:033.051c: idānīm asmi saṃvṛttaḥ sacetāḥ prakṛtiṃ gataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:033.052a: sudurdarśam idaṃ rūpaṃ dṛṣṭavān asi yan mama
GE07mbh_06_u:033.052c: devā apy asya rūpasya nityaṃ darśanakāṅkṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:033.053a: nāhaṃ vedair na tapasā na dānena na cejyayā
GE07mbh_06_u:033.053c: śakya evaṃvidho draṣṭuṃ dṛṣṭavān asi māṃ yathā
GE07mbh_06_u:033.054a: bhaktyā tv ananyayā śakya aham evaṃvidho 'rjuna
GE07mbh_06_u:033.054c: jñātuṃ draṣṭuṃ ca tattvena praveṣṭuṃ ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_06_u:033.055c: nirvairaḥ sarvabhūteṣu yaḥ sa mām eti pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_06_u:034.001a: evaṃ satatayuktā ye bhaktās tvāṃ paryupāsate
GE07mbh_06_u:034.001c: ye cāpy akṣaram avyaktaṃ teṣāṃ ke yogavittamāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:034.002a: mayy āveśya mano ye māṃ nityayuktā upāsate
GE07mbh_06_u:034.002c: śraddhayā parayopetās te me yuktatamā matāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:034.003a: ye tv akṣaram anirdeśyam avyaktaṃ paryupāsate
GE07mbh_06_u:034.003c: sarvatragam acintyaṃ ca kūṭastham acalaṃ dhruvam
GE07mbh_06_u:034.004c: te prāpnuvanti mām eva sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:034.005c: avyaktā hi gatir duḥkhaṃ dehavadbhir avāpyate
GE07mbh_06_u:034.006a: ye tu sarvāṇi karmāṇi mayi saṃnyasya matparāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:034.008a: mayy eva mana ādhatsva mayi buddhiṃ niveśaya
GE07mbh_06_u:034.008c: nivasiṣyasi mayy eva ata ūrdhvaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:034.009a: atha cittaṃ samādhātuṃ na śaknoṣi mayi sthiram
GE07mbh_06_u:034.010c: madartham api karmāṇi kurvan siddhim avāpsyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:034.011a: athaitad apy aśakto 'si kartuṃ madyogam āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:034.012a: śreyo hi jñānam abhyāsāj jñānād dhyānaṃ viśiṣyate
GE07mbh_06_u:034.013a: adveṣṭā sarvabhūtānāṃ maitraḥ karuṇa eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:034.014c: mayy arpitamanobuddhir yo madbhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:034.015a: yasmān nodvijate loko lokān nodvijate ca yaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:034.015c: harṣāmarṣabhayodvegair mukto yaḥ sa ca me priyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:034.016c: sarvārambhaparityāgī yo madbhaktaḥ sa me priyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:034.017a: yo na hṛṣyati na dveṣṭi na śocati na kāṅkṣati
GE07mbh_06_u:034.017c: śubhāśubhaparityāgī bhaktimān yaḥ sa me priyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:034.018a: samaḥ śatrau ca mitre ca tathā mānāvamānayoḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:034.019a: tulyanindāstutir maunī saṃtuṣṭo yena kena cit
GE07mbh_06_u:034.019c: aniketaḥ sthiramatir bhaktimān me priyo naraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:034.020a: ye tu dharmyāmṛtam idaṃ yathoktaṃ paryupāsate
GE07mbh_06_u:034.020c: śraddadhānā matparamā bhaktās te 'tīva me priyāḥ arjuna uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:035.000-0108_01: prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:035.000-0108_02: etad veditum icchāmi jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ ca keśava śrībhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:035.001-0109_01: prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:035.001-0109_02: etat te kathayiṣyāmi jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:035.001a: idaṃ śarīraṃ kaunteya kṣetram ity abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_06_u:035.001c: etad yo vetti taṃ prāhuḥ kṣetrajña iti tadvidaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:035.002a: kṣetrajñaṃ cāpi māṃ viddhi sarvakṣetreṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:035.002c: kṣetrakṣetrajñayor jñānaṃ yat taj jñānaṃ mataṃ mama
GE07mbh_06_u:035.003a: tat kṣetraṃ yac ca yādṛk ca yadvikāri yataś ca yat
GE07mbh_06_u:035.003c: sa ca yo yatprabhāvaś ca tat samāsena me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_06_u:035.004a: ṛṣibhir bahudhā gītaṃ chandobhir vividhaiḥ pṛthak
GE07mbh_06_u:035.005a: mahābhūtāny ahaṃkāro buddhir avyaktam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:035.006a: icchā dveṣaḥ sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ saṃghātaś cetanā dhṛtiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:035.008a: indriyārtheṣu vairāgyam anahaṃkāra eva ca janmamṛtyujarāvyādhiduḥkhadoṣānudarśanam
GE07mbh_06_u:035.011c: etaj jñānam iti proktam ajñānaṃ yad ato 'nyathā
GE07mbh_06_u:035.012a: jñeyaṃ yat tat pravakṣyāmi yaj jñātvāmṛtam aśnute
GE07mbh_06_u:035.012c: anādimat paraṃ brahma na sat tan nāsad ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:035.014c: asaktaṃ sarvabhṛc caiva nirguṇaṃ guṇabhoktṛ ca
GE07mbh_06_u:035.015a: bahir antaś ca bhūtānām acaraṃ caram eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:035.015c: sūkṣmatvāt tad avijñeyaṃ dūrasthaṃ cāntike ca tat
GE07mbh_06_u:035.016a: avibhaktaṃ ca bhūteṣu vibhaktam iva ca sthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:035.016c: bhūtabhartṛ ca taj jñeyaṃ grasiṣṇu prabhaviṣṇu ca
GE07mbh_06_u:035.017a: jyotiṣām api taj jyotis tamasaḥ param ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:035.017c: jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ jñānagamyaṃ hṛdi sarvasya viṣṭhitam
GE07mbh_06_u:035.018a: iti kṣetraṃ tathā jñānaṃ jñeyaṃ coktaṃ samāsataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:035.019a: prakṛtiṃ puruṣaṃ caiva viddhy anādī ubhāv api
GE07mbh_06_u:035.019c: vikārāṃś ca guṇāṃś caiva viddhi prakṛtisaṃbhavān
GE07mbh_06_u:035.021a: puruṣaḥ prakṛtistho hi bhuṅkte prakṛtijān guṇān
GE07mbh_06_u:035.022c: paramātmeti cāpy ukto dehe 'smin puruṣaḥ paraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:035.023a: ya evaṃ vetti puruṣaṃ prakṛtiṃ ca guṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:035.024a: dhyānenātmani paśyanti ke cid ātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:035.025a: anye tv evam ajānantaḥ śrutvānyebhya upāsate
GE07mbh_06_u:035.026a: yāvat saṃjāyate kiṃ cit sattvaṃ sthāvarajaṅgamam
GE07mbh_06_u:035.027c: vinaśyatsv avinaśyantaṃ yaḥ paśyati sa paśyati
GE07mbh_06_u:035.028a: samaṃ paśyan hi sarvatra samavasthitam īśvaram
GE07mbh_06_u:035.028c: na hinasty ātmanātmānaṃ tato yāti parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_06_u:035.029c: yaḥ paśyati tathātmānam akartāraṃ sa paśyati
GE07mbh_06_u:035.030c: tata eva ca vistāraṃ brahma saṃpadyate tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:035.031c: śarīrastho 'pi kaunteya na karoti na lipyate
GE07mbh_06_u:035.033a: yathā prakāśayaty ekaḥ kṛtsnaṃ lokam imaṃ raviḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:035.033c: kṣetraṃ kṣetrī tathā kṛtsnaṃ prakāśayati bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:035.034c: bhūtaprakṛtimokṣaṃ ca ye vidur yānti te param
GE07mbh_06_u:036.001a: paraṃ bhūyaḥ pravakṣyāmi jñānānāṃ jñānam uttamam
GE07mbh_06_u:036.001c: yaj jñātvā munayaḥ sarve parāṃ siddhim ito gatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:036.002a: idaṃ jñānam upāśritya mama sādharmyam āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:036.002c: sarge 'pi nopajāyante pralaye na vyathanti ca
GE07mbh_06_u:036.003a: mama yonir mahad brahma tasmin garbhaṃ dadhāmy aham
GE07mbh_06_u:036.004c: tāsāṃ brahma mahad yonir ahaṃ bījapradaḥ pitā
GE07mbh_06_u:036.005a: sattvaṃ rajas tama iti guṇāḥ prakṛtisaṃbhavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:036.008a: tamas tv ajñānajaṃ viddhi mohanaṃ sarvadehinām
GE07mbh_06_u:036.009a: sattvaṃ sukhe sañjayati rajaḥ karmaṇi bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:036.009c: jñānam āvṛtya tu tamaḥ pramāde sañjayaty uta
GE07mbh_06_u:036.010a: rajas tamaś cābhibhūya sattvaṃ bhavati bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:036.010c: rajaḥ sattvaṃ tamaś caiva tamaḥ sattvaṃ rajas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:036.011c: jñānaṃ yadā tadā vidyād vivṛddhaṃ sattvam ity uta
GE07mbh_06_u:036.012a: lobhaḥ pravṛttir ārambhaḥ karmaṇām aśamaḥ spṛhā
GE07mbh_06_u:036.013a: aprakāśo 'pravṛttiś ca pramādo moha eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:036.014a: yadā sattve pravṛddhe tu pralayaṃ yāti dehabhṛt
GE07mbh_06_u:036.016c: rajasas tu phalaṃ duḥkham ajñānaṃ tamasaḥ phalam
GE07mbh_06_u:036.017a: sattvāt saṃjāyate jñānaṃ rajaso lobha eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:036.018a: ūrdhvaṃ gacchanti sattvasthā madhye tiṣṭhanti rājasāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:036.019c: guṇebhyaś ca paraṃ vetti madbhāvaṃ so 'dhigacchati
GE07mbh_06_u:036.020a: guṇān etān atītya trīn dehī dehasamudbhavān
GE07mbh_06_u:036.021a: kair liṅgais trīn guṇān etān atīto bhavati prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:036.021c: kimācāraḥ kathaṃ caitāṃs trīn guṇān ativartate
GE07mbh_06_u:036.022a: prakāśaṃ ca pravṛttiṃ ca moham eva ca pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_06_u:036.022c: na dveṣṭi saṃpravṛttāni na nivṛttāni kāṅkṣati
GE07mbh_06_u:036.023a: udāsīnavad āsīno guṇair yo na vicālyate
GE07mbh_06_u:036.023c: guṇā vartanta ity eva yo 'vatiṣṭhati neṅgate
GE07mbh_06_u:037.001c: chandāṃsi yasya parṇāni yas taṃ veda sa vedavit
GE07mbh_06_u:037.002a: adhaś cordhvaṃ prasṛtās tasya śākhā; guṇapravṛddhā viṣayapravālāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:037.002c: adhaś ca mūlāny anusaṃtatāni; karmānubandhīni manuṣyaloke
GE07mbh_06_u:037.003a: na rūpam asyeha tathopalabhyate; nānto na cādir na ca saṃpratiṣṭhā
GE07mbh_06_u:037.003c: aśvattham enaṃ suvirūḍhamūlam; asaṅgaśastreṇa dṛḍhena chittvā
GE07mbh_06_u:037.004a: tataḥ padaṃ tatparimārgitavyaṃ; yasmin gatā na nivartanti bhūyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:037.004c: tam eva cādyaṃ puruṣaṃ prapadye; yataḥ pravṛttiḥ prasṛtā purāṇī
GE07mbh_06_u:037.005c: dvaṃdvair vimuktāḥ sukhaduḥkhasaṃjñair; gacchanty amūḍhāḥ padam avyayaṃ tat
GE07mbh_06_u:037.006a: na tad bhāsayate sūryo na śaśāṅko na pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:037.006c: yad gatvā na nivartante tad dhāma paramaṃ mama
GE07mbh_06_u:037.008a: śarīraṃ yad avāpnoti yac cāpy utkrāmatīśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:037.009a: śrotraṃ cakṣuḥ sparśanaṃ ca rasanaṃ ghrāṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:037.010a: utkrāmantaṃ sthitaṃ vāpi bhuñjānaṃ vā guṇānvitam
GE07mbh_06_u:037.011a: yatanto yoginaś cainaṃ paśyanty ātmany avasthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:037.012c: yac candramasi yac cāgnau tat tejo viddhi māmakam
GE07mbh_06_u:037.013a: gām āviśya ca bhūtāni dhārayāmy aham ojasā
GE07mbh_06_u:037.013c: puṣṇāmi cauṣadhīḥ sarvāḥ somo bhūtvā rasātmakaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:037.014a: ahaṃ vaiśvānaro bhūtvā prāṇināṃ deham āśritaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:037.015a: sarvasya cāhaṃ hṛdi saṃniviṣṭo; mattaḥ smṛtir jñānam apohanaṃ ca
GE07mbh_06_u:037.015c: vedaiś ca sarvair aham eva vedyo; vedāntakṛd vedavid eva cāham
GE07mbh_06_u:037.016a: dvāv imau puruṣau loke kṣaraś cākṣara eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:037.017a: uttamaḥ puruṣas tv anyaḥ paramātmety udāhṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:037.017c: yo lokatrayam āviśya bibharty avyaya īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:037.018a: yasmāt kṣaram atīto 'ham akṣarād api cottamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:037.018c: ato 'smi loke vede ca prathitaḥ puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:037.019a: yo mām evam asaṃmūḍho jānāti puruṣottamam
GE07mbh_06_u:037.019c: sa sarvavid bhajati māṃ sarvabhāvena bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:037.020a: iti guhyatamaṃ śāstram idam uktaṃ mayānagha
GE07mbh_06_u:037.020c: etad buddhvā buddhimān syāt kṛtakṛtyaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:038.001c: dānaṃ damaś ca yajñaś ca svādhyāyas tapa ārjavam
GE07mbh_06_u:038.002a: ahiṃsā satyam akrodhas tyāgaḥ śāntir apaiśunam
GE07mbh_06_u:038.002c: dayā bhūteṣv aloluptvaṃ mārdavaṃ hrīr acāpalam
GE07mbh_06_u:038.003a: tejaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ śaucam adroho nātimānitā
GE07mbh_06_u:038.004a: dambho darpo 'timānaś ca krodhaḥ pāruṣyam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:038.005c: mā śucaḥ saṃpadaṃ daivīm abhijāto 'si pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_06_u:038.006a: dvau bhūtasargau loke 'smin daiva āsura eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:038.006c: daivo vistaraśaḥ prokta āsuraṃ pārtha me śṛṇu
GE07mbh_06_u:038.007a: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca janā na vidur āsurāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:038.007c: na śaucaṃ nāpi cācāro na satyaṃ teṣu vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:038.008a: asatyam apratiṣṭhaṃ te jagad āhur anīśvaram
GE07mbh_06_u:038.013a: idam adya mayā labdham idaṃ prāpsye manoratham
GE07mbh_06_u:038.013c: idam astīdam api me bhaviṣyati punar dhanam
GE07mbh_06_u:038.014a: asau mayā hataḥ śatrur haniṣye cāparān api
GE07mbh_06_u:038.014c: īśvaro 'ham ahaṃ bhogī siddho 'haṃ balavān sukhī
GE07mbh_06_u:038.018a: ahaṃkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ ca saṃśritāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:038.019a: tān ahaṃ dviṣataḥ krūrān saṃsāreṣu narādhamān
GE07mbh_06_u:038.019c: kṣipāmy ajasram aśubhān āsurīṣv eva yoniṣu
GE07mbh_06_u:038.020a: āsurīṃ yonim āpannā mūḍhā janmani janmani
GE07mbh_06_u:038.020c: mām aprāpyaiva kaunteya tato yānty adhamāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_06_u:038.021c: kāmaḥ krodhas tathā lobhas tasmād etat trayaṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_06_u:038.022a: etair vimuktaḥ kaunteya tamodvārais tribhir naraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:038.022c: ācaraty ātmanaḥ śreyas tato yāti parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_06_u:038.023c: na sa siddhim avāpnoti na sukhaṃ na parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_06_u:039.001c: teṣāṃ niṣṭhā tu kā kṛṣṇa sattvam āho rajas tamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:039.002a: trividhā bhavati śraddhā dehināṃ sā svabhāvajā
GE07mbh_06_u:039.002c: sāttvikī rājasī caiva tāmasī ceti tāṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_06_u:039.003c: śraddhāmayo 'yaṃ puruṣo yo yacchraddhaḥ sa eva saḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:039.004c: pretān bhūtagaṇāṃś cānye yajante tāmasā janāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:039.005a: aśāstravihitaṃ ghoraṃ tapyante ye tapo janāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:039.007a: āhāras tv api sarvasya trividho bhavati priyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:039.007c: yajñas tapas tathā dānaṃ teṣāṃ bhedam imaṃ śṛṇu āyuḥsattvabalārogyasukhaprītivivardhanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:039.008c: rasyāḥ snigdhāḥ sthirā hṛdyā āhārāḥ sāttvikapriyāḥ kaṭvamlalavaṇātyuṣṇatīkṣṇarūkṣavidāhinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:039.010a: yātayāmaṃ gatarasaṃ pūti paryuṣitaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_06_u:039.011c: yaṣṭavyam eveti manaḥ samādhāya sa sāttvikaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:039.012a: abhisaṃdhāya tu phalaṃ dambhārtham api caiva yat
GE07mbh_06_u:039.012c: ijyate bharataśreṣṭha taṃ yajñaṃ viddhi rājasam
GE07mbh_06_u:039.014c: brahmacaryam ahiṃsā ca śārīraṃ tapa ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:039.015a: anudvegakaraṃ vākyaṃ satyaṃ priyahitaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_06_u:039.016c: bhāvasaṃśuddhir ity etat tapo mānasam ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:039.017a: śraddhayā parayā taptaṃ tapas tat trividhaṃ naraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:039.018c: kriyate tad iha proktaṃ rājasaṃ calam adhruvam
GE07mbh_06_u:039.020c: deśe kāle ca pātre ca tad dānaṃ sāttvikaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:039.021a: yat tu pratyupakārārthaṃ phalam uddiśya vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:039.021c: dīyate ca parikliṣṭaṃ tad dānaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:039.022a: adeśakāle yad dānam apātrebhyaś ca dīyate
GE07mbh_06_u:039.023a: oṃ tat sad iti nirdeśo brahmaṇas trividhaḥ smṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:039.023c: brāhmaṇās tena vedāś ca yajñāś ca vihitāḥ purā
GE07mbh_06_u:039.026a: sadbhāve sādhubhāve ca sad ity etat prayujyate
GE07mbh_06_u:039.026c: praśaste karmaṇi tathā sacchabdaḥ pārtha yujyate
GE07mbh_06_u:039.027a: yajñe tapasi dāne ca sthitiḥ sad iti cocyate
GE07mbh_06_u:039.027c: karma caiva tadarthīyaṃ sad ity evābhidhīyate
GE07mbh_06_u:039.028a: aśraddhayā hutaṃ dattaṃ tapas taptaṃ kṛtaṃ ca yat
GE07mbh_06_u:039.028c: asad ity ucyate pārtha na ca tat pretya no iha
GE07mbh_06_u:040.002a: kāmyānāṃ karmaṇāṃ nyāsaṃ saṃnyāsaṃ kavayo viduḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.003a: tyājyaṃ doṣavad ity eke karma prāhur manīṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.004a: niścayaṃ śṛṇu me tatra tyāge bharatasattama
GE07mbh_06_u:040.005a: yajñadānatapaḥkarma na tyājyaṃ kāryam eva tat
GE07mbh_06_u:040.005c: yajño dānaṃ tapaś caiva pāvanāni manīṣiṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:040.006a: etāny api tu karmāṇi saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:040.006c: kartavyānīti me pārtha niścitaṃ matam uttamam
GE07mbh_06_u:040.008a: duḥkham ity eva yat karma kāyakleśabhayāt tyajet
GE07mbh_06_u:040.008c: sa kṛtvā rājasaṃ tyāgaṃ naiva tyāgaphalaṃ labhet
GE07mbh_06_u:040.009a: kāryam ity eva yat karma niyataṃ kriyate 'rjuna
GE07mbh_06_u:040.009c: saṅgaṃ tyaktvā phalaṃ caiva sa tyāgaḥ sāttviko mataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.010a: na dveṣṭy akuśalaṃ karma kuśale nānuṣajjate
GE07mbh_06_u:040.011a: na hi dehabhṛtā śakyaṃ tyaktuṃ karmāṇy aśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.011c: yas tu karmaphalatyāgī sa tyāgīty abhidhīyate
GE07mbh_06_u:040.012a: aniṣṭam iṣṭaṃ miśraṃ ca trividhaṃ karmaṇaḥ phalam
GE07mbh_06_u:040.012c: bhavaty atyāgināṃ pretya na tu saṃnyāsināṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_06_u:040.014a: adhiṣṭhānaṃ tathā kartā karaṇaṃ ca pṛthagvidham
GE07mbh_06_u:040.014c: vividhāś ca pṛthakceṣṭā daivaṃ caivātra pañcamam
GE07mbh_06_u:040.015c: nyāyyaṃ vā viparītaṃ vā pañcaite tasya hetavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.016a: tatraivaṃ sati kartāram ātmānaṃ kevalaṃ tu yaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.016c: paśyaty akṛtabuddhitvān na sa paśyati durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.017a: yasya nāhaṃkṛto bhāvo buddhir yasya na lipyate
GE07mbh_06_u:040.017c: hatvāpi sa imāṃl lokān na hanti na nibadhyate
GE07mbh_06_u:040.019a: jñānaṃ karma ca kartā ca tridhaiva guṇabhedataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.019c: procyate guṇasaṃkhyāne yathāvac chṛṇu tāny api
GE07mbh_06_u:040.020c: avibhaktaṃ vibhakteṣu taj jñānaṃ viddhi sāttvikam
GE07mbh_06_u:040.021a: pṛthaktvena tu yaj jñānaṃ nānābhāvān pṛthagvidhān
GE07mbh_06_u:040.021c: vetti sarveṣu bhūteṣu taj jñānaṃ viddhi rājasam
GE07mbh_06_u:040.022a: yat tu kṛtsnavad ekasmin kārye saktam ahaitukam
GE07mbh_06_u:040.022c: atattvārthavad alpaṃ ca tat tāmasam udāhṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:040.023c: aphalaprepsunā karma yat tat sāttvikam ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:040.024a: yat tu kāmepsunā karma sāhaṃkāreṇa vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.025a: anubandhaṃ kṣayaṃ hiṃsām anapekṣya ca pauruṣam
GE07mbh_06_u:040.025c: mohād ārabhyate karma yat tat tāmasam ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:040.028c: viṣādī dīrghasūtrī ca kartā tāmasa ucyate
GE07mbh_06_u:040.029a: buddher bhedaṃ dhṛteś caiva guṇatas trividhaṃ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_06_u:040.030a: pravṛttiṃ ca nivṛttiṃ ca kāryākārye bhayābhaye
GE07mbh_06_u:040.030c: bandhaṃ mokṣaṃ ca yā vetti buddhiḥ sā pārtha sāttvikī
GE07mbh_06_u:040.031a: yayā dharmam adharmaṃ ca kāryaṃ cākāryam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:040.031c: ayathāvat prajānāti buddhiḥ sā pārtha rājasī
GE07mbh_06_u:040.032a: adharmaṃ dharmam iti yā manyate tamasāvṛtā
GE07mbh_06_u:040.032c: sarvārthān viparītāṃś ca buddhiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī
GE07mbh_06_u:040.034c: prasaṅgena phalākāṅkṣī dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha rājasī
GE07mbh_06_u:040.035a: yayā svapnaṃ bhayaṃ śokaṃ viṣādaṃ madam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:040.035c: na vimuñcati durmedhā dhṛtiḥ sā pārtha tāmasī
GE07mbh_06_u:040.036a: sukhaṃ tv idānīṃ trividhaṃ śṛṇu me bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:040.036c: abhyāsād ramate yatra duḥkhāntaṃ ca nigacchati
GE07mbh_06_u:040.038c: pariṇāme viṣam iva tat sukhaṃ rājasaṃ smṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:040.039a: yad agre cānubandhe ca sukhaṃ mohanam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.040a: na tad asti pṛthivyāṃ vā divi deveṣu vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.040c: sattvaṃ prakṛtijair muktaṃ yad ebhiḥ syāt tribhir guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.042a: śamo damas tapaḥ śaucaṃ kṣāntir ārjavam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:040.043a: śauryaṃ tejo dhṛtir dākṣyaṃ yuddhe cāpy apalāyanam
GE07mbh_06_u:040.045a: sve sve karmaṇy abhirataḥ saṃsiddhiṃ labhate naraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.045c: svakarmanirataḥ siddhiṃ yathā vindati tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_06_u:040.046a: yataḥ pravṛttir bhūtānāṃ yena sarvam idaṃ tatam
GE07mbh_06_u:040.046c: svakarmaṇā tam abhyarcya siddhiṃ vindati mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.048a: sahajaṃ karma kaunteya sadoṣam api na tyajet
GE07mbh_06_u:040.050a: siddhiṃ prāpto yathā brahma tathāpnoti nibodha me
GE07mbh_06_u:040.050c: samāsenaiva kaunteya niṣṭhā jñānasya yā parā
GE07mbh_06_u:040.051a: buddhyā viśuddhayā yukto dhṛtyātmānaṃ niyamya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:040.051c: śabdādīn viṣayāṃs tyaktvā rāgadveṣau vyudasya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:040.053a: ahaṃkāraṃ balaṃ darpaṃ kāmaṃ krodhaṃ parigraham
GE07mbh_06_u:040.054a: brahmabhūtaḥ prasannātmā na śocati na kāṅkṣati
GE07mbh_06_u:040.054c: samaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu madbhaktiṃ labhate parām
GE07mbh_06_u:040.055a: bhaktyā mām abhijānāti yāvān yaś cāsmi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.055c: tato māṃ tattvato jñātvā viśate tadanantaram
GE07mbh_06_u:040.058c: atha cet tvam ahaṃkārān na śroṣyasi vinaṅkṣyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:040.059a: yad ahaṃkāram āśritya na yotsya iti manyase
GE07mbh_06_u:040.059c: mithyaiṣa vyavasāyas te prakṛtis tvāṃ niyokṣyati
GE07mbh_06_u:040.060c: kartuṃ necchasi yan mohāt kariṣyasy avaśo 'pi tat
GE07mbh_06_u:040.062a: tam eva śaraṇaṃ gaccha sarvabhāvena bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:040.062c: tatprasādāt parāṃ śāntiṃ sthānaṃ prāpsyasi śāśvatam
GE07mbh_06_u:040.063a: iti te jñānam ākhyātaṃ guhyād guhyataraṃ mayā
GE07mbh_06_u:040.064a: sarvaguhyatamaṃ bhūyaḥ śṛṇu me paramaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.064c: iṣṭo 'si me dṛḍham iti tato vakṣyāmi te hitam
GE07mbh_06_u:040.065a: manmanā bhava madbhakto madyājī māṃ namaskuru
GE07mbh_06_u:040.065c: mām evaiṣyasi satyaṃ te pratijāne priyo 'si me
GE07mbh_06_u:040.066a: sarvadharmān parityajya mām ekaṃ śaraṇaṃ vraja
GE07mbh_06_u:040.066c: ahaṃ tvā sarvapāpebhyo mokṣayiṣyāmi mā śucaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.067a: idaṃ te nātapaskāya nābhaktāya kadā cana
GE07mbh_06_u:040.067c: na cāśuśrūṣave vācyaṃ na ca māṃ yo 'bhyasūyati
GE07mbh_06_u:040.068a: ya idaṃ paramaṃ guhyaṃ madbhakteṣv abhidhāsyati
GE07mbh_06_u:040.068c: bhaktiṃ mayi parāṃ kṛtvā mām evaiṣyaty asaṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.069a: na ca tasmān manuṣyeṣu kaś cin me priyakṛttamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.069c: bhavitā na ca me tasmād anyaḥ priyataro bhuvi
GE07mbh_06_u:040.070a: adhyeṣyate ca ya imaṃ dharmyaṃ saṃvādam āvayoḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.070c: jñānayajñena tenāham iṣṭaḥ syām iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.071a: śraddhāvān anasūyaś ca śṛṇuyād api yo naraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.071c: so 'pi muktaḥ śubhāṃl lokān prāpnuyāt puṇyakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:040.072a: kaccid etac chrutaṃ pārtha tvayaikāgreṇa cetasā
GE07mbh_06_u:040.073a: naṣṭo mohaḥ smṛtir labdhā tvatprasādān mayācyuta
GE07mbh_06_u:040.074a: ity ahaṃ vāsudevasya pārthasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.075a: vyāsaprasādāc chrutavān etad guhyam ahaṃ param
GE07mbh_06_u:040.075c: yogaṃ yogeśvarāt kṛṣṇāt sākṣāt kathayataḥ svayam
GE07mbh_06_u:040.076a: rājan saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya saṃvādam imam adbhutam
GE07mbh_06_u:040.076c: keśavārjunayoḥ puṇyaṃ hṛṣyāmi ca muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.077a: tac ca saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya rūpam atyadbhutaṃ hareḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.077c: vismayo me mahān rājan hṛṣyāmi ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078a: yatra yogeśvaraḥ kṛṣṇo yatra pārtho dhanurdharaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078c: tatra śrīr vijayo bhūtir dhruvā nītir matir mama
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-0112_01: ṣaṭ śatāni saviṃśāni ślokānāṃ prāha keśavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-0112_03: dhṛtarāṣṭraḥ ślokam ekaṃ gītāyā mānam ucyate vaiśaṃpāyana uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-0113_05: gaṅgā gītā ca gāyatrī govindeti hṛdi sthite
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-0114_02: sāram uddhṛtya kṛṣṇena arjunasya mukhe hutam arjuna uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0001: yad etan niṣkalaṃ brahma vyomātītaṃ nirañjanam |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0009: yat tat parataraṃ jyotir dhruvāt parataraṃ sthitam |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0010: ācaturyugam adyāpi kathitaṃ na hi kasya cit || (5)
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0011: ātmadehe mayā sṛṣṭā prakṛtiḥ kṣetram eva ca |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0012: sakalaṃ tu bhavet kṣetraṃ niṣkalaṃ paramaṃ padam ||
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0016: teṣāṃ na vidyate niṣṭhā sarvaiḥ pāṣaṇḍibhiḥ saha ||
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0017: kathitaṃ ca mayā jñānaṃ devānām api durlabham |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0020: aprakāśam idaṃ praśnaṃ yan mayā kathitaṃ tava ||
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0021: nāgnir vāyur na cākāśaṃ na kṣitir nāpi vā jalam |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0023: anityo nityatāṃ yāti yadā bhāvaṃ na paśyati |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0025: puruṣaṃ nirguṇaṃ sākṣāt sarvataś caiva tiṣṭhati |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0026: sarvaṃ tat syāt paraṃ brahma buddhiś cāsya na budhyati || (13)
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0029: jīvo yatra pralīyeta sā kalā ṣoḍaśī smṛtā |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0030: tayā sarvam idaṃ vyāptaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram ||
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0031: tac cintyaṃ tena vai jñānaṃ tad atrādyā upāsate |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0033: vedeṣu vedam ity āhur vedadhāma paraṃ matam |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0034: tat paraṃ viditaṃ yasya sa vipro vedapāragaḥ || (17)
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0035: āhutiḥ sā parā jñeyā sā ca saṃdhyā pratiṣṭhitā |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0036: gāyatrī sā parā jñeyā ajapā nāma viśrutā || (18)
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0037: tapasy atha tathā vede munibhiḥ samupāsyate |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0041: iḍā bhagavatī gaṅgā piṅgalā yamunā nadī |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0042: tayor madhye tṛtīyā tu tat prayāgam anusmaret ||
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0043: iḍā vai vaiṣṇavī nāḍī brahmanāḍī tu piṅgalā |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0044: suṣumṇā caiśvarī nāḍī tridhā prāṇavahā smṛtā |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0049: suṣumṇā dakṣiṇāgnis tu hy etad agnitrayaṃ smṛtam ||
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0050: tasya madhye sthitaṃ jyotiḥ somamaṇḍalam eva ca |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0060: tristhānaṃ ca trimātraṃ ca tribrahma ca trirakṣaram
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0061: ardhamātraṃ ca yo vetti sa bhaved vedapāragaḥ ||
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0064: jīvo jīvati jīvena nāsti jīvam ajīvitam | śrībhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0065: nirgataḥ saha saṅgena sa jīvaḥ kena jīvati || (32)
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0067: ākāśaṃ pibate nityaṃ sa jīvas tena jīvati || (33)
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0070: tāvat paśyet khagākāraṃ khakāraṃ tu vicintayet |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0071: khamadhye kuru cātmānam ātmamadhyaṃ ca khaṃ kuru ||
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0072: khamadhye ca praveṣṭavyaṃ khaṃ ca brahma sanātanam |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0073: ātmānaṃ khamayaṃ kṛtvā na kiṃ cid api cintayet ||
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0076: tasya bhāvasya bhāvātmā bhāvanā naiva yujyate |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0077: anāvṛttasya śabdasya tasya śabdasya yo gatiḥ || (38)
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0078: tat padaṃ viditaṃ yena sa yogī chinnasaṃśayaḥ |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0080: jīvinaḥ saha gacchanti yāvat tattvaṃ na vindati |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0084: indriyāṇi paśuṃ kṛtvā yo yajeta sa dīkṣitaḥ |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0087: niṣkale darśanaṃ nāsti svabhāvo bhāvaṃ yuñjati ||
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0102: chinnamūlasya vṛkṣasya yathā janma na vidyate |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0104: gītāḥ sugītāḥ kartavyāḥ kim anyaiḥ śāstrasaṃgrahaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0110: gītā gaṅgā ca gāyatrī govindo hṛdi saṃsthitāḥ |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003A_0112: gītāsāraṃ paṭhed yas tu hy acyutasya ca saṃnidhau |

GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003B_0079: labdhaśāntapade bhāve na yogo na ca dhāraṇā || (39)

GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003B_0087: bindur bhidyati nādena sa nādaḥ kena bhidyate ||
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003B_0089: nirālambhas tu nirdeho yatra nādo layaṃ gataḥ || arjuna uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003B_0090: bāhyena vyāpitaṃ vyoma vyoma cānanunāsikam śrībhagavān uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003B_0091: adhaś cordhvaṃ kathaṃ caiva kaṇṭhe caiva nirañjanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003B_0097: śabdaṃ guṇam ivākāśaṃ niḥśabdaṃ brahma cocyate ||
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003B_0100: dehe naṣṭe kuto buddhir jñānaṃ vijñānam eva ca |
GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003B_0102: chinnamūlasya vṛkṣasya yathā janma na vidyate |

GE07mbh_06_u:040.078d-003B_0114: sa gacchet tatkṣaṇāt prāyo brahmamūrte namo 'stu te

GE07mbh_06_u:041.001-0115_01: prabodhitaḥ sa tu tadā viṣṇunā viśvamūrtinā
GE07mbh_06_u:041.002a: pāṇḍavāḥ somakāś caiva ye caiṣām anuyāyinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.002c: dadhmuś ca muditāḥ śaṅkhān vīrāḥ sāgarasaṃbhavān
GE07mbh_06_u:041.003a: tato bheryaś ca peśyaś ca krakacā goviṣāṇikāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.004a: atha devāḥ sagandharvāḥ pitaraś ca janeśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:041.005c: samīyus tatra sahitā draṣṭuṃ tad vaiśasaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:041.005d-0116_01: te sene stimite cāstāṃ vīkṣamāṇe parasparam
GE07mbh_06_u:041.005d-0116_03: evaṃ pravṛtte te sene niḥśabde janasaṃsadi
GE07mbh_06_u:041.006c: te sene sāgaraprakhye muhuḥ pracalite nṛpa
GE07mbh_06_u:041.007a: vimucya kavacaṃ vīro nikṣipya ca varāyudham
GE07mbh_06_u:041.007c: avaruhya rathāt tūrṇaṃ padbhyām eva kṛtāñjaliḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.010b-0118_01: sātyakiś cārjunaś caiva abhimanyuś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:041.010c: yathāmukhyāś ca rājānas tam anvājagmur utsukāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.011a: kiṃ te vyavasitaṃ rājan yad asmān apahāya vai
GE07mbh_06_u:041.013a: evaṃgate tvayi jyeṣṭhe mama bhrātari bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:041.013c: bhīr me dunoti hṛdayaṃ brūhi gantā bhavān kva nu
GE07mbh_06_u:041.013d-0119_01: kvaivaṃ gamiṣyasi śreṣṭha tyaktvāsmān durbalo yathā
GE07mbh_06_u:041.013d-0119_02: rājā hi tvaṃ mahābāho vāgyato manyumān iva
GE07mbh_06_u:041.014c: yoddhavye kva nu gantāsi śatrūn abhimukho nṛpa
GE07mbh_06_u:041.015c: novāca vāgyataḥ kiṃ cid gacchaty eva yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.017a: eṣa bhīṣmaṃ tathā droṇaṃ gautamaṃ śalyam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:041.018a: śrūyate hi purākalpe gurūn ananumānya yaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.018c: yudhyate sa bhaved vyaktam apadhyāto mahattaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.018d-0120_01: yuddhāyāvataraty eva tasya nāsti jayo raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:041.018d-0120_02: yas tu yuddhe samutpanne gurūn dṛṣṭvātha daṃśitān
GE07mbh_06_u:041.019a: anumānya yathāśāstraṃ yas tu yudhyen mahattaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.019c: dhruvas tasya jayo yuddhe bhaved iti matir mama
GE07mbh_06_u:041.020a: evaṃ bruvati kṛṣṇe tu dhārtarāṣṭracamūṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:041.020b-0121_01: netrair animiṣaiḥ sarve prekṣante sma yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_06_u:041.020c: hāhākāro mahān āsīn niḥśabdās tv apare 'bhavan
GE07mbh_06_u:041.022a: vyaktaṃ bhīta ivābhyeti rājāsau bhīṣmam antikāt
GE07mbh_06_u:041.023a: dhanaṃjaye kathaṃ nāthe pāṇḍave ca vṛkodare
GE07mbh_06_u:041.023c: nakule sahadeve ca bhīto 'bhyeti ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.024a: na nūnaṃ kṣatriyakule jātaḥ saṃprathite bhuvi
GE07mbh_06_u:041.025a: tatas te kṣatriyāḥ sarve praśaṃsanti sma kauravān
GE07mbh_06_u:041.025c: hṛṣṭāḥ sumanaso bhūtvā cailāni dudhuvuḥ pṛthak
GE07mbh_06_u:041.026a: vyanindanta tataḥ sarve yodhās tatra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:041.027a: tatas tat kauravaṃ sainyaṃ dhikkṛtvā tu yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_06_u:041.027c: niḥśabdam abhavat tūrṇaṃ punar eva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:041.028a: kiṃ nu vakṣyati rājāsau kiṃ bhīṣmaḥ prativakṣyati
GE07mbh_06_u:041.028b-0122_01: kiṃ nu vakṣyati rājāsau dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.028b-0122_02: kiṃ nu vakṣyati bhīṣmo 'sau bharatānāṃ dhuraṃdharaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.028c: kiṃ bhīmaḥ samaraślāghī kiṃ nu kṛṣṇārjunāv iti
GE07mbh_06_u:041.029a: vivakṣitaṃ kim asyeti saṃśayaḥ sumahān abhūt
GE07mbh_06_u:041.031a: tam uvāca tataḥ pādau karābhyāṃ pīḍya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.032a: āmantraye tvāṃ durdharṣa yotsye tāta tvayā saha
GE07mbh_06_u:041.032c: anujānīhi māṃ tāta āśiṣaś ca prayojaya
GE07mbh_06_u:041.032d-0123_01: jayeyaṃ ca ripūn sarvān anujñātas tvayānagha
GE07mbh_06_u:041.032d-0123_02: yudhyantaṃ māṃ raṇe vīra tvam anujñātum arhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:041.033a: yady evaṃ nābhigacchethā yudhi māṃ pṛthivīpate
GE07mbh_06_u:041.034a: prīto 'smi putra yudhyasva jayam āpnuhi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_06_u:041.034c: yat te 'bhilaṣitaṃ cānyat tad avāpnuhi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:041.035a: vriyatāṃ ca varaḥ pārtha kim asmatto 'bhikāṅkṣasi
GE07mbh_06_u:041.035c: evaṃ gate mahārāja na tavāsti parājayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.036a: arthasya puruṣo dāso dāsas tv artho na kasya cit
GE07mbh_06_u:041.036c: iti satyaṃ mahārāja baddho 'smy arthena kauravaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.037a: atas tvāṃ klībavad vākyaṃ bravīmi kurunandana
GE07mbh_06_u:041.037c: hṛto 'smy arthena kauravya yuddhād anyat kim icchasi
GE07mbh_06_u:041.039a: rājan kim atra sāhyaṃ te karomi kurunandana
GE07mbh_06_u:041.039b-0124_01: mantrayiṣyāmy ahaṃ rājan yac ca te hitam uttamam
GE07mbh_06_u:041.039c: kāmaṃ yotsye parasyārthe brūhi yat te vivakṣitam
GE07mbh_06_u:041.040c: etan me mantraya hitaṃ yadi śreyaḥ prapaśyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:041.041a: na taṃ paśyāmi kaunteya yo māṃ yudhyantam āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:041.041c: vijayeta pumān kaś cid api sākṣāc chatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.042a: hanta pṛcchāmi tasmāt tvāṃ pitāmaha namo 'stu
GE07mbh_06_u:041.042c: jayopāyaṃ bravīhi tvam ātmanaḥ samare paraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.043a: na śatruṃ tāta paśyāmi samare yo jayeta mām
GE07mbh_06_u:041.043b-0125_02: nyastaśastraṃ nirudyogaṃ hanyur mā śatravo yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:041.043b-0125_04: dravamāṇe ca bhīte ca tavāsmīti ca yo vadet
GE07mbh_06_u:041.043b-0125_06: aprasūte ca hīne ca na yuddhaṃ rocayāmy aham
GE07mbh_06_u:041.043b-0125_07: idaṃ ca gaditaṃ pārtha paramaṃ vratam āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:041.043c: na tāvan mṛtyukālo me punarāgamanaṃ kuru
GE07mbh_06_u:041.044c: śirasā pratijagrāha bhūyas tam abhivādya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:041.045a: prāyāt punar mahābāhur ācāryasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:041.046a: sa droṇam abhivādyātha kṛtvā caiva pradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:041.047c: jayeyaṃ ca ripūn sarvān anujñātas tvayā dvija
GE07mbh_06_u:041.049a: tad yudhiṣṭhira tuṣṭo 'smi pūjitaś ca tvayānagha
GE07mbh_06_u:041.050a: karavāṇi ca te kāmaṃ brūhi yat te 'bhikāṅkṣitam
GE07mbh_06_u:041.050c: evaṃ gate mahārāja yuddhād anyat kim icchasi
GE07mbh_06_u:041.051a: arthasya puruṣo dāso dāsas tv artho na kasya cit
GE07mbh_06_u:041.051c: iti satyaṃ mahārāja baddho 'smy arthena kauravaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.052a: atas tvāṃ klībavad brūmo yuddhād anyat kim icchasi
GE07mbh_06_u:041.053a: jayam āśāssva me brahman mantrayasva ca maddhitam
GE07mbh_06_u:041.053c: yudhyasva kauravasyārthe vara eṣa vṛto mayā
GE07mbh_06_u:041.054a: dhruvas te vijayo rājan yasya mantrī haris tava
GE07mbh_06_u:041.054c: ahaṃ ca tvābhijānāmi raṇe śatrūn vijeṣyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:041.055a: yato dharmas tataḥ kṛṣṇo yataḥ kṛṣṇas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.055c: yudhyasva gaccha kaunteya pṛccha māṃ kiṃ bravīmi te
GE07mbh_06_u:041.056a: pṛcchāmi tvāṃ dvijaśreṣṭha śṛṇu me yad vivakṣitam
GE07mbh_06_u:041.057a: na te 'sti vijayas tāvad yāvad yudhyāmy ahaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:041.057c: mamāśu nidhane rājan yatasva saha sodaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.058c: ācārya praṇipatyaiṣa pṛcchāmi tvāṃ namo 'stu te
GE07mbh_06_u:041.059a: na śatruṃ tāta paśyāmi yo māṃ hanyād raṇe sthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:041.060c: hanyān māṃ yudhi yodhānāṃ satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_06_u:041.061a: śastraṃ cāhaṃ raṇe jahyāṃ śrutvā sumahad apriyam
GE07mbh_06_u:041.061c: śraddheyavākyāt puruṣād etat satyaṃ bravīmi te
GE07mbh_06_u:041.062c: anumānya tam ācāryaṃ prāyāc chāradvataṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:041.063a: so 'bhivādya kṛpaṃ rājā kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:041.064c: jayeyaṃ ca ripūn sarvān anujñātas tvayānagha
GE07mbh_06_u:041.065d-0126_01: kiṃ te karomi vai kāmaṃ brūhi pāṇḍavanandana
GE07mbh_06_u:041.065d-0126_02: evaṃ gate mahārāja yuddhād anyat kim icchasi
GE07mbh_06_u:041.066a: arthasya puruṣo dāso dāsas tv artho na kasya cit
GE07mbh_06_u:041.066c: iti satyaṃ mahārāja baddho 'smy arthena kauravaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.067a: teṣām arthe mahārāja yoddhavyam iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.067c: atas tvāṃ klībavad brūmi yuddhād anyat kim icchasi
GE07mbh_06_u:041.068a: hanta pṛcchāmi te tasmād ācārya śṛṇu me vacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.068b-0127_01: vadhopāyaṃ bravīhi tvam ātmanaḥ samare paraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.069a: ity uktvā vyathito rājā novāca gatacetanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.070a: prītas tv abhigamenāhaṃ jayaṃ tava narādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:041.070c: āśāsiṣye sadotthāya satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_06_u:041.071a: etac chrutvā mahārāja gautamasya vacas tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:041.071c: anumānya kṛpaṃ rājā prayayau yena madrarāṭ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.073c: jayeyaṃ ca mahārāja anujñātas tvayā ripūn
GE07mbh_06_u:041.074c: śapeyaṃ tvāṃ mahārāja parābhāvāya vai raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:041.075a: tuṣṭo 'smi pūjitaś cāsmi yat kāṅkṣasi tad astu te
GE07mbh_06_u:041.075c: anujānāmi caiva tvāṃ yudhyasva jayam āpnuhi
GE07mbh_06_u:041.076a: brūhi caiva paraṃ vīra kenārthaḥ kiṃ dadāmi te
GE07mbh_06_u:041.076c: evaṃ gate mahārāja yuddhād anyat kim icchasi
GE07mbh_06_u:041.077a: arthasya puruṣo dāso dāsas tv artho na kasya cit
GE07mbh_06_u:041.077c: iti satyaṃ mahārāja baddho 'smy arthena kauravaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.077d-0128_01: teṣām arthe mahārāja yoddhavyam iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.078a: kariṣyāmi hi te kāmaṃ bhāgineya yathepsitam
GE07mbh_06_u:041.078c: bravīmy ataḥ klībavat tvāṃ yuddhād anyat kim icchasi
GE07mbh_06_u:041.079c: kāmaṃ yudhya parasyārthe varam etad vṛṇomy aham
GE07mbh_06_u:041.080a: brūhi kim atra sāhyaṃ te karomi nṛpasattama
GE07mbh_06_u:041.080c: kāmaṃ yotsye parasyārthe vṛto 'smy arthena kauravaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.081a: sa eva me varaḥ satya udyoge yas tvayā kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.081d-0129_01: tvāṃ hi yokṣyati sūtatve sūtaputrasya mātula
GE07mbh_06_u:041.081d-0129_02: duryodhano raṇe śūram iti me naiṣṭhikī matiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.082a: saṃpatsyaty eṣa te kāmaḥ kuntīputra yathepsitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.082c: gaccha yudhyasva visrabdhaṃ pratijāne jayaṃ tava
GE07mbh_06_u:041.085a: śrutaṃ me karṇa bhīṣmasya dveṣāt kila na yotsyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:041.085c: asmān varaya rādheya yāvad bhīṣmo na hanyate
GE07mbh_06_u:041.086a: hate tu bhīṣme rādheya punar eṣyasi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:041.086c: dhārtarāṣṭrasya sāhāyyaṃ yadi paśyasi cet samam
GE07mbh_06_u:041.088a: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ saṃnyavartata bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:041.089a: atha sainyasya madhye tu prākrośat pāṇḍavāgrajaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.089c: yo 'smān vṛṇoti tad ahaṃ varaye sāhyakāraṇāt
GE07mbh_06_u:041.090a: atha tān samabhiprekṣya yuyutsur idam abravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:041.092a: ehy ehi sarve yotsyāmas tava bhrātṝn apaṇḍitān
GE07mbh_06_u:041.092c: yuyutso vāsudevaś ca vayaṃ ca brūma sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.092d-0130_01: na bhaviṣyanti te bālā dhārtarāṣṭrā na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.093a: vṛṇomi tvāṃ mahābāho yudhyasva mama kāraṇāt
GE07mbh_06_u:041.093c: tvayi piṇḍaś ca tantuś ca dhṛtarāṣṭrasya dṛśyate
GE07mbh_06_u:041.093d-0131_01: tato jalakriyā caiva tvayā kāryā tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:041.095a: tato yuyutsuḥ kauravyaḥ parityajya sutāṃs tava
GE07mbh_06_u:041.095b-0132_01: sa satyam iti manvāno yudhiṣṭhiravacas tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:041.097a: pratyapadyanta te sarve rathān svān puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.097c: tato vyūhaṃ yathāpūrvaṃ pratyavyūhanta te punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.098a: avādayan dundubhīṃś ca śataśaś caiva puṣkarān
GE07mbh_06_u:041.100a: gauravaṃ pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ mānyān mānayatāṃ ca tān
GE07mbh_06_u:041.100c: dṛṣṭvā mahīkṣitas tatra pūjayāṃ cakrire bhṛśam
GE07mbh_06_u:041.101a: sauhṛdaṃ ca kṛpāṃ caiva prāptakālaṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_06_u:041.101c: dayāṃ ca jñātiṣu parāṃ kathayāṃ cakrire nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.102a: sādhu sādhv iti sarvatra niśceruḥ stutisaṃhitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.103a: mlecchāś cāryāś ca ye tatra dadṛśuḥ śuśruvus tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:041.103c: vṛttaṃ tat pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ rurudus te sagadgadāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:041.104a: tato jaghnur mahābherīḥ śataśaś caiva puṣkarān
GE07mbh_06_u:041.104c: śaṅkhāṃś ca gokṣīranibhān dadhmur hṛṣṭā manasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:042.001a: evaṃ vyūḍheṣv anīkeṣu māmakeṣv itareṣu ca
GE07mbh_06_u:042.001c: ke pūrvaṃ prāharaṃs tatra kuravaḥ pāṇḍavās tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:042.002a: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahito rājan putro duryodhanas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:042.002c: bhīṣmaṃ pramukhataḥ kṛtvā prayayau saha senayā
GE07mbh_06_u:042.005a: ubhayoḥ senayo rājaṃs tatas te 'smān samādravan
GE07mbh_06_u:042.005c: vayaṃ pratinadantaś ca tadāsīt tumulaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:042.007c: babhūva ghoṣas tumulaś camūnāṃ; vātoddhutānām iva sāgarāṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:042.011a: taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ tasya sainyās tava vitatrasuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:042.013a: darśayan ghoram ātmānaṃ mahābhram iva nādayan
GE07mbh_06_u:042.013c: vibhīṣayaṃs tava sutāṃs tava senāṃ samabhyayāt
GE07mbh_06_u:042.015a: duryodhanaś ca putras te durmukho duḥsahaḥ śalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:042.016c: purumitro jayo bhojaḥ saumadattiś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:042.018a: atha tān draupadīputrāḥ saubhadraś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:042.018c: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:042.020c: tāvakānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca nāsīt kaś cit parāṅmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:042.023a: sarve tv anye mahīpālāḥ prekṣakā iva bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:042.028a: ubhayoḥ senayos tīvraḥ sainyānāṃ sa samāgamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:042.029c: nātra sveṣāṃ pareṣāṃ vā viśeṣaḥ samajāyata
GE07mbh_06_u:042.030a: tasmiṃs tu tumule yuddhe vartamāne mahābhaye
GE07mbh_06_u:043.001a: pūrvāhṇe tasya raudrasya yuddham ahno viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:043.002c: siṃhānām iva saṃhrādo divam urvīṃ ca nādayan
GE07mbh_06_u:043.004c: pattīnāṃ pādaśabdāś ca vājināṃ ca mahāsvanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:043.010c: gāṅgeyas tu raṇe pārthaṃ viddhvā nākampayad balī
GE07mbh_06_u:043.010e: tathaiva pāṇḍavo rājan bhīṣmaṃ nākampayad yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:043.014c: tataḥ kosalako rājā saubhadrasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:043.014e: dhvajaṃ ciccheda samare sārathiṃ ca nyapātayat
GE07mbh_06_u:043.015a: saubhadras tu tataḥ kruddhaḥ pātite rathasārathau
GE07mbh_06_u:043.016c: dhvajam ekena ciccheda pārṣṇim ekena sārathim
GE07mbh_06_u:043.016e: anyonyaṃ ca śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ kruddhau rājaṃs tatakṣatuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:043.018d-0136_01: tau vīrāv atisaṃrabdhau kṛtinau viṣame sthitau
GE07mbh_06_u:043.019a: tau tu vīkṣya mahātmānau kṛtinau citrayodhinau
GE07mbh_06_u:043.021a: tasya mādrīsutaḥ ketuṃ saśaraṃ ca śarāsanam
GE07mbh_06_u:043.021c: ciccheda niśitair bāṇaiḥ prahasann iva bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:043.022a: putras tu tava durdharṣo nakulasya mahāhave
GE07mbh_06_u:043.022c: yugeṣāṃ cicchide bāṇair dhvajaṃ caiva nyapātayat
GE07mbh_06_u:043.026c: tasya madrādhipaś cāpaṃ dvidhā ciccheda māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:043.027a: tad apāsya dhanuś chinnaṃ kuntīputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:043.028c: chādayām āsa saṃkruddhas tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:043.030c: preṣayām āsa samare so 'sya kāye nyamajjata
GE07mbh_06_u:043.031a: athānyad dhanur ādāya sāyakāṃś ca caturdaśa
GE07mbh_06_u:043.031e: tāv anyonyaṃ susaṃkruddhau cakratuḥ subhṛśaṃ raṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:043.032a: saumadattiṃ raṇe śaṅkho rabhasaṃ rabhaso yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:043.033a: tasya vai dakṣiṇaṃ vīro nirbibheda raṇe bhujam
GE07mbh_06_u:043.034a: tayoḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ ghorarūpaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:043.035a: bāhlīkaṃ tu raṇe kruddhaṃ kruddharūpo viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:043.036a: bāhlīkas tu tato rājan dhṛṣṭaketum amarṣaṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:043.037a: cedirājas tu saṃkruddho bāhlīkaṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:043.037c: vivyādha samare tūrṇaṃ matto mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_06_u:043.038a: tau tatra samare kruddhau nardantau ca muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:043.040a: ghaṭotkacas tu saṃkruddho rākṣasaṃ taṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_06_u:043.040c: navatyā sāyakais tīkṣṇair dārayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:043.042a: vyabhrājetāṃ tatas tau tu saṃyuge śaravikṣatau
GE07mbh_06_u:043.043a: śikhaṇḍī samare rājan drauṇim abhyudyayau balī
GE07mbh_06_u:043.044c: śikhaṇḍy api tato rājan droṇaputram atāḍayat
GE07mbh_06_u:043.045c: tau jaghnatus tadānyonyaṃ śarair bahuvidhair mṛdhe
GE07mbh_06_u:043.046c: abhyayāt tvarito rājaṃs tato yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_06_u:043.048c: chādayām āsa samare meghaḥ sūryam ivoditam
GE07mbh_06_u:043.049a: bṛhatkṣatraṃ tu kaikeyaṃ kṛpaḥ śāradvato yayau
GE07mbh_06_u:043.049c: taṃ kṛpaḥ śaravarṣeṇa chādayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:043.050c: tāv anyonyaṃ hayān hatvā dhanuṣī vinikṛtya vai
GE07mbh_06_u:043.051c: tayos tad abhavad yuddhaṃ ghorarūpaṃ sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:043.052a: drupadas tu tato rājā saindhavaṃ vai jayadratham
GE07mbh_06_u:043.053a: tataḥ saindhavako rājā drupadaṃ viśikhais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:043.053c: tāḍayām āsa samare sa ca taṃ pratyavidhyata
GE07mbh_06_u:043.055a: vikarṇas tu sutas tubhyaṃ sutasomaṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_06_u:043.055c: abhyayāj javanair aśvais tato yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_06_u:043.056a: vikarṇaḥ sutasomaṃ tu viddhvā nākampayac charaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:043.056c: sutasomo vikarṇaṃ ca tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_06_u:043.060c: abhyadravata rājendra matto mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_06_u:043.061a: yaudhiṣṭhiras tu saṃkruddhaḥ saubalaṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:043.064c: viddhvā nākampayata vai mainākam iva parvatam
GE07mbh_06_u:043.065c: śarair bahubhir ānarchad dārayann iva sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:043.067a: ārjunis tasya samare hayān hatvā mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:043.067c: nanāda sumahan nādaṃ tat sainyaṃ pratyapūrayat
GE07mbh_06_u:043.068a: śrutāyus tv atha saṃkruddhaḥ phālguneḥ samare hayān
GE07mbh_06_u:043.070c: yad ayudhyan sthirā bhūtvā mahatyā senayā saha
GE07mbh_06_u:043.072c: sa ca taṃ prativivyādha tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_06_u:043.073a: kekayā bhrātaraḥ pañca gāndhārān pañca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:043.073c: sasainyās te sasainyāṃś ca yodhayām āsur āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:043.074a: vīrabāhuś ca te putro vairāṭiṃ rathasattamam
GE07mbh_06_u:043.074c: uttaraṃ yodhayām āsa vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:043.074d-0138_01: ulūkaṃ tu śatānīkaḥ śarair bahubhir āvṛṇot
GE07mbh_06_u:043.074e: uttaraś cāpi taṃ dhīraṃ vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:043.075c: ulūkaś cāpi taṃ bāṇair niśitair lomavāhibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:043.076a: tayor yuddhaṃ samabhavad ghorarūpaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:043.077c: padātīnāṃ ca samare tava teṣāṃ ca saṃkulam
GE07mbh_06_u:043.078a: muhūrtam iva tad yuddham āsīn madhuradarśanam
GE07mbh_06_u:043.078c: tata unmattavad rājan na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:043.079a: gajo gajena samare rathī ca rathinaṃ yayau
GE07mbh_06_u:043.081a: tatra devarṣayaḥ siddhāś cāraṇāś ca samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:043.083c: sādinaś ca naravyāghra yudhyamānā muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:044.001a: rājañ śatasahasrāṇi tatra tatra tadā tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:044.001c: nirmaryādaṃ prayuddhāni tat te vakṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:044.002a: na putraḥ pitaraṃ jajñe na pitā putram aurasam
GE07mbh_06_u:044.002c: na bhrātā bhrātaraṃ tatra svasrīyaṃ na ca mātulaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:044.003a: mātulaṃ na ca svasrīyo na sakhāyaṃ sakhā tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:044.003c: āviṣṭā iva yudhyante pāṇḍavāḥ kurubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:044.004a: rathānīkaṃ naravyāghrāḥ ke cid abhyapatan rathaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:044.006a: na śekuś calituṃ ke cit saṃnipatya rathā rathaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:044.006c: prabhinnās tu mahākāyāḥ saṃnipatya gajā gajaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:044.010a: prabhinnair api saṃsaktāḥ ke cit tatra mahāgajāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:044.010c: krauñcavan ninadaṃ muktvā prādravanta tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:044.012c: prādravanta diśaḥ ke cin nadanto bhairavān ravān
GE07mbh_06_u:044.013c: ṛṣṭibhiś ca dhanurbhiś ca vimalaiś ca paraśvadhaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:044.014c: āyasaiḥ parighaiś caiva nistriṃśair vimalaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:044.019c: śuśruvur dāruṇā vācaḥ pretānām iva bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:044.022a: aśvair agryajavaiḥ ke cid āplutya mahato rathān
GE07mbh_06_u:044.025a: pāṭyamāneṣu kumbheṣu pārśveṣv api ca vāraṇāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:044.025c: prāsair vinihatāḥ ke cid vineduḥ paramāturāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:044.026a: sāśvārohān hayān ke cid unmathya varavāraṇāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:044.026c: sahasā cikṣipus tatra saṃkule bhairave sati
GE07mbh_06_u:044.028a: puṃstvād abhimadatvāc ca ke cid atra mahāgajāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:044.028c: sāśvārohān hayāñ jaghnuḥ karaiḥ sacaraṇais tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:044.028d-0141_01: aśvārohaiś ca samare hastisādibhir eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:044.029a: ke cid ākṣipya kariṇaḥ sāśvān api rathān karaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:044.029d-0142_01: pratimāneṣu gātreṣu pārśveṣv abhi ca vāraṇān
GE07mbh_06_u:044.029d-0143_01: muktās tu rathibhir bāṇā rukmapuṅkhāḥ sutejanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:044.029d-0143_02: te nipetur akuṇṭhāgrā nāgeṣu ca hayeṣu ca
GE07mbh_06_u:044.031c: maholkāpratimā ghorās tatra tatra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:044.032c: vikośair vimalaiḥ khaḍgair abhijaghnuḥ parān raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:044.034a: śaktibhir dāritāḥ ke cit saṃchinnāś ca paraśvadhaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:044.034c: hastibhir mṛditāḥ ke cit kṣuṇṇāś cānye turaṃgamaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:044.035c: vikrośanti narā rājaṃs tatra tatra sma bāndhavān
GE07mbh_06_u:044.036a: putrān anye pitṝn anye bhrātṝṃś ca saha bāndhavaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:044.036c: mātulān bhāgineyāṃś ca parān api ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:044.038a: tṛṣṇāparigatāḥ ke cid alpasattvā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:044.038c: bhūmau nipatitāḥ saṃkhye jalam eva yayācire
GE07mbh_06_u:044.039c: vyanindan bhṛśam ātmānaṃ tava putrāṃś ca saṃgatān
GE07mbh_06_u:044.040c: naiva śastraṃ vimuñcanti naiva krandanti māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:044.040e: tarjayanti ca saṃhṛṣṭās tatra tatra parasparam
GE07mbh_06_u:044.041a: nirdaśya daśanaiś cāpi krodhāt svadaśanac chadān
GE07mbh_06_u:044.043a: anye tu virathāḥ śūrā ratham anyasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:044.045a: ahanat tu pitā putraṃ putraś ca pitaraṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:044.045c: svasrīyo mātulaṃ cāpi svasrīyaṃ cāpi mātulaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:044.046a: sakhāyaṃ ca sakhā rājan saṃbandhī bāndhavaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:044.046c: evaṃ yuyudhire tatra kuravaḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:044.048e: babhau bhīṣmas tadā rājaṃś candramā iva meruṇā
GE07mbh_06_u:045.002a: durmukhaḥ kṛtavarmā ca kṛpaḥ śalyo viviṃśatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.002c: bhīṣmaṃ jugupur āsādya tava putreṇa coditāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.004c: bhīṣmasya bahudhā tālaś caran ketur adṛśyata
GE07mbh_06_u:045.005a: śirāṃsi ca tadā bhīṣmo bāhūṃś cāpi sahāyudhān
GE07mbh_06_u:045.005b-0145_01: dhanūṃṣi rathināṃ bhīṣmaḥ sotsedhāni śirāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_06_u:045.005b-0145_02: bāhūn api tathā corūn rathāṃś ca vipuladhvajān
GE07mbh_06_u:045.006c: ke cid ārtasvaraṃ cakrur nāgā marmaṇi tāḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.006d-0147_02: hayāṃś ca sahayārohān pātayām āsa sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.006d-0147_03: sa rathena maheṣvāso vicaran bahudhā balī
GE07mbh_06_u:045.006d-0147_04: maṇḍalāni ca vīthīś ca gomūtrāṇi ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:045.006d-0147_05: anyāṃś ca subahūn mārgān rathena rathakovidaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.007c: saṃyuktaṃ ratham āsthāya prāyād bhīṣmarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:045.008c: abhyavarṣata bhīṣmaṃ ca tāṃś caiva rathasattamān
GE07mbh_06_u:045.009a: sa tālaketos tīkṣṇena ketum āhatya patriṇā
GE07mbh_06_u:045.009c: bhīṣmeṇa yuyudhe vīras tasya cānucaraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:045.013c: kṛpasya niśitāgreṇa tāṃś ca tīkṣṇamukhaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.014c: tasya lāghavam udvīkṣya tutuṣur devatā api
GE07mbh_06_u:045.016c: diśaḥ paryapatac cāpaṃ gāṇḍīvam iva ghoṣavat
GE07mbh_06_u:045.017a: tam āsādya mahāvegair bhīṣmo navabhir āśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.018a: dhvajaṃ cāsya tribhir bhallaiś ciccheda paramaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.018c: sārathiṃ ca tribhir bāṇair ājaghāna yatavrataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.019a: tathaiva kṛtavarmā ca kṛpaḥ śalyaś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:045.019b-0150_01: viviṃśatis tathā rājan sarve viddhvā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.019c: viddhvā nākampayat kārṣṇiṃ mainākam iva parvatam
GE07mbh_06_u:045.020a: sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ śūro dhārtarāṣṭrair mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.021c: nanāda balavān kārṣṇir bhīṣmāya visṛjañ śarān
GE07mbh_06_u:045.022a: tatrāsya sumahad rājan bāhvor balam adṛśyata
GE07mbh_06_u:045.023c: sa tāṃś ciccheda samare bhīṣmacāpacyutāñ śarān
GE07mbh_06_u:045.024a: tato dhvajam amogheṣur bhīṣmasya navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.024c: ciccheda samare vīras tata uccukruśur janāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.027a: atha bhīṣmo mahāstrāṇi divyāni ca bahūni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:045.030a: virāṭaḥ saha putreṇa dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.030c: bhīmaś ca kekayāś caiva sātyakiś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:045.031c: pāñcālyaṃ tribhir ānarchat sātyakiṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.034a: bhīmasenas tribhir viddhvā bhīṣmaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:045.036c: śalyo nivārayām āsa vegam apratimaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:045.037a: tasya kruddhaḥ sa nāgendro bṛhataḥ sādhuvāhinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.037c: padā yugam adhiṣṭhāya jaghāna caturo hayān
GE07mbh_06_u:045.038a: sa hatāśve rathe tiṣṭhan madrādhipatir āyasīm
GE07mbh_06_u:045.041c: bhīmam ārtasvaraṃ kṛtvā papāta ca mamāra ca
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043a: uttaraṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā vairāṭir bhrātaraṃ śubham
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043c: kṛtavarmaṇā ca sahitaṃ dṛṣṭvā śalyam avasthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0001: śvetaḥ krodhāt prajajvāla haviṣā havyavāḍ iva
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0002: sa visphārya mahac cāpaṃ śakracāpopamaṃ balī
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0003: abhyadhāvaj jighāṃsan vai śalyaṃ madrādhipaṃ balī
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0005: muñcan bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ prāyāc chalyarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0009: bṛhadbalaś ca kausalyo jayatsenaś ca māgadhaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0015: te tu bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ śvetamūrdhany apātayan
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0019: nikṛttāny eva tāni sma samadṛśyanta bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0020: tatas te tu nimeṣārdhāt pratyapadyan dhanūṃṣi ca
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0022: tataḥ punar ameyātmā bhallaiḥ saptabhir āśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0031: tasya dehe nipatito bāṇo vajrātigo mahān
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0034: taṃ visaṃjñaṃ vimanasaṃ tvaramāṇas tu sārathiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0038: hayāṃś ca teṣāṃ nirbhidya sārathīṃś ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0039: śaraiś caitān samākīrya prāyāc chalyarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0041: dṛṣṭvā senāpatiṃ tūrṇaṃ yāntaṃ śalyarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0042: tato bhīṣmaṃ puraskṛtya tava putro mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0043: vṛtas tu sarvasainyena prāyāc chvetarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0047: saubhadre bhīmasene ca sātyakau ca mahārathe
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0048: kaikeye ca virāṭe ca dhṛṣṭadyumne ca pārṣate
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0049: eteṣu narasiṃheṣu cedimatsyeṣu caiva ha dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0051: evaṃ śvete maheṣvāse prāpte śalyarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0052: kuravaḥ pāṇḍaveyāś ca kim akurvata saṃjaya saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0053: bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavaḥ kiṃ vā tan mamācakṣva
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0056: rājño balaṃ darśayantas tava putrasya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0059: jighāṃsantaṃ yudhāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ tadāsīt tumulaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0061: tāvakānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca yathā yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0065: nudan samantāt samare ravir udyan yathā tamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0068: śirāṃsi pātayām āsur vīrāṇāṃ śataśo raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0070: rathā ratheṣu saṃsaktā vyadṛśanta viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0073: udīrṇāś ca hayā rājan vahantas tatra tatra ha
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0082: matto gajaḥ paryavartad dhayāṃś ca hatasādinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0084: syandanād apatat kaś cin nihato 'nyena sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0085: hatasārathir apy uccaiḥ papāta kāṣṭhavad rathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0089: yudhyamānaṃ śarai rājan siñjinī dhvajinī ravāt
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0097: pitā putraṃ ca samare nābhijānāti kaś cana
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0098: cakre bhagne yuge chinne eko dhuryo hayo hataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0100: evaṃ ca samare sarve vīrāś ca virathīkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0101: tena tena sma dṛśyante dhāvamānāḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0102: gajo hataḥ śiraś chinnaṃ marma bhinnaṃ hayo hataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0103: ahataḥ ko 'pi naivāsīd bhīṣme nighnati śātravān
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0104: śvetaḥ kurūṇām akarot svayaṃ tasmin mahāhave
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0107: sāṅgadā bāhavaś caiva dhanūṃṣi ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0109: chatrāṇi ca mahārhāṇi patākāś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0110: hayaughāś ca rathaughāś ca naraughāś caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0111: vāraṇāḥ śataśaś caiva hatāḥ śvetena bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0113: avaśiṣṭās tathā paścād vibhuṃ paśyāma dhṛṣṇavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0115: bhīṣmaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ yuddhe sthitāḥ paśyāma sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0117: ekas tasthau naravyāghro girir merur ivācalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0122: te vadhyamānā bhīṣmeṇa prajahus taṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0123: svayūthād iva te yūthān muktaṃ bhūmiṣu dāruṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0124: tam ekam upalabhyaiko hṛṣṭaḥ puṣṭaḥ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0126: jīvitaṃ dustyajaṃ tyaktvā bhayaṃ ca sumahāhave
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0127: pātayām āsa sainyāni pāṇḍavānāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0129: dṛṣṭvā senāpatiṃ bhīṣmas tvaritaḥ śvetam abhyayāt
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0131: śvetaṃ cāpi tathā bhīṣmaḥ śaraughaiḥ samavākirat
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0132: tau vṛṣāv iva nardantau mattāv iva mahādvipau
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0134: astrair astrāṇi saṃvārya tatas tau puruṣarṣabhau
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0137: śaraiḥ paramasaṃkruddho yadi śveto na pālayet
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0139: praharṣaṃ pāṇḍavā jagmuḥ putras te vimanābhavat
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0142: durmukhaḥ kṛtavarmā ca kṛpaḥ śalyo viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0143: bhīṣmaṃ jugupur āsādya tava putreṇa coditāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0146: śveto gāṅgeyam utsṛjya tava putrasya vāhinīm
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0147: nāśayām āsa vegena vāyur vṛkṣān ivaujasā
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0149: āpatat sahasā bhūyo yatra bhīṣmo vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0153: nigṛhya kārmukaṃ śveto bhīṣmaṃ vivyādha saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0155: tarasā vārayām āsa matto mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0158: taṃ pratyavidhyad daśabhir bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavas tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0159: sa viddhas tena balavān nākampata yathācalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0160: vairāṭiḥ samare kruddho bhṛśam āyamya kārmukam
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0163: dhanuś ciccheda bhīṣmasya navabhir daśadhā śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0166: ketuṃ nipatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmasya tanayās tava
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0167: hataṃ bhīṣmam amanyanta śvetasya vaśam āgatam
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0168: pāṇḍavāś cāpi saṃhṛṣṭā dadhmuḥ śaṅkhān mudā yutāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0169: bhīṣmasya patitaṃ ketuṃ dṛṣṭvā tālaṃ mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0170: tato duryodhanaḥ krodhāt svam anīkam acodayat
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0172: mā naḥ prapaśyamānānāṃ śvetān mṛtyum avāpsyati
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0173: bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavaḥ śūras tathā satyaṃ bravīmi vaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0174: rājñas tu vacanaṃ śrutvā tvaramāṇā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0176: bāhlīkaḥ kṛtavarmā ca śalaḥ śalyaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0180: tān kruddho niśitair bāṇais tvaramāṇo mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0182: sa nivārya tu tān sarvān kesarī kuñjarān iva
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0184: tato 'nyad dhanur ādāya bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0185: śvetaṃ vivyādha rājendra kaṅkapatraiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0186: tataḥ senāpatiḥ kruddho bhīṣmaṃ bahubhir āyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0188: tataḥ pravyathito rājā bhīṣmaṃ dṛṣṭvā nivāritam
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0189: pravīraṃ sarvalokasya śvetena yudhi vai tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0190: niṣṭhānakaś ca sumahāṃs tava sainyasya cābhavat
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0191: taṃ vīraṃ vāritaṃ dṛṣṭvā śvetena śaravikṣatam
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0192: hataṃ śvetena manyante śvetasya vaśam āgatam
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0193: tataḥ krodhavaśaṃ prāptaḥ pitā devavratas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0194: dhvajam unmathitaṃ dṛṣṭvā tāṃ ca senāṃ nivāritām
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0195: śvetaṃ prati mahārāja vyasṛjat sāyakān bahūn
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0196: tān āvārya raṇe śveto bhīṣmasya rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0197: dhanuś ciccheda bhallena punar eva pitus tava
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0200: tatra saṃdhāya vipulān bhallān sapta śilāśitān
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0202: dhvajaṃ dvābhyāṃ tu ciccheda saptamena ca sāratheḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0206: virathaṃ rathināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ śvetaṃ dṛṣṭvā pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0209: svarathe dhanur utsṛjya śaktiṃ jagrāha kāñcanīm
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0210: tataḥ śaktiṃ raṇe śveto jagrāhogrāṃ mahābhayām
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0211: kāladaṇḍopamāṃ ghorāṃ mṛtyor iva svasāṃ śvasan
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0212: abravīc ca tadā śveto bhīṣmaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0213: tiṣṭhedānīṃ susaṃrabdhaḥ paśya māṃ puruṣo bhava
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0214: evam uktvā maheṣvāso bhīṣmaṃ yudhi parākramī
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0217: hāhākāro mahān āsīt putrāṇāṃ te viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0221: jvalantīm antarikṣe tāṃ jvālābhir iva saṃvṛtām
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0222: asaṃbhrāntas tadā rājan pitā devavratas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0223: aṣṭabhir navabhir bhīṣmaḥ śaktiṃ ciccheda patribhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0229: gadāṃ jagrāha saṃhṛṣṭo bhīṣmasya nidhanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0232: tasya vegam asaṃvārya matvā bhīṣmaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0234: śvetaḥ krodhasamāviṣṭo bhrāmayitvā tu tāṃ gadām
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0235: rathe bhīṣmasya cikṣepa yathā devo dhaneśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0236: tayā bhīṣmanipātinyā sa ratho bhasmasāt kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0238: virathaṃ rathināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ bhīṣmaṃ dṛṣṭvā rathottamāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0240: tato 'nyaṃ ratham āsthāya dhanur visphārya durmanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0241: śanakair abhyayāc chvetaṃ gāṅgeyaḥ prahasann iva
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0242: etasminn antare bhīṣmaḥ śuśrāva vipulāṃ giram
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0244: bhīṣma bhīṣma mahābāho śīghraṃ yatnaṃ kuruṣva vai
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0245: eṣa hy asya jaye kālo nirdiṣṭo viśvayoninā
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0246: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ devadūtena bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0247: saṃprahṛṣṭamanā bhūtvā vadhe tasya mano dadhe
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0248: virathaṃ rathināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ śvetaṃ dṛṣṭvā padātinam
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0250: sātyakir bhīmasenaś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0251: kaikeyo dhṛṣṭaketuś ca abhimanyuś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0255: śvetaḥ khaḍgam athākṛṣya bhīṣmasya dhanur ācchinat
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0256: tad apāsya dhanuś chinnaṃ tvaramāṇaḥ pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0257: devadūtavacaḥ śrutvā vadhe tasya mano dadhe
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0258: tataḥ pracāramāṇas tu pitā devavratas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0261: pitā te bharataśreṣṭha śvetaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0265: ājaghne viśikhaiḥ ṣaṣṭyā senānyaṃ sa mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0266: abhimanyuṃ ca samare pitā devavratas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0269: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca viṃśatyā kaikeyaṃ cāpi pañcabhiḥ
