GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0270: tāṃś ca sarvān maheṣvāsān pitā devavratas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0276: sa tasya kavacaṃ bhittvā hṛdayaṃ cāmitaujasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0277: jagāma dharaṇīṃ bāṇo mahāśanir iva jvalan
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0278: astaṃ gacchan yathādityaḥ prabhām ādāya satvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0279: evaṃ jīvitam ādāya śvetadehāj jagāma ha
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0280: taṃ bhīṣmeṇa naravyāghraṃ tathā vinihataṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0281: prapatantam apaśyāma gireḥ śṛṅgam iva cyutam
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0282: aśocan pāṇḍavās tatra kṣatriyāś ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0283: prahṛṣṭāś ca sutās tubhyaṃ kuravaś cāpi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0284: tato duḥśāsano rājañ śvetaṃ dṛṣṭvā nipātitam
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0288: tato dhanaṃjayo rājan vārṣṇeyaś cāpi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0290: tato 'vahāraḥ sainyānāṃ tava teṣāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0291: tāvakānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca nardatāṃ ca muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0292: pārthā vimanaso bhūtvā nyaviśanta mahārathāḥ dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0294: śvete senāpatau tāta saṃgrāme nihate paraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0295: kim akurvan maheṣvāsāḥ pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0298: manaḥ prīṇāti me vākyaṃ jayaṃ saṃjaya śṛṇvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0300: sa hi vīro 'nuraktaś ca vṛddhaḥ kurupatis tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0301: kṛtaṃ vairaṃ sadā tena pituḥ putreṇa dhīmatā
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0303: sarvaṃ balaṃ parityajya durgaṃ saṃśritya tiṣṭhati
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0304: pāṇḍavānāṃ pratāpena durgaṃ deśaṃ niveśya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0306: āścaryaṃ vai sadā teṣāṃ purā rājñāṃ sudurmatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0307: tato yudhiṣṭhire bhaktaḥ kathaṃ saṃjaya sūditaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0308: prakṣiptaḥ saṃmataḥ kṣudraḥ putro me puruṣādhamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0309: na yuddhaṃ rocayed bhīṣmo na cācāryaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0310: na kṛpo na ca gāndhārī nāhaṃ saṃjaya rocaye
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0311: na vāsudevo vārṣṇeyo dharmarājaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0312: na bhīmo nārjunaś caiva na yamau puruṣarṣabhau
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0313: vāryamāṇo mayā nityaṃ gāndhāryā vidureṇa ca
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0315: duryodhano yudhyamāno nityam eva hi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0316: karṇasya matam āsthāya saubalasya ca pāpakṛt
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0318: tasyāhaṃ vyasanaṃ ghoraṃ manye prāptaṃ tu saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0319: śvetasya ca vināśena bhīṣmasya vijayena ca
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0320: saṃkruddhaḥ kṛṣṇasahitaḥ pārthaḥ kim akarod yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0321: arjunād dhi bhayaṃ bhūyas tan me tāta na śāmyati
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0322: sa hi śūraś ca kaunteyaḥ kṣiprakārī ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0325: amoghakrodhasaṃkalpaṃ dṛṣṭvā vaḥ kim abhūn manaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0329: sa khaḍgākṣepahastas tu ghoṣaṃ cakre mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0331: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ kim akaroc chvete yudhi nipātite
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0334: teṣāṃ krodhaṃ cintayaṃs tu ahaḥsu ca niśāsu ca saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0335: na śāntim adhigacchāmi sarvam ācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0337: tāvakānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca punar yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0338: śvetaṃ tu nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā virāṭasya camūpatim
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043d-004_0339: kṛtavarmaṇā ca sahitaṃ dṛṣṭvā śalyam avasthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:045.043e: śaṅkhaḥ krodhāt prajajvāla haviṣā havyavāḍ iva
GE07mbh_06_u:045.044c: abhyadhāvaj jighāṃsan vai śalyaṃ madrādhipaṃ balī
GE07mbh_06_u:045.045c: sṛjan bāṇamayaṃ varṣaṃ prāyāc chalyarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:045.047a: tato bhīṣmo mahābāhur vinadya jalado yathā
GE07mbh_06_u:045.047c: tālamātraṃ dhanur gṛhya śaṅkham abhyadravad raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:045.049c: bhīṣmād rakṣyo 'yam adyeti tato yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_06_u:045.050a: hāhākāro mahān āsīd yodhānāṃ yudhi yudhyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:045.050c: tejas tejasi saṃpṛktam ity evaṃ vismayaṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.052a: sa hatāśvād rathāt tūrṇaṃ khaḍgam ādāya vidrutaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.052c: bībhatsoḥ syandanaṃ prāpya tataḥ śāntim avindata
GE07mbh_06_u:045.053c: yair antarikṣaṃ bhūmiś ca sarvataḥ samavastṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:045.053d-0151_01: pāñcālān atha matsyaṃ ca drupadaṃ senayā vṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:045.054a: pāñcālān atha matsyāṃś ca kekayāṃś ca prabhadrakān
GE07mbh_06_u:045.054c: bhīṣmaḥ praharatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pātayām āsa mārgaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.055e: priyaṃ saṃbandhinaṃ rājañ śarān avakiran bahūn
GE07mbh_06_u:045.056e: atiṣṭhata raṇe bhīṣmo vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.057c: na śekuḥ pāṇḍaveyasya yodhā bhīṣmaṃ nirīkṣitum
GE07mbh_06_u:045.058a: vīkṣāṃ cakruḥ samantāt te pāṇḍavā bhayapīḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.058d-0152_02: siṃheneva vinirbhinnā śuklā gaur iva gopateḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.060c: mumoca bāṇān dīptāgrān ahīn āśīviṣān iva
GE07mbh_06_u:045.062a: tataḥ sainyeṣu bhagneṣu mathiteṣu ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:045.062c: prāpte cāstaṃ dinakare na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:045.063a: bhīṣmaṃ ca samudīryantaṃ dṛṣṭvā pārthā mahāhave
GE07mbh_06_u:046.001c: bhīṣme ca yudhi saṃrabdhe hṛṣṭe duryodhane tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:046.002c: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ sarvaiḥ sarvaiś caiva janeśvaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.003c: vārṣṇeyam abravīd rājan dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmasya vikramam
GE07mbh_06_u:046.004c: śarair dahantaṃ sainyaṃ me grīṣme kakṣam ivānalam
GE07mbh_06_u:046.007a: śakyo jetuṃ yamaḥ kruddho vajrapāṇiś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:046.007c: varuṇaḥ pāśabhṛc cāpi kubero vā gadādharaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.008a: na tu bhīṣmo mahātejāḥ śakyo jetuṃ mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.009c: vanaṃ yāsyāmi govinda śreyo me tatra jīvitum
GE07mbh_06_u:046.010a: na tv imān pṛthivīpālān dātuṃ bhīṣmāya mṛtyave
GE07mbh_06_u:046.010c: kṣapayiṣyati senāṃ me kṛṣṇa bhīṣmo mahāstravit
GE07mbh_06_u:046.011c: vināśāyaiva gacchanti tathā me sainiko janaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.012c: bhrātaraś caiva me vīrāḥ karśitāḥ śarapīḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.013a: matkṛte bhrātṛsauhārdād rājyād bhraṣṭās tathā sukhāt
GE07mbh_06_u:046.013c: jīvitaṃ bahu manye 'haṃ jīvitaṃ hy adya durlabham
GE07mbh_06_u:046.014a: jīvitasya hi śeṣeṇa tapas tapsyāmi duścaram
GE07mbh_06_u:046.015a: rathān me bahusāhasrān divyair astrair mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.016a: kiṃ nu kṛtvā kṛtaṃ me syād brūhi mādhava māciram
GE07mbh_06_u:046.017a: eko bhīmaḥ paraṃ śaktyā yudhyaty eṣa mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.019a: nālam eṣa kṣayaṃ kartuṃ parasainyasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:046.020a: eko 'stravit sakhā te 'yaṃ so 'py asmān samupekṣate
GE07mbh_06_u:046.021a: divyāny astrāṇi bhīṣmasya droṇasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.021c: dhakṣyanti kṣatriyān sarvān prayuktāni punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.023a: sa tvaṃ paśya maheṣvāsaṃ yogīṣvara mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:046.023c: yo bhīṣmaṃ śamayet saṃkhye dāvāgniṃ jalado yathā
GE07mbh_06_u:046.025a: evam uktvā tataḥ pārtho dhyāyann āste mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.027a: mā śuco bharataśreṣṭha na tvaṃ śocitum arhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:046.027c: yasya te bhrātaraḥ śūrāḥ sarvalokasya dhanvinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.028a: ahaṃ ca priyakṛd rājan sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.029c: tvatprasādaṃ pratīkṣante tvadbhaktāś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:046.030a: eṣa te pārṣato nityaṃ hitakāmaḥ priye rataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.030e: śikhaṇḍī ca mahābāho bhīṣmasya nidhanaṃ kila
GE07mbh_06_u:046.031a: etac chrutvā tato rājā dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:046.032a: dhṛṣṭadyumna nibodhedaṃ yat tvā vakṣyāmi māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:046.032c: nātikramyaṃ bhavet tac ca vacanaṃ mama bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_06_u:046.033c: kārttikeyo yathā nityaṃ devānām abhavat purā
GE07mbh_06_u:046.033e: tathā tvam api pāṇḍūnāṃ senānīḥ puruṣarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:046.034a: sa tvaṃ puruṣaśārdūla vikramya jahi kauravān
GE07mbh_06_u:046.034c: ahaṃ ca tvānuyāsyāmi bhīmaḥ kṛṣṇaś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:046.035a: mādrīputrau ca sahitau draupadeyāś ca daṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.035d-0155_02: abhiṣekasya saṃbhārān kṣipram ānaya vai javāt
GE07mbh_06_u:046.035d-0155_03: prādurāsīt tato dhaumyaḥ saṃbhārān gṛhya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:046.035d-0155_08: yathā devāsure yuddhe kārttikeyo hy aśobhata
GE07mbh_06_u:046.036c: ahaṃ droṇāntakaḥ pārtha vihitaḥ śaṃbhunā purā
GE07mbh_06_u:046.037a: raṇe bhīṣmaṃ tathā droṇaṃ kṛpaṃ śalyaṃ jayadratham
GE07mbh_06_u:046.037c: sarvān adya raṇe dṛptān pratiyotsyāmi pārthiva
GE07mbh_06_u:046.038b-0156_01: tac chrutvā jahṛṣuḥ pārthāḥ pārthivāś ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.039a: tam abravīt tataḥ pārthaḥ pārṣataṃ pṛtanāpatim
GE07mbh_06_u:046.041a: tathoktaḥ sa nṛdevena viṣṇur vajrabhṛtā iva
GE07mbh_06_u:046.044a: tena ratnavatā pārthaḥ sa ca gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
GE07mbh_06_u:046.045a: śiro 'bhūd drupado rājā mahatyā senayā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.045c: kuntibhojaś ca caidyaś ca cakṣuṣy āstāṃ janeśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:046.047a: paṭaccaraiś ca huṇḍaiś ca rājan pauravakais tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:046.047c: niṣādaiḥ sahitaś cāpi pṛṣṭham āsīd yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.048a: pakṣau tu bhīmasenaś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.049a: piśācā daradāś caiva puṇḍrāḥ kuṇḍīviṣaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:046.050a: bāhlikās tittirāś caiva colāḥ pāṇḍyāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:046.050c: ete janapadā rājan dakṣiṇaṃ pakṣam āśritāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.051c: śabarās tumbupāś caiva vatsāś ca saha nākulaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.051e: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca vāmaṃ pārśvaṃ samāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.052a: rathānām ayutaṃ pakṣau śiraś ca niyutaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:046.052c: pṛṣṭham arbudam evāsīt sahasrāṇi ca viṃśatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.052e: grīvāyāṃ niyutaṃ cāpi sahasrāṇi ca saptatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.053c: jagmuḥ parivṛtā rājaṃś calanta iva parvatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.054a: jaghanaṃ pālayām āsa virāṭaḥ saha kekayaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.054c: kāśirājaś ca śaibyaś ca rathānām ayutais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.055a: evam etaṃ mahāvyūhaṃ vyūhya bhārata pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:046.055d-005_0001: śabdaś ca sumahāṃs tatra divaspṛg bharatottama
GE07mbh_06_u:046.055d-005_0004: trasantīva hi cetāṃsi yodhānāṃ bharatarṣabha dhṛtarāṣṭra uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:046.055d-005_0012: keṣāṃ yūnāṃ mukhavarṇāḥ prasannāḥ saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:046.055d-005_0013: sarvaṃ hy etad brūhi tattvaṃ yathāvat
GE07mbh_06_u:047.001a: krauñcaṃ tato mahāvyūham abhedyaṃ tanayas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:047.002a: ācāryam upasaṃgamya kṛpaṃ śalyaṃ ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:047.002c: saumadattiṃ vikarṇaṃ ca aśvatthāmānam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:047.003a: duḥśāsanādīn bhrātṝṃś ca sa sarvān eva bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:047.003c: anyāṃś ca subahūñ śūrān yuddhāya samupāgatān
GE07mbh_06_u:047.004a: prāhedaṃ vacanaṃ kāle harṣayaṃs tanayas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:047.005a: ekaikaśaḥ samarthā hi yūyaṃ sarve mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:047.005c: pāṇḍuputrān raṇe hantuṃ sasainyān kim u saṃhatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:047.006c: paryāptaṃ tv idam eteṣāṃ balaṃ pārthivasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:047.007a: saṃsthānāḥ śūrasenāś ca veṇikāḥ kukurās tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:047.007c: ārevakās trigartāś ca madrakā yavanās tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:047.010a: tato droṇaś ca bhīṣmaś ca tava putraś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:047.011c: yayau prakarṣan mahatīṃ vāhinīṃ surarāḍ iva
GE07mbh_06_u:047.012c: kuntalaiś ca daśārṇaiś ca māgadhaiś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:047.017a: bhūriśravāḥ śalaḥ śalyo bhagadattaś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:047.018a: saumadattiḥ suśarmā ca kāmbojaś ca sudakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:047.018c: śatāyuś ca śrutāyuś ca dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvam āsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:047.019a: aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:047.020c: ketumān vasudānaś ca putraḥ kāśyasya cābhibhūḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:047.021a: tatas te tāvakāḥ sarve hṛṣṭā yuddhāya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:047.021c: dadhmuḥ śaṅkhān mudā yuktāḥ siṃhanādāṃś ca nādayan
GE07mbh_06_u:047.022a: teṣāṃ śrutvā tu hṛṣṭānāṃ kuruvṛddhaḥ pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:047.023a: tataḥ śaṅkhāś ca bheryaś ca peśyaś ca vividhāḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:047.024a: tataḥ śvetair hayair yukte mahati syandane sthitau
GE07mbh_06_u:047.026d-0157_01: yudhiṣṭhiraś ca dharmātmā mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_06_u:047.026d-0157_02: abhimanyuś ca vikrānta uttamaujāś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:047.027a: kāśirājaś ca śaibyaś ca śikhaṇḍī ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:047.027c: dhṛṣṭadyumno virāṭaś ca sātyakiś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:047.028a: pāñcālyaś ca maheṣvāso draupadyāḥ pañca cātmajāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:047.028c: sarve dadhmur mahāśaṅkhān siṃhanādāṃś ca nedire
GE07mbh_06_u:047.029a: sa ghoṣaḥ sumahāṃs tatra vīrais taiḥ samudīritaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:047.029c: nabhaś ca pṛthivīṃ caiva tumulo vyanunādayat
GE07mbh_06_u:048.001a: evaṃ vyūḍheṣv anīkeṣu māmakeṣv itareṣu ca
GE07mbh_06_u:048.002b-0158_01: tāvakāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ yathāyudhyanta tac chṛṇu
GE07mbh_06_u:048.003a: teṣāṃ madhye sthito rājā putro duryodhanas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:048.003c: abravīt tāvakān sarvān yudhyadhvam iti daṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.006a: muktās tu rathibhir bāṇā rukmapuṅkhāḥ sutejanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.006c: saṃnipetur akuṇṭhāgrā nāgeṣu ca hayeṣu ca
GE07mbh_06_u:048.007a: tathā pravṛtte saṃgrāme dhanur udyamya daṃśitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.008a: saubhadre bhīmasene ca śaineye ca mahārathe
GE07mbh_06_u:048.008c: kekaye ca virāṭe ca dhṛṣṭadyumne ca pārṣate
GE07mbh_06_u:048.010c: sarveṣām eva sainyānām āsīd vyatikaro mahān
GE07mbh_06_u:048.012a: arjunas tu naravyāghro dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:048.012c: vārṣṇeyam abravīt kruddho yāhi yatra pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.013a: eṣa bhīṣmaḥ susaṃkruddho vārṣṇeya mama vāhinīm
GE07mbh_06_u:048.014a: eṣa droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ śalyo vikarṇaś ca janārdana
GE07mbh_06_u:048.016a: tam abravīd vāsudevo yatto bhava dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:048.016c: eṣa tvā prāpaye vīra pitāmaharathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:048.017a: evam uktvā tataḥ śaurī rathaṃ taṃ lokaviśrutam
GE07mbh_06_u:048.017c: prāpayām āsa bhīṣmāya rathaṃ prati janeśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:048.020a: tam āpatantaṃ vegena prabhinnam iva vāraṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:048.020c: trāsayānaṃ raṇe śūrān pātayantaṃ ca sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.024a: droṇaś ca pañcaviṃśatyā kṛpaḥ pañcāśatā śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.024c: duryodhanaś catuḥṣaṣṭyā śalyaś ca navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.024d-0160_01: drauṇiḥ ṣaṣṭyā naravyāghro vikarṇaś ca tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.025a: saindhavo navabhiś cāpi śakuniś cāpi pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.025c: vikarṇo daśabhir bhallai rājan vivyādha pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_06_u:048.026a: sa tair viddho maheṣvāsaḥ samantān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.027a: sa bhīṣmaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā kṛpaṃ ca navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.027c: droṇaṃ ṣaṣṭyā naravyāghro vikarṇaṃ ca tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.027d-0161_01: śalyaṃ ca daśabhir bāṇais tāvadbhiś ca jayadratham
GE07mbh_06_u:048.028a: ārtāyaniṃ tribhir bāṇai rājānaṃ cāpi pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.029a: taṃ sātyakir virāṭaś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.030a: tato droṇaṃ maheṣvāsaṃ gāṅgeyasya priye ratam
GE07mbh_06_u:048.031a: bhīṣmas tu rathināṃ śreṣṭhas tūrṇaṃ vivyādha pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_06_u:048.032a: teṣāṃ tu ninadaṃ śrutvā prahṛṣṭānāṃ prahṛṣṭavat
GE07mbh_06_u:048.033a: teṣāṃ tu rathasiṃhānāṃ madhyaṃ prāpya dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.033c: cikrīḍa dhanuṣā rājaṃl lakṣyaṃ kṛtvā mahārathān
GE07mbh_06_u:048.033d-0162_01: kṣatriyāṇāṃ śirāṃsy ugraiḥ kṛntañ śastrair mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.033d-0162_02: śūnyān kṛtvā rathopasthān vyacarat phalgunas tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:048.034a: tato duryodhano rājā bhīṣmam āha janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.034c: pīḍyamānaṃ svakaṃ sainyaṃ dṛṣṭvā pārthena saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:048.035a: eṣa pāṇḍusutas tāta kṛṣṇena sahito balī
GE07mbh_06_u:048.035e: tvayi jīvati gāṅgeye droṇe ca rathināṃ vare
GE07mbh_06_u:048.036a: tvatkṛte hy eṣa karṇo 'pi nyastaśastro mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.036c: na yudhyati raṇe pārthaṃ hitakāmaḥ sadā mama
GE07mbh_06_u:048.037a: sa tathā kuru gāṅgeya yathā hanyeta phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.037c: evam uktas tato rājan pitā devavratas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:048.037e: dhik kṣatradharmam ity uktvā yayau pārtharathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:048.038a: ubhau śvetahayau rājan saṃsaktau dṛśya pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.038c: siṃhanādān bhṛśaṃ cakruḥ śaṅkhaśabdāṃś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:048.039a: drauṇir duryodhanaś caiva vikarṇaś ca tavātmajaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.039c: parivārya raṇe bhīṣmaṃ sthitā yuddhāya māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:048.040c: sthitā yuddhāya mahate tato yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_06_u:048.041a: gāṅgeyas tu raṇe pārtham ānarchan navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.043a: śarajālaṃ tatas tat tu śarajālena kaurava
GE07mbh_06_u:048.043c: vārayām āsa pārthasya bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:048.047a: arjunaḥ pañcaviṃśatyā bhīṣmam ārcchac chitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.047c: bhīṣmo 'pi samare pārthaṃ vivyādha triṃśatā śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.048a: anyonyasya hayān viddhvā dhvajau ca sumahābalau
GE07mbh_06_u:048.049a: tataḥ kruddho mahārāja bhīṣmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.050c: virarāja raṇe rājan sapuṣpa iva kiṃśukaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.051a: tato 'rjuno bhṛśaṃ kruddho nirviddhaṃ prekṣya mādhavam
GE07mbh_06_u:048.052a: yatamānau tu tau vīrāv anyonyasya vadhaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:048.054c: rājann antaramārgasthau sthitāv āstāṃ muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.056c: dāritā sahasā bhūmiś cakampa ca nanāda ca
GE07mbh_06_u:048.057a: na tayor antaraṃ kaś cid dadṛśe bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:048.058a: cihnamātreṇa bhīṣmaṃ tu prajajñus tatra kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.059a: tayor nṛvarayo rājan dṛśya tādṛk parākramam
GE07mbh_06_u:048.060a: na tayor vivaraṃ kaś cid raṇe paśyati bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:048.060c: dharme sthitasya hi yathā na kaś cid vṛjinaṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_06_u:048.061a: ubhau hi śarajālena tāv adṛśyau babhūvatuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.061c: prakāśau ca punas tūrṇaṃ babhūvatur ubhau raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:048.062a: tatra devāḥ sagandharvāś cāraṇāś ca saharṣibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.063a: na śakyau yudhi saṃrabdhau jetum etau mahārathau
GE07mbh_06_u:048.065a: nāpi śakyo raṇe jetuṃ bhīṣmaḥ pārthena dhīmatā
GE07mbh_06_u:048.065c: sadhanuś ca rathasthaś ca pravapan sāyakān raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:048.066a: tathaiva pāṇḍavaṃ yuddhe devair api durāsadam
GE07mbh_06_u:048.066c: na vijetuṃ raṇe bhīṣma utsaheta dhanurdharam
GE07mbh_06_u:048.066d-0163_01: ālokād api yuddhaṃ tu samam etad bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_06_u:048.067a: iti sma vācaḥ śrūyante proccarantyas tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.068a: tvadīyās tu tato yodhāḥ pāṇḍaveyāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:048.068c: anyonyaṃ samare jaghnus tayos tatra parākrame
GE07mbh_06_u:048.069a: śitadhārais tathā khaḍgair vimalaiś ca paraśvadhaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:048.069c: śarair anyaiś ca bahubhiḥ śastrair nānāvidhair yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:048.070a: vartamāne tathā ghore tasmin yuddhe sudāruṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:049.001a: kathaṃ droṇo maheṣvāsaḥ pāñcālyaś cāpi pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:049.001c: raṇe samīyatur yattau tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:049.002a: diṣṭam eva paraṃ manye pauruṣād api saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:049.002c: yatra śāṃtanavo bhīṣmo nātarad yudhi pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_06_u:049.003a: bhīṣmo hi samare kruddho hanyāl lokāṃś carācarān
GE07mbh_06_u:049.003c: sa kathaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ yuddhe nātarat saṃjayaujasā
GE07mbh_06_u:049.004a: śṛṇu rājan sthiro bhūtvā yuddham etat sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:049.004c: na śakyaḥ pāṇḍavo jetuṃ devair api savāsavaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:049.005a: droṇas tu niśitair bāṇair dhṛṣṭadyumnam ayodhayat
GE07mbh_06_u:049.007a: dhṛṣṭadyumnas tato droṇaṃ navatyā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:049.007c: vivyādha prahasan vīras tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:049.009a: ādade ca śaraṃ ghoraṃ pārṣatasya vadhaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:049.010c: tam iṣuṃ saṃdhitaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhāradvājena saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:049.011c: yad ekaḥ samare vīras tasthau girir ivācalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:049.012a: taṃ ca dīptaṃ śaraṃ ghoram āyāntaṃ mṛtyum ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:049.012c: ciccheda śaravṛṣṭiṃ ca bhāradvāje mumoca ha
GE07mbh_06_u:049.013a: tata uccukruśuḥ sarve pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:049.013c: dhṛṣṭadyumnena tat karma kṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_06_u:049.015c: tridhā cikṣepa samare bhāradvājo hasann iva
GE07mbh_06_u:049.017a: śaravarṣaṃ tatas taṃ tu saṃnivārya mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:049.018a: sa cchinnadhanvā samare gadāṃ gurvīṃ mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:049.020c: vyaṃsayitvā gadāṃ tāṃ ca preṣayām āsa pārṣate
GE07mbh_06_u:049.021c: te tasya kavacaṃ bhittvā papuḥ śoṇitam āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:049.022c: droṇaṃ yudhi parākramya śarair vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:049.023a: rudhirāktau tatas tau tu śuśubhāte nararṣabhau
GE07mbh_06_u:049.025d-0164_01: tad apy asya raṇe droṇaś ciccheda saśaraṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:049.026c: athāsya caturo vāhāṃś caturbhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:049.027a: pātayām āsa samare siṃhanādaṃ nanāda ca
GE07mbh_06_u:049.029a: tām asya viśikhais tūrṇaṃ pātayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:049.030a: tataḥ sa vipulaṃ carma śatacandraṃ ca bhānumat
GE07mbh_06_u:049.030c: khaḍgaṃ ca vipulaṃ divyaṃ pragṛhya subhujo balī
GE07mbh_06_u:049.031c: āmiṣārthī yathā siṃho vane mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_06_u:049.032c: lāghavaṃ cāstrayogaṃ ca balaṃ bāhvoś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:049.033a: yad enaṃ śaravarṣeṇa vārayām āsa pārṣatam
GE07mbh_06_u:049.033c: na śaśāka tato gantuṃ balavān api saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:049.036a: sa droṇaṃ niśitair bāṇai rājan vivyādha saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:049.036c: pārṣataṃ ca tadā tūrṇam anyam āropayad ratham
GE07mbh_06_u:049.038a: tataḥ sā mahatī senā kaliṅgānāṃ janeśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:049.038c: bhīmam abhyudyayau tūrṇaṃ tava putrasya śāsanāt
GE07mbh_06_u:049.040c: kaliṅgānāṃ ca samare bhīmasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.002c: yodhayām āsa samare kaliṅgaḥ saha senayā
GE07mbh_06_u:050.003a: putreṇa tava rājendra sa tathokto mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.003c: mahatyā senayā guptaḥ prāyād bhīmarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:050.005c: ketumantaṃ ca naiṣādim āyāntaṃ saha cedibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.006a: tataḥ śrutāyuḥ saṃkruddho rājñā ketumatā saha
GE07mbh_06_u:050.007c: ayutena gajānāṃ ca niṣādaiḥ saha ketumān
GE07mbh_06_u:050.009c: prajānan na ca yodhān svān parasparajighāṃsayā
GE07mbh_06_u:050.010a: ghoram āsīt tato yuddhaṃ bhīmasya sahasā paraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.012a: anyonyasya tadā yodhā nikṛntanto viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:050.013a: yodhāṃś ca svān parān vāpi nābhyajānañ jighāṃsayā
GE07mbh_06_u:050.013c: svān apy ādadate svāś ca śūrāḥ samaradurjayāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.014a: vimardaḥ sumahān āsīd alpānāṃ bahubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:050.014c: kaliṅgaiḥ saha cedīnāṃ niṣādaiś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:050.018a: kaliṅgas tu maheṣvāsaḥ putraś cāsya mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.018c: śakradeva iti khyāto jaghnatuḥ pāṇḍavaṃ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.019a: tato bhīmo mahābāhur vidhunvan ruciraṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.020a: śakradevas tu samare visṛjan sāyakān bahūn
GE07mbh_06_u:050.020d-0166_01: taṃ dṛṣṭvā virathaṃ tatra bhīmasenam ariṃdamam
GE07mbh_06_u:050.021a: hatāśve tu rathe tiṣṭhan bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.022a: sa tayā nihato rājan kaliṅgasya suto rathāt
GE07mbh_06_u:050.024a: tato bhīmo mahābāhur gurvīṃ tyaktvā mahāgadām
GE07mbh_06_u:050.026a: kaliṅgas tu tataḥ kruddho dhanurjyām avamṛjya ha
GE07mbh_06_u:050.026c: pragṛhya ca śaraṃ ghoram ekaṃ sarpaviṣopamam
GE07mbh_06_u:050.027a: tam āpatantaṃ vegena preritaṃ niśitaṃ śaram
GE07mbh_06_u:050.028a: kaliṅgas tu tataḥ kruddho bhīmasenāya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:050.029a: tān aprāptān mahābāhuḥ khagatān eva pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.030a: nikṛtya tu raṇe bhīmas tomarān vai caturdaśa
GE07mbh_06_u:050.031a: bhānumāṃs tu tato bhīmaṃ śaravarṣeṇa chādayan
GE07mbh_06_u:050.032a: na taṃ sa mamṛṣe bhīmaḥ siṃhanādaṃ mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:050.033c: na bhīmaṃ samare mene mānuṣaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:050.034a: tato bhīmo mahārāja naditvā vipulaṃ svanam
GE07mbh_06_u:050.035b-0168_01: tato mumoca kāliṅgaḥ śaktiṃ tām akarod dvidhā
GE07mbh_06_u:050.038a: tatas tasmād avaplutya gajād bhārata bhārataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.039a: sa cacāra bahūn mārgān abhītaḥ pātayan gajān
GE07mbh_06_u:050.041a: chindaṃs teṣāṃ śarīrāṇi śirāṃsi ca mahājavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.042d-0169_01: padātibhiḥ padātīṃś ca aśvān aśvair gajān gajaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.042d-0169_02: rathān rathaiś ca bahudhā jaghāna samare balī
GE07mbh_06_u:050.043a: mūḍhāś ca te tam evājau vinadantaḥ samādravan
GE07mbh_06_u:050.043b-0170_01: vibhujya kṣudhitā nādaṃ vidravanti diśo daśa
GE07mbh_06_u:050.044a: nikṛtya rathinām ājau ratheṣāś ca yugāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:050.045c: bhrāntam udbhrāntam āviddham āplutaṃ prasṛtaṃ sṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:050.045e: saṃpātaṃ samudīryaṃ ca darśayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.046a: ke cid agrāsinā chinnāḥ pāṇḍavena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:050.047c: viyodhāḥ svāny anīkāni jaghnur bhārata vāraṇāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.047e: nipetur urvyāṃ ca tathā vinadanto mahāravān
GE07mbh_06_u:050.047f-0171_01: gajāṃś ca gajayantṝṃś ca gajahastāṃś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:050.048a: chinnāṃś ca tomarāṃś cāpān mahāmātraśirāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_06_u:050.049a: graiveyāṇy atha śaktīś ca patākāḥ kaṇapāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:050.049c: tūṇīrāṇy atha yantrāṇi vicitrāṇi dhanūṃṣi ca
GE07mbh_06_u:050.050c: ghaṇṭāś ca vividhā rājan hemagarbhāṃs tsarūn api
GE07mbh_06_u:050.050e: patataḥ patitāṃś caiva paśyāmaḥ saha sādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.051c: āsīt tasmin samāstīrṇā patitair bhūr nagair iva
GE07mbh_06_u:050.052e: tad ghoram abhavad yuddhaṃ tasya teṣāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:050.053a: khalīnāny atha yoktrāṇi kaśāś ca kanakojjvalāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.053c: paristomāś ca prāsāś ca ṛṣṭayaś ca mahādhanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.054a: kavacāny atha carmāṇi citrāṇy āstaraṇāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:050.055a: prothayantrair vicitraiś ca śastraiś ca vimalais tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:050.055c: sa cakre vasudhāṃ kīrṇāṃ śabalaiḥ kusumair iva
GE07mbh_06_u:050.056a: āplutya rathinaḥ kāṃś cit parāmṛśya mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.056c: pātayām āsa khaḍgena sadhvajān api pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.057a: muhur utpatato dikṣu dhāvataś ca yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.057c: mārgāṃś ca carataś citrān vyasmayanta raṇe janāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.058a: nijaghāna padā kāṃś cid ākṣipyānyān apothayat
GE07mbh_06_u:050.058c: khaḍgenānyāṃś ca ciccheda nādenānyāṃś ca bhīṣayan
GE07mbh_06_u:050.059a: ūruvegena cāpy anyān pātayām āsa bhūtale
GE07mbh_06_u:050.059c: apare cainam ālokya bhayāt pañcatvam āgatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.060a: evaṃ sā bahulā senā kaliṅgānāṃ tarasvinām
GE07mbh_06_u:050.062a: tam āyāntam abhiprekṣya kaliṅgo navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.065a: tam āruhya rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ kaunteyaḥ śatrusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.066a: tataḥ śrutāyur balavān bhīmāya niśitāñ śarān
GE07mbh_06_u:050.068a: kruddhaś ca cāpam āyamya balavad balināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.068c: kaliṅgam avadhīt pārtho bhīmaḥ saptabhir āyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.069c: satyadevaṃ ca satyaṃ ca prāhiṇod yamasādanam
GE07mbh_06_u:050.070a: tataḥ punar ameyātmā nārācair niśitais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.072c: kaliṅgāś ca tato rājan bhīmasenam avākiran
GE07mbh_06_u:050.073a: saṃnivārya sa tāṃ ghorāṃ śaravṛṣṭiṃ samutthitām
GE07mbh_06_u:050.074d-0174_01: gadayā muktayā rājan pātayām āsa dantinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.074d-0174_03: rathaṃ rathena saṃcūrṇya turaṅgaṃ turageṇa tu
GE07mbh_06_u:050.074d-0174_05: punar aśveṣu patati gajeṣu ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.074d-0174_07: yathā mṛgāṇāṃ madhye tu kesarīva nakhagrahaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.075a: evaṃ sa tāny anīkāni kaliṅgānāṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.075c: bibheda samare vīraḥ prekṣya bhīṣmaṃ mahāvratam
GE07mbh_06_u:050.077a: tato bhīmo mahābāhuḥ śaṅkhaṃ prādhmāpayad balī
GE07mbh_06_u:050.078c: prākampanta ca sainyāni vāhanāni ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.079c: mārgān bahūn vicaratā dhāvatā ca tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.082c: abravīt svāny anīkāni yudhyadhvam iti pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.084a: dharmarājaś ca tān sarvān upajagrāha pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.085a: evaṃ saṃcodya sarvāṇi svāny anīkāni pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.086a: na hi pāñcālarājasya loke kaś cana vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:050.088a: nanarda bahudhā rājan hṛṣṭaś cāsīt paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.088c: śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau ca samare siṃhanādaṃ nanāda ca
GE07mbh_06_u:050.090a: dhṛṣṭadyumnas tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā kaliṅgaiḥ samabhidrutam
GE07mbh_06_u:050.092a: sa tatra gatvā śaineyo javena jayatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.092d-0179_01: etac caturdaśe varṣe bhīmo dṛṣṭvā raṇājiram
GE07mbh_06_u:050.092d-0179_02: viśeṣeṇa gajān rājan paraṃ toṣam upāgamat
GE07mbh_06_u:050.093c: āsthito raudram ātmānaṃ jaghāna samare parān
GE07mbh_06_u:050.096a: bhīmasenaṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā prākrośaṃs tāvakā nṛpa
GE07mbh_06_u:050.097a: tataḥ śāṃtanavo bhīṣmaḥ śrutvā taṃ ninadaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:050.098a: taṃ sātyakir bhīmaseno dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.099a: parivārya ca te sarve gāṅgeyaṃ rabhasaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:050.099c: tribhis tribhiḥ śarair ghorair bhīṣmam ānarchur añjasā
GE07mbh_06_u:050.100a: pratyavidhyata tān sarvān pitā devavratas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:050.102a: hatāśve tu rathe tiṣṭhan bhīmasenaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_06_u:050.102c: śaktiṃ cikṣepa tarasā gāṅgeyasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:050.103a: aprāptām eva tāṃ śaktiṃ pitā devavratas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:050.103c: tridhā ciccheda samare sā pṛthivyām aśīryata
GE07mbh_06_u:050.104a: tataḥ śaikyāyasīṃ gurvīṃ pragṛhya balavad gadām
GE07mbh_06_u:050.105b-0181_01: āplutyāplutya vegena carma bhrāmya punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.106a: bhīṣmas tu nihate tasmin sārathau rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.107c: prajajvāla yathā vahnir dahan kakṣam ivaidhitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.108c: nainam abhyutsahan ke cit tāvakā bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:050.109a: dhṛṣṭadyumnas tam āropya svarathe rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.112a: diṣṭyā kaliṅgarājaś ca rājaputraś ca ketumān
GE07mbh_06_u:050.112c: śakradevaś ca kāliṅgaḥ kaliṅgāś ca mṛdhe hatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.114a: evam uktvā śiner naptā dīrghabāhur ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.114d-0183_01: bhīmaś ca punar āviṣṭaḥ sātvatena narottama
GE07mbh_06_u:050.114d-0183_02: praharṣam atulaṃ lebhe bhīmaḥ sātyakinā saha
GE07mbh_06_u:050.115a: tataḥ svaratham āruhya punar eva mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:050.115c: tāvakān avadhīt kruddho bhīmasya balam ādadhat
GE07mbh_06_u:051.005a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ tu saṃsaktaṃ drauṇinā dṛśya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:051.006a: sa śalyaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā kṛpaṃ ca navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:051.007a: ārjuniṃ tu tatas tūrṇaṃ drauṇir vivyādha patriṇā
GE07mbh_06_u:051.007c: śalyo dvādaśabhiś caiva kṛpaś ca niśitais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:051.008a: lakṣmaṇas tava pautras tu tava pautram avasthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:051.009a: dauryodhanis tu saṃkruddhaḥ saubhadraṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:051.009c: vivyādha samare rājaṃs tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_06_u:051.011a: lakṣmaṇo 'pi tatas tasya dhanuś ciccheda patriṇā
GE07mbh_06_u:051.012a: tad vihāya dhanuś chinnaṃ saubhadraḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_06_u:051.014a: tato duryodhano rājā dṛṣṭvā putraṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:051.014c: pīḍitaṃ tava pautreṇa prāyāt tatra janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:051.015a: saṃnivṛtte tava sute sarva eva janādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:051.016a: sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ śūraiḥ śūro yudhi sudurjayaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:051.017a: saubhadram atha saṃsaktaṃ tatra dṛṣṭvā dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:051.022a: nāpy antarikṣaṃ na diśo na bhūmir na ca bhāskaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:051.024c: tatra tatraiva dṛśyante sāyudhāḥ sāṅgadair bhujaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:051.025a: hayārohā hayāṃs tyaktvā gajārohāś ca dantinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:051.026a: rathebhyaś ca gajebhyaś ca hayebhyaś ca narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:051.027a: sagadān udyatān bāhūn sakhaḍgāṃś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:051.028a: sāṅkuśān sapatākāṃś ca tatra tatrārjuno nṛṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:051.028c: nicakarta śarair ugrai raudraṃ bibhrad vapus tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:051.031a: dhvajānāṃ carmaṇāṃ caiva vyajanānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:051.032a: pratodānāṃ kaśānāṃ ca yoktrāṇāṃ caiva māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:051.033a: nāsīt tatra pumān kaś cit tava sainyasya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:051.033c: yo 'rjunaṃ samare śūraṃ pratyudyāyāt kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:051.034a: yo yo hi samare pārthaṃ patyudyāti viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:051.034c: sa sa vai viśikhais tīkṣṇaiḥ paralokāya nīyate
GE07mbh_06_u:051.036a: tat prabhagnaṃ balaṃ dṛṣṭvā pitā devavratas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:051.036c: abravīt samare śūraṃ bhāradvājaṃ smayann iva
GE07mbh_06_u:051.037a: eṣa pāṇḍusuto vīraḥ kṛṣṇena sahito balī
GE07mbh_06_u:051.037c: tathā karoti sainyāni yathā kuryād dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:051.038a: na hy eṣa samare śakyo jetum adya kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:051.039a: na nivartayituṃ cāpi śakyeyaṃ mahatī camūḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:051.039d-0185_01: vayaṃ ca śastribhir bhinnā nṛpair indrasamair yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:051.039d-0185_02: bhīto vyūhasya sarvatra na sthātuṃ kaś cid icchati
GE07mbh_06_u:051.039d-0185_04: diśaś ca vidiśaś caiva vyāptā hy ārjunasāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:051.041c: śrāntā bhītāś ca no yodhā na yotsyanti kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:051.042a: evam uktvā tato bhīṣmo droṇam ācāryasattamam
GE07mbh_06_u:051.042d-0186_02: pāñcālāḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva praṇeduś ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:051.043a: tato 'vahāraḥ sainyānāṃ tava teṣāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:051.043c: astaṃ gacchati sūrye 'bhūt saṃdhyākāle ca vartati
GE07mbh_06_u:052.001a: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavas tataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:052.002a: gāruḍaṃ ca mahāvyūhaṃ cakre śāṃtanavas tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:052.003a: garuḍasya svayaṃ tuṇḍe pitā devavratas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:052.003c: cakṣuṣī ca bharadvājaḥ kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:052.004a: aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva śīrṣam āstāṃ yaśasvinau
GE07mbh_06_u:052.005a: bhūriśravāḥ śalaḥ śalyo bhagadattaś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:052.005c: madrakāḥ sindhusauvīrās tathā pañcanadāś ca ye
GE07mbh_06_u:052.006c: pṛṣṭhe duryodhano rājā sodaraiḥ sānugair vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:052.007a: vindānuvindāv āvantyau kāmbojaś ca śakaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:052.007c: puccham āsan mahārāja śūrasenāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:052.008a: māgadhāś ca kaliṅgāś ca dāśerakagaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:052.008c: dakṣiṇaṃ pakṣam āsādya sthitā vyūhasya daṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:052.009a: kānanāś ca vikuñjāś ca muktāḥ puṇḍrāviṣas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:052.010a: vyūḍhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu tat sainyaṃ savyasācī paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:052.010d-0187_01: tāvakānāṃ tu taṃ vyūhaṃ pratyavyūhanta pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:052.012a: tad anv eva virāṭaś ca drupadaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:052.014a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca pāñcālāś ca prabhadrakāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:052.014c: madhye sainyasya mahataḥ sthitā yuddhāya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:052.015c: tatas tu sātyakī rājan draupadyāḥ pañca cātmajāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:052.016a: abhimanyus tatas tūrṇam irāvāṃś ca tataḥ param
GE07mbh_06_u:052.016c: bhaimasenis tato rājan kekayāś ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:052.017a: tato 'bhūd dvipadāṃ śreṣṭho vāmaṃ pārśvam upāśritaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:052.017c: sarvasya jagato goptā goptā yasya janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:052.018c: vadhārthaṃ tava putrāṇāṃ tatpakṣaṃ ye ca saṃgatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:052.020a: hayaughāś ca rathaughāś ca tatra tatra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:052.021a: dhāvatāṃ ca rathaughānāṃ nighnatāṃ ca pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_06_u:052.022c: saṃprahāre sutumule tava teṣāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:053.001a: tato vyūḍheṣv anīkeṣu tāvakeṣv itareṣu ca
GE07mbh_06_u:053.002e: prārthayānā yaśo dīptaṃ mṛtyuṃ kṛtvā nivartanam
GE07mbh_06_u:053.003c: babhañjur bahuśo rājaṃs te cābhajyanta saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:053.004a: dravadbhir atha bhagnaiś ca parivartadbhir eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:053.004c: pāṇḍavaiḥ kauravaiś caiva na prajñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:053.005c: diśaḥ pratidiśo vāpi tatra jajñuḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:053.006c: vartate sma tadā yuddhaṃ tatra tatra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:053.007a: na vyūho bhidyate tatra kauravāṇāṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:053.010c: ṛṣṭibhir vimalāgrābhiḥ prāsair api ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:053.012c: saṃsaktāḥ pātayām āsus tava teṣāṃ ca saṃghaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:053.012d-0190_01: kaś cid utpatya samare varavāraṇam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:053.012d-0190_04: vemuś ca rudhiraṃ vīrā niḥśvasantaḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:053.013d-0191_01: rathī ca samare rājann āsādya gajayodhinam
GE07mbh_06_u:053.013d-0191_02: sagajaṃ pātayām āsa gajī ca rathinaṃ rathāt
GE07mbh_06_u:053.013d-0191_04: pātayām āsa samare rathī ca hayasādinam
GE07mbh_06_u:053.014a: padātī rathinaṃ saṃkhye rathī cāpi padātinam
GE07mbh_06_u:053.014c: nyapātayac chitaiḥ śastraiḥ senayor ubhayor api
GE07mbh_06_u:053.015c: hayārohā gajasthāṃś ca tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_06_u:053.018a: dhvajais tatrāpaviddhaiś ca kārmukais tomarais tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:053.018c: prāsais tathā gadābhiś ca parighaiḥ kampanais tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:053.019a: śaktibhiḥ kavacaiś citraiḥ kaṇapair aṅkuśair api
GE07mbh_06_u:053.019c: nistriṃśair vimalaiś cāpi svarṇapuṅkhaiḥ śarais tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:053.020a: paristomaiḥ kuthābhiś ca kambalaiś ca mahādhanaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:053.020c: bhūr bhāti bharataśreṣṭha sragdāmair iva citritā
GE07mbh_06_u:053.022c: diśaś ca vimalāḥ sarvāḥ saṃbabhūvur janeśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:053.025a: tato droṇaś ca bhīṣmaś ca saindhavaś ca jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:053.025c: purumitro vikarṇaś ca śakuniś cāpi saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:053.026c: pāṇḍavānām anīkāni babhañjuḥ sma punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:053.027c: sātyakiś cekitānaś ca draupadeyāś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:053.028a: tāvakāṃs tava putrāṃś ca sahitān sarvarājabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:053.028c: drāvayām āsur ājau te tridaśā dānavān iva
GE07mbh_06_u:053.030a: vinirjitya ripūn vīrāḥ senayor ubhayor api
GE07mbh_06_u:053.031c: abhyayāt pāṇḍavān yuddhe rākṣasaṃ ca ghaṭotkacam
GE07mbh_06_u:053.032a: tathaiva pāṇḍavāḥ sarve mahatyā senayā saha
GE07mbh_06_u:053.033a: kirīṭī tu yayau kruddhaḥ samarthān pārthivottamān
GE07mbh_06_u:053.033c: ārjuniḥ sātyakiś caiva yayatuḥ saubalaṃ balam
GE07mbh_06_u:054.001a: tatas te pārthivāḥ kruddhāḥ phalgunaṃ vīkṣya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:054.003a: śaktīś ca vimalās tīkṣṇā gadāś ca parighaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:054.003c: prāsān paraśvadhāṃś caiva mudgarān musalān api
GE07mbh_06_u:054.003e: cikṣipuḥ samare kruddhāḥ phalgunasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:054.004a: śastrāṇām atha tāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ śalabhānām ivāyatim
GE07mbh_06_u:054.005a: tatra tal lāghavaṃ dṛṣṭvā bībhatsor atimānuṣam
GE07mbh_06_u:054.005e: sādhu sādhv iti rājendra phalgunaṃ pratyapūjayan
GE07mbh_06_u:054.006a: sātyakiṃ cābhimanyuṃ ca mahatyā senayā saha
GE07mbh_06_u:054.007c: tilaśaś cicchiduḥ krodhāc chastrair nānāvidhair yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:054.008a: sātyakis tu rathaṃ tyaktvā vartamāne mahābhaye
GE07mbh_06_u:054.011a: tato dharmasuto rājā mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_06_u:054.012c: yathā devāsuraṃ yuddhaṃ pūrvam āsīt sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:054.013b-0193_01: pitā putraś ca samare kurvāṇau karma duṣkaram
GE07mbh_06_u:054.014c: atītya pitaraṃ yuddhe yad ayudhyata bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:054.015c: hṛdy avidhyat pṛṣatkena prahasann iva pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:054.016c: niṣasāda rathopasthe kaśmalaṃ ca jagāma ha
GE07mbh_06_u:054.017a: taṃ visaṃjñam atho jñātvā tvaramāṇo 'sya sārathiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:054.017c: apovāha raṇād rājaṃs tataḥ sainyam abhidyata
GE07mbh_06_u:054.018a: tatas tāṃ kauravīṃ senāṃ dravamāṇāṃ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:054.018c: nighnan bhīmaḥ śarais tīkṣṇair anuvavrāja pṛṣṭhataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:054.019a: pārṣataś ca rathaśreṣṭho dharmaputraś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:054.019c: droṇasya paśyataḥ sainyaṃ gāṅgeyasya ca paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:054.020a: dravamāṇaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ tava putrasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:054.021a: vāryamāṇaṃ hi bhīṣmeṇa droṇena ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:054.021c: vidravaty eva tat sainyaṃ paśyator droṇabhīṣmayoḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:054.024a: arjunas tu tataḥ kruddhas tava sainyaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:054.025a: vadhyamānaṃ tatas tat tu śaraiḥ pārthasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:054.027a: tato duryodhano rājā samāśvasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:054.028a: yatra yatra sutaṃ tubhyaṃ yo yaḥ paśyati bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:054.030a: punarāvartatāṃ teṣāṃ vega āsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:054.031a: saṃnivṛttāṃs tatas tāṃs tu dṛṣṭvā rājā suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:054.031c: abravīt tvarito gatvā bhīṣmaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:054.032a: pitāmaha nibodhedaṃ yat tvā vakṣyāmi bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:054.032c: nānurūpam ahaṃ manye tvayi jīvati kaurava
GE07mbh_06_u:054.034a: na pāṇḍavāḥ pratibalās tava rājan kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:054.034c: tathā droṇasya saṃgrāme drauṇeś caiva kṛpasya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:054.036a: so 'smi vācyas tvayā rājan pūrvam eva samāgame
GE07mbh_06_u:054.036c: na yotsye pāṇḍavān saṃkhye nāpi pārṣatasātyakī
GE07mbh_06_u:054.037a: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tubhyam ācāryasya kṛpasya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:054.037c: karṇena sahitaḥ kṛtyaṃ cintayānas tadaiva hi
GE07mbh_06_u:054.038a: yadi nāhaṃ parityājyo yuvābhyām iha saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:054.039a: etac chrutvā vaco bhīṣmaḥ prahasan vai muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:054.039c: abravīt tanayaṃ tubhyaṃ krodhād udvṛtya cakṣuṣī
GE07mbh_06_u:054.040a: bahuśo hi mayā rājaṃs tathyam uktaṃ hitaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:054.040c: ajeyāḥ pāṇḍavā yuddhe devair api savāsavaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:054.041a: yat tu śakyaṃ mayā kartuṃ vṛddhenādya nṛpottama
GE07mbh_06_u:054.042a: adya pāṇḍusutān sarvān sasainyān saha bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:054.043a: evam ukte tu bhīṣmeṇa putrās tava janeśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:054.043c: dadhmuḥ śaṅkhān mudā yuktā bherīś ca jaghnire bhṛśam
GE07mbh_06_u:054.044a: pāṇḍavāpi tato rājañ śrutvā taṃ ninadaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:054.044c: dadhmuḥ śaṅkhāṃś ca bherīś ca murajāṃś ca vyanādayan
GE07mbh_06_u:055.001a: pratijñāte tu bhīṣmeṇa tasmin yuddhe sudāruṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:055.002a: bhīṣmaḥ kim akarot tatra pāṇḍaveyeṣu saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:055.002c: pitāmahe vā pāñcālās tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:055.003b-0196_01: paścimāṃ diśam āsthāya sthite cāpi divākare
GE07mbh_06_u:055.004e: mahatyā senayā guptas tava putraiś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.005c: asmākaṃ pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdham anayāt tava bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:055.006c: mahān samabhavac chabdo girīṇām iva dīryatām
GE07mbh_06_u:055.007a: tiṣṭha sthito 'smi viddhy enaṃ nivartasva sthiro bhava
GE07mbh_06_u:055.008c: śilānām iva śaileṣu patitānām abhūt svanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.013a: na dṛṣṭaṃ na śrutaṃ cāpi yuddham etādṛśaṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_06_u:055.013c: yathā tava sutānāṃ ca pāṇḍavānāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:055.014a: nāsīd rathapathas tatra yodhair yudhi nipātitaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.014c: gajaiś ca patitair nīlair giriśṛṅgair ivāvṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:055.015a: vikīrṇaiḥ kavacaiś citrair dhvajaiś chatraiś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:055.017a: tāta bhrātaḥ sakhe bandho vayasya mama mātula
GE07mbh_06_u:055.017c: mā māṃ parityajety anye cukruśuḥ patitā raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:055.018a: ādhāvābhyehi mā gaccha kiṃ bhīto 'si kva yāsyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:055.018c: sthito 'haṃ samare mā bhair iti cānye vicukruśuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.019c: mumoca bāṇān dīptāgrān ahīn āśīviṣān iva
GE07mbh_06_u:055.021a: sa nṛtyan vai rathopasthe darśayan pāṇilāghavam
GE07mbh_06_u:055.021c: alātacakravad rājaṃs tatra tatra sma dṛśyate
GE07mbh_06_u:055.022a: tam ekaṃ samare śūraṃ pāṇḍavāḥ sṛñjayās tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:055.023a: māyākṛtātmānam iva bhīṣmaṃ tatra sma menire
GE07mbh_06_u:055.023c: pūrvasyāṃ diśi taṃ dṛṣṭvā pratīcyāṃ dadṛśur janāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.024a: udīcyāṃ cainam ālokya dakṣiṇasyāṃ punaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:055.024c: evaṃ sa samare vīro gāṅgeyaḥ pratyadṛśyata
GE07mbh_06_u:055.025a: na cainaṃ pāṇḍaveyānāṃ kaś cic chaknoti vīkṣitum
GE07mbh_06_u:055.026a: kurvāṇaṃ samare karma sūdayānaṃ ca vāhinīm
GE07mbh_06_u:055.026c: vyākrośanta raṇe tatra vīrā bahuvidhaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_06_u:055.028a: na hi moghaḥ śaraḥ kaś cid āsīd bhīṣmasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:055.030a: dvau trīn api gajārohān piṇḍitān varmitān api
GE07mbh_06_u:055.031a: yo yo bhīṣmaṃ naravyāghram abhyeti yudhi kaś cana
GE07mbh_06_u:055.031c: muhūrtadṛṣṭaḥ sa mayā pātito bhuvi dṛśyate
GE07mbh_06_u:055.035c: abhajyata mahārāja na ca dvau saha dhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.037a: jaghānātra pitā putraṃ putraś ca pitaraṃ tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:055.040c: uvāca pārthaṃ bībhatsuṃ nigṛhya ratham uttamam
GE07mbh_06_u:055.041a: ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāptaḥ pārtha yaḥ kāṅkṣitas tvayā
GE07mbh_06_u:055.041c: praharāsmai naravyāghra na cen mohād vimuhyase
GE07mbh_06_u:055.042a: yat tvayā kathitaṃ vīra purā rājñāṃ samāgame
GE07mbh_06_u:055.043a: sānubandhān haniṣyāmi ye māṃ yotsyanti saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:055.043c: iti tat kuru kaunteya satyaṃ vākyam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_06_u:055.044a: bībhatso paśya sainyaṃ svaṃ bhajyamānaṃ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.044c: dravataś ca mahīpālān sarvān yaudhiṣṭhire bale
GE07mbh_06_u:055.045a: dṛṣṭvā hi samare bhīṣmaṃ vyāttānanam ivāntakam
GE07mbh_06_u:055.047c: yato bhīṣmaratho rājan duṣprekṣyo raśmimān iva
GE07mbh_06_u:055.048a: tatas tat punar āvṛttaṃ yudhiṣṭhirabalaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:055.049a: tato bhīṣmaḥ kuruśreṣṭhaḥ siṃhavad vinadan muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.050a: kṣaṇena sa rathas tasya sahayaḥ sahasārathiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.051a: vāsudevas tv asaṃbhrānto dhairyam āsthāya sattvavān
GE07mbh_06_u:055.051c: codayām āsa tān aśvān vitunnān bhīṣmasāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.052a: tataḥ pārtho dhanur gṛhya divyaṃ jaladanisvanam
GE07mbh_06_u:055.052c: pātayām āsa bhīṣmasya dhanuś chittvā tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.053a: sa cchinnadhanvā kauravyaḥ punar anyan mahad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.054c: athāsya tad api kruddhaś ciccheda dhanur arjunaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.055a: tasya tat pūjayām āsa lāghavaṃ śaṃtanoḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.055c: sādhu pārtha mahābāho sādhu bho pāṇḍunandana
GE07mbh_06_u:055.056a: tvayy evaitad yuktarūpaṃ mahat karma dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:055.056c: prīto 'smi sudṛḍhaṃ putra kuru yuddhaṃ mayā saha
GE07mbh_06_u:055.057a: iti pārthaṃ praśasyātha pragṛhyānyan mahad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.057c: mumoca samare vīraḥ śarān pārtharathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:055.058c: moghān kurvañ śarāṃs tasya maṇḍalāny acaral laghu
GE07mbh_06_u:055.061c: kṛṣṇayor yudhi saṃrabdho bhīṣmo vyāvārayad diśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.062a: vārṣṇeyaṃ ca śarais tīkṣṇaiḥ kampayām āsa roṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.062c: muhur abhyutsmayan bhīṣmaḥ prahasya svanavat tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:055.063a: tataḥ kṛṣṇas tu samare dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmaparākramam
GE07mbh_06_u:055.064a: bhīṣmaṃ ca śaravarṣāṇi sṛjantam aniśaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:055.065c: yugāntam iva kurvāṇaṃ bhīṣmaṃ yaudhiṣṭhire bale
GE07mbh_06_u:055.067a: ekāhnā hi raṇe bhīṣmo nāśayed devadānavān
GE07mbh_06_u:055.067c: kim u pāṇḍusutān yuddhe sabalān sapadānugān
GE07mbh_06_u:055.068a: dravate ca mahat sainyaṃ pāṇḍavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.068c: ete ca kauravās tūrṇaṃ prabhagnān dṛśya somakān
GE07mbh_06_u:055.069a: so 'haṃ bhīṣmaṃ nihanmy adya pāṇḍavārthāya daṃśitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.070a: arjuno 'pi śarais tīkṣṇair vadhyamāno hi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:055.071a: tathā cintayatas tasya bhūya eva pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.071c: preṣayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ śarān pārtharathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:055.072a: teṣāṃ bahutvād dhi bhṛśaṃ śarāṇāṃ; diśo 'tha sarvāḥ pihitā babhūvuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.072c: na cāntarikṣaṃ na diśo na bhūmir; na bhāskaro 'dṛśyata raśmimālī
GE07mbh_06_u:055.072e: vavuś ca vātās tumulāḥ sadhūmā; diśaś ca sarvāḥ kṣubhitā babhūvuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.073a: droṇo vikarṇo 'tha jayadrathaś ca; bhūriśravāḥ kṛtavarmā kṛpaś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:055.073c: śrutāyur ambaṣṭhapatiś ca rājā; vindānuvindau ca sudakṣiṇaś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:055.074a: prācyāś ca sauvīragaṇāś ca sarve; vasātayaḥ kṣudrakamālavāś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:055.075c: kirīṭinaṃ saṃparivāryamāṇaṃ; śiner naptā vāraṇayūthapaiś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:055.077a: sa tāny anīkāni mahādhanuṣmāñ; śinipravīraḥ sahasābhipatya
GE07mbh_06_u:055.077c: cakāra sāhāyyam athārjunasya; viṣṇur yathā vṛtraniṣūdanasya
GE07mbh_06_u:055.079a: kva kṣatriyā yāsyatha naiṣa dharmaḥ; satāṃ purastāt kathitaḥ purāṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.079c: mā svāṃ pratijñāṃ jahata pravīrāḥ; svaṃ vīradharmaṃ paripālayadhvam
GE07mbh_06_u:055.080a: tān vāsavān antarajo niśamya; narendramukhyān dravataḥ samantāt
GE07mbh_06_u:055.080c: pārthasya dṛṣṭvā mṛduyuddhatāṃ ca; bhīṣmaṃ ca saṃkhye samudīryamāṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:055.081a: amṛṣyamāṇaḥ sa tato mahātmā; yaśasvinaṃ sarvadaśārhabhartā
GE07mbh_06_u:055.081c: uvāca śaineyam abhipraśaṃsan; dṛṣṭvā kurūn āpatataḥ samantāt
GE07mbh_06_u:055.082a: ye yānti yāntv eva śinipravīra; ye 'pi sthitāḥ sātvata te 'pi yāntu
GE07mbh_06_u:055.082c: bhīṣmaṃ rathāt paśya nipātyamānaṃ; droṇaṃ ca saṃkhye sagaṇaṃ mayādya
GE07mbh_06_u:055.083a: nāsau rathaḥ sātvata kauravāṇāṃ; kruddhasya mucyeta raṇe 'dya kaś cit
GE07mbh_06_u:055.083c: tasmād ahaṃ gṛhya rathāṅgam ugraṃ; prāṇaṃ hariṣyāmi mahāvratasya
GE07mbh_06_u:055.084a: nihatya bhīṣmaṃ sagaṇaṃ tathājau; droṇaṃ ca śaineya rathapravīram
GE07mbh_06_u:055.084c: prītiṃ kariṣyāmi dhanaṃjayasya; rājñaś ca bhīmasya tathāśvinoś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:055.085a: nihatya sarvān dhṛtarāṣṭraputrāṃs; tatpakṣiṇo ye ca narendramukhyāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.085c: rājyena rājānam ajātaśatruṃ; saṃpādayiṣyāmy aham adya hṛṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.086c: kṣurāntam udyamya bhujena cakraṃ; rathād avaplutya visṛjya vāhān
GE07mbh_06_u:055.087a: saṃkampayan gāṃ caraṇair mahātmā; vegena kṛṣṇaḥ prasasāra bhīṣmam
GE07mbh_06_u:055.087c: madāndham ājau samudīrṇadarpaḥ; siṃho jighāṃsann iva vāraṇendram
GE07mbh_06_u:055.088a: so 'bhyadravad bhīṣmam anīkamadhye; kruddho mahendrāvarajaḥ pramāthī
GE07mbh_06_u:055.089a: sudarśanaṃ cāsya rarāja śaures; tac cakrapadmaṃ subhujorunālam
GE07mbh_06_u:055.091a: tam āttacakraṃ praṇadantam uccaiḥ; kruddhaṃ mahendrāvarajaṃ samīkṣya
GE07mbh_06_u:055.091c: sarvāṇi bhūtāni bhṛśaṃ vineduḥ; kṣayaṃ kurūṇām iti cintayitvā
GE07mbh_06_u:055.092a: sa vāsudevaḥ pragṛhītacakraḥ; saṃvartayiṣyann iva jīvalokam
GE07mbh_06_u:055.092c: abhyutpataṃl lokagurur babhāse; bhūtāni dhakṣyann iva kālavahniḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.093a: tam āpatantaṃ pragṛhītacakraṃ; samīkṣya devaṃ dvipadāṃ variṣṭham
GE07mbh_06_u:055.094a: ehy ehi deveśa jagannivāsa; namo 'stu te śārṅgarathāṅgapāṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:055.094c: prasahya māṃ pātaya lokanātha; rathottamād bhūtaśaraṇya saṃkhye
GE07mbh_06_u:055.095a: tvayā hatasyeha mamādya kṛṣṇa; śreyaḥ parasminn iha caiva loke
GE07mbh_06_u:055.095c: saṃbhāvito 'smy andhakavṛṣṇinātha; lokais tribhir vīra tavābhiyānāt
GE07mbh_06_u:055.095d-0204_15: śrotā hitaṃ yasya na kaś cid asti
GE07mbh_06_u:055.095d-0204_16: vaktā bhṛśaṃ syāt sa tu kiṃ bravītu
GE07mbh_06_u:055.096a: rathād avaplutya tatas tvarāvān; pārtho 'py anudrutya yadupravīram
GE07mbh_06_u:055.097a: nigṛhyamāṇaś ca tadādidevo; bhṛśaṃ saroṣaḥ kila nāma yogī
GE07mbh_06_u:055.097c: ādāya vegena jagāma viṣṇur; jiṣṇuṃ mahāvāta ivaikavṛkṣam
GE07mbh_06_u:055.098a: pārthas tu viṣṭabhya balena pādau; bhīṣmāntikaṃ tūrṇam abhidravantam
GE07mbh_06_u:055.098c: balān nijagrāha kirīṭamālī; pade 'tha rājan daśame kathaṃ cit
GE07mbh_06_u:055.099a: avasthitaṃ ca praṇipatya kṛṣṇaṃ; prīto 'rjunaḥ kāñcanacitramālī
GE07mbh_06_u:055.099c: uvāca kopaṃ pratisaṃhareti; gatir bhavān keśava pāṇḍavānām
GE07mbh_06_u:055.100a: na hāsyate karma yathāpratijñaṃ; putraiḥ śape keśava sodaraiś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:055.100c: antaṃ kariṣyāmi yathā kurūṇāṃ; tvayāham indrānuja saṃprayuktaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.101a: tataḥ pratijñāṃ samayaṃ ca tasmai; janārdanaḥ prītamanā niśamya
GE07mbh_06_u:055.101c: sthitaḥ priye kauravasattamasya; rathaṃ sacakraḥ punar āruroha
GE07mbh_06_u:055.102a: sa tān abhīṣūn punar ādadānaḥ; pragṛhya śaṅkhaṃ dviṣatāṃ nihantā
GE07mbh_06_u:055.102c: vinādayām āsa tato diśaś ca; sa pāñcajanyasya raveṇa śauriḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.104c: sasiṃhanādāś ca babhūvur ugrāḥ; sarveṣv anīkeṣu tataḥ kurūṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:055.105a: gāṇḍīvaghoṣaḥ stanayitnukalpo; jagāma pārthasya nabho diśaś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:055.105c: jagmuś ca bāṇā vimalāḥ prasannāḥ; sarvā diśaḥ pāṇḍavacāpamuktāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.106a: taṃ kauravāṇām adhipo balena; bhīṣmeṇa bhūriśravasā ca sārdham
GE07mbh_06_u:055.106c: abhyudyayāv udyatabāṇapāṇiḥ; kakṣaṃ didhakṣann iva dhūmaketuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.107a: athārjunāya prajahāra bhallān; bhūriśravāḥ sapta suvarṇapuṅkhān
GE07mbh_06_u:055.107c: duryodhanas tomaram ugravegaṃ; śalyo gadāṃ śāṃtanavaś ca śaktim
GE07mbh_06_u:055.108a: sa saptabhiḥ sapta śarapravekān; saṃvārya bhūriśravasā visṛṣṭān
GE07mbh_06_u:055.108c: śitena duryodhanabāhumuktaṃ; kṣureṇa tat tomaram unmamātha
GE07mbh_06_u:055.109a: tataḥ śubhām āpatatīṃ sa śaktiṃ; vidyutprabhāṃ śāṃtanavena muktām
GE07mbh_06_u:055.109c: gadāṃ ca madrādhipabāhumuktāṃ; dvābhyāṃ śarābhyāṃ nicakarta vīraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.110a: tato bhujābhyāṃ balavad vikṛṣya; citraṃ dhanur gāṇḍivam aprameyam
GE07mbh_06_u:055.110c: māhendram astraṃ vidhivat sughoraṃ; prāduścakārādbhutam antarikṣe
GE07mbh_06_u:055.111a: tenottamāstreṇa tato mahātmā; sarvāṇy anīkāni mahādhanuṣmān
GE07mbh_06_u:055.112a: śilīmukhāḥ pārthadhanuḥpramuktā; rathān dhvajāgrāṇi dhanūṃṣi bāhūn
GE07mbh_06_u:055.113a: tato diśaś cānudiśaś ca pārthaḥ; śaraiḥ sudhārair niśitair vitatya
GE07mbh_06_u:055.113c: gāṇḍīvaśabdena manāṃsi teṣāṃ; kirīṭamālī vyathayāṃ cakāra
GE07mbh_06_u:055.114a: tasmiṃs tathā ghoratame pravṛtte; śaṅkhasvanā dundubhinisvanāś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:055.114c: antarhitā gāṇḍivanisvanena; bhabhūvur ugrāś ca raṇapraṇādāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.115a: gāṇḍīvaśabdaṃ tam atho viditvā; virāṭarājapramukhā nṛvīrāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.115c: pāñcālarājo drupadaś ca vīras; taṃ deśam ājagmur adīnasattvāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.116a: sarvāṇi sainyāni tu tāvakāni; yato yato gāṇḍivajaḥ praṇādaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.116c: tatas tataḥ saṃnatim eva jagmur; na taṃ pratīpo 'bhisasāra kaś cit
GE07mbh_06_u:055.117a: tasmin sughore nṛpasaṃprahāre; hatāḥ pravīrāḥ sarathāḥ sasūtāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.118c: dṛḍhāhatāḥ patribhir ugravegaiḥ; pārthena bhallair niśitaiḥ śitāgraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.119c: padātisaṃghāś ca rathāś ca saṃkhye; hayāś ca nāgāś ca dhanaṃjayena
GE07mbh_06_u:055.120a: bāṇāhatās tūrṇam apetasattvā; viṣṭabhya gātrāṇi nipetur urvyām
GE07mbh_06_u:055.121c: nadī sughorā naradehaphenā; pravartitā tatra raṇājire vai
GE07mbh_06_u:055.124c: tāṃ kaṅkamālāvṛtagṛdhrakahvaiḥ; kravyādasaṃghaiś ca tarakṣubhiś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:055.126a: te cedipāñcālakarūṣamatsyāḥ; pārthāś ca sarve sahitāḥ praṇeduḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.126c: vitrāsya senāṃ dhvajinīpatīnāṃ; siṃho mṛgāṇām iva yūthasaṃghān
GE07mbh_06_u:055.126e: vinedatus tāv atiharṣayuktau; gāṇḍīvadhanvā ca janārdanaś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:055.127a: tato raviṃ saṃhṛtaraśmijālaṃ; dṛṣṭvā bhṛśaṃ śastraparikṣatāṅgāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.127c: tad aindram astraṃ vitataṃ sughoram; asahyam udvīkṣya yugāntakalpam
GE07mbh_06_u:055.128c: cakrur niśāṃ saṃdhigatāṃ samīkṣya; vibhāvasor lohitarājiyuktām
GE07mbh_06_u:055.129a: avāpya kīrtiṃ ca yaśaś ca loke; vijitya śatrūṃś ca dhanaṃjayo 'pi
GE07mbh_06_u:055.129c: yayau narendraiḥ saha sodaraiś ca; samāptakarmā śibiraṃ niśāyām
GE07mbh_06_u:055.129e: tataḥ prajajñe tumulaḥ kurūṇāṃ; niśāmukhe ghorataraḥ praṇādaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.130a: raṇe rathānām ayutaṃ nihatya; hatā gajāḥ saptaśatārjunena
GE07mbh_06_u:055.130c: prācyāś ca sauvīragaṇāś ca sarve; nipātitāḥ kṣudrakamālavāś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:055.130e: mahat kṛtaṃ karma dhanaṃjayena; kartuṃ yathā nārhati kaś cid anyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.131a: śrutāyur ambaṣṭhapatiś ca rājā; tathaiva durmarṣaṇacitrasenau
GE07mbh_06_u:055.131c: droṇaḥ kṛpaḥ saindhavabāhlikau ca; bhūriśravāḥ śalyaśalau ca rājan
GE07mbh_06_u:055.132a: iti bruvantaḥ śibirāṇi jagmuḥ; sarve gaṇā bhārata ye tvadīyāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:055.132c: ulkāsahasraiś ca susaṃpradīptair; vibhrājamānaiś ca tathā pradīpaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:056.001a: vyuṣṭāṃ niśāṃ bhārata bhāratānām; anīkinīnāṃ pramukhe
GE07mbh_06_u:056.001c: yayau sapatnān prati jātakopo; vṛtaḥ samagreṇa balena bhīṣmaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:056.002c: jayadrathaś cātibalo balaughair; nṛpās tathānye 'nuyayuḥ samantāt
GE07mbh_06_u:056.003a: sa tair mahadbhiś ca mahārathaiś; ca tejasvibhir vīryavadbhiś ca rājan
GE07mbh_06_u:056.003c: rarāja rājottama rājamukhyair; vṛtaḥ sa devair iva vajrapāṇiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:056.004a: tasminn anīkapramukhe viṣaktā; dodhūyamānāś ca mahāpatākāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:056.005a: sā vāhinī śāṃtanavena rājñā; mahārathair vāraṇavājibhiś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:056.005c: babhau savidyutstanayitnukalpā; jalāgame dyaur iva jātameghā
GE07mbh_06_u:056.006a: tato raṇāyābhimukhī prayātā; praty arjunaṃ śāṃtanavābhiguptā
GE07mbh_06_u:056.006c: senā mahogrā sahasā kurūṇāṃ; vego yathā bhīma ivāpagāyāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:056.007c: vyūhaṃ mahāmeghasamaṃ mahātmā; dadarśa dūrāt kapirājaketuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:056.008a: sa niryayau ketumatā rathena; nararṣabhaḥ śvetahayena vīraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:056.008c: varūthinā sainyamukhe mahātmā; vadhe dhṛtaḥ sarvasapatnayūnām
GE07mbh_06_u:056.009a: sūpaskaraṃ sottarabandhureṣaṃ; yattaṃ yadūnām ṛṣabheṇa saṃkhye
GE07mbh_06_u:056.009c: kapidhvajaṃ prekṣya viṣedur ājau; sahaiva putrais tava kauraveyāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:056.011a: yathā hi pūrve 'hani dharmarājñā; vyūhaḥ kṛtaḥ kauravanandanena
GE07mbh_06_u:056.011c: tathā tathoddeśam upetya tasthuḥ; pāñcālamukhyaiḥ saha cedimukhyāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:056.011d-0221_02: na dṛṣṭapūrvo na ca saṃśrutaś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:056.012c: śaṅkhasvanā dundubhinisvanāś ca; sarveṣv anīkeṣu sasiṃhanādāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:056.013a: tataḥ sabāṇāni mahāsvanāni; visphāryamāṇāni dhanūṃṣi vīraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:056.015a: rathī rathenābhihataḥ sasūtaḥ; papāta sāśvaḥ sarathaḥ saketuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:056.015c: gajo gajenābhihataḥ papāta; padātinā cābhihataḥ padātiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:056.016c: prāsaiś ca khaḍgaiś ca samāhatāni; sadaśvavṛndāni sadaśvavṛndaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:056.017c: vidāryamāṇāni paraśvadhaiś ca; prāsaiś ca khaḍgaiś ca nipetur urvyām
GE07mbh_06_u:056.018a: gajair viṣāṇair varahastarugṇāḥ; ke cit sasūtā rathinaḥ prapetuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:056.018c: gajarṣabhāś cāpi ratharṣabheṇa; nipetire bāṇahatāḥ pṛthivyām
GE07mbh_06_u:056.022c: kṛpaś ca śalyaś ca viviṃśatiś ca; duryodhanaḥ saumadattiś ca rājan
GE07mbh_06_u:056.024a: teṣāṃ mahāstrāṇi mahārathānām; asaktakarmā vinihatya kārṣṇiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:056.024c: babhau mahāmantrahutārcimālī; sadogataḥ san bhagavān ivāgniḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:056.025a: tataḥ sa tūrṇaṃ rudhirodaphenāṃ; kṛtvā nadīṃ vaiśasane ripūṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:056.025c: jagāma saubhadram atītya bhīṣmo; mahārathaṃ pārtham adīnasattvaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:056.027c: bhīṣmaṃ mahātmābhivavarṣa tūrṇaṃ; śaraughajālair vimalaiś ca bhallaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:056.028c: dadarśa lokaḥ kurusṛñjayāś ca; tad dvairathaṃ bhīṣmadhanaṃjayābhyām
GE07mbh_06_u:057.001a: drauṇir bhūriśravāḥ śalyaś citrasenaś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:057.002a: saṃsaktam atitejobhis tam ekaṃ dadṛśur janāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:057.003a: nābhilakṣyatayā kaś cin na śaurye na parākrame
GE07mbh_06_u:057.003c: babhūva sadṛśaḥ kārṣṇer nāstre nāpi ca lāghave
GE07mbh_06_u:057.004a: tathā tam ātmajaṃ yuddhe vikramantam ariṃdamam
GE07mbh_06_u:057.004c: dṛṣṭvā pārtho raṇe yattaḥ siṃhanādam atho 'nadat
GE07mbh_06_u:057.005a: pīḍayānaṃ ca tat sainyaṃ pautraṃ tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:057.006c: pratyudyayau sa saubhadras tejasā ca balena ca
GE07mbh_06_u:057.007c: vyadṛśyata mahac cāpaṃ samare yudhyataḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:057.008a: sa drauṇim iṣuṇaikena viddhvā śalyaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:057.010a: śalyasya ca mahāghorān asyataḥ śataśaḥ śarān
GE07mbh_06_u:057.011a: bhūriśravāś ca śalyaś ca drauṇiḥ sāṃyamaniḥ śalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:057.012a: tatas trigartā rājendra madrāś ca saha kekayaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:057.014a: tau tu tatra pitāputrau parikṣiptau ratharṣabhau
GE07mbh_06_u:057.016c: yayau tan madrakānīkaṃ kekayāṃś ca paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:057.019a: tataḥ sa madrakān hatvā daśabhir daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:057.021c: avidhyat triṃśatā bāṇair daśabhiś cāsya sārathim
GE07mbh_06_u:057.023c: aśvāṃś cāsyāvadhīd rājann ubhau tau pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_06_u:057.024a: sa hatāśve rathe tiṣṭhan dadarśa bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:057.026a: taṃ mahaugham ivāyāntaṃ khāt patantam ivoragam
GE07mbh_06_u:057.027c: apaśyan pāṇḍavās tatra dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:057.029c: tvaran senāpatiḥ kruddho bibheda gadayā śiraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:057.030a: tasya rājan sanistriṃśaṃ suprabhaṃ ca śarāvaram
GE07mbh_06_u:057.030c: hatasya patato hastād vegena nyapatad bhuvi
GE07mbh_06_u:057.031a: taṃ nihatya gadāgreṇa lebhe sa paramaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:057.032c: hāhākāro mahān āsīt tava sainyasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:057.033a: tataḥ sāṃyamaniḥ kruddho dṛṣṭvā nihatam ātmajam
GE07mbh_06_u:057.034a: tau tatra samare vīrau sametau rathināṃ varau
GE07mbh_06_u:057.035c: ājaghāna tribhir bāṇais tottrair iva mahādvipam
GE07mbh_06_u:058.001a: daivam eva paraṃ manye pauruṣād api saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:058.001c: yat sainyaṃ mama putrasya pāṇḍusainyena vadhyate
GE07mbh_06_u:058.002a: nityaṃ hi māmakāṃs tāta hatān eva hi śaṃsasi
GE07mbh_06_u:058.002c: avyagrāṃś ca prahṛṣṭāṃś ca nityaṃ śaṃsasi pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_06_u:058.002d-0226_01: vibhagnāṃś ca praṇaṣṭāṃś ca nityaṃ śaṃsasi māmakān
GE07mbh_06_u:058.003c: patitān pātyamānāṃś ca hatān eva ca śaṃsasi
GE07mbh_06_u:058.004c: pāṇḍavā vijayanty eva jīyante caiva māmakāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:058.005c: aśrauṣaṃ satataṃ tāta duḥsahāni bahūni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:058.006a: tam upāyaṃ na paśyāmi jīyeran yena pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:058.006c: māmakā vā jayaṃ yuddhe prāpnuyur yena saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:058.007c: śṛṇu rājan sthiro bhūtvā tavaivāpanayo mahān
GE07mbh_06_u:058.008a: dhṛṣṭadyumnas tu śalyena pīḍito navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:058.010a: nāntaraṃ dadṛśe kaś cit tayoḥ saṃrabdhayo raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:058.010c: muhūrtam iva tad yuddhaṃ tayoḥ samam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_06_u:058.011c: dhanuś ciccheda bhallena pītena niśitena ca
GE07mbh_06_u:058.015a: tatas tu tāvakā rājan parīpsanto ''rjuniṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:058.016c: durmarṣaṇo duḥsahaś ca citrasenaś ca durmukhaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:058.017a: satyavrataś ca bhadraṃ te purumitraś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:058.018a: tān bhīmasenaḥ saṃkruddho dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:058.019e: te vai samīyuḥ saṃgrāme rājan durmantrite tava
GE07mbh_06_u:058.023c: vivyādha niśitair bāṇaiś caturbhis tvarito bhṛśam
GE07mbh_06_u:058.024a: durmarṣaṇaś ca viṃśatyā citrasenaś ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:058.024c: durmukho navabhir bāṇair duḥsahaś cāpi saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:058.024e: viviṃśatiḥ pañcabhiś ca tribhir duḥśāsanas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:058.024f-0231_01: vikarṇo daśabhir bāṇaiḥ purumitraś ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:058.024f-0232_01: madrādhipas tribhiś caiva vikarṇaḥ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:058.026a: satyavrataṃ tu samare purumitraṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:058.026c: abhimanyur avidhyat tau daśabhir daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:058.028a: tataḥ śalyo mahārāja svasrīyau rathināṃ varau
GE07mbh_06_u:058.028e: chādyamānau tatas tau tu mādrīputrau na celatuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:058.030a: tam udyatagadaṃ dṛṣṭvā kailāsam iva śṛṅgiṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:058.030c: bhīmasenaṃ mahābāhuṃ putrās te prādravan bhayāt
GE07mbh_06_u:058.032a: āpatantaṃ ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā gajānīkaṃ vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:058.034a: sa gajān gadayā nighnan vyacarat samare balī
GE07mbh_06_u:058.035b-0235_01: vipradhvastā gajā rājan madaṃ tyaktvā bhayaṃ gatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:058.036a: tatas tu draupadīputrāḥ saubhadraś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:058.036c: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:058.037c: abhyadhāvanta varṣanto meghā iva girīn yathā
GE07mbh_06_u:058.038a: kṣuraiḥ kṣuraprair bhallaiś ca pītair añjalikair api
GE07mbh_06_u:058.039a: śirobhiḥ prapatadbhiś ca bāhubhiś ca vibhūṣitaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:058.042c: preṣayām āsa samare saubhadrasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:058.045c: vyacarat samare mṛdnan gajān indro girīn iva
GE07mbh_06_u:058.046c: apaśyāma raṇe tasmin girīn vajrahatān iva
GE07mbh_06_u:058.048a: nadataḥ sīdataś cānyān vimukhān samare gajān
GE07mbh_06_u:058.050c: vihvalanto gatā bhūmiṃ śailā iva dharātale
GE07mbh_06_u:058.052a: gajānāṃ rudhirāktāṃ tāṃ gadāṃ bibhrad vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:058.053c: sahasā prādravañ śiṣṭā mṛdnantas tava vāhinīm
GE07mbh_06_u:058.054a: taṃ hi vīraṃ maheṣvāsāḥ saubhadrapramukhā rathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:058.059a: yathā paśūnāṃ saṃghātaṃ yaṣṭyā pālaḥ prakālayet
GE07mbh_06_u:058.060a: gadayā vadhyamānās te mārgaṇaiś ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:058.060c: svāny anīkāni mṛdnantaḥ prādravan kuñjarās tava
GE07mbh_06_u:058.061c: atiṣṭhat tumule bhīmaḥ śmaśāna iva śūlabhṛt
GE07mbh_06_u:059.001a: tasmin hate gajānīke putro duryodhanas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:059.002a: tataḥ sarvāṇy anīkāni tava putrasya śāsanāt
GE07mbh_06_u:059.003a: taṃ balaugham aparyantaṃ devair api durutsaham
GE07mbh_06_u:059.006a: tad āścaryam apaśyāma śraddheyam api cādbhutam
GE07mbh_06_u:059.008a: sa saṃvārya balaughāṃs tān gadayā rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:059.008c: atiṣṭhat tumule bhīmo girir merur ivācalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:059.009c: bhrātaraś caiva putrāś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:059.010c: na prājahan bhīmasenaṃ bhaye jāte mahābalam
GE07mbh_06_u:059.011a: tataḥ śaikyāyasīṃ gurvīṃ pragṛhya mahatīṃ gadām
GE07mbh_06_u:059.012a: vyacarat samare bhīmo yugānte pāvako yathā
GE07mbh_06_u:059.012c: vinighnan samare sarvān yugānte kālavad vibhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:059.014d-0239_01: gadayā vyadhamat sarvān vāto vṛkṣān ivaujasā
GE07mbh_06_u:059.014d-0239_02: bhīmaseno mahābāhus tava putrasya vai bale
GE07mbh_06_u:059.014d-0239_03: sā vai majjāvasāmāṃsaiḥ pradigdhā rudhireṇa ca
GE07mbh_06_u:059.018a: taṃ tathā mahatīṃ senāṃ drāvayantaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:059.019a: yato yataḥ prekṣate sma gadām udyamya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:059.019c: tena tena sma dīryante sarvasainyāni bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:059.023a: tam āyāntaṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā vyāttānanam ivāntakam
GE07mbh_06_u:059.024a: tasmin kṣaṇe sātyakiḥ satyasaṃdhaḥ; śinipravīro 'bhyapatat pitāmaham
GE07mbh_06_u:059.024c: nighnann amitrān dhanuṣā dṛḍhena; sa kampayaṃs tava putrasya senām
GE07mbh_06_u:059.025a: taṃ yāntam aśvai rajataprakāśaiḥ; śarān dhamantaṃ dhanuṣā dṛḍhena
GE07mbh_06_u:059.025c: nāśaknuvan vārayituṃ tadānīṃ; sarve gaṇā bhārata ye tvadīyāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:059.026a: avidhyad enaṃ niśitaiḥ śarāgrair; alambuso rājavarārśyaśṛṅgiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:059.026c: taṃ vai caturbhiḥ pratividhya vīro; naptā śiner abhyapatad rathena
GE07mbh_06_u:059.027a: anvāgataṃ vṛṣṇivaraṃ niśamya; madhye ripūṇāṃ parivartamānam
GE07mbh_06_u:059.027c: prāvartayantaṃ kurupuṃgavāṃś ca; punaḥ punaś ca praṇadantam ājau
GE07mbh_06_u:059.028a: nāśaknuvan vārayituṃ variṣṭhaṃ; madhyaṃdine sūryam ivātapantam
GE07mbh_06_u:059.028c: na tatra kaś cinn aviṣaṇṇa āsīd; ṛte rājan somadattasya putrāt
GE07mbh_06_u:059.029a: sa hy ādadāno dhanur ugravegaṃ; bhūriśravā bhārata saumadattiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:059.029c: dṛṣṭvā rathān svān vyapanīyamānān; pratyudyayau sātyakiṃ yoddhum icchan
GE07mbh_06_u:060.001a: tato bhūriśravā rājan sātyakiṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.004a: tathaiva pāṇḍavāḥ sarve sātyakiṃ rabhasaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:060.005a: bhīmasenas tu saṃkruddho gadām udyamya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:060.005d-0243_01: tathaiva ca sutās tubhyaṃ bhīmasenaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:060.006c: nandakas tava putras tu bhīmasenaṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_06_u:060.009c: mām eva bhṛśasaṃkruddhā hantum abhyudyatā yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:060.009d-0244_02: saphalaḥ sūta adyeha yo 'haṃ paśyāmi sodarān
GE07mbh_06_u:060.009d-0244_05: tatra tiṣṭhati saṃnaddhaḥ svayaṃ rājā suyodhanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.010a: etān adya haniṣyāmi paśyatas te na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.010c: tasmān mamāśvān saṃgrāme yattaḥ saṃyaccha sārathe
GE07mbh_06_u:060.011a: evam uktvā tataḥ pārthaḥ putraṃ duryodhanaṃ tava
GE07mbh_06_u:060.011e: nandakaṃ ca tribhir bāṇaiḥ pratyavidhyat stanāntare
GE07mbh_06_u:060.012a: taṃ tu duryodhanaḥ ṣaṣṭyā viddhvā bhīmaṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_06_u:060.013a: bhīmasya ca raṇe rājan dhanuś ciccheda bhāsvaram
GE07mbh_06_u:060.013c: muṣṭideśe śarais tīkṣṇais tribhī rājā hasann iva
GE07mbh_06_u:060.013d-0245_01: ākarṇapūrṇaiḥ putras te prahasann iva bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:060.014a: bhīmas tu prekṣya yantāraṃ viśokaṃ saṃyuge tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:060.014c: pīḍitaṃ viśikhais tīkṣṇais tava putreṇa dhanvinā
GE07mbh_06_u:060.016c: tena ciccheda nṛpater bhīmaḥ kārmukam uttamam
GE07mbh_06_u:060.017a: so 'pavidhya dhanuś chinnaṃ krodhena prajvalann iva
GE07mbh_06_u:060.019c: sa niṣaṇṇo rathopasthe mūrchām abhijagāma ha
GE07mbh_06_u:060.021a: tatas tu tumulāṃ vṛṣṭiṃ śastrāṇāṃ tigmatejasām
GE07mbh_06_u:060.021c: pātayām āsur avyagrāḥ putrasya tava mūrdhani
GE07mbh_06_u:060.022c: duryodhanaṃ tribhir viddhvā punar vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.023a: śalyaṃ ca pañcaviṃśatyā śarair vivyādha pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.023c: rukmapuṅkhair maheṣvāsaḥ sa viddho vyapayād raṇāt
GE07mbh_06_u:060.024a: pratyudyayus tato bhīmaṃ tava putrāś caturdaśa
GE07mbh_06_u:060.025c: durmukho duṣpradharṣaś ca vivitsur vikaṭaḥ samaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.027a: putrāṃs tu tava saṃprekṣya bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.027c: sṛkkiṇī vilihan vīraḥ paśumadhye vṛko yathā
GE07mbh_06_u:060.027f-0247_01: saṃprahṛṣya ca hṛṣṭātmā tribhir bāṇair mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.028c: suṣeṇaṃ ca tato hatvā preṣayām āsa mṛtyave
GE07mbh_06_u:060.028d-0248_01: vicitraṃ ca tathā hatvā preṣayām āsa mṛtyave
GE07mbh_06_u:060.031a: bhīmaṃ bhīmarathaṃ cobhau bhīmaseno hasann iva
GE07mbh_06_u:060.033a: putrās tu tava taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmasenaparākramam
GE07mbh_06_u:060.033c: śeṣā ye 'nye 'bhavaṃs tatra te bhīmasya bhayārditāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.034c: eṣa bhīmo raṇe kruddho dhārtarāṣṭrān mahārathān
GE07mbh_06_u:060.036a: evam uktās tataḥ sarve dhārtarāṣṭrasya sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.037c: apatat sahasā tatra yatra bhīmo vyavasthitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.038a: āpatann eva ca raṇe bhīmasenaṃ śilāśitaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.038c: adṛśyaṃ samare cakre jīmūta iva bhāskaram
GE07mbh_06_u:060.040c: gajaṃ ca śaravṛṣṭyā taṃ bibhidus te samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.043e: dviguṇaṃ javam āsthāya kampayaṃś caraṇair mahīm
GE07mbh_06_u:060.044a: tasya tat sumahad rūpaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.045a: tatas tu nṛpatiḥ kruddho bhīmasenaṃ stanāntare
GE07mbh_06_u:060.047a: tāṃs tu bhītān samālakṣya bhīmasenaṃ ca mūrchitam
GE07mbh_06_u:060.047d-0249_01: bhīmo 'pi labdhasaṃjñas tu adravat sa tato raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:060.048a: tato ghaṭotkaco rājan prekṣya bhīmaṃ tathāgatam
GE07mbh_06_u:060.049a: sa kṛtvā dāruṇāṃ māyāṃ bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhinīm
GE07mbh_06_u:060.051a: añjano vāmanaś caiva mahāpadmaś ca suprabhaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.051d-0251_01: madhye trigartā(sic)n rākṣasyo labhante prasravanti ca
GE07mbh_06_u:060.051d-0251_03: praṇamya vikacaḥ pādāv agṛhṇāt pitaraṃ tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:060.051d-0251_04: mātuś ca parameṣvāsas tau ca nāmāsya cakratuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.051d-0251_06: abravīt tena nāmāsya ghaṭotkaca iti sma ha
GE07mbh_06_u:060.051d-0251_07: sa hi sṛṣṭo maghavatā karṇahetor mahātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:060.052a: mahākāyās tridhā rājan prasravanto madaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_06_u:060.052d-0252_01: preṣitāś ca mahārāja rākṣasaiś ca caturdiśam
GE07mbh_06_u:060.053a: ghaṭotkacas tu svaṃ nāgaṃ codayām āsa taṃ tataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.054a: te cānye coditā nāgā rākṣasais tair mahābalaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.056a: tasya taṃ nadato nādaṃ sughoraṃ bhīmanisvanam
GE07mbh_06_u:060.056c: śrutvā bhīṣmo 'bravīd droṇaṃ rājānaṃ ca suyodhanam
GE07mbh_06_u:060.058a: rākṣasaś ca mahāmāyaḥ sa ca rājātikopanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.059a: śrūyate hy eṣa hṛṣṭānāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahāsvanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.059c: hastinaś caiva sumahān bhītasya ruvato dhvaniḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.060a: tatra gacchāma bhadraṃ vo rājānaṃ parirakṣitum
GE07mbh_06_u:060.061a: te tvaradhvaṃ mahāvīryāḥ kiṃ cireṇa prayāmahe
GE07mbh_06_u:060.061c: mahān hi vartate raudraḥ saṃgrāmo lomaharṣaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.062a: bhaktaś ca kulaputraś ca śūraś ca pṛtanāpatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.062c: yuktaṃ tasya paritrāṇaṃ kartum asmābhir acyutāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.063e: uttamaṃ javam āsthāya prayayur yatra so 'bhavat
GE07mbh_06_u:060.066a: tasya taṃ ninadaṃ śrutvā dṛṣṭvā nāgāṃś ca yudhyataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.067a: na rocate me saṃgrāmo haiḍimbena durātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:060.068a: naiṣa śakyo yudhā jetum api vajrabhṛtā svayam
GE07mbh_06_u:060.068c: labdhalakṣyaḥ prahārī ca vayaṃ ca śrāntavāhanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.068f-0254_01: idānīṃ yudhi nirjetuṃ na śakyo 'sau sa rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.068f-0254_02: astam abhyeti savitā rātrau yoddhuṃ na śakyate
GE07mbh_06_u:060.069a: tan na me rocate yuddhaṃ pāṇḍavair jitakāśibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.069c: ghuṣyatām avahāro 'dya śvo yotsyāmaḥ paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:060.070a: pitāmahavacaḥ śrutvā tathā cakruḥ sma kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.072a: evaṃ tad abhavad yuddhaṃ divasaṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:060.073a: kauravās tu tato rājan prayayuḥ śibiraṃ svakam
GE07mbh_06_u:060.077c: ghaṭṭayantaś ca marmāṇi tava putrasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:060.077d-0255_01: kampayantaś ca putrāṇāṃ tava cetāṃsi bhūmipa
GE07mbh_06_u:060.077d-0255_02: putrāś ca tava rājendra tathaiva śaravikṣatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:060.078a: duryodhanas tu nṛpatir dīno bhrātṛvadhena ca
GE07mbh_06_u:060.079a: tataḥ kṛtvā vidhiṃ sarvaṃ śibirasya yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_06_u:061.001a: bhayaṃ me sumahaj jātaṃ vismayaś caiva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:061.002a: putrāṇāṃ ca parābhavaṃ śrutvā saṃjaya sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.002c: cintā me mahatī sūta bhaviṣyati kathaṃ tv iti
GE07mbh_06_u:061.003c: yathā hi dṛśyate sarvaṃ daivayogena saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:061.005c: kena dattavarās tāta kiṃ vā jñānaṃ vidanti te
GE07mbh_06_u:061.005e: yena kṣayaṃ na gacchanti divi tārāgaṇā iva
GE07mbh_06_u:061.006a: punaḥ punar na mṛṣyāmi hataṃ sainyaṃ sma pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.006c: mayy eva daṇḍaḥ patati daivāt paramadāruṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.007a: yathāvadhyāḥ pāṇḍusutā yathā vadhyāś ca me sutāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.007c: etan me sarvam ācakṣva yathātattvena saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:061.008a: na hi pāraṃ prapaśyāmi duḥkhasyāsya kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:061.009a: putrāṇāṃ vyasanaṃ manye dhruvaṃ prāptaṃ sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:061.009c: ghātayiṣyati me putrān sarvān bhīmo na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.010a: na hi paśyāmi taṃ vīraṃ yo me rakṣet sutān raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:061.010c: dhruvaṃ vināśaḥ samare putrāṇāṃ mama saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:061.011a: tasmān me kāraṇaṃ sūta yuktiṃ caiva viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.012a: duryodhano 'pi yac cakre dṛṣṭvā svān vimukhān raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:061.012e: drauṇir vāpi maheṣvāso vikarṇo vā mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.013a: niścayo vāpi kas teṣāṃ tadā hy āsīn mahātmanām
GE07mbh_06_u:061.013d-0256_01: yad vṛttaṃ tatra saṃgrāme tad bhavān vaktum arhati
GE07mbh_06_u:061.014c: naiva mantrakṛtaṃ kiṃ cin naiva māyāṃ tathāvidhām
GE07mbh_06_u:061.014e: na vai vibhīṣikāṃ kāṃ cid rājan kurvanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.015a: yudhyanti te yathānyāyaṃ śaktimantaś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:061.015e: ārabhante sadā pārthāḥ prārthayānā mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.016a: na te yuddhān nivartante dharmopetā mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.016c: śriyā paramayā yuktā yato dharmas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.016e: tenāvadhyā raṇe pārthā jayayuktāś ca pārthiva
GE07mbh_06_u:061.017a: tava putrā durātmānaḥ pāpeṣv abhiratāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_06_u:061.018c: nikṛtānīha pāṇḍūnāṃ nīcair iva yathā naraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.019a: sarvaṃ ca tad anādṛtya putrāṇāṃ tava kilbiṣam
GE07mbh_06_u:061.019e: na cainān bahu manyante putrās tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:061.020e: sa tad bhuṅkṣva mahārāja saputraḥ sasuhṛjjanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.022a: tathā mayā cāpy asakṛd vāryamāṇo na gṛhṇasi
GE07mbh_06_u:061.022c: vākyaṃ hitaṃ ca pathyaṃ ca martyaḥ pathyam ivauṣadham
GE07mbh_06_u:061.022e: putrāṇāṃ matam āsthāya jitān manyasi pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_06_u:061.023a: śṛṇu bhūyo yathātattvaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_06_u:061.024c: dṛṣṭvā bhrātṝn raṇe sarvān nirjitān sumahārathān
GE07mbh_06_u:061.025e: yad abravīt sutas te 'sau tan me śṛṇu janeśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:061.026a: tvaṃ ca droṇaś ca śalyaś ca kṛpo drauṇis tathaiva
GE07mbh_06_u:061.026c: kṛtavarmā ca hārdikyaḥ kāmbojaś ca sudakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.027a: bhūriśravā vikarṇaś ca bhagadattaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:061.028a: trayāṇām api lokānāṃ paryāptā iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.028c: pāṇḍavānāṃ samastāś ca na tiṣṭhanti parākrame
GE07mbh_06_u:061.029a: tatra me saṃśayo jātas tan mamācakṣva pṛcchataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.029c: yaṃ samāśritya kaunteyā jayanty asmān pade pade
GE07mbh_06_u:061.030a: śṛṇu rājan vaco mahyaṃ yat tvāṃ vakṣyāmi kaurava
GE07mbh_06_u:061.030c: bahuśaś ca mamokto 'si na ca me tattvayā kṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:061.031c: etat kṣamam ahaṃ manye pṛthivyās tava cābhibho
GE07mbh_06_u:061.032a: bhuñjemāṃ pṛthivīṃ rājan bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ sukhī
GE07mbh_06_u:061.032c: durhṛdas tāpayan sarvān nandayaṃś cāpi bāndhavān
GE07mbh_06_u:061.033a: na ca me krośatas tāta śrutavān asi vai purā
GE07mbh_06_u:061.033c: tad idaṃ samanuprāptaṃ yat pāṇḍūn avamanyase
GE07mbh_06_u:061.034a: yaś ca hetur avadhyatve teṣām akliṣṭakarmaṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:061.034c: taṃ śṛṇuṣva mahārāja mama kīrtayataḥ prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:061.035a: nāsti lokeṣu tad bhūtaṃ bhavitā no bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_06_u:061.035c: yo jayet pāṇḍavān saṃkhye pālitāñ śārṅgadhanvanā
GE07mbh_06_u:061.036a: yat tu me kathitaṃ tāta munibhir bhāvitātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.037a: purā kila surāḥ sarve ṛṣayaś ca samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.038c: vimānaṃ jājvalad bhāsā sthitaṃ pravaram ambare
GE07mbh_06_u:061.039a: dhyānenāvedya taṃ brahmā kṛtvā ca niyato 'ñjalim
GE07mbh_06_u:061.040a: ṛṣayas tv atha devāś ca dṛṣṭvā brahmāṇam utthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:061.040c: sthitāḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve paśyanto mahad adbhutam
GE07mbh_06_u:061.041a: yathāvac ca tam abhyarcya brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.042a: viśvāvasur viśvamūrtir viśveśo; viṣvakseno viśvakarmā vaśī ca
GE07mbh_06_u:061.042c: viśveśvaro vāsudevo 'si tasmād; yogātmānaṃ daivataṃ tvām upaimi
GE07mbh_06_u:061.043a: jaya viśva mahādeva jaya lokahite rata
GE07mbh_06_u:061.054a: pādau tava dharā devī diśo bāhur divaṃ śiraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.054c: mūrtis te 'haṃ surāḥ kāyaś candrādityau ca cakṣuṣī
GE07mbh_06_u:061.055a: balaṃ tapaś ca satyaṃ ca dharmaḥ kāmātmajaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:061.055c: tejo 'gniḥ pavanaḥ śvāsa āpas te svedasaṃbhavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.056a: aśvinau śravaṇau nityaṃ devī jihvā sarasvatī
GE07mbh_06_u:061.056c: vedāḥ saṃskāraniṣṭhā hi tvayīdaṃ jagad āśritam
GE07mbh_06_u:061.057a: na saṃkhyāṃ na parīmāṇaṃ na tejo na parākramam
GE07mbh_06_u:061.057c: na balaṃ yogayogīśa jānīmas te na saṃbhavam
GE07mbh_06_u:061.061a: tvaṃ gatiḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ tvaṃ netā tvaṃ jaganmukham
GE07mbh_06_u:061.063c: jagato dhāraṇārthāya vijñāpyaṃ kuru me prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:061.064a: yad etat paramaṃ guhyaṃ tvatprasādamayaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_06_u:061.064c: vāsudeva tad etat te mayodgītaṃ yathātatham
GE07mbh_06_u:061.065a: sṛṣṭvā saṃkarṣaṇaṃ devaṃ svayam ātmānam ātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:061.066a: pradyumnāc cāniruddhaṃ tvaṃ yaṃ vidur viṣṇum avyayam
GE07mbh_06_u:061.067b-0258_01: vāsudeveti taṃ vidyād yenāhaṃ nirmitaḥ prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:061.068c: dharmaṃ sthāpya yaśaḥ prāpya yogaṃ prāpsyasi tattvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:061.069a: tvāṃ hi brahmarṣayo loke devāś cāmitavikrama
GE07mbh_06_u:061.069c: tais taiś ca nāmabhir bhaktā gāyanti paramātmakam
GE07mbh_06_u:061.070a: sthitāś ca sarve tvayi bhūtasaṃghāḥ; kṛtvāśrayaṃ tvāṃ varadaṃ subāho
GE07mbh_06_u:061.070c: anādimadhyāntam apārayogaṃ; lokasya setuṃ pravadanti viprāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.001a: tataḥ sa bhagavān devo lokānāṃ parameśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.002a: viditaṃ tāta yogān me sarvam etat tavepsitam
GE07mbh_06_u:062.004a: ko nv ayaṃ yo bhagavatā praṇamya vinayād vibho
GE07mbh_06_u:062.004c: vāgbhiḥ stuto variṣṭhābhiḥ śrotum icchāma taṃ vayam
GE07mbh_06_u:062.005a: evam uktas tu bhagavān pratyuvāca pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.006a: yat tatparaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca bhavitavyaṃ ca yat param
GE07mbh_06_u:062.006c: bhūtātmā yaḥ prabhuś caiva brahma yac ca paraṃ padam
GE07mbh_06_u:062.008a: mānuṣaṃ lokam ātiṣṭha vāsudeva iti śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.009c: ta ime nṛṣu saṃbhūtā ghorarūpā mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.010a: teṣāṃ vadhārthaṃ bhagavān nareṇa sahito vaśī
GE07mbh_06_u:062.012a: ajeyau samare yattau sahitāv amarair api
GE07mbh_06_u:062.012c: mūḍhās tv etau na jānanti naranārāyaṇāv ṛṣī
GE07mbh_06_u:062.012d-0261_01: jagataś cāgrajau vidmas tato devau surarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.013a: tasyāham ātmajo brahmā sarvasya jagataḥ patiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.014a: tathā manuṣyo 'yam iti kadā cit surasattamāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.014d-0262_01: etat puruṣasaṃjñaṃ vai purāṇaṃ rūpam uttamam
GE07mbh_06_u:062.015a: etat paramakaṃ guhyam etat paramakaṃ padam
GE07mbh_06_u:062.015c: etat paramakaṃ brahma etat paramakaṃ yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.016a: etad akṣaram avyaktam etat tac chāśvataṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:062.016c: etat puruṣasaṃjñaṃ vai gīyate jñāyate na ca
GE07mbh_06_u:062.017a: etat paramakaṃ teja etat paramakaṃ sukham
GE07mbh_06_u:062.018a: tasmāt sarvaiḥ suraiḥ sendrair lokaiś cāmitavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.019a: yaś ca mānuṣamātro 'yam iti brūyāt sumandadhīḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.020a: yoginaṃ taṃ mahātmānaṃ praviṣṭaṃ mānuṣīṃ tanum
GE07mbh_06_u:062.020c: avamanyed vāsudevaṃ tam āhus tāmasaṃ janāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.021c: padmanābhaṃ na jānāti tam āhus tāmasaṃ janāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.024a: evam uktvā sa bhagavān sarvān devagaṇān purā
GE07mbh_06_u:062.025c: kathāṃ tāṃ brahmaṇā gītāṃ śrutvā prītā divaṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.026a: etac chrutaṃ mayā tāta ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām
GE07mbh_06_u:062.028a: etam arthaṃ ca vijñāya śrutvā ca prabhum avyayam
GE07mbh_06_u:062.029a: yasyāsāv ātmajo brahmā sarvasya jagataḥ pitā
GE07mbh_06_u:062.029c: kathaṃ na vāsudevo 'yam arcyaś cejyaś ca mānavaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.030c: mā gaccha saṃyugaṃ tena vāsudevena dhīmatā
GE07mbh_06_u:062.030e: mā pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdham iti tac ca mohān na budhyase
GE07mbh_06_u:062.031a: manye tvāṃ rākṣasaṃ krūraṃ tathā cāsi tamovṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.031c: yasmād dviṣasi govindaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ ca dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_06_u:062.031e: naranārāyaṇau devau nānyo dviṣyād dhi mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.032a: tasmād bravīmi te rājann eṣa vai śāśvato 'vyayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.032c: sarvalokamayo nityaḥ śāstā dhātā dharo dhruvaḥ
