GE07mbh_06_u:062.033a: lokān dhārayate yas trīṃś carācaraguruḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.033c: yoddhā jayaś ca jetā ca sarvaprakṛtir īśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.034c: yataḥ kṛṣṇas tato dharmo yato dharmas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.035c: dhṛtāḥ pāṇḍusutā rājañ jayaś caiṣāṃ bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_06_u:062.036a: śreyoyuktāṃ sadā buddhiṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ dadhāti yaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.036c: balaṃ caiva raṇe nityaṃ bhayebhyaś caiva rakṣati
GE07mbh_06_u:062.037a: sa eṣa śāśvato devaḥ sarvaguhyamayaḥ śivaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.037c: vāsudeva iti jñeyo yan māṃ pṛcchasi bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:062.038a: brāhmaṇaiḥ kṣatriyair vaiśyaiḥ śūdraiś ca kṛtalakṣaṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.039c: sātvataṃ vidhim āsthāya gītaḥ saṃkarṣaṇena yaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:062.040a: sa eṣa sarvāsuramartyalokaṃ; samudrakakṣyāntaritāḥ purīś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:062.040c: yuge yuge mānuṣaṃ caiva vāsaṃ; punaḥ punaḥ sṛjate vāsudevaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:063.001c: tasyāgamaṃ pratiṣṭhāṃ ca jñātum icche pitāmaha
GE07mbh_06_u:063.002a: vāsudevo mahad bhūtaṃ saṃbhūtaṃ saha daivataiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:063.002d-0263_01: śrutaṃ me tāta rāmasya jāmadagnyasya jalpataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:063.002e: mārkaṇḍeyaś ca govindaṃ kathayaty adbhutaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:063.003c: āpo vāyuś ca tejaś ca trayam etad akalpayat
GE07mbh_06_u:063.004a: sa sṛṣṭvā pṛthivīṃ devaḥ sarvalokeśvaraḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:063.004c: apsu vai śayanaṃ cakre mahātmā puruṣottamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:063.004e: sarvatoyamayo devo yogāt suṣvāpa tatra ha
GE07mbh_06_u:063.005a: mukhataḥ so 'gnim asṛjat prāṇād vāyum athāpi ca
GE07mbh_06_u:063.005c: sarasvatīṃ ca vedāṃś ca manasaḥ sasṛje 'cyutaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:063.006a: eṣa lokān sasarjādau devāṃś carṣigaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:063.006c: nidhanaṃ caiva mṛtyuṃ ca prajānāṃ prabhavo 'vyayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:063.007a: eṣa dharmaś ca dharmajño varadaḥ sarvakāmadaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:063.007c: eṣa kartā ca kāryaṃ ca pūrvadevaḥ svayaṃprabhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:063.008a: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyac ca pūrvam etad akalpayat
GE07mbh_06_u:063.008c: ubhe saṃdhye diśaḥ khaṃ ca niyamaṃ ca janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:063.009a: ṛṣīṃś caiva hi govindas tapaś caivānu kalpayat
GE07mbh_06_u:063.009c: sraṣṭāraṃ jagataś cāpi mahātmā prabhur avyayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:063.010b-0264_03: tasmāt pitāmaho jātas tasmāj jātās tv imāḥ prajāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:063.010c: śeṣaṃ cākalpayad devam anantam iti yaṃ viduḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:063.011a: yo dhārayati bhūtāni dharāṃ cemāṃ saparvatām
GE07mbh_06_u:063.011c: dhyānayogena viprāś ca taṃ vadanti mahaujasam
GE07mbh_06_u:063.012c: tam ugram ugrakarmāṇam ugrāṃ buddhiṃ samāsthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:063.012d-0265_01: harantaṃ brahmaṇo vedāñ jaghāna brahmaṇaḥ pitā
GE07mbh_06_u:063.013c: madhusūdanam ity āhur ṛṣayaś ca janārdanam
GE07mbh_06_u:063.013e: varāhaś caiva siṃhaś ca trivikramagatiḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:063.014a: eṣa mātā pitā caiva sarveṣāṃ prāṇināṃ hariḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:063.014c: paraṃ hi puṇḍarīkākṣān na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_06_u:063.015c: vaiśyāṃś cāpy ūruto rājañ śūdrān padbhyāṃ tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:063.017c: evam āhur hṛṣīkeśaṃ munayo vai narādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:063.018a: evam enaṃ vijānīhi ācāryaṃ pitaraṃ gurum
GE07mbh_06_u:063.018c: kṛṣṇo yasya prasīdeta lokās tenākṣayā jitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:063.019a: yaś caivainaṃ bhayasthāne keśavaṃ śaraṇaṃ vrajet
GE07mbh_06_u:063.019c: sadā naraḥ paṭhaṃś cedaṃ svastimān sa sukhī bhavet
GE07mbh_06_u:063.020a: ye ca kṛṣṇaṃ prapadyante te na muhyanti mānavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:063.020c: bhaye mahati ye magnāḥ pāti nityaṃ janārdanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:063.021e: prapannaḥ śaraṇaṃ rājan yogānām īśvaraṃ prabhum
GE07mbh_06_u:064.001c: brahmarṣibhiś ca devaiś ca yaḥ purā kathito bhuvi
GE07mbh_06_u:064.002e: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca mārkaṇḍeyo 'bhyuvāca ha
GE07mbh_06_u:064.003a: yajñānāṃ caiva yajñaṃ tvāṃ tapaś ca tapasām api
GE07mbh_06_u:064.003c: devānām api devaṃ ca tvām āha bhagavān bhṛguḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:064.003e: purāṇe bhairavaṃ rūpaṃ viṣṇo bhūtapateti vai
GE07mbh_06_u:064.004a: vāsudevo vasūnāṃ tvaṃ śakraṃ sthāpayitā tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:064.006a: avyaktaṃ te śarīrotthaṃ vyaktaṃ te manasi sthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:064.006c: devā vāksaṃbhavāś ceti devalas tv asito 'bravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:064.007a: śirasā te divaṃ vyāptaṃ bāhubhyāṃ pṛthivī dhṛtā
GE07mbh_06_u:064.007c: jaṭharaṃ te trayo lokāḥ puruṣo 'si sanātanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:064.008a: evaṃ tvām abhijānanti tapasā bhāvitā narāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:064.009d-0267_01: etad dvaipāyanaḥ prāha stutvā vai puruṣottamam
GE07mbh_06_u:064.010a: eṣa te vistaras tāta saṃkṣepaś ca prakīrtitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:064.011a: puṇyaṃ śrutvaitad ākhyānaṃ mahārāja sutas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:064.011c: keśavaṃ bahu mene sa pāṇḍavāṃś ca mahārathān
GE07mbh_06_u:064.012a: tam abravīn mahārāja bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:064.012c: māhātmyaṃ te śrutaṃ rājan keśavasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:064.012d-0269_01: arjunasya māhātmyaṃ hi kathitaṃ tattvato mayā
GE07mbh_06_u:064.012d-0269_02: na jeṣyāmi mahāyuddhe vicarantaṃ naraṃ kva cit
GE07mbh_06_u:064.012d-0269_03: nārāyaṇaṃ ca saṃgrāme avadhyau tau yataḥ smṛtau
GE07mbh_06_u:064.012d-0269_04: dharmarājaś ca bhīmaś ca mādrīputraś ca pāṃḍavau
GE07mbh_06_u:064.013a: narasya ca yathātattvaṃ yan māṃ tvaṃ paripṛcchasi
GE07mbh_06_u:064.014a: avadhyau ca yathā vīrau saṃyugeṣv aparājitau
GE07mbh_06_u:064.014c: yathā ca pāṇḍavā rājann agamyā yudhi kasya cit
GE07mbh_06_u:064.015a: prītimān hi dṛḍhaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ pāṇḍaveṣu yaśasviṣu
GE07mbh_06_u:064.015c: tasmād bravīmi rājendra śamo bhavatu pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:064.016a: pṛthivīṃ bhuṅkṣva sahito bhrātṛbhir balibhir vaśī
GE07mbh_06_u:064.016d-0270_01: na cet kartāsi vacanaṃ saṃdigdhaṃ na tariṣyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:064.017a: evam uktvā tava pitā tūṣṇīm āsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:064.017c: vyasarjayac ca rājānaṃ śayanaṃ ca viveśa ha
GE07mbh_06_u:064.018c: śiśye ca śayane śubhre tāṃ rātriṃ bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:065.001a: vyuṣitāyāṃ ca śarvaryām udite ca divākare
GE07mbh_06_u:065.002c: te sarve sahitā yuddhe samālokya parasparam
GE07mbh_06_u:065.003a: pāṇḍavā dhārtarāṣṭrāś ca rājan durmantrite tava
GE07mbh_06_u:065.003c: vyūhau ca vyūhya saṃrabdhāḥ saṃprayuddhāḥ prahāriṇaḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:065.004d-0272_02: śyenavad vyūhya taṃ vyūhaṃ dhaumyasya vacanāt svayam
GE07mbh_06_u:065.004d-0272_03: sa hi tasya suvijñāta agnicityeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:065.004d-0272_04: makaras tu mahāvyūhas tava putrasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:065.005a: sa niryayau rathānīkaṃ pitā devavratas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:065.006c: rathinaḥ pattayaś caiva dantinaḥ sādinas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:065.007a: tān dṛṣṭvā prodyatān saṃkhye pāṇḍavāś ca yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:065.008c: netre śikhaṇḍī durdharṣo dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:065.009c: vidhunvan gāṇḍivaṃ pārtho grīvāyām abhavat tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:065.010c: mahātmā drupadaḥ śrīmān saha putreṇa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:065.011c: pṛṣṭhato draupadeyāś ca saubhadraś cāpi vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:065.012a: pṛṣṭhe samabhavac chrīmān svayaṃ rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:065.013a: praviśya tu raṇe bhīmo makaraṃ mukhatas tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:065.013c: bhīṣmam āsādya saṃgrāme chādayām āsa sāyakaiḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:065.017c: pūrvaṃ dṛṣṭvā vadhaṃ ghoraṃ balasya balināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:065.017e: bhrātṝṇāṃ ca vadhaṃ yuddhe smaramāṇo mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:065.018a: ācārya satataṃ tvaṃ hi hitakāmo mamānagha
GE07mbh_06_u:065.018c: vayaṃ hi tvāṃ samāśritya bhīṣmaṃ caiva pitāmaham
GE07mbh_06_u:065.019a: devān api raṇe jetuṃ prārthayāmo na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:065.019d-0273_01: sa tathā kuru bhadraṃ te yathā vadhyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:065.020a: evam uktas tato droṇas tava putreṇa māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:065.020b-0274_01: uvāca tatra rājānaṃ saṃkruddha iva niḥśvasan
GE07mbh_06_u:065.020b-0274_02: bāliśas tvaṃ na jānīṣe pāṇḍavānāṃ parākramam
GE07mbh_06_u:065.020b-0274_03: na śakyā hi yathā jetuṃ pāṇḍavā hi mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:065.020b-0274_04: yathābalaṃ yathāvīryaṃ karma kuryām ahaṃ hi te
GE07mbh_06_u:065.020b-0274_05: ity uktvā te sutaṃ rājann abhyapadyata vāhinīm
GE07mbh_06_u:065.021a: sātyakis tu tadā droṇaṃ vārayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:065.022a: śaineyaṃ tu raṇe kruddho bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_06_u:065.022c: avidhyan niśitair bāṇair jatrudeśe hasann iva
GE07mbh_06_u:065.023c: saṃrakṣan sātyakiṃ rājan droṇāc chastrabhṛtāṃ varāt
GE07mbh_06_u:065.024a: tato droṇaś ca bhīṣmaś ca tathā śalyaś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:065.024c: bhīmasenaṃ raṇe kruddhāś chādayāṃ cakrire śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:065.025c: vivyadhur niśitair bāṇaiḥ sarvāṃs tān udyatāyudhān
GE07mbh_06_u:065.029a: tato droṇo mahārāja abhyadravata taṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:065.029c: rakṣamāṇas tato bhīṣmaṃ tava putreṇa coditaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:065.030a: śikhaṇḍī tu samāsādya droṇaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ varam
GE07mbh_06_u:065.031a: tato balena mahatā putras tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:065.031c: jugopa bhīṣmam āsādya prārthayāno mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:065.032c: bhīṣmam evābhyavartanta jaye kṛtvā dṛḍhāṃ matim
GE07mbh_06_u:065.033a: tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ devānāṃ dānavair iva
GE07mbh_06_u:065.033c: jayaṃ ca kāṅkṣatāṃ nityaṃ yaśaś ca paramādbhutam
GE07mbh_06_u:066.001a: akarot tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavas tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:066.002a: pūrvāhṇe tan mahāraudraṃ rājñāṃ yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_06_u:066.003c: abhavat tumulaḥ śabdaḥ saṃspṛśan gaganaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:066.004a: nadadbhiś ca mahānāgair heṣamāṇaiś ca vājibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:066.012c: prāvartata kurūṇāṃ ca pāṇḍavānāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:066.014d-0275_06: nijaghnuḥ samare śūrās te 'nyonyaṃ ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_06_u:066.014d-0275_07: babhramuḥ kuñjarāś cātra śarair viddhā niraṅkuśāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:066.014e: aśvāś ca paryadhāvanta hatārohā diśo daśa
GE07mbh_06_u:066.015d-0276_02: gadānāṃ parighāṇāṃ ca hastānāṃ corubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:066.015d-0276_03: pādānāṃ bhūṣaṇānāṃ ca keyūrāṇāṃ ca saṃghaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:066.016c: saṃghātāḥ sma pradṛśyante tatra tatra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:066.017a: gadābhir asibhiḥ prāsair bāṇaiś ca nataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:066.019a: muṣṭibhir jānubhiś caiva talaiś caiva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:066.019c: anyonyaṃ jaghnire vīrās tāvakāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:066.019d-0277_01: patitaiḥ pātyamānaiś ca viceṣṭadbhiś ca bhūtale
GE07mbh_06_u:066.019d-0277_02: ghoram āyodhanaṃ jajñe tatra tatra janeśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:066.019d-0278_05: hatārohā hayā rājan rathino virathā api
GE07mbh_06_u:066.021a: tato duryodhano rājā kaliṅgair bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:067.001a: dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmeṇa saṃsaktān bhrātṝn anyāṃś ca pārthivān
GE07mbh_06_u:067.002c: dhvajaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā pārthasya sarvān no bhayam āviśat
GE07mbh_06_u:067.003c: bahuvarṇaṃ ca citraṃ ca divyaṃ vānaralakṣaṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:067.005c: sughoraṃ talayoḥ śabdaṃ nighnatas tava vāhinīm
GE07mbh_06_u:067.007c: diśaṃ prācīṃ pratīcīṃ ca na jānīmo 'stramohitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:067.009c: teṣām ārtāyanam abhūd bhīṣmaḥ śaṃtanavo raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:067.010d-0280_02: vihvalāḥ pratyadṛśyanta na jānanti diśo nṛpa
GE07mbh_06_u:067.017a: rathibhir vāraṇair aśvaiḥ padātaiś ca samīritam
GE07mbh_06_u:067.017c: ghoram āyodhanaṃ jajñe mahābhrasadṛśaṃ rajaḥ tomaraprāsanārācagajāśvarathayodhinām
GE07mbh_06_u:067.020c: matsyā duryodhanaṃ jagmuḥ śakuniṃ ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:067.021a: drupadaś cekitānaś ca sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:067.021e: kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca dhṛṣṭaketum abhidrutau
GE07mbh_06_u:067.023a: nirabhre vidyutas tīvrā diśaś ca rajasāvṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:067.023c: prādurāsan maholkāś ca sanirghātā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:067.024a: pravavau ca mahāvātaḥ pāṃsuvarṣaṃ papāta ca
GE07mbh_06_u:067.029c: dikṣu sarvāsv adṛśyanta śarīrāṇi śirāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_06_u:067.030c: hatāśvāḥ pṛthivīṃ jagmus tatra tatra mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:067.031a: paripetur hayāś cātra ke cic chastrakṛtavraṇāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:067.032c: yugāni paryakarṣanta tatra tatra sma bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:067.033c: ekena balinā rājan vāraṇena hatā rathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:067.036c: nipetur yudhi saṃbhagnāḥ sayodhāḥ sadhvajā rathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:067.039a: ratheṣu ca rathān yuddhe saṃsaktān varavāraṇāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:067.040a: teṣāṃ tathā karṣatāṃ ca gajānāṃ rūpam ābabhau
GE07mbh_06_u:067.041c: sādibhiś ca padātaiś ca sadhvajaiś ca mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:068.001a: śikhaṇḍī saha matsyena virāṭena viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:068.002a: droṇaṃ kṛpaṃ vikarṇaṃ ca maheṣvāsān mahābalān
GE07mbh_06_u:068.002c: rājñaś cānyān raṇe śūrān bahūn ārchad dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:068.003a: saindhavaṃ ca maheṣvāsaṃ sāmātyaṃ saha bandhubhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:068.003c: prācyāṃś ca dākṣiṇātyāṃś ca bhūmipān bhūmiparṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:068.004a: putraṃ ca te maheṣvāsaṃ duryodhanam amarṣaṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:068.005a: sahadevas tu śakunim ulūkaṃ ca mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:068.007a: mādrīputras tu nakulaḥ śūraḥ saṃkrandano yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:068.008c: sātyakiś cekitānaś ca saubhadraś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:068.009a: dhṛṣṭaketuś ca samare rākṣasaś ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:068.011a: evam ete maheṣvāsās tāvakāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:068.014c: babhūva tumulaḥ śabdaḥ siṃhānām iva nardatām
GE07mbh_06_u:068.015c: yam akurvan raṇe vīrāḥ sṛñjayāḥ kurubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:068.016a: naiva khaṃ na diśo rājan na sūryaṃ śatrutāpana
GE07mbh_06_u:068.016c: vidiśo vāpy apaśyāma śarair muktaiḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:068.018c: khaṃ diśaḥ pradiśaś caiva bhāsayām āsur ojasā
GE07mbh_06_u:068.018e: virarāja tadā rājaṃs tatra tatra raṇāṅgaṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:068.019c: virejuḥ samare rājan grahā iva nabhastale
GE07mbh_06_u:068.020a: bhīṣmas tu rathināṃ śreṣṭho bhīmasenaṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_06_u:068.024d-0286_01: apāsya tu dhanuś chinnaṃ bhīmaseno mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:068.024d-0286_02: śarair bahubhir ānarchad bhīṣmaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:068.025a: sātyakis tu tatas tūrṇaṃ bhīṣmam āsādya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:068.025c: śarair bahubhir ānarchat pitaraṃ te janeśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:068.026a: tataḥ saṃdhāya vai tīkṣṇaṃ śaraṃ paramadāruṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:068.026c: vārṣṇeyasya rathād bhīṣmaḥ pātayām āsa sārathim
GE07mbh_06_u:068.029c: ity āsīt tumulaḥ śabdo yuyudhānarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:068.030a: etasminn eva kāle tu bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:068.030c: vyahanat pāṇḍavīṃ senām āsurīm iva vṛtrahā
GE07mbh_06_u:068.031a: te vadhyamānā bhīṣmeṇa pāñcālāḥ somakaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:068.031c: āryāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā bhīṣmam evābhidudruvuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.001a: virāṭo 'tha tribhir bāṇair bhīṣmam ārchan mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:069.001c: vivyādha turagāṃś cāsya tribhir bāṇair mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.002a: taṃ pratyavidhyad daśabhir bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavaḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.004c: avidhyac ca bhṛśaṃ tīkṣṇaiḥ patribhiḥ śatrukarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.006a: avidhyat phalgunaṃ rājan navatyā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.007c: dīrgham uṣṇaṃ ca niḥśvasya cintayitvā muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.009a: tais tūrṇaṃ samare 'vidhyad drauṇiṃ balavatāṃ varam
GE07mbh_06_u:069.009c: tasya te kavacaṃ bhittvā papuḥ śoṇitam āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:069.010a: na vivyathe ca nirbhinno drauṇir gāṇḍīvadhanvanā
GE07mbh_06_u:069.010e: tasthau sa samare rājaṃs trātum icchan mahāvratam
GE07mbh_06_u:069.011a: tasya tat sumahat karma śaśaṃsuḥ puruṣarṣabhāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.011d-0288_01: sa viddhaḥ phālgunenājau na papāta mahītale
GE07mbh_06_u:069.012a: sa hi nityam anīkeṣu yudhyate 'bhayam āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.013c: brāhmaṇaś ca viśeṣeṇa mānanīyo mameti ca
GE07mbh_06_u:069.015a: drauṇiṃ tyaktvā tato yuddhe kaunteyaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.017c: citraṃ kārmukam ādatta śarāṃś ca niśitān daśa
GE07mbh_06_u:069.019a: tasya kāñcanasūtras tu śaraiḥ parivṛto maṇiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.019c: rarājorasi vai sūryo grahair iva samāvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.020a: putras tu tava tejasvī bhīmasenena tāḍitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.023c: avidhyad daśabhir bāṇaiḥ purumitraṃ ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.024a: satyavrataṃ ca saptatyā viddhvā śakrasamo yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:069.024c: nṛtyann iva raṇe vīra ārtiṃ naḥ samajījanat
GE07mbh_06_u:069.025c: satyavrataś ca navabhiḥ purumitraś ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.026a: sa viddho vikṣaran raktaṃ śatrusaṃvāraṇaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:069.027a: tatas te tāvakā vīrā rājaputrā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.027c: sametya yudhi saṃrabdhā vivyadhur niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.027e: tāṃś ca sarvāñ śarais tīkṣṇair jaghāna paramāstravit
GE07mbh_06_u:069.028a: tasya dṛṣṭvā tu tat karma parivavruḥ sutās tava
GE07mbh_06_u:069.028c: dahantaṃ samare sainyaṃ tava kakṣaṃ yatholbaṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:069.030a: tat tasya caritaṃ dṛṣṭvā pautras tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:069.031c: vivyādha viśikhaiḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ sārathiṃ ca tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.032a: tathaiva lakṣmaṇo rājan saubhadraṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.033a: tasyāśvāṃś caturo hatvā sārathiṃ ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.034a: hatāśve tu rathe tuṣṭhaṃl lakṣmaṇaḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_06_u:069.034c: śaktiṃ cikṣepa saṃkruddhaḥ saubhadrasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:069.036a: tataḥ svaratham āropya lakṣmaṇaṃ gautamas tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:069.037b-0289_01: hayo hayaṃ gajo nāgaṃ vīro vīraṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:069.038a: tāvakāś ca maheṣvāsāḥ pāṇḍavāś ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.040c: senāṃ jaghāna saṃkruddho divyair astrair mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:069.041a: hateśvarair gajais tatra narair aśvaiś ca pātitaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:070.001d-0290_01: yat tat sakhyus tu pūrveṇa arjunād upaśikṣitam
GE07mbh_06_u:070.002c: prakāśaṃ laghu citraṃ ca darśayann astralāghavam
GE07mbh_06_u:070.003a: tasya vikṣipataś cāpaṃ śarān anyāṃś ca muñcataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:070.004a: kṣipataś ca śarān asya raṇe śatrūn vinighnataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:070.005a: tam udīryantam ālokya rājā duryodhanas tataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:070.005c: rathānām ayutaṃ tasya preṣayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:070.006a: tāṃs tu sarvān maheṣvāsān sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:070.008a: sa hi saṃdṛśya senāṃ tāṃ yuyudhānena pātitām
GE07mbh_06_u:070.009a: indrāyudhasavarṇaṃ tat sa visphārya mahad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:070.010a: śarāṃs tān mṛtyusaṃsparśān sātyakes tu padānugāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:070.010c: na viṣehus tadā rājan dudruvus te samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:070.011a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā yuyudhānasya sutā daśa mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:070.012d-0291_01: yudhyasva samare cādya paśyāmas tava pauruṣam
GE07mbh_06_u:070.013c: ehi yudhyasva saṃgrāme samastaiḥ pṛthag eva vā
GE07mbh_06_u:070.014a: asmān vā tvaṃ parājitya yaśaḥ prāpnuhi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:070.014c: vayaṃ vā tvāṃ parājitya prītiṃ dāsyāmahe pituḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:070.015a: evam uktas tadā śūrais tān uvāca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:070.016a: sādhv idaṃ kathyate vīrā yad evaṃ matir adya vaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:070.016c: yudhyadhvaṃ sahitā yattā nihaniṣyāmi vo raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:070.017a: evam uktā maheṣvāsās te vīrāḥ kṣiprakāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:070.018c: ekasya ca bahūnāṃ ca sametānāṃ raṇājire
GE07mbh_06_u:070.019a: tam ekaṃ rathināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ śaravarṣair avākiran
GE07mbh_06_u:070.020a: tais tu muktāñ śaraughāṃs tān yamadaṇḍāśaniprabhān
GE07mbh_06_u:070.021c: yad eko bahubhir yuddhe samasajjad abhītavat
GE07mbh_06_u:070.022a: visṛjya śaravṛṣṭiṃ tāṃ daśa rājan mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:070.023a: saumadattis tataḥ kruddhas teṣāṃ cāpāni bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:070.024c: ciccheda samare rājañ śirāṃsi niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:070.024e: te hatā nyapatan bhūmau vajrabhagnā iva drumāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:070.025a: tān dṛṣṭvā nihatān vīrān raṇe putrān mahābalān
GE07mbh_06_u:070.028c: bhīmasenas tvaran rājan ratham āropayat tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:070.030a: tasmiṃs tathā vartamāne raṇe bhīṣmaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:070.032c: saṃprāpyaiva gatā nāśaṃ śalabhā iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_06_u:070.034a: etasminn eva kāle tu sūrye 'stam upagacchati
GE07mbh_06_u:070.035a: avahāraṃ tataś cakre pitā devavratas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:070.036c: te sene bhṛśasaṃvigne yayatuḥ svaṃ niveśanam
GE07mbh_06_u:070.037a: tataḥ svaśibiraṃ gatvā nyaviśaṃs tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:070.037c: pāṇḍavāḥ sṛñjayaiḥ sārdhaṃ kuravaś ca yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_06_u:071.001a: vihṛtya ca tato rājan sahitāḥ kurupāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:071.001c: vyatītāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ punar yuddhāya niryayuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:071.002a: tatra śabdo mahān āsīt tava teṣāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:071.005a: evam uktas tu pārthena dhṛṣṭadyumno mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:071.006a: śiro 'bhūd drupadas tasya pāṇḍavaś ca dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:071.006c: cakṣuṣī sahadevaś ca nakulaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:071.007a: saubhadro draupadeyāś ca rākṣasaś ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:071.009a: kekayā bhrātaraḥ pañca vāmaṃ pārśvaṃ samāśritāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:071.009e: dakṣiṇaṃ pakṣam āśritya sthitā vyūhasya rakṣaṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:071.010a: pādayos tu mahārāja sthitaḥ śrīmān mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:071.011a: śikhaṇḍī tu maheṣvāsaḥ somakaiḥ saṃvṛto balī
GE07mbh_06_u:071.011c: irāvāṃś ca tataḥ pucche makarasya vyavasthitau
GE07mbh_06_u:071.012a: evam etan mahāvyūhaṃ vyūhya bhārata pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:071.013c: samucchritair dhvajaiś citraiḥ śastraiś ca vimalaiḥ śitaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:071.014a: vyūhaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu tat sainyaṃ pitā devavratas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:071.015c: aśvatthāmā kṛpaś caiva cakṣur āstāṃ nareśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:071.017a: grīvāyāṃ śūrasenas tu tava putraś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:071.018c: urasy abhūn naraśreṣṭha mahatyā senayā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:071.020a: tuṣārā yavanāś caiva śakāś ca saha cūcupaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:071.020c: dakṣiṇaṃ pakṣam āśritya sthitā vyūhasya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:071.021a: śrutāyuś ca śatāyuś ca saumadattiś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:071.022a: tato yuddhāya saṃjagmuḥ pāṇḍavāḥ kauravaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:071.022c: sūryodaye mahārāja tato yuddham abhūn mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:071.023a: pratīyū rathino nāgān nāgāś ca rathino yayuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:071.024a: sārathiṃ ca rathī rājan kuñjarāṃś ca mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:071.025a: rathinaḥ pattibhiḥ sārdhaṃ sādinaś cāpi pattibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:071.026c: śuśubhe pāṇḍavī senā nakṣatrair iva śarvarī
GE07mbh_06_u:071.027c: tavāpi vibabhau senā grahair dyaur iva saṃvṛtā
GE07mbh_06_u:071.028a: bhīmasenas tu kaunteyo droṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā parākramī
GE07mbh_06_u:071.029a: droṇas tu samare kruddho bhīmaṃ navabhir āyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:071.029c: vivyādha samare rājan marmāṇy uddiśya vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:071.030c: sārathiṃ preṣayām āsa yamasya sadanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:071.031a: sa saṃgṛhya svayaṃ vāhān bhāradvājaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_06_u:071.032a: te vadhyamānā droṇena bhīṣmeṇa ca narottama
GE07mbh_06_u:071.034c: āsīd vyatikaro ghoras tava teṣāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:071.035a: tad adbhutam apaśyāma tāvakānāṃ paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:071.036c: yuyudhuḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva kauravāś ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:072.001a: evaṃ bahuguṇaṃ sainyam evaṃ bahuvidhaṃ param
GE07mbh_06_u:072.001c: vyūḍham evaṃ yathāśāstram amoghaṃ caiva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:072.002a: puṣṭam asmākam atyantam abhikāmaṃ ca naḥ sadā
GE07mbh_06_u:072.003a: nātivṛddham abālaṃ ca na kṛśaṃ na ca pīvaram
GE07mbh_06_u:072.004c: asiyuddhe niyuddhe ca gadāyuddhe ca kovidam
GE07mbh_06_u:072.006a: kampaneṣu ca cāpeṣu kaṇapeṣu ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:072.010a: na goṣṭhyā nopacāreṇa na ca bandhunimittataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:072.012a: sajayaiś ca narair mukhyair bahuśo mukhyakarmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:072.014c: apakṣaiḥ pakṣasaṃkāśai rathair nāgaiś ca saṃvṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:072.019c: yad ahanyata saṃgrāme diṣṭam etat purātanam
GE07mbh_06_u:072.020c: ṛṣayo vā mahābhāgāḥ purāṇā bhuvi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:072.021a: īdṛśo hi balaughas tu yuktaḥ śastrāstrasaṃpadā
GE07mbh_06_u:072.021c: vadhyate yatra saṃgrāme kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:072.022a: viparītam idaṃ sarvaṃ pratibhāti sma saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:072.022c: yatredṛśaṃ balaṃ ghoraṃ nātarad yudhi pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_06_u:072.023a: atha vā pāṇḍavārthāya devās tatra samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:072.023c: yudhyante māmakaṃ sainyaṃ yad avadhyanta saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:072.024a: ukto hi vidureṇeha hitaṃ pathyaṃ ca saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:072.024c: na ca gṛhṇāti tan mandaḥ putro duryodhano mama
GE07mbh_06_u:072.025a: tasya manye matiḥ pūrvaṃ sarvajñasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:072.025c: āsīd yathāgataṃ tāta yena dṛṣṭam idaṃ purā
GE07mbh_06_u:072.026a: atha vā bhāvyam evaṃ hi saṃjayaitena sarvathā
GE07mbh_06_u:072.026c: purā dhātrā yathā sṛṣṭaṃ tat tathā na tad anyathā
GE07mbh_06_u:073.001a: ātmadoṣāt tvayā rājan prāptaṃ vyasanam īdṛśam
GE07mbh_06_u:073.001c: na hi duryodhanas tāni paśyate bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:073.002a: tava doṣāt purā vṛttaṃ dyūtam etad viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:073.002c: tava doṣeṇa yuddhaṃ ca pravṛttaṃ saha pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.002e: tvam evādya phalaṃ bhuṅkṣva kṛtvā kilbiṣam ātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:073.003c: iha vā pretya vā rājaṃs tvayā prāptaṃ yathātatham
GE07mbh_06_u:073.004a: tasmād rājan sthiro bhūtvā prāpyedaṃ vyasanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:073.004c: śṛṇu yuddhaṃ yathāvṛttaṃ śaṃsato mama māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:073.005a: bhīmasenas tu niśitair bāṇair bhittvā mahācamūm
GE07mbh_06_u:073.007a: cārucitraṃ suvarmāṇaṃ duṣkarṇaṃ karṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:073.007c: etān anyāṃś ca subahūn samīpasthān mahārathān
GE07mbh_06_u:073.009b-0294_01: athālokya praviṣṭaṃ tam ūcus te sarva eva tu
GE07mbh_06_u:073.010a: sa taiḥ parivṛtaḥ pārtho bhrātṛbhiḥ kṛtaniścayaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.011a: saṃprāpya madhyaṃ vyūhasya na bhīḥ pāṇḍavam āviśat
GE07mbh_06_u:073.011c: yathā devāsure yuddhe mahendraḥ prāpya dānavān
GE07mbh_06_u:073.012c: chādayānaṃ śarair ghorais tam ekam anuvavrire
GE07mbh_06_u:073.014c: samastānāṃ vadhe rājan matiṃ cakre mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.015a: tato rathaṃ samutsṛjya gadām ādāya pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.015b-0295_01: uvāca sārathiṃ bhīmaḥ sthīyatām iti bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:073.015b-0295_03: ity uktvā bhīmasenas tu praviśya mahatīṃ camūm
GE07mbh_06_u:073.015d-0296_04: rathāś ca bhagnās tilaśaḥ sayodhāḥ śataśo raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:073.015d-0296_05: aśvāś ca sādinaś caiva pādātaiḥ saha bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:073.015d-0296_07: yad ekaḥ samare rājan bahubhiḥ samayodhayat
GE07mbh_06_u:073.016c: droṇam utsṛjya tarasā prayayau yatra saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.017d-0297_01: rathaṃ ca śūnyaṃ saṃprekṣya bhīmaṃ prati vicetanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.019c: mama prāṇaiḥ priyatamaḥ kva bhīma iti duḥkhitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.020c: saṃsthāpya mām iha balī pāṇḍaveyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_06_u:073.021c: mām uktvā puruṣavyāghra prītiyuktam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.022c: yāvad etān nihanmy āśu ya ime madvadhodyatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.022d-0298_01: abhyadhāvad gadāpāṇis tad balaṃ sa mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.024a: tasmiṃs tu tumule yuddhe vartamāne bhayānake
GE07mbh_06_u:073.024c: bhittvā rājan mahāvyūhaṃ praviveśa sakhā tava
GE07mbh_06_u:073.026a: na hi me vidyate sūta jīvite 'dya prayojanam
GE07mbh_06_u:073.026c: bhīmasenaṃ raṇe hitvā sneham utsṛjya pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.027a: yadi yāmi vinā bhīmaṃ kiṃ māṃ kṣatraṃ vadiṣyati
GE07mbh_06_u:073.028c: yaḥ sahāyān parityajya svastimān āvrajed gṛhān
GE07mbh_06_u:073.028d-0299_01: dhikkṛtasya ca kṣatreṇa nirarthaṃ jīvitaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_06_u:073.028d-0300_01: raurave narake majjed aplave dustare nṛbhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.029a: mama bhīmaḥ sakhā caiva saṃbandhī ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.029c: bhakto 'smān bhaktimāṃś cāhaṃ tam apy ariniṣūdanam
GE07mbh_06_u:073.030a: so 'haṃ tatra gamiṣyāmi yatra yāto vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.030c: nighnantaṃ mām arīn paśya dānavān iva vāsavam
GE07mbh_06_u:073.031a: evam uktvā tato vīro yayau madhyena bhāratīm
GE07mbh_06_u:073.032a: sa dadarśa tato bhīmaṃ dahantaṃ ripuvāhinīm
GE07mbh_06_u:073.032c: vātaṃ vṛkṣān iva balāt prabhañjantaṃ raṇe nṛpān
GE07mbh_06_u:073.033a: te hanyamānāḥ samare rathinaḥ sādinas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:073.033c: pādātā dantinaś caiva cakrur ārtasvaraṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:073.034a: hāhākāraś ca saṃjajñe tava sainyasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:073.035a: tataḥ kṛtāstrās te sarve parivārya vṛkodaram
GE07mbh_06_u:073.036a: abhidrutaṃ śastrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaṃ; samantataḥ pāṇḍavaṃ lokavīraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.036c: sainyena ghoreṇa susaṃgatena; dṛṣṭvā balī pārṣato bhīmasenam
GE07mbh_06_u:073.037c: āśvāsayan pārṣato bhīmasenaṃ; gadāhastaṃ kālam ivāntakāle
GE07mbh_06_u:073.038a: niḥśalyam enaṃ ca cakāra tūrṇam; āropayac cātmarathaṃ mahātmā
GE07mbh_06_u:073.038c: bhṛśaṃ pariṣvajya ca bhīmasenam; āśvāsayām āsa ca śatrumadhye
GE07mbh_06_u:073.039a: bhrātṝn athopetya tavāpi putras; tasmin vimarde mahati pravṛtte
GE07mbh_06_u:073.039c: ayaṃ durātmā drupadasya putraḥ; samāgato bhīmasenena sārdham
GE07mbh_06_u:073.039e: taṃ yāta sarve sahitā nihantuṃ; mā vo ripuḥ prārthayatām anīkam
GE07mbh_06_u:073.040a: śrutvā tu vākyaṃ tam amṛṣyamāṇā; jyeṣṭhājñayā coditā dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.040c: vadhāya niṣpetur udāyudhās te; yugakṣaye ketavo yadvad ugrāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.041a: pragṛhya citrāṇi dhanūṃṣi vīrā; jyānemighoṣaiḥ pravikampayantaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.041c: śarair avarṣan drupadasya putraṃ; yathāmbudā bhūdharaṃ vārijālaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.041e: nihatya tāṃś cāpi śaraiḥ sutīkṣṇair; na vivyathe samare citrayodhī
GE07mbh_06_u:073.042a: samabhyudīrṇāṃś ca tavātmajāṃs tathā; niśāmya vīrān abhitaḥ sthitān raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:073.042c: jighāṃsur ugraṃ drupadātmajo yuvā; pramohanāstraṃ yuyuje mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.042e: kruddho bhṛśaṃ tava putreṣu rājan; daityeṣu yadvat samare mahendraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.043c: pradudruvuḥ kuravaś caiva sarve; savājināgāḥ sarathāḥ samantāt
GE07mbh_06_u:073.043e: parītakālān iva naṣṭasaṃjñān; mohopetāṃs tava putrān niśamya
GE07mbh_06_u:073.043f-0307_01: etasminn eva kāle tu bhīmaḥ praharatāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.043f-0307_02: viśramya ca tadā rājan pītvāmṛtarasaṃ jalam
GE07mbh_06_u:073.043f-0307_03: punaḥ saṃnahya sahasā yodhayām āsa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:073.044a: etasminn eva kāle tu droṇaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.044c: drupadaṃ tribhir āsādya śarair vivyādha dāruṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.045a: so 'tividdhas tadā rājan raṇe droṇena pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.046a: jitvā tu drupadaṃ droṇaḥ śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau pratāpavān
GE07mbh_06_u:073.047a: atha śuśrāva tejasvī droṇaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.048e: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca bhīmaṃ ca vicarantau mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:073.049a: mohāviṣṭāṃś ca te putrān apaśyat sa mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.052c: pravṛttim adhigacchantu na hi śudhyati me manaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.052d-0308_03: gacchantu parayā śaktyā bhavanta iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.053c: bāḍham ity evam uktvā tu sarve puruṣamāninaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.053e: madhyaṃdinagate sūrye prayayuḥ sarva eva hi
GE07mbh_06_u:073.054a: kekayā draupadeyāś ca dhṛṣṭaketuś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:073.055a: te kṛtvā samare vyūhaṃ sūcīmukham ariṃdamāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.057a: na saṃdhārayituṃ śaktā tava senā janādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:073.059c: babhūvatur mudā yuktau nighnantau tava vāhinīm
GE07mbh_06_u:073.060a: dṛṣṭvā ca sahasāyāntaṃ pāñcālyo gurum ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.060c: nāśaṃsata vadhaṃ vīraḥ putrāṇāṃ tava pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.063a: anyāṃś ca śataśo bāṇān preṣayām āsa pārṣate
GE07mbh_06_u:073.065c: hayāṃś ca caturas tūrṇaṃ caturbhiḥ sāyakottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.066c: sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena preṣayām āsa mṛtyave
GE07mbh_06_u:073.066d-0310_01: dharmarājapuraṃ rājan preṣayām āsa vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.067a: hatāśvāt sa rathāt tūrṇam avaplutya mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.070a: vadhyamānaṃ tu tat sainyaṃ droṇena niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:073.071a: tathā dṛṣṭvā ca tat sainyaṃ jahṛṣe ca balaṃ tava
GE07mbh_06_u:073.071e: cukruśuḥ sarvato yodhāḥ sādhu sādhv iti bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:074.001a: tato duryodhano rājā mohāt pratyāgatas tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:074.002a: ekībhūtāḥ punaś caiva tava putrā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:074.002c: sametya samare bhīmaṃ yodhayām āsur udyatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:074.004c: citraṃ śarāsanaṃ saṃkhye śarair vivyādha te sutān
GE07mbh_06_u:074.007a: duryodhanaṃ tribhir bāṇair bāhvor urasi cārpayat
GE07mbh_06_u:074.007c: sa tathābhihato rājā nācalad girirāḍ iva
GE07mbh_06_u:074.008a: tau dṛṣṭvā samare kruddhau vinighnantau parasparam
GE07mbh_06_u:074.011a: bhṛśaṃ kruddhaś ca tejasvī nārācena samarpayat
GE07mbh_06_u:074.012a: tathetarāṃs tava sutāṃs tāḍayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:074.013a: tataḥ saṃsthāpya samare svāny anīkāni sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:074.015c: sarvān eva maheṣvāsān bhrājamānāñ śriyā vṛtān
GE07mbh_06_u:074.016c: tatyajuḥ samare bhīmaṃ tava putrā mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:074.017a: tān nāmṛṣyata kaunteyo jīvamānā gatā iti
GE07mbh_06_u:074.017c: anvīya ca punaḥ sarvāṃs tava putrān apīḍayat
GE07mbh_06_u:074.018c: pārṣatena ca saṃprekṣya tava sainye mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:074.019c: bhṛśam aśvaiḥ prajavitaiḥ prayayur yatra te rathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:074.020a: aparāhṇe tato rājan prāvartata mahān raṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:074.020c: tāvakānāṃ ca balināṃ pareṣāṃ caiva bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:074.022a: hatāśvaṃ ratham utsṛjya vikarṇas tu mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:074.023a: sthitāv ekarathe tau tu bhrātarau kuruvardhanau
GE07mbh_06_u:074.024a: durjayo 'tha vikarṇaś ca kārṣṇiṃ pañcabhir āyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:074.024c: vivyadhāte na cākampat kārṣṇir merur ivācalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:074.025a: duḥśāsanas tu samare kekayān pañca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:074.025c: yodhayām āsa rājendra tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_06_u:074.026c: ekaikas tribhir ānarchat putraṃ tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:074.027a: putro 'pi tava durdharṣo draupadyās tanayān raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:074.027c: sāyakair niśitai rājann ājaghāna pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_06_u:074.028a: taiś cāpi viddhaḥ śuśubhe rudhireṇa samukṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:074.029c: kālayām āsa balavān pālaḥ paśugaṇān iva
GE07mbh_06_u:074.031c: kurūṇāṃ cāpi sainyeṣu pāṇḍavānāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:074.034c: bhūr bhāti bharataśreṣṭha parvatair ācitā yathā
GE07mbh_06_u:074.035a: tatrādbhutam apaśyāma tava teṣāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:074.035c: na tatrāsīt pumān kaś cid yo yoddhuṃ nābhikāṅkṣati
GE07mbh_06_u:074.036a: evaṃ yuyudhire vīrāḥ prārthayānā mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:074.036c: tāvakāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇā jayaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:075.003c: adya tvāṃ nihaniṣyāmi yadi notsṛjase raṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:075.004a: adya kuntyāḥ parikleśaṃ vanavāsaṃ ca kṛtsnaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:075.004c: draupadyāś ca parikleśaṃ praṇotsyāmi hate tvayi
GE07mbh_06_u:075.005a: yat tvaṃ durodaro bhūtvā pāṇḍavān avamanyase
GE07mbh_06_u:075.005c: tasya pāpasya gāndhāre paśya vyasanam āgatam
GE07mbh_06_u:075.006a: karṇasya matam ājñāya saubalasya ca yat purā
GE07mbh_06_u:075.006c: acintya pāṇḍavān kāmād yatheṣṭaṃ kṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_06_u:075.007a: yācamānaṃ ca yan mohād dāśārham avamanyase
GE07mbh_06_u:075.007c: ulūkasya samādeśaṃ yad dadāsi ca hṛṣṭavat
GE07mbh_06_u:075.008c: samīkariṣye tat pāpaṃ yat purā kṛtavān asi
GE07mbh_06_u:075.009a: evam uktvā dhanur ghoraṃ vikṛṣyodbhrāmya cāsakṛt
GE07mbh_06_u:075.011a: tato 'sya kārmukaṃ dvābhyāṃ sūtaṃ dvābhyāṃ ca vivyadhe
GE07mbh_06_u:075.012c: chatraṃ ciccheda samare rājñas tasya rathottamāt
GE07mbh_06_u:075.013a: tribhiś ca tasya ciccheda jvalantaṃ dhvajam uttamam
GE07mbh_06_u:075.013b-0312_01: tribhir anyair maheṣvāsaś cicchedāsya dhvajaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:075.013c: chittvā taṃ ca nanādoccais tava putrasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:075.014a: rathāc ca sa dhvajaḥ śrīmān nānāratnavibhūṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:075.014c: papāta sahasā bhūmiṃ vidyuj jaladharād iva
GE07mbh_06_u:075.016a: athainaṃ daśabhir bāṇais tottrair iva mahāgajam
GE07mbh_06_u:075.016c: ājaghāna raṇe bhīmaḥ smayann iva mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:075.016d-0313_01: sa tathābhihato rājā smayann iva mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:075.017a: tatas tu rājā sindhūnāṃ rathaśreṣṭho jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:075.018a: kṛpaś ca rathināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ kauravyam amitaujasam
GE07mbh_06_u:075.021a: dhṛṣṭaketus tato rājann abhimanyuś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:075.021c: kekayā draupadeyāś ca tava putrān ayodhayan
GE07mbh_06_u:075.025c: vavarṣur mārgaṇais tīkṣṇair giriṃ merum ivāmbudāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:075.027a: vikarṇasya tato bhallān preṣayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:075.027d-0314_01: sa tair vikarṇasya rathāt pātayām āsa vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:075.027e: dhvajaṃ sūtaṃ hayāṃś cāsya chittvā nṛtyann ivāhave
GE07mbh_06_u:075.028a: punaś cānyāñ śarān pītān akuṇṭhāgrāñ śilāśitān
GE07mbh_06_u:075.029c: bhittvā dehaṃ gatā bhūmiṃ jvalanta iva pannagāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:075.033c: dhvajam ekena ciccheda sārathiṃ cāsya saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:075.035a: sa hatāśve rathe tiṣṭhañ śrutakarmā mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:075.035c: śaktiṃ cikṣepa saṃkruddho maholkāṃ jvalitām iva
GE07mbh_06_u:075.036a: sā durmukhasya vipulaṃ varma bhittvā yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:075.036d-0315_01: durmukho vihvalas tatra niṣasāda rathe vibho
GE07mbh_06_u:075.036d-0315_02: visaṃjñaṃ prekṣya te sarve bhrātaraḥ paryavārayan
GE07mbh_06_u:075.037a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā virathaṃ tatra sutasomo mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:075.038a: śrutakīrtis tathā vīro jayatsenaṃ sutaṃ tava
GE07mbh_06_u:075.039c: ciccheda samare rājañ jayatsenaḥ sutas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:075.041a: śatānīkas tu samare dṛḍhaṃ visphārya kārmukam
GE07mbh_06_u:075.043a: tathā tasmin vartamāne duṣkarṇo bhrātur antike
GE07mbh_06_u:075.045a: tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cāmantrya duṣkarṇaṃ bhrātur agrataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:075.045c: mumoca niśitān bāṇāñ jvalitān pannagān iva
GE07mbh_06_u:075.046a: tato 'sya dhanur ekena dvābhyāṃ sūtaṃ ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:075.046c: ciccheda samare tūrṇaṃ taṃ ca vivyādha saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:075.047c: jaghāna niśitais tūrṇaṃ sarvān dvādaśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:075.048c: duṣkarṇaṃ samare kruddho vivyādha hṛdaye bhṛśam
GE07mbh_06_u:075.048d-0318_01: sa papāta tato bhūmau vajrarugṇa iva drumaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:075.048d-0319_01: sa vihvalo rathopasthe niṣasāda sutas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:075.049a: duṣkarṇaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā pañca rājan mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:075.051a: tān abhyāpatataḥ prekṣya tava putrā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:075.052a: durmukho durjayaś caiva tathā durmarṣaṇo yuvā
GE07mbh_06_u:075.054c: viviśus te paraṃ sainyaṃ siṃhā iva vanād vanam
GE07mbh_06_u:075.057c: nāśayām āsa senāṃ vai bhīṣmas teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_06_u:075.057e: pāñcālānāṃ ca sainyāni śarair ninye yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_06_u:075.059c: mūrdhni caitāv upāghrāya saṃhṛṣṭaḥ śibiraṃ yayau
GE07mbh_06_u:075.059d-0321_02: hatvā vidrāvya ca śaraiḥ śibirāyaiva jagmatuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:076.004a: sainyāni raudrāṇi bhayānakāni; vyūḍhāni samyag bahuladhvajāni
GE07mbh_06_u:076.004c: vidārya hatvā ca nipīḍya śūrās; te pāṇḍavānāṃ tvaritā rathaughāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:076.005a: saṃmohya sarvān yudhi kīrtimanto; vyūhaṃ ca taṃ makaraṃ vajrakalpam
GE07mbh_06_u:076.005c: praviśya bhīmena nibarhito 'smi; ghoraiḥ śarair mṛtyudaṇḍaprakāśaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:076.006a: kruddhaṃ tam udvīkṣya bhayena rājan; saṃmūrchito nālabhaṃ śāntim adya
GE07mbh_06_u:076.006c: icche prasādāt tava satyasaṃdha; prāptuṃ jayaṃ pāṇḍaveyāṃś ca hantum
GE07mbh_06_u:076.007a: tenaivam uktaḥ prahasan mahātmā; duryodhanaṃ jātamanyuṃ viditvā
GE07mbh_06_u:076.007c: taṃ pratyuvācāvimanā manasvī; gaṅgāsutaḥ śastrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:076.008a: pareṇa yatnena vigāhya senāṃ; sarvātmanāhaṃ tava rājaputra
GE07mbh_06_u:076.008c: icchāmi dātuṃ vijayaṃ sukhaṃ ca; na cātmānaṃ chādaye 'haṃ tvadarthe
GE07mbh_06_u:076.009a: ete tu raudrā bahavo mahārathā; yaśasvinaḥ śūratamāḥ kṛtāstrāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:076.009c: ye pāṇḍavānāṃ samare sahāyā; jitaklamāḥ krodhaviṣaṃ vamanti
GE07mbh_06_u:076.010a: te neha śakyāḥ sahasā vijetuṃ; vīryonnaddhāḥ kṛtavairās tvayā ca
GE07mbh_06_u:076.010c: ahaṃ hy etān pratiyotsyāmi rājan; sarvātmanā jīvitaṃ tyajya vīra
GE07mbh_06_u:076.011a: raṇe tavārthāya mahānubhāva; na jīvitaṃ rakṣyatamaṃ mamādya
GE07mbh_06_u:076.011c: sarvāṃs tavārthāya sadevadaityāṃl; lokān daheyaṃ kim u śatrūṃs taveha
GE07mbh_06_u:076.012a: tat pāṇḍavān yodhayiṣyāmi rājan; priyaṃ ca te sarvam ahaṃ kariṣye
GE07mbh_06_u:076.012c: śrutvaiva caitat paramapratīto; duryodhanaḥ prītamanā babhūva
GE07mbh_06_u:076.013a: sarvāṇi sainyāni tataḥ prahṛṣṭo; nirgacchatety āha nṛpāṃś ca sarvān
GE07mbh_06_u:076.014a: praharṣayuktāni tu tāni rājan; mahānti nānāvidhaśastravanti
GE07mbh_06_u:076.014c: sthitāni nāgāśvapadātimanti; virejur ājau tava rājan balāni
GE07mbh_06_u:076.015a: vṛndaiḥ sthitāś cāpi susaṃprayuktāś; cakāśire dantigaṇāḥ samantāt
GE07mbh_06_u:076.015c: śastrāstravidbhir naradeva yodhair; adhiṣṭhitāḥ sainyagaṇās tvadīyāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:076.016a: rathaiś ca pādātagajāśvasaṃghaiḥ; prayādbhir ājau vidhivat praṇunnaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:076.016c: samuddhataṃ vai taruṇārkavarṇaṃ; rajo babhau chādayat sūryaraśmīn
GE07mbh_06_u:076.017a: rejuḥ patākā rathadantisaṃsthā; vāteritā bhrāmyamāṇāḥ samantāt
GE07mbh_06_u:076.017c: nānāraṅgāḥ samare tatra rājan; meghair yuktā vidyutaḥ khe yathaiva
GE07mbh_06_u:076.018a: dhanūṃṣi visphārayatāṃ nṛpāṇāṃ; babhūva śabdas tumulo 'tighoraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:076.019a: tad ugranādaṃ bahurūpavarṇaṃ; tavātmajānāṃ samudīrṇam evam
GE07mbh_06_u:077.001a: athātmajaṃ tava punar gāṅgeyo dhyānam āsthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:077.002a: ahaṃ droṇaś ca śalyaś ca kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:077.003c: trigartarājaś ca balī māgadhaś ca sudurjayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:077.004b-0322_01: kṛpaś ca saha sodaryais tava rājan padānugaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:077.005a: deśajāś ca hayā rājan svārūḍhā hayasādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:077.007a: ete cānye ca bahavas tvadarthe tyaktajīvitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:077.007c: devān api raṇe jetuṃ samarthā iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:077.008a: avaśyaṃ tu mayā rājaṃs tava vācyaṃ hitaṃ sadā
GE07mbh_06_u:077.008c: aśakyāḥ pāṇḍavā jetuṃ devair api savāsavaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:077.009a: sarvathāhaṃ tu rājendra kariṣye vacanaṃ tava
GE07mbh_06_u:077.009c: pāṇḍavān vā raṇe jeṣye māṃ vā jeṣyanti pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:077.010a: evam uktvā dadau cāsmai viśalyakaraṇīṃ śubhām
GE07mbh_06_u:077.014a: nāge nāge rathāḥ sapta sapta cāśvā rathe rathe
GE07mbh_06_u:077.014c: anv aśvaṃ daśa dhānuṣkā dhānuṣke sapta carmiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:077.015c: sthitaṃ raṇāya mahate bhīṣmeṇa yudhi pālitam
GE07mbh_06_u:077.016a: daśāśvānāṃ sahasrāṇi dantināṃ ca tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:077.016c: rathānām ayutaṃ cāpi putrāś ca tava daṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:077.017a: rakṣyamāṇaś ca taiḥ śūrair gopyamānāś ca tena te
GE07mbh_06_u:077.018a: duryodhanas tu samare daṃśito ratham āsthitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:077.018c: vyabhrājata śriyā juṣṭo yathā śakras triviṣṭape
GE07mbh_06_u:077.019a: tataḥ śabdo mahān āsīt putrāṇāṃ tava bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:077.019c: rathaghoṣaś ca tumulo vāditrāṇāṃ ca nisvanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:077.021c: svayaṃ yudhiṣṭhiro rājā vyūhaṃ vajram athākarot
GE07mbh_06_u:077.024a: bhāradvājo yayau matsyaṃ drauṇiś cāpi śikhaṇḍinam
GE07mbh_06_u:077.025a: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca rājan madreśam īyatuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:077.026a: sarve nṛpās tu samare dhanaṃjayam ayodhayan
GE07mbh_06_u:077.027a: citrasenaṃ vikarṇaṃ ca tathā durmarṣaṇaṃ vibho
GE07mbh_06_u:077.027c: ārjuniḥ samare rājaṃs tava putrān ayodhayat
GE07mbh_06_u:077.028c: abhidudrāva vegena matto mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_06_u:077.031c: śeṣāḥ pratiyayur yattā bhīmam eva mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:077.033a: arjuno 'tha bhṛśaṃ kruddho vārṣṇeyam idam abravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:077.034a: yuddhābhikāmāñ śūrāṃś ca paśya mādhava daṃśitān
GE07mbh_06_u:077.035c: ya ime māṃ yaduśreṣṭha yoddhukāmā raṇājire
GE07mbh_06_u:077.036a: evam uktvā tu kaunteyo dhanurjyām avamṛjya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:077.037c: taḍāgam iva dhārābhir yathā prāvṛṣi toyadā
GE07mbh_06_u:077.038a: hāhākāro mahān āsīt tava sainye viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:077.038c: chādyamānau bhṛśaṃ kṛṣṇau śarair dṛṣṭvā mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:077.039a: devā devarṣayaś caiva gandharvāś ca mahoragāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:077.039c: vismayaṃ paramaṃ jagmur dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇau tathāgatau
GE07mbh_06_u:077.040a: tataḥ kruddho 'rjuno rājann aindram astram udīrayat
GE07mbh_06_u:077.041a: śastravṛṣṭiṃ parair muktāṃ śaraughair yad avārayat
GE07mbh_06_u:077.041c: na ca tatrāpy anirbhinnaḥ kaś cid āsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:077.042c: dvābhyāṃ tribhiḥ śaraiś cānyān pārtho vivyādha māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:077.043a: te hanyamānāḥ pārthena bhīṣmaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ yayuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:077.044a: āpatadbhis tu tais tatra prabhagnaṃ tāvakaṃ balam
GE07mbh_06_u:078.001a: tathā pravṛtte saṃgrāme nivṛtte ca suśarmaṇi
GE07mbh_06_u:078.002c: pratyudyāte ca gāṅgeye tvaritaṃ vijayaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:078.003a: dṛṣṭvā duryodhano rājan raṇe pārthasya vikramam
GE07mbh_06_u:078.003c: tvaramāṇaḥ samabhyetya sarvāṃs tān abravīn nṛpān
GE07mbh_06_u:078.004a: teṣāṃ ca pramukhe śūraṃ suśarmāṇaṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_06_u:078.004c: madhye sarvasya sainyasya bhṛśaṃ saṃharṣayan vacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.007a: bāḍham ity evam uktvā tu tāny anīkāni sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.010c: abhavat tumulo nādo bhayād dṛṣṭvā kirīṭinam
GE07mbh_06_u:078.012c: na śekuḥ pāṇḍavā draṣṭuṃ śvetagraham ivoditam
GE07mbh_06_u:078.013c: bhrātṛbhis tava putraiś ca tathānyaiś ca mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.014a: bhāradvājas tu samare matsyaṃ vivyādha patriṇā
GE07mbh_06_u:078.014c: dhvajaṃ cāsya śareṇājau dhanuś caikena cicchide
GE07mbh_06_u:078.015a: tad apāsya dhanuś chinnaṃ virāṭo vāhinīpatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.015c: anyad ādatta vegena dhanur bhārasahaṃ dṛḍham
GE07mbh_06_u:078.016a: droṇaṃ tribhiḥ pravivyādha caturbhiś cāsya vājinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.016c: dhvajam ekena vivyādha sārathiṃ cāsya pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.018c: āruroha rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ śaṅkhasya rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.019a: tatas tu tau pitāputrau bhāradvājaṃ rathe sthitau
GE07mbh_06_u:078.020c: cikṣepa samare tūrṇaṃ śaṅkhaṃ prati janeśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:078.021a: sa tasya hṛdayaṃ bhittvā pītvā śoṇitam āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:078.022c: dhanus tyaktvā śarāṃś caiva pitur eva samīpataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.023a: hataṃ svam ātmajaṃ dṛṣṭvā virāṭaḥ prādravad bhayāt
GE07mbh_06_u:078.025a: śikhaṇḍy api mahārāja drauṇim āsādya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:078.025c: ājaghāna bhruvor madhye nārācais tribhir āśugaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.026a: sa babhau naraśārdūlo lalāṭe saṃsthitais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.027c: sūtaṃ dhvajam atho rājaṃs turagān āyudhaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:078.027e: śarair bahubhir uddiśya pātayām āsa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:078.028a: sa hatāśvād avaplutya rathād vai rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.028c: khaḍgam ādāya niśitaṃ vimalaṃ ca śarāvaram
GE07mbh_06_u:078.029c: nāntaraṃ dadṛśe drauṇis tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_06_u:078.032c: carmācchinad asiṃ cāsya khaṇḍayām āsa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:078.032e: śitaiḥ subahuśo rājaṃs taṃ ca vivyādha patribhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.033a: śikhaṇḍī tu tataḥ khaḍgaṃ khaṇḍitaṃ tena sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.033c: āvidhya vyasṛjat tūrṇaṃ jvalantam iva pannagam
GE07mbh_06_u:078.034e: śikhaṇḍinaṃ ca vivyādha śarair bahubhir āyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.035a: śikhaṇḍī tu bhṛśaṃ rājaṃs tāḍyamānaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.036a: sātyakis tu tataḥ kruddho rākṣasaṃ krūram āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:078.036c: alambusaṃ śarair ghorair vivyādha balinaṃ balī
GE07mbh_06_u:078.037a: rākṣasendras tatas tasya dhanuś ciccheda bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:078.037c: ardhacandreṇa samare taṃ ca vivyādha sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.037e: māyāṃ ca rākṣasīṃ kṛtvā śaravarṣair avākirat
GE07mbh_06_u:078.038c: nāsaṃbhramad yat samare vadhyamānaḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.039a: aindram astraṃ ca vārṣṇeyo yojayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:078.040a: tad astraṃ bhasmasāt kṛtvā māyāṃ tāṃ rākṣasīṃ tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:078.041a: tat tathā pīḍitaṃ tena mādhavena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:078.041c: pradudrāva bhayād rakṣo hitvā sātyakim āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:078.042a: tam ajeyaṃ rākṣasendraṃ saṃkhye maghavatā api
GE07mbh_06_u:078.042c: śaineyaḥ prāṇadaj jitvā yodhānāṃ tava paśyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:078.044a: etasminn eva kāle tu drupadasyātmajo balī
GE07mbh_06_u:078.045c: vivyathe na ca rājendra tava putro janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.046a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca samare tūrṇaṃ vivyādha sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.046c: ṣaṣṭyā ca triṃśatā caiva tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_06_u:078.047a: tasya senāpatiḥ kruddho dhanuś ciccheda māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:078.047c: hayāṃś ca caturaḥ śīghraṃ nijaghāna mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.047e: śaraiś cainaṃ suniśitaiḥ kṣipraṃ vivyādha saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.048a: sa hatāśvān mahābāhur avaplutya rathād balī
GE07mbh_06_u:078.048c: padātir asim udyamya prādravat pārṣataṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:078.051a: kṛtavarmā raṇe bhīmaṃ śarair ārchan mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:078.051c: pracchādayām āsa ca taṃ mahāmegho raviṃ yathā
GE07mbh_06_u:078.053c: nākampata mahārāja bhīmaṃ cārchac chitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:078.054c: sārathiṃ pātayām āsa dhvajaṃ ca supariṣkṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:078.056a: hatāśvāt tu rathāt tūrṇaṃ vṛṣakasya rathaṃ yayau
GE07mbh_06_u:078.056c: syālasya te mahārāja tava putrasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:079.001c: pāṇḍūnāṃ māmakaiḥ sārdham aśrauṣaṃ tava jalpataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:079.002a: na caiva māmakaṃ kaṃ cid dhṛṣṭaṃ śaṃsasi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:079.002c: nityaṃ pāṇḍusutān hṛṣṭān abhagnāṃś caiva śaṃsasi
GE07mbh_06_u:079.003c: vadase saṃyuge sūta diṣṭam etad asaṃśayam
GE07mbh_06_u:079.006a: tathā tat pauruṣaṃ rājaṃs tāvakānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_06_u:079.006c: prāpya pāṇḍusutān vīrān vyarthaṃ bhavati saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:079.007c: na doṣeṇa kuruśreṣṭha kauravān gantum arhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:079.009c: na hi rakṣanti rājānaḥ sarvārthān nāpi jīvitam
GE07mbh_06_u:079.014a: yudhyatāṃ hi tathā rājan viśeṣo na vyadṛśyata
GE07mbh_06_u:079.015a: irāvāṃs tu tato rājann anuvindasya sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:079.016a: bhallābhyāṃ ca sutīkṣṇābhyāṃ dhanuḥ ketuṃ ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:079.016c: ciccheda samare rājaṃs tad adbhutam ivābhavat
GE07mbh_06_u:079.018a: tāv ekasthau raṇe vīrāv āvantyau rathināṃ varau
GE07mbh_06_u:079.020a: irāvāṃs tu tataḥ kruddho bhrātarau tau mahārathau
GE07mbh_06_u:079.022c: pauruṣaṃ khyāpayaṃs tūrṇaṃ vyadhamat tava vāhinīm
GE07mbh_06_u:079.023c: vegān bahuvidhāṃś cakre viṣaṃ pītveva mānavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:079.026a: tatra devāḥ sagandharvā ṛṣayaś ca samāgatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:079.027a: yathā surapatiḥ śakras trāsayām āsa dānavān
GE07mbh_06_u:079.027c: tathaiva samare rājaṃs trāsayām āsa pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_06_u:079.030a: nivṛtteṣu tu pāṇḍūnāṃ punaḥ sainyeṣu bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:079.030c: āsīn niṣṭānako ghoras tava sainyeṣu saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:079.031c: śaraiḥ pracchādayām āsa meruṃ girim ivāmbudaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:079.032a: nihatya tāñ śarān rājā rākṣasasya dhanuścyutān
GE07mbh_06_u:079.034a: tasya prāgjyotiṣaḥ kruddhas tomarān sa caturdaśa
GE07mbh_06_u:079.034c: preṣayām āsa samare tāṃś ca ciccheda rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:079.035a: sa tāṃś chittvā mahābāhus tomarān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:079.036a: tataḥ prāgjyotiṣo rājan prahasann iva bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:079.036c: tasyāśvāṃś caturaḥ saṃkhye pātayām āsa sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:079.037a: sa hatāśve rathe tiṣṭhan rākṣasendraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_06_u:079.038c: tridhā ciccheda nṛpatiḥ sā vyakīryata medinīm
GE07mbh_06_u:079.039a: śaktiṃ vinihatāṃ dṛṣṭvā haiḍimbaḥ prādravad bhayāt
GE07mbh_06_u:079.040a: taṃ vijitya raṇe śūraṃ vikrāntaṃ khyātapauruṣam
GE07mbh_06_u:079.040c: ajeyaṃ samare rājan yamena varuṇena ca
GE07mbh_06_u:079.041c: yathā vanagajo rājan mṛdnaṃś carati padminīm
GE07mbh_06_u:079.042a: madreśvaras tu samare yamābhyāṃ saha saṃgataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:079.043a: sahadevas tu samare mātulaṃ vīkṣya saṃgatam
GE07mbh_06_u:079.044c: tayoś cāpy abhavat prītir atulā mātṛkāraṇāt
GE07mbh_06_u:079.045b-0325_01: dhvajaṃ ciccheda bāṇena dhanuś caikena māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:079.045b-0325_03: nijaghāna raṇe taṃ tu sūtaṃ cāsya nyapātayat
GE07mbh_06_u:079.045c: aśvān vai caturo rājaṃś caturbhiḥ sāyakottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:079.045e: preṣayām āsa samare yamasya sadanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:079.046a: hatāśvāt tu rathāt tūrṇam avaplutya mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:079.046c: āruroha tato yānaṃ bhrātur eva yaśasvinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:079.047a: ekasthau tu raṇe śūrau dṛḍhe vikṣipya kārmuke
GE07mbh_06_u:079.048e: prahasann iva tāṃ cāpi śaravṛṣṭiṃ jaghāna ha
GE07mbh_06_u:079.048f-0326_01: pṛṣatkānāṃ sahasrāṇi prahasann iva tāv api
GE07mbh_06_u:079.048f-0326_02: sṛjan rurodha samare megho vṛṣṭyā yathācalam
GE07mbh_06_u:079.049a: sahadevas tataḥ kruddhaḥ śaram udyamya vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:079.050a: sa śaraḥ preṣitas tena garutmān iva vegavān
GE07mbh_06_u:079.051c: niṣasāda mahārāja kaśmalaṃ ca jagāma ha
GE07mbh_06_u:079.052a: taṃ visaṃjñaṃ nipatitaṃ sūtaḥ saṃprekṣya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:079.053c: sarve vimanaso bhūtvā nedam astīty acintayan
GE07mbh_06_u:079.055a: abhidudruvatur hṛṣṭau tava sainyaṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:080.001a: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā madhyaṃ prāpte divākare
GE07mbh_06_u:080.003a: sa saṃvārya raṇe rājā preṣitān dharmasūnunā
GE07mbh_06_u:080.004a: te tasya kavacaṃ bhittvā papuḥ śoṇitam āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:080.004c: asūn iva vicinvanto dehe tasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:080.005a: pāṇḍavas tu bhṛśaṃ viddhas tena rājñā mahātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:080.006c: rathaśreṣṭho rathāt tūrṇaṃ bhūmau pārtho nyapātayat
GE07mbh_06_u:080.007a: ketuṃ nipatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā śrutāyuḥ sa tu pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:080.007c: pāṇḍavaṃ viśikhais tīkṣṇai rājan vivyādha saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:080.008c: yathā yugānte bhūtāni dhakṣyann iva hutāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:080.009c: pravivyathur mahārāja vyākulaṃ cāpy abhūj jagat
GE07mbh_06_u:080.010a: sarveṣāṃ caiva bhūtānām idam āsīn manogatam
GE07mbh_06_u:080.010c: trīṃl lokān adya saṃkruddho nṛpo 'yaṃ dhakṣyatīti vai
GE07mbh_06_u:080.011a: ṛṣayaś caiva devāś ca cakruḥ svastyayanaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:080.011c: lokānāṃ nṛpa śāntyarthaṃ krodhite pāṇḍave tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:080.013a: tataḥ sarvāṇi sainyāni tāvakāni viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:080.013c: nirāśāny abhavaṃs tatra jīvitaṃ prati bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:080.014a: sa tu dhairyeṇa taṃ kopaṃ saṃnivārya mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:080.016a: satvaraṃ caraṇe rājaṃs tasya vāhān mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:080.016c: nijaghāna śaraiḥ kṣipraṃ sūtaṃ ca sumahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:080.017a: hatāśvaṃ tu rathaṃ tyaktvā dṛṣṭvā rājñas tu pauruṣam
GE07mbh_06_u:080.019c: vyāttānano yathā kālas tava sainyaṃ jaghāna ha
GE07mbh_06_u:080.020a: cekitānas tu vārṣṇeyo gautamaṃ rathināṃ varam
GE07mbh_06_u:080.021a: saṃnivārya śarāṃs tāṃs tu kṛpaḥ śāradvato yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:080.021c: cekitānaṃ raṇe yattaṃ rājan vivyādha patribhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:080.022e: hayāṃś cāsyāvadhīd rājann ubhau ca pārṣṇisārathī
GE07mbh_06_u:080.023a: so 'vaplutya rathāt tūrṇaṃ gadāṃ jagrāha sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:080.023c: sa tayā vīraghātinyā gadayā gadināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:080.023e: gautamasya hayān hatvā sārathiṃ ca nyapātayat
GE07mbh_06_u:080.024a: bhūmiṣṭho gautamas tasya śarāṃś cikṣepa ṣoḍaśa
GE07mbh_06_u:080.024c: te śarāḥ sātvataṃ bhittvā prāviśanta dharātalam
GE07mbh_06_u:080.025a: cekitānas tataḥ kruddhaḥ punaś cikṣepa tāṃ gadām
GE07mbh_06_u:080.027a: cekitānas tataḥ khaḍgaṃ kośād uddhṛtya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:080.032a: tathaiva śakuniḥ śūraḥ syālas tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:080.032c: āropayad rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ gautamaṃ rathināṃ varam
GE07mbh_06_u:080.033c: navatyā sāyakaiḥ kṣipraṃ rājan vivyādha vakṣasi
GE07mbh_06_u:080.034a: saumadattir uraḥsthais tair bhṛśaṃ bāṇair aśobhata
GE07mbh_06_u:080.037a: sa ca taṃ ratham utsṛjya dhṛṣṭaketur mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:080.038a: citraseno vikarṇaś ca rājan durmarṣaṇas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:080.039a: abhimanyos tatas tais tu ghoraṃ yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_06_u:080.040a: virathāṃs tava putrāṃs tu kṛtvā rājan mahāhave
GE07mbh_06_u:080.040c: na jaghāna naravyāghraḥ smaran bhīmavacas tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:080.041c: saṃvṛtaṃ samare bhīṣmaṃ devair api durāsadam
GE07mbh_06_u:080.042a: prayāntaṃ śīghram udvīkṣya paritrātuṃ sutāṃs tava
GE07mbh_06_u:080.043c: ete hi bahavaḥ śūrāḥ kṛtāstrā yuddhadurmadāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:080.043e: yathā na hanyur naḥ senāṃ tathā mādhava codaya
GE07mbh_06_u:080.044c: rathaṃ śvetahayair yuktaṃ preṣayām āsa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:080.045a: niṣṭānako mahān āsīt tava sainyasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:080.045c: yad arjuno raṇe kruddhaḥ saṃyātas tāvakān prati
GE07mbh_06_u:080.046a: samāsādya tu kaunteyo rājñas tān bhīṣmarakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:080.046c: suśarmāṇam atho rājann idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:080.047a: jānāmi tvāṃ yudhi śreṣṭham atyantaṃ pūrvavairiṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:080.047b-0328_01: tatas tvaṃ samare yoddhuṃ rājabhir bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:080.048e: na cainam abravīt kiṃ cic chubhaṃ vā yadi vāśubham
GE07mbh_06_u:080.049a: abhi gatvārjunaṃ vīraṃ rājabhir bahubhir vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:080.049c: purastāt pṛṣṭhataś caiva pārśvataś caiva sarvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:080.050c: śaraiḥ saṃchādayām āsa meghair iva divākaram
GE07mbh_06_u:080.051c: tāvakānāṃ ca samare pāṇḍavānāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:081.001a: sa tudyamānas tu śarair dhanaṃjayaḥ; padā hato nāga iva śvasan balī
GE07mbh_06_u:081.001c: bāṇena bāṇena mahārathānāṃ; ciccheda cāpāni raṇe prasahya
GE07mbh_06_u:081.002a: saṃchidya cāpāni ca tāni rājñāṃ; teṣāṃ raṇe vīryavatāṃ kṣaṇena
GE07mbh_06_u:081.002c: vivyādha bāṇair yugapan mahātmā; niḥśeṣatāṃ teṣv atha manyamānaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.003a: nipetur ājau rudhirapradigdhās; te tāḍitāḥ śakrasutena rājan
GE07mbh_06_u:081.004a: mahīṃ gatāḥ pārthabalābhibhūtā; vicitrarūpā yugapad vineśuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.004c: dṛṣṭvā hatāṃs tān yudhi rājaputrāṃs; trigartarājaḥ prayayau kṣaṇena
GE07mbh_06_u:081.005a: teṣāṃ rathānām atha pṛṣṭhagopā; dvātriṃśad anye 'byapatanta pārtham
GE07mbh_06_u:081.005c: tathaiva te saṃparivārya pārthaṃ; vikṛṣya cāpāni mahāravāṇi
GE07mbh_06_u:081.005e: avīvṛṣan bāṇamahaughavṛṣṭyā; yathā giriṃ toyadharā jalaughaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.006a: saṃpīḍyamānas tu śaraughavṛṣṭyā; dhanaṃjayas tān yudhi jātaroṣaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.006c: ṣaṣṭyā śaraiḥ saṃyati tailadhautair; jaghāna tān apy atha pṛṣṭhagopān
GE07mbh_06_u:081.007a: ṣaṣṭiṃ rathāṃs tān avajitya saṃkhye; dhanaṃjayaḥ prītamanā yaśasvī
GE07mbh_06_u:081.007c: athātvarad bhīṣmavadhāya jiṣṇur; balāni rājñāṃ samare nihatya
GE07mbh_06_u:081.008a: trigartarājo nihatān samīkṣya; mahārathāṃs tān atha bandhuvargān
GE07mbh_06_u:081.008c: raṇe puraskṛtya narādhipāṃs tāñ; jagāma pārthaṃ tvarito vadhāya
GE07mbh_06_u:081.009a: abhidrutaṃ cāstrabhṛtāṃ variṣṭhaṃ; dhanaṃjayaṃ vīkṣya śikhaṇḍimukhyāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.009c: abhyudyayus te śitaśastrahastā; rirakṣiṣanto ratham arjunasya
GE07mbh_06_u:081.010a: pārtho 'pi tān āpatataḥ samīkṣya; trigartarājñā sahitān nṛvīrān
GE07mbh_06_u:081.010c: vidhvaṃsayitvā samare dhanuṣmān; gāṇḍīvamuktair niśitaiḥ pṛṣatkaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.010e: bhīṣmaṃ yiyāsur yudhi saṃdadarśa; duryodhanaṃ saindhavādīṃś ca rājñaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.011a: āvārayiṣṇūn abhisaṃprayāya; muhūrtam āyodhya balena vīraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.011c: utsṛjya rājānam anantavīryo; jayadrathādīṃś ca nṛpān mahaujāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.011e: yayau tato bhīmabalo manasvī; gāṅgeyam ājau śaracāpapāṇiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.012a: yudhiṣṭhiraś cograbalo mahātmā; samāyayau tvarito jātakopaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.012c: madrādhipaṃ samabhityajya saṃkhye; svabhāgam āptaṃ tam anantakīrtiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.012e: sārdhaṃ sa mādrīsutabhīmasenair; bhīṣmaṃ yayau śāṃtanavaṃ raṇāya
GE07mbh_06_u:081.013a: taiḥ saṃprayuktaḥ sa mahārathāgryair; gaṅgāsutaḥ samare citrayodhī
GE07mbh_06_u:081.013c: na vivyathe śāṃtanavo mahātmā; samāgataiḥ pāṇḍusutaiḥ samastaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.014a: athaitya rājā yudhi satyasaṃdho; jayadratho 'tyugrabalo manasvī
GE07mbh_06_u:081.014c: ciccheda cāpāni mahārathānāṃ; prasahya teṣāṃ dhanuṣā vareṇa
GE07mbh_06_u:081.015a: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ bhīmasenaṃ yamau ca; pārthaṃ tathā yudhi saṃjātakopaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.015c: duryodhanaḥ krodhaviṣo mahātmā; jaghāna bāṇair analaprakāśaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.016a: kṛpeṇa śalyena śalena caiva; tathā vibho citrasenena cājau
GE07mbh_06_u:081.016c: viddhāḥ śarais te 'tivivṛddhakopair; devā yathā daityagaṇaiḥ sametaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.017a: chinnāyudhaṃ śāṃtanavena rājā; śikhaṇḍinaṃ prekṣya ca jātakopaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.017c: ajātaśatruḥ samare mahātmā; śikhaṇḍinaṃ kruddha uvāca vākyam
GE07mbh_06_u:081.018a: uktvā tathā tvaṃ pitur agrato mām; ahaṃ haniṣyāmi mahāvrataṃ tam
GE07mbh_06_u:081.018c: bhīṣmaṃ śaraughair vimalārkavarṇaiḥ; satyaṃ vadāmīti kṛtā pratijñā
GE07mbh_06_u:081.019a: tvayā na caināṃ saphalāṃ karoṣi; devavrataṃ yan na nihaṃsi yuddhe
GE07mbh_06_u:081.019c: mithyāpratijño bhava mā nṛvīra; rakṣasva dharmaṃ ca kulaṃ yaśaś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:081.020a: prekṣasva bhīṣmaṃ yudhi bhīmavegaṃ; sarvāṃs tapantaṃ mama sainyasaṃghān
GE07mbh_06_u:081.020c: śaraughajālair atitigmatejaiḥ; kālaṃ yathā mṛtyukṛtaṃ kṣaṇena
GE07mbh_06_u:081.021c: vihāya bandhūn atha sodarāṃś ca; kva yāsyase nānurūpaṃ tavedam
GE07mbh_06_u:081.022a: dṛṣṭvā hi bhīṣmaṃ tam anantavīryaṃ; bhagnaṃ ca sainyaṃ dravamāṇam evam
GE07mbh_06_u:081.022c: bhīto 'si nūnaṃ drupadasya putra; tathā hi te mukhavarṇo 'prahṛṣṭaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.023c: kathaṃ hi bhīṣmāt prathitaḥ pṛthivyāṃ; bhayaṃ tvam adya prakaroṣi vīra
GE07mbh_06_u:081.024a: sa dharmarājasya vaco niśamya; rūkṣākṣaraṃ vipralāpānubaddham
GE07mbh_06_u:081.024c: pratyādeśaṃ manyamāno mahātmā; pratatvare bhīṣmavadhāya rājan
GE07mbh_06_u:081.025a: tam āpatantaṃ mahatā javena; śikhaṇḍinaṃ bhīṣmam abhidravantam
GE07mbh_06_u:081.025c: āvārayām āsa hi śalya enaṃ; śastreṇa ghoreṇa sudurjayena
GE07mbh_06_u:081.026a: sa cāpi dṛṣṭvā samudīryamāṇam; astraṃ yugāntāgnisamaprabhāvam
GE07mbh_06_u:081.026c: nāsau vyamuhyad drupadasya putro; rājan mahendrapratimaprabhāvaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.027a: tasthau ca tatraiva mahādhanuṣmāñ; śarais tad astraṃ pratibādhamānaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.027c: athādade vāruṇam anyad astraṃ; śikhaṇḍy athograṃ pratighātāya tasya
GE07mbh_06_u:081.027e: tad astram astreṇa vidāryamāṇaṃ; khasthāḥ surā dadṛśuḥ pārthivāś ca
GE07mbh_06_u:081.028a: bhīṣmas tu rājan samare mahātmā; dhanuḥ sucitraṃ dhvajam eva cāpi
GE07mbh_06_u:081.029a: tataḥ samutsṛjya dhanuḥ sabāṇaṃ; yudhiṣṭhiraṃ vīkṣya bhayābhibhūtam
GE07mbh_06_u:081.029c: gadāṃ pragṛhyābhipapāta saṃkhye; jayadrathaṃ bhīmasenaḥ padātiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.030a: tam āpatantaṃ mahatā javena; jayadrathaḥ sagadaṃ bhīmasenam
GE07mbh_06_u:081.030c: vivyādha ghorair yamadaṇḍakalpaiḥ; śitaiḥ śaraiḥ pañcaśataiḥ samantāt
GE07mbh_06_u:081.031a: acintayitvā sa śarāṃs tarasvī; vṛkodaraḥ krodhaparītacetāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.031c: jaghāna vāhān samare samastān; āraṭṭajān sindhurājasya saṃkhye
GE07mbh_06_u:081.033a: bhīmo 'py athainaṃ sahasā vinadya; pratyudyayau gadayā tarjamānaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.033c: samudyatāṃ tāṃ yamadaṇḍakalpāṃ; dṛṣṭvā gadāṃ te kuravaḥ samantāt
GE07mbh_06_u:081.034a: vihāya sarve tava putram ugraṃ; pātaṃ gadāyāḥ parihartukāmāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.034c: apakrāntās tumule saṃvimarde; sudāruṇe bhārata mohanīye
GE07mbh_06_u:081.035a: amūḍhacetās tv atha citraseno; mahāgadām āpatantīṃ nirīkṣya
GE07mbh_06_u:081.035c: rathaṃ samutsṛjya padātir ājau; pragṛhya khaḍgaṃ vimalaṃ ca carma
GE07mbh_06_u:081.035e: avaplutaḥ siṃha ivācalāgrāj; jagāma cānyaṃ bhuvi bhūmideśam
GE07mbh_06_u:081.036a: gadāpi sā prāpya rathaṃ sucitraṃ; sāśvaṃ sasūtaṃ vinihatya saṃkhye
GE07mbh_06_u:081.036c: jagāma bhūmiṃ jvalitā maholkā; bhraṣṭāmbarād gām iva saṃpatantī
GE07mbh_06_u:081.037a: āścaryabhūtaṃ sumahat tvadīyā; dṛṣṭvaiva tad bhārata saṃprahṛṣṭāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:081.037c: sarve vineduḥ sahitāḥ samantāt; pupūjire tava putraṃ sasainyāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:082.001c: ratham āropayām āsa vikarṇas tanayas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:082.002a: tasmiṃs tathā vartamāne tumule saṃkule bhṛśam
GE07mbh_06_u:082.003c: mṛtyor āsyam anuprāptaṃ menire ca yudhiṣṭhiram
GE07mbh_06_u:082.005c: bhīṣmaṃ saṃchādayām āsa yathā megho divākaram
GE07mbh_06_u:082.008a: nimeṣārdhāc ca kaunteyaṃ bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:082.010a: asaṃprāptaṃ tatas taṃ tu kṣurapreṇa mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:082.010c: ciccheda samare rājan bhīṣmas tasya dhanuścyutam
GE07mbh_06_u:082.011a: taṃ tu chittvā raṇe bhīṣmo nārācaṃ kālasaṃmitam
GE07mbh_06_u:082.011d-0332_01: hatāśve tu rathe tiṣṭhañ śaktiṃ cikṣepa dharmarāṭ
GE07mbh_06_u:082.012a: hatāśvaṃ tu rathaṃ tyaktvā dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:082.013a: yamāv api susaṃkruddhaḥ samāsādya raṇe tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:082.013d-0333_01: bhīṣmo 'pi rathināṃ śreṣṭho vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:082.015a: tato yudhiṣṭhiro vaśyān rājñas tān samacodayat
GE07mbh_06_u:082.016a: tatas te pārthivāḥ sarve śrutvā pārthasya bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_06_u:082.017a: sa samantāt parivṛtaḥ pitā devavratas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:082.018a: taṃ carantaṃ raṇe pārthā dadṛśuḥ kauravaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:082.019a: tarjayānaṃ raṇe śūrāṃs trāsayānaṃ ca sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:082.019c: dṛṣṭvā tresur mahārāja siṃhaṃ mṛgagaṇā iva
GE07mbh_06_u:082.021a: śirāṃsi rathināṃ bhīṣmaḥ pātayām āsa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:082.021c: tālebhya iva pakvāni phalāni kuśalo naraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:082.022c: babhūva tumulaḥ śabdaḥ patatām aśmanām iva
GE07mbh_06_u:082.023a: tasmiṃs tu tumule yuddhe vartamāne sudāruṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:082.023c: sarveṣām eva sainyānām āsīd vyatikaro mahān
GE07mbh_06_u:082.026a: anādṛtya tato bhīṣmas taṃ śikhaṇḍinam āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:082.026c: prayayau sṛñjayān kruddhaḥ strītvaṃ cintya śikhaṇḍinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:082.027a: sṛñjayās tu tato hṛṣṭā dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:082.028c: aparāṃ diśam āsthāya sthite savitari prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:082.029e: śastraiś ca bahubhī rājañ jaghnatus tāvakān raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:082.030c: āryāṃ yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā na tyajanti sma saṃyugam
GE07mbh_06_u:082.030e: yathotsāhaṃ ca samare jaghnur lokaṃ mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:082.032a: taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ tāvakānāṃ mahārathau
GE07mbh_06_u:082.033a: tau tasya turagān hatvā tvaramāṇau mahārathau
GE07mbh_06_u:082.035a: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā mahatyā senayā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:082.035c: āvantyau samare kruddhāv abhyayāt sa paraṃtapau
GE07mbh_06_u:082.038a: droṇaś ca samare kruddhaḥ putrasya priyakṛt tava
GE07mbh_06_u:082.039a: duryodhanapurogās tu putrās tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:082.039c: parivārya raṇe bhīṣmaṃ yuyudhuḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:082.040c: abravīt tāvakān sarvāṃs tvaradhvam iti bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:082.041a: yudhyatāṃ tu tathā teṣāṃ kurvatāṃ karma duṣkaram
GE07mbh_06_u:082.043a: śivābhir aśivābhiś ca ruvadbhir bhairavaṃ ravam
GE07mbh_06_u:082.044a: rākṣasāś ca piśācāś ca tathānye piśitāśanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:082.044d-0334_01: mattā rudhiragandhena piśitena ca te nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:082.044d-0334_03: kabandhāni ca nṛtyanti dhanur hastāni saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:082.044d-0334_04: prāsam ālambya niśitaṃ nistriṃśaṃ nirmalaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:082.046c: yayau svaśibiraṃ rājā niśāyāṃ senayā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:082.047c: avajitya tataḥ saṃkhye yayau svaśibiraṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:082.048c: bhīṣmaṃ śāṃtanavaṃ tūrṇaṃ prayātaḥ śibiraṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:082.049a: droṇo drauṇiḥ kṛpaḥ śalyaḥ kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:082.049c: parivārya camūṃ sarvāṃ prayayuḥ śibiraṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:082.050a: tathaiva sātyakī rājan dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:082.050c: parivārya raṇe yodhān yayatuḥ śibiraṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:082.051a: evam ete mahārāja tāvakāḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:082.052a: tataḥ svaśibiraṃ gatvā pāṇḍavāḥ kuravas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:082.053a: rakṣāṃ kṛtvātmanaḥ śūrā nyasya gulmān yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_06_u:082.053c: apanīya ca śalyāṃs te snātvā ca vividhair jalaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:082.055a: muhūrtam iva tat sarvam abhavat svargasaṃnibham
GE07mbh_06_u:082.055c: na hi yuddhakathāṃ kāṃ cit tatra cakrur mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:082.056a: te prasupte bale tatra pariśrāntajane nṛpa
GE07mbh_06_u:083.001a: pariṇāmya niśāṃ tāṃ tu sukhasuptā janeśvarāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:083.001c: kuravaḥ pāṇḍavāś caiva punar yuddhāya niryayuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:083.002a: tataḥ śabdo mahān āsīt senayor ubhayor api
GE07mbh_06_u:083.003c: bhīṣmaś ca rathināṃ śreṣṭho bhāradvājaś ca vai dvijaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:083.004c: vyūhāya vidadhū rājan pāṇḍavān prati daṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:083.005a: bhīṣmaḥ kṛtvā mahāvyūhaṃ pitā tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:083.006c: mālavair dākṣiṇātyaiś ca āvantyaiś ca samanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:083.008c: māgadhaiś ca kaliṅgaiś ca piśācaiś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:083.009c: mekalais traipuraiś caiva cicchilaiś ca samanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:083.010c: kāmbojair bahubhiḥ sārdhaṃ yavanaiś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:083.011a: drauṇis tu rabhasaḥ śūras trigartād anu bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:083.012a: tathā sarveṇa sainyena rājā duryodhanas tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:083.013a: duryodhanād anu kṛpas tataḥ śāradvato yayau
GE07mbh_06_u:083.014a: rejus tatra patākāś ca śvetacchatrāṇi cābhibho
GE07mbh_06_u:083.014c: aṅgadāny atha citrāṇi mahārhāṇi dhanūṃṣi ca
GE07mbh_06_u:083.015a: taṃ tu dṛṣṭvā mahāvyūhaṃ tāvakānāṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:083.016c: prativyūhaṃ tvam api hi kuru pārṣata māciram
GE07mbh_06_u:083.017a: tataḥ sa pārṣataḥ śūro vyūhaṃ cakre sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:083.018a: śṛṅgebhyo bhīmasenaś ca sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:083.019c: madhye yudhiṣṭhiro rājā mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_06_u:083.021a: abhimanyus tataḥ paścād virāṭaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:083.021c: draupadeyāś ca saṃhṛṣṭā rākṣasaś ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:083.022a: evam etaṃ mahāvyūhaṃ vyūhya bhārata pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:083.024a: tataḥ śūrāḥ samāsādya samare te parasparam
GE07mbh_06_u:083.025a: manobhis te manuṣyendra pūrvaṃ yodhāḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_06_u:083.027a: nārācā niśitāḥ saṃkhye saṃpatanti sma bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:083.029a: gadāś ca vimalaiḥ paṭṭaiḥ pinaddhāḥ svarṇabhūṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:083.032a: rathās tu rathibhis tūrṇaṃ preṣitāḥ paramāhave
GE07mbh_06_u:083.034a: prāsair abhihatāḥ ke cid gajayodhāḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:083.034c: patamānāḥ sma dṛśyante giriśṛṅgān nagā iva
GE07mbh_06_u:083.035a: pādātāś cāpy adṛśyanta nighnanto hi parasparam
GE07mbh_06_u:083.036c: śastrair nānāvidhair ghorai raṇe ninyur yamakṣayam
GE07mbh_06_u:083.039a: tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tava teṣāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:084.001a: bhīṣmaṃ tu samare kruddhaṃ pratapantaṃ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:084.001c: na śekuḥ pāṇḍavā draṣṭuṃ tapantam iva bhāskaram
GE07mbh_06_u:084.003a: sa tu bhīṣmo raṇaślāghī somakān sahasṛñjayān
GE07mbh_06_u:084.003c: pāñcālāṃś ca maheṣvāsān pātayām āsa sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:084.004a: te vadhyamānā bhīṣmeṇa pāñcālāḥ somakaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:084.004c: bhīṣmam evābhyayus tūrṇaṃ tyaktvā mṛtyukṛtaṃ bhayam
GE07mbh_06_u:084.005a: sa teṣāṃ rathināṃ vīro bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:084.005c: ciccheda sahasā rājan bāhūn atha śirāṃsi ca
GE07mbh_06_u:084.006a: virathān rathinaś cakre pitā devavratas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:084.008a: na tatrāsīt pumān kaś cit pāṇḍavānāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:084.009a: sa hi bhīṣmaṃ samāsādya tāḍayām āsa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:084.012a: bhīmas tu sārathiṃ hatvā bhīṣmasya rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:084.013a: kṣurapreṇa sutīkṣṇena sa hato nyapatad bhuvi
GE07mbh_06_u:084.013c: hate tasmin mahārāja tava putre mahārathe
GE07mbh_06_u:084.013e: nāmṛṣyanta raṇe śūrāḥ sodaryāḥ sapta saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:084.016a: mahodaras tu samare bhīmaṃ vivyādha patribhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:084.017c: navatyā kuṇḍadhāras tu viśālākṣaś ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:084.019a: raṇe paṇḍitakaś cainaṃ tribhir bāṇaiḥ samardayat
GE07mbh_06_u:084.019c: sa tan na mamṛṣe bhīmaḥ śatrubhir vadham āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:084.023c: preṣayām āsa samare paṇḍitaṃ prati bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:084.024a: sa śaraḥ paṇḍitaṃ hatvā viveśa dharaṇītalam
GE07mbh_06_u:084.025c: tribhiḥ śarair adīnātmā smaran kleśaṃ purātanam
GE07mbh_06_u:084.026c: vivyādha samare rājan sa hato nyapatad bhuvi
GE07mbh_06_u:084.027a: ādityaketoḥ ketuṃ ca chittvā bāṇena saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:084.028c: preṣayām āsa saṃkruddho yamasya sadanaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:084.029a: pradudruvus tatas te 'nye putrās tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:084.029c: manyamānā hi tat satyaṃ sabhāyāṃ tasya bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_06_u:084.030c: abravīt tāvakān yodhān bhīmo 'yaṃ yudhi vadhyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:084.031a: evam ete maheṣvāsāḥ putrās tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:084.031c: bhrātṝn saṃdṛśya nihatān prāsmaraṃs te hi tad vacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:084.032a: yad uktavān mahāprājñaḥ kṣattā hitam anāmayam
GE07mbh_06_u:084.033c: na budhyase purā yat tat tathyam uktaṃ vaco mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:084.034a: tathaiva hi vadhārthāya putrāṇāṃ pāṇḍavo balī
GE07mbh_06_u:084.034c: nūnaṃ jāto mahābāhur yathā hanti sma kauravān
GE07mbh_06_u:084.035a: tato duryodhano rājā bhīṣmam āsādya māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:084.036a: nihatā bhrātaraḥ śūrā bhīmasenena me yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:084.037a: bhavāṃś ca madhyasthatayā nityam asmān upekṣate
GE07mbh_06_u:084.037c: so 'haṃ kāpatham ārūḍhaḥ paśya daivam idaṃ mama
GE07mbh_06_u:084.038a: etac chrutvā vacaḥ krūraṃ pitā devavratas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:084.039a: uktam etan mayā pūrvaṃ droṇena vidureṇa ca
GE07mbh_06_u:084.039c: gāndhāryā ca yaśasvinyā tattvaṃ tāta na buddhavān
GE07mbh_06_u:084.040a: samayaś ca mayā pūrvaṃ kṛto vaḥ śatrukarśana
GE07mbh_06_u:084.040c: nāhaṃ yudhi vimoktavyo nāpy ācāryaḥ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:084.041a: yaṃ yaṃ hi dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ bhīmo drakṣyati saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:084.041c: haniṣyati raṇe taṃ taṃ satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_06_u:084.042a: sa tvaṃ rājan sthiro bhūtvā dṛḍhāṃ kṛtvā raṇe matim
GE07mbh_06_u:084.042c: yodhayasva raṇe pārthān svargaṃ kṛtvā parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:084.043a: na śakyāḥ pāṇḍavā jetuṃ sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:084.043c: tasmād yuddhe matiṃ kṛtvā sthirāṃ yudhyasva bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:085.001a: dṛṣṭvā mama hatān putrān bahūn ekena saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:085.001c: bhīṣmo droṇaḥ kṛpaś caiva kim akurvata saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:085.002a: ahany ahani me putrāḥ kṣayaṃ gacchanti saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:085.003a: yatra me tanayāḥ sarve jīyante na jayanty uta
GE07mbh_06_u:085.003c: yatra bhīṣmasya droṇasya kṛpasya ca mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:085.005a: anyeṣāṃ caiva vīrāṇāṃ madhyagās tanayā mama
GE07mbh_06_u:085.005c: yad ahanyanta saṃgrāme kim anyad bhāgadheyataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:085.006a: na hi duryodhano mandaḥ purā proktam abudhyata
GE07mbh_06_u:085.006c: vāryamāṇo mayā tāta bhīṣmeṇa vidureṇa ca
GE07mbh_06_u:085.007c: nāvabudhyat purā mohāt tasya prāptam idaṃ phalam
GE07mbh_06_u:085.008a: yad bhīmasenaḥ samare putrān mama vicetasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:085.009a: idaṃ tat samanuprāptaṃ kṣattur vacanam uttamam
GE07mbh_06_u:085.009c: na buddhavān asi vibho procyamānaṃ hitaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:085.010a: nivāraya sutān dyūtāt pāṇḍavān mā druheti ca
GE07mbh_06_u:085.010c: suhṛdāṃ hitakāmānāṃ bruvatāṃ tat tad eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:085.011a: na śuśrūṣasi yad vākyaṃ martyaḥ pathyam ivauṣadham
GE07mbh_06_u:085.011c: tad eva tvām anuprāptaṃ vacanaṃ sādhu bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_06_u:085.012c: akṛtvā vacanaṃ pathyaṃ kṣayaṃ gacchanti kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:085.013a: tad etat samatikrāntaṃ pūrvam eva viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:085.013c: tasmān me śṛṇu tattvena yathā yuddham avartata
GE07mbh_06_u:085.014c: lokakṣayakaro rājaṃs tan me nigadataḥ śṛṇu
GE07mbh_06_u:085.016a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:085.016d-0338_03: kekayā dhṛṣṭaketuś ca kuntibhojaś ca daṃśitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:085.017a: arjuno draupadeyāś ca cekitānaś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:085.018a: abhimanyus tathā vīro haiḍimbaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:085.019c: tathaiva kaurave rājann avadhyanta pare raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:085.020a: droṇas tu rathināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ somakān sṛñjayaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:085.022a: droṇena nihatās tatra kṣatriyā bahavo raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:085.022c: viveṣṭantaḥ sma dṛśyante vyādhikliṣṭā narā iva
GE07mbh_06_u:085.023a: kūjatāṃ krandatāṃ caiva stanatāṃ caiva saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:085.023c: aniśaṃ śrūyate śabdaḥ kṣutkṛśānāṃ nṛṇām iva
GE07mbh_06_u:085.024c: cakāra kadanaṃ ghoraṃ kruddhaḥ kāla ivāparaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:085.027a: tato bhīmo raṇe kruddho rabhasaś ca viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:085.028c: petuḥ seduś ca neduś ca diśaś ca paribabhramuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:085.031a: patadbhiś ca hayai rājan samāstīryata medinī
GE07mbh_06_u:085.031c: nirjihvaiś ca śvasadbhiś ca kūjadbhiś ca gatāsubhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:085.032a: arjunena hataiḥ saṃkhye tathā bhārata vājibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:085.032c: prababhau vasudhā ghorā tatra tatra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:085.033a: rathair bhagnair dhvajaiś chinnaiś chatraiś ca sumahāprabhaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:085.033c: hārair niṣkaiḥ sakeyūraiḥ śirobhiś ca sakuṇḍalaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:085.033d-0340_01: pratodaiś ca tathā chinnair vikṛtaiś ca mahāyudhaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:085.034a: uṣṇīṣair apaviddhaiś ca patākābhiś ca sarvaṣaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:085.034e: saṃchannā vasudhā bhāti vasante kusumair iva
GE07mbh_06_u:085.035a: evam eṣa kṣayo vṛttaḥ pāṇḍūnām api bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:085.035c: kruddhe śāṃtanave bhīṣme droṇe ca rathasattame
GE07mbh_06_u:086.005c: hayair vātajavair mukhyaiḥ pāṇḍavasya suto balī
GE07mbh_06_u:086.008a: bhāryārthaṃ tāṃ ca jagrāha pārthaḥ kāmavaśānugām
GE07mbh_06_u:086.009a: sa nāgaloke saṃvṛddho mātrā ca parirakṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.011e: irāvān asmi bhadraṃ te putraś cāhaṃ tavābhibho
GE07mbh_06_u:086.012a: mātuḥ samāgamo yaś ca tat sarvaṃ pratyavedayat
GE07mbh_06_u:086.012c: tac ca sarvaṃ yathāvṛttam anusasmāra pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.013a: pariṣvajya sutaṃ cāpi so ''tmanaḥ sadṛśaṃ guṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.014d-0344_02: abravīc ca tadā pārtham ayam asmi tadā vibho
GE07mbh_06_u:086.014d-0344_03: sthitaḥ preṣyaś ca putraś ca sarvathā hy anuśādhi mām
GE07mbh_06_u:086.014d-0344_04: kiṃ karomi ca te kāmaṃ kaṃ vā kāmaṃ tvam icchasi
GE07mbh_06_u:086.014d-0344_05: pariṣvajya sutaṃ premṇā vāsaviḥ pratyuvāca tam
GE07mbh_06_u:086.014d-0344_06: prītipūrvaṃ ca kāryaṃ ca kāryaṃ prati ca mānada
GE07mbh_06_u:086.014e: yuddhakāle tvayāsmākaṃ sāhyaṃ deyam iti prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:086.015a: bāḍham ity evam uktvā ca yuddhakāla upāgataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.016c: utpetuḥ sahasā rājan haṃsā iva mahodadhau
GE07mbh_06_u:086.017c: kroḍaiḥ kroḍān abhighnanto ghoṇābhiś ca parasparam
GE07mbh_06_u:086.018a: nipatadbhis tathā taiś ca hayasaṃghaiḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_06_u:086.020a: tasmiṃs tathā vartamāne saṃkule tumule bhṛśam
GE07mbh_06_u:086.022a: tataḥ kṣīṇe hayānīke kiṃciccheṣe ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:086.024a: gajo gavākṣo vṛṣakaś carmavān ārjavaḥ śukaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.024c: ṣaḍ ete balasaṃpannā niryayur mahato balāt
GE07mbh_06_u:086.025a: vāryamāṇāḥ śakuninā svaiś ca yodhair mahābalaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.026e: viviśus te tadā hṛṣṭā gāndhārā yuddhadurmadāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.027a: tān praviṣṭāṃs tadā dṛṣṭvā irāvān api vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:086.028c: hanyante samare sarve tathā nītir vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:086.029a: bāḍham ity evam uktvā te sarve yodhā irāvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.029c: jaghnus te vai parānīkaṃ durjayaṃ samare paraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.030a: tad anīkam anīkena samare vīkṣya pātitam
GE07mbh_06_u:086.031c: te śūrāḥ paryadhāvanta kurvanto mahad ākulam
GE07mbh_06_u:086.032a: irāvān atha nirbhinnaḥ prāsais tīkṣṇair mahātmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.032c: sravatā rudhireṇāktas tottrair viddha iva dvipaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.033a: urasy api ca pṛṣṭhe ca pārśvayoś ca bhṛśāhataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.033c: eko bahubhir atyarthaṃ dhairyād rājan na vivyathe
GE07mbh_06_u:086.034a: irāvān atha saṃkruddhaḥ sarvāṃs tān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.035a: prāsān uddhṛtya sarvāṃś ca svaśarīrād ariṃdamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.035c: tair eva tāḍayām āsa subalasyātmajān raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:086.036a: nikṛṣya niśitaṃ khaḍgaṃ gṛhītvā ca śarāvaram
GE07mbh_06_u:086.036c: padātis tūrṇam āgacchaj jighāṃsuḥ saubalān yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:086.040a: bhūmiṣṭham atha taṃ saṃkhye saṃpradṛśya tataḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.042a: āyudhāni ca sarveṣāṃ bāhūn api ca bhūṣitān
GE07mbh_06_u:086.044a: tān sarvān patitān dṛṣṭvā bhīto duryodhanas tataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.046a: paśya vīra yathā hy eṣa phalgunasya suto balī
GE07mbh_06_u:086.046c: māyāvī vipriyaṃ ghoram akārṣīn me balakṣayam
GE07mbh_06_u:086.047a: tvaṃ ca kāmagamas tāta māyāstre ca viśāradaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.047c: kṛtavairaś ca pārthena tasmād enaṃ raṇe jahi
GE07mbh_06_u:086.048a: bāḍham ity evam uktvā tu rākṣaso ghoradarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.049c: vīraiḥ prahāribhir yuktaḥ svair anīkaiḥ samāvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.052a: tena māyāmayāḥ kḷptā hayās tāvanta eva hi
GE07mbh_06_u:086.054a: tasmiṃs tu nihate sainye tāv ubhau yuddhadurmadau
GE07mbh_06_u:086.056c: ciccheda kārmukaṃ dīptaṃ śarāvāpaṃ ca pañcakam
GE07mbh_06_u:086.057a: sa nikṛttaṃ dhanur dṛṣṭvā khaṃ javena samāviśat
GE07mbh_06_u:086.059a: tathā sa rākṣasaśreṣṭhaḥ śaraiḥ kṛttaḥ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.060a: māyā hi sahajā teṣāṃ vayo rūpaṃ ca kāmajam
GE07mbh_06_u:086.060c: evaṃ tad rākṣasasyāṅgaṃ chinnaṃ chinnaṃ vyarohata
GE07mbh_06_u:086.061a: irāvān api saṃkruddho rākṣasaṃ taṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_06_u:086.061c: paraśvadhena tīkṣṇena ciccheda ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.062a: sa tena balinā vīraś chidyamāna iva drumaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.062c: rākṣaso vyanadad ghoraṃ sa śabdas tumulo 'bhavat
GE07mbh_06_u:086.063c: tataś cukrodha balavāṃś cakre vegaṃ ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:086.064a: ārśyaśṛṅgis tato dṛṣṭvā samare śatrum ūrjitam
GE07mbh_06_u:086.064c: kṛtvā ghoraṃ mahad rūpaṃ grahītum upacakrame
GE07mbh_06_u:086.065a: tāṃ dṛṣṭvā tādṛśīṃ māyāṃ rākṣasasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.065c: irāvān api saṃkruddho māyāṃ sraṣṭuṃ pracakrame
GE07mbh_06_u:086.066c: yo 'nvayo mātṛkas tasya sa enam abhipedivān
GE07mbh_06_u:086.067a: sa nāgair bahuśo rājan sarvataḥ saṃvṛto raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:086.067c: dadhāra sumahad rūpam ananta iva bhogavān
GE07mbh_06_u:086.067e: tato bahuvidhair nāgaiś chādayām āsa rākṣasam
GE07mbh_06_u:086.068a: chādyamānas tu nāgaiḥ sa dhyātvā rākṣasapuṃgavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.068c: sauparṇaṃ rūpam āsthāya bhakṣayām āsa pannagān
GE07mbh_06_u:086.069a: māyayā bhakṣite tasminn anvaye tasya mātṛke
GE07mbh_06_u:086.070c: irāvataḥ śiro rakṣaḥ pātayām āsa bhūtale
GE07mbh_06_u:086.072a: tasmin mahati saṃgrāme tādṛśe bhairave punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.073a: hayā gajāḥ padātāś ca vimiśrā dantibhir hatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.073c: rathāś ca dantinaś caiva pattibhis tatra sūditāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.074a: tathā pattirathaughāś ca hayāś ca bahavo raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:086.074c: rathibhir nihatā rājaṃs tava teṣāṃ ca saṃkule
GE07mbh_06_u:086.075a: ajānann arjunaś cāpi nihataṃ putram aurasam
GE07mbh_06_u:086.075c: jaghāna samare śūrān rājñas tān bhīṣmarakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.076a: tathaiva tāvakā rājan sṛñjayāś ca mahābalāḥ
