GE07mbh_06_u:086.079a: tena yaudhiṣṭhire sainye bahavo mānavā hatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.079c: dantinaḥ sādinaś caiva rathino 'tha hayās tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:086.080a: tatra bhārata bhīṣmasya raṇe dṛṣṭvā parākramam
GE07mbh_06_u:086.081c: raudram āsīt tadā yuddhaṃ sātvatasya ca dhanvinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.082a: dṛṣṭvā droṇasya vikrāntaṃ pāṇḍavān bhayam āviśat
GE07mbh_06_u:086.082c: eka eva raṇe śakto hantum asmān sasainikān
GE07mbh_06_u:086.083c: ity abruvan mahārāja raṇe droṇena pīḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.085c: tāvakāḥ pāṇḍaveyāś ca saṃrabdhās tāta dhanvinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:086.086a: na sma paśyāmahe kaṃ cid yaḥ prāṇān parirakṣati
GE07mbh_06_u:087.001a: irāvantaṃ tu nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā pārthā mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:087.001c: saṃgrāme kim akurvanta tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:087.002a: irāvantaṃ tu nihataṃ saṃgrāme vīkṣya rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:087.003e: antarikṣaṃ diśaś caiva sarvāś ca pradiśas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:087.003f-0347_01: celuś ca sahasā tatra tena nādena nāditāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:087.004a: taṃ śrutvā sumahānādaṃ tava sainyasya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:087.004c: ūrustambhaḥ samabhavad vepathuḥ sveda eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:087.005a: sarva eva ca rājendra tāvakā dīnacetasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:087.006c: jvalitaṃ śūlam udyamya rūpaṃ kṛtvā vibhīṣaṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:087.008c: svabalaṃ ca bhayāt tasya prāyaśo vimukhīkṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:087.009c: pragṛhya vipulaṃ cāpaṃ siṃhavad vinadan muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:087.011c: putraṃ tava mahārāja cukopa sa niśācaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:087.014a: nadanto vividhān nādān meghā iva savidyutaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:087.015c: parvatāgraiś ca vṛkṣaiś ca nijaghnus te mahāgajān
GE07mbh_06_u:087.019a: jaghāna ca maheṣvāsaḥ pradhānāṃs tatra rākṣasān
GE07mbh_06_u:087.022a: tat tu dṛṣṭvā mahat karma putrasya tava māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:087.024c: na vivyathe mahārāja putro duryodhanas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:087.025b-0348_01: adyānṛṇyaṃ gamiṣyāmi pitṝṇāṃ mātur eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:087.025e: yac ca te pāṇḍavā rājaṃś chaladyūte parājitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:087.026a: yac caiva draupadī kṛṣṇā ekavastrā rajasvalā
GE07mbh_06_u:087.026c: sabhām ānīya durbuddhe bahudhā kleśitā tvayā
GE07mbh_06_u:087.026d-0349_01: asya pāpasya durbuddhe phalaṃ prāpnuhi durmate
GE07mbh_06_u:087.028c: antam adya gamiṣyāmi yadi notsṛjase raṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:087.029a: evam uktvā tu haiḍimbo mahad visphārya kārmukam
GE07mbh_06_u:088.001a: tatas tad bāṇavarṣaṃ tu duḥsahaṃ dānavair api
GE07mbh_06_u:088.001c: dadhāra yudhi rājendro yathā varṣaṃ mahādvipaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:088.002c: saṃśayaṃ paramaṃ prāptaḥ putras te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:088.004a: sa tair viddhaḥ sravan raktaṃ prabhinna iva kuñjaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:088.004c: dadhre matiṃ vināśāya rājñaḥ sa piśitāśanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:088.004e: jagrāha ca mahāśaktiṃ girīṇām api dāraṇīm
GE07mbh_06_u:088.006a: tām udyatām abhiprekṣya vaṅgānām adhipas tvaran
GE07mbh_06_u:088.007e: rathaṃ ca vārayām āsa kuñjareṇa sutasya te
GE07mbh_06_u:088.008a: mārgam āvāritaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājñā vaṅgena dhīmatā
GE07mbh_06_u:088.008e: udyatāṃ tāṃ mahāśaktiṃ tasmiṃś cikṣepa vāraṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:088.010a: pataty atha gaje cāpi vaṅgānām īśvaro balī
GE07mbh_06_u:088.011c: prabhagnaṃ ca balaṃ dṛṣṭvā jagāma paramāṃ vyathām
GE07mbh_06_u:088.011d-0350_01: aśaktaḥ pratiyoddhuṃ vai dṛṣṭvā tasya parākramam
GE07mbh_06_u:088.016a: taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ tasya bhīṣmasya rakṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:088.017c: haiḍimbo yudhyate nūnaṃ rājñā duryodhanena ha
GE07mbh_06_u:088.018a: naiṣa śakyo hi saṃgrāme jetuṃ bhūtena kena cit
GE07mbh_06_u:088.018c: tatra gacchata bhadraṃ vo rājānaṃ parirakṣata
GE07mbh_06_u:088.019c: etad dhi paramaṃ kṛtyaṃ sarveṣāṃ naḥ paraṃtapāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:088.020c: uttamaṃ javam āsthāya prayayur yatra kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:088.021a: droṇaś ca somadattaś ca bāhlikaś ca jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:088.022a: aśvatthāmā vikarṇaś ca āvantyaś ca bṛhadbalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:088.027c: śabdaḥ samabhavad rājann adrīṇām iva dīryatām
GE07mbh_06_u:088.028c: rūpam āsīd viyatsthānāṃ sarpāṇāṃ sarpatām iva
GE07mbh_06_u:088.031a: bāhlikaṃ ca tribhir bāṇair abhyavidhyat stanāntare
GE07mbh_06_u:088.031c: kṛpam ekena vivyādha citrasenaṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:088.033a: tataḥ punar ameyātmā nārācān daśa pañca ca
GE07mbh_06_u:088.033e: te varma bhittvā tasyāśu prāviśan medinītalam
GE07mbh_06_u:088.034a: viviṃśateś ca drauṇeś ca yantārau samatāḍayat
GE07mbh_06_u:088.034c: tau petatū rathopasthe raśmīn utsṛjya vājinām
GE07mbh_06_u:088.038f-0351_01: prāviśan bhūtalaṃ rājan valmīkam iva pannagāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:089.001a: vimukhīkṛtya tān sarvāṃs tāvakān yudhi rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:089.002a: tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya rājānaṃ prati vegitam
GE07mbh_06_u:089.005a: sa gāḍhaviddho vyathitas tottrārdita iva dvipaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:089.006c: diśaḥ khaṃ pradiśaś caiva nādayan bhairavasvanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:089.007a: rākṣasasya tu taṃ śabdaṃ śrutvā rājā yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:089.008c: yathāsya śrūyate śabdo nadato bhairavaṃ svanam
GE07mbh_06_u:089.008e: atibhāraṃ ca paśyāmi tatra tāta samāhitam
GE07mbh_06_u:089.009a: pitāmahaś ca saṃkruddhaḥ pāñcālān hantum udyataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:089.009c: teṣāṃ ca rakṣaṇārthāya yudhyate phalgunaḥ paraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:089.010c: gaccha rakṣasva haiḍimbaṃ saṃśayaṃ paramaṃ gatam
GE07mbh_06_u:089.012c: śreṇimān vasudānaś ca putraḥ kāśyasya cābhibhūḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:089.013c: kṣatradevaś ca vikrāntaḥ kṣatradharmā tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:089.015a: kuñjaraiś ca sadā mattaiḥ ṣaṭsahasraiḥ prahāribhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:089.017a: teṣām āpatatāṃ śrutvā śabdaṃ taṃ tāvakaṃ balam
GE07mbh_06_u:089.018a: tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tatra tatra mahātmanām
GE07mbh_06_u:089.020a: hayā gajaiḥ samājagmuḥ pādātā rathibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:089.020b-0352_01: rathā rathaiḥ samāgacchan nāgā nāgaiś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:089.020c: anyonyaṃ samare rājan prārthayānā mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:089.021a: sahasā cābhavat tīvraṃ saṃnipātān mahad rajaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:089.022c: naiva sve na pare rājan samajānan parasparam
GE07mbh_06_u:089.023a: pitā putraṃ na jānīte putro vā pitaraṃ tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:089.024c: sumahān abhavac chabdo vaṃśānām iva dahyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:089.026a: narāṇāṃ caiva kāyebhyaḥ śirasāṃ patatāṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:089.026c: śuśruve sumahāñ śabdaḥ patatām aśmanām iva
GE07mbh_06_u:089.027a: viśiraskair manuṣyaiś ca chinnagātraiś ca vāraṇaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:089.033a: ke cid bhinnā viṣāṇāgrair bhinnakumbhāś ca tomaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:089.034a: ke cid dhastair dvidhā chinnaiś chinnagātrās tathāpare
GE07mbh_06_u:089.035a: pārśvais tu dāritair anye vāraṇair varavāraṇāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:089.035c: mumucuḥ śoṇitaṃ bhūri dhātūn iva mahīdharāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:089.036a: nārācābhihatās tv anye tathā viddhāś ca tomaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:089.037c: rathān hayān padātāṃś ca mamṛduḥ śataśo raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:089.039c: parāṃ śaktiṃ samāsthāya cakruḥ karmāṇy abhītavat
GE07mbh_06_u:089.040c: prārthayānā yaśo rājan svargaṃ vā yuddhaśālinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:090.001a: svasainyaṃ nihataṃ dṛṣṭvā rājā duryodhanaḥ svayam
GE07mbh_06_u:090.004c: saṃdadhe niśitaṃ bāṇaṃ girīṇām api dāraṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:090.009a: kṣipraṃ gacchata bhadraṃ vo rājānaṃ parirakṣata
GE07mbh_06_u:090.011c: nadanto bhairavān nādāṃs trāsayantaś ca bhūm imām
GE07mbh_06_u:090.015a: evam uktvā mahābāhur mahad visphārya kārmukam
GE07mbh_06_u:090.016a: bhūyaś cainaṃ mahābāhuḥ śaraiḥ śīghram avākirat
GE07mbh_06_u:090.018a: sa gāḍhaviddho vyathito vayovṛddhaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:090.019a: guruṃ pravyathitaṃ dṛṣṭvā rājā duryodhanaḥ svayam
GE07mbh_06_u:090.021a: avaplutya rathāt tūrṇaṃ tasthau girir ivācalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:090.022a: tam udyatagadaṃ dṛṣṭvā kailāsam iva śṛṅgiṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:090.023a: tāv āpatantau sahitau tvaritau balināṃ varau
GE07mbh_06_u:090.026a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśayaṃ prāptaṃ pīḍyamānaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:090.027e: spardhate hi maheṣvāso nityaṃ droṇasutena yaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:090.028a: sa visphārya mahac cāpaṃ drauṇiṃ vivyādha patriṇā
GE07mbh_06_u:090.028c: yathā śakro mahārāja purā vivyādha dānavam
GE07mbh_06_u:090.029c: yena lokatrayaṃ krodhāt trāsitaṃ svena tejasā
GE07mbh_06_u:090.029d-0353_01: sa rudreṇa jitaḥ pūrvaṃ nihato mātariśvanā
GE07mbh_06_u:090.032c: jaghāna caturo vāhān pātayām āsa ca dhvajam
GE07mbh_06_u:090.032d-0354_01: tataḥ ṣaṣṭhena bhallena rathāt sūtam apātayat
GE07mbh_06_u:090.033a: saptamena ca bhallena nīlaṃ vivyādha vakṣasi
GE07mbh_06_u:090.038a: vimukhāṃś caiva tān dṛṣṭvā drauṇicāpacyutaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:090.040a: tatas te tāvakāḥ sarve māyayā vimukhīkṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:090.041a: droṇaṃ duryodhanaṃ śalyam aśvatthāmānam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:090.041c: prāyaśaś ca maheṣvāsā ye pradhānāś ca kauravāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:090.042a: vidhvastā rathinaḥ sarve gajāś ca vinipātitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:090.043a: tad dṛṣṭvā tāvakaṃ sainyaṃ vidrutaṃ śibiraṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:090.043c: mama prākrośato rājaṃs tathā devavratasya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:090.044a: yudhyadhvaṃ mā palāyadhvaṃ māyaiṣā rākṣasī raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:090.044e: naiva te śraddadhur bhītā vadator āvayor vacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:090.045a: tāṃś ca pradravato dṛṣṭvā jayaṃ prāptāś ca pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:090.046a: evaṃ tava balaṃ sarvaṃ haiḍimbena durātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:091.001a: tasmin mahati saṃkrande rājā duryodhanas tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:091.003a: kathayām āsa durdharṣo viniḥśvasya punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.003c: abravīc ca tadā rājan bhīṣmaṃ kurupitāmaham
GE07mbh_06_u:091.004c: pāṇḍavair vigraho ghoraḥ samārabdho mayā prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:091.005a: ekādaśa samākhyātā akṣauhiṇyaś ca yā mama
GE07mbh_06_u:091.005c: nideśe tava tiṣṭhanti mayā sārdhaṃ paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_06_u:091.007a: tan me dahati gātrāṇi śuṣkavṛkṣam ivānalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.008c: tvāṃ samāśritya durdharṣaṃ tan me kartuṃ tvam arhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:091.009a: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ rājño bharatasattama
GE07mbh_06_u:091.010a: śṛṇu rājan mama vaco yat tvā vakṣyāmi kaurava
GE07mbh_06_u:091.011a: ātmā rakṣyo raṇe tāta sarvāvasthāsv ariṃdama
GE07mbh_06_u:091.012a: arjunena yamābhyāṃ vā bhīmasenena vā punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.012b-0358_01: na tu kāryas tvayā rājan haiḍimbena durātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:091.013a: ahaṃ droṇaḥ kṛpo drauṇiḥ kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.013c: śalyaś ca saumadattiś ca vikarṇaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.015a: tasmin raudre rākṣasendre yadi te hṛcchayo mahān
GE07mbh_06_u:091.015c: ayaṃ vā gacchatu raṇe tasya yuddhāya durmateḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.018a: tava divyāni cāstrāṇi vikramaś ca paraṃtapa
GE07mbh_06_u:091.018c: samāgamaś ca bahubhiḥ purābhūd asuraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:091.020a: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ bhīṣmasya pṛtanāpateḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.021a: tam ādravantaṃ saṃprekṣya garjantam iva toyadam
GE07mbh_06_u:091.025c: te nipetur mahārāja nāgeṣu ca ratheṣu ca
GE07mbh_06_u:091.034a: sa bhīmaṃ śaradhārābhis tāḍayām āsa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.036a: tān dṛṣṭvā nihatān kruddho bhagadattaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_06_u:091.037a: sa nāgaḥ preṣitas tena bāṇo jyācodito yathā
GE07mbh_06_u:091.039a: kekayāś cābhimanyuś ca draupadeyāś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.039e: cedipaś citraketuś ca saṃkruddhāḥ sarva eva te
GE07mbh_06_u:091.040c: tam ekaṃ kuñjaraṃ kruddhāḥ samantāt paryavārayan
GE07mbh_06_u:091.041a: sa viddho bahubhir bāṇair vyarocata mahādvipaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.043a: tam āpatantaṃ samare gajaṃ gajapatiḥ sa ca
GE07mbh_06_u:091.043d-0359_01: dadhāra supratīkaṃ taṃ kṣatradharmā gajena tu
GE07mbh_06_u:091.044c: sādhu sādhv iti sainyāni pāṇḍaveyāny apūjayan
GE07mbh_06_u:091.045a: tataḥ prāgjyotiṣaḥ kruddhas tomarān vai caturdaśa
GE07mbh_06_u:091.046c: vidārya prāviśan kṣipraṃ valmīkam iva pannagāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.048a: pradudrāva ca vegena praṇadan bhairavaṃ svanam
GE07mbh_06_u:091.048c: sa mardamānaḥ svabalaṃ vāyur vṛkṣān ivaujasā
GE07mbh_06_u:091.050c: kiranto vividhān bāṇāñ śastrāṇi vividhāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:091.051c: śrutvā sa ninadaṃ ghoram amarṣād gatasādhvasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.053a: rathasaṃghāṃs tathā nāgān hayāṃś ca saha sādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.053e: amṛdnāt samare rājan saṃpradhāvaṃs tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.054a: tena saṃloḍyamānaṃ tu pāṇḍūnāṃ tad balaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:091.055a: bhagnaṃ tu svabalaṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagadattena dhīmatā
GE07mbh_06_u:091.056c: rūpaṃ vibhīṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā roṣeṇa prajvalann iva
GE07mbh_06_u:091.057a: jagrāha vipulaṃ śūlaṃ girīṇām api dāraṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:091.057c: nāgaṃ jighāṃsuḥ sahasā cikṣepa ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.058a: tam āpatantaṃ sahasā dṛṣṭvā jvālākulaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:091.058c: cikṣepa ruciraṃ tīkṣṇam ardhacandraṃ sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.058e: ciccheda sumahac chūlaṃ tena bāṇena vegavat
GE07mbh_06_u:091.060a: śūlaṃ nipatitaṃ dṛṣṭvā dvidhā kṛttaṃ sa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.060e: cikṣepa tāṃ rākṣasasya tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:091.061a: tām āpatantīṃ saṃprekṣya viyatsthām aśanīm iva
GE07mbh_06_u:091.061c: utpatya rākṣasas tūrṇaṃ jagrāha ca nanāda ca
GE07mbh_06_u:091.062a: babhañja caināṃ tvarito jānuny āropya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:091.063a: tad avekṣya kṛtaṃ karma rākṣasena balīyasā
GE07mbh_06_u:091.063c: divi devāḥ sagandharvā munayaś cāpi vismitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.064c: sādhu sādhv iti nādena pṛthivīm anunādayan
GE07mbh_06_u:091.065a: taṃ tu śrutvā mahānādaṃ prahṛṣṭānāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_06_u:091.067a: bhīmam ekena vivyādha rākṣasaṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.067c: abhimanyuṃ tribhiś caiva kekayān pañcabhis tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:091.068e: papāta sahasā tasya saśaraṃ dhanur uttamam
GE07mbh_06_u:091.070a: dhvajaṃ kesariṇaṃ cāsya ciccheda viśikhais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.070c: nirbibheda tribhiś cānyaiḥ sārathiṃ cāsya patribhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.072a: tato bhīmo mahārāja viratho rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.073a: tam udyatagadaṃ dṛṣṭvā saśṛṅgam iva parvatam
GE07mbh_06_u:091.074a: etasminn eva kāle tu pāṇḍavaḥ kṛṣṇasārathiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:091.076a: dṛṣṭvā tu pāṇḍavo rājan yudhyamānān mahārathān
GE07mbh_06_u:092.001a: putraṃ tu nihataṃ śrutvā irāvantaṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.002a: abravīt samare rājan vāsudevam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.002c: idaṃ nūnaṃ mahāprājño viduro dṛṣṭavān purā
GE07mbh_06_u:092.003a: kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ ca kṣayaṃ ghoraṃ mahāmatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.004c: nihatāḥ kauravaiḥ saṃkhye tathāsmābhiś ca te hatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.005c: dhig arthān yatkṛte hy evaṃ kriyate jñātisaṃkṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.006a: adhanasya mṛtaṃ śreyo na ca jñātivadhād dhanam
GE07mbh_06_u:092.006c: kiṃ nu prāpsyāmahe kṛṣṇa hatvā jñātīn samāgatān
GE07mbh_06_u:092.008c: kṛtaṃ rājñā mahābāho yācatā sma suyodhanam
GE07mbh_06_u:092.008e: rājyārdhaṃ pañca vā grāmān nākārṣīt sa ca durmatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.009a: dṛṣṭvā hi kṣatriyāñ śūrāñ śayānān dharaṇītale
GE07mbh_06_u:092.009c: nindāmi bhṛśam ātmānaṃ dhig astu kṣatrajīvikām
GE07mbh_06_u:092.010a: aśaktam iti mām ete jñāsyanti kṣatriyā raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:092.011e: nāyaṃ klībayituṃ kālo vidyate mādhava kva cit
GE07mbh_06_u:092.012a: evam uktas tu pārthena keśavaḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_06_u:092.012c: codayām āsa tān aśvān pāṇḍurān vātaraṃhasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.013a: atha śabdo mahān āsīt tava sainyasya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:092.015a: tato rājaṃs tava sutā bhīmasenam upādravan
GE07mbh_06_u:092.015c: parivārya raṇe droṇaṃ vasavo vāsavaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_06_u:092.016a: tataḥ śāṃtanavo bhīṣmaḥ kṛpaś ca rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.018a: śeṣās tv anye mahārāja śeṣān eva mahārathān
GE07mbh_06_u:092.019a: bhīmasenas tu saṃprekṣya putrāṃs tava janeśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:092.019c: prajajvāla raṇe kruddho haviṣā havyavāḍ iva
GE07mbh_06_u:092.020a: putrās tu tava kaunteyaṃ chādayāṃ cakrire śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.021a: sa cchādyamāno bahudhā putrais tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:092.021c: sṛkkiṇī vilihan vīraḥ śārdūla iva darpitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.022a: vyūḍhoraskaṃ tato bhīmaḥ pātayām āsa pārthiva
GE07mbh_06_u:092.023a: apareṇa tu bhallena pītena niśitena ca
GE07mbh_06_u:092.024b-0363_01: tatas tu samare kruddho bhīmasenaḥ śilīmukhān
GE07mbh_06_u:092.024c: sa sapta tvarayā yuktaḥ putrāṃs te prāpya māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:092.027a: prapatanta sma te vīrā virejur bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:092.028a: tataḥ pradudruvuḥ śeṣāḥ putrās tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:092.028c: taṃ kālam iva manyanto bhīmasenaṃ mahābalam
GE07mbh_06_u:092.029a: droṇas tu samare vīraṃ nirdahantaṃ sutāṃs tava
GE07mbh_06_u:092.030c: droṇena vāryamāṇo 'pi nijaghne yat sutāṃs tava
GE07mbh_06_u:092.031a: yathā hi govṛṣo varṣaṃ saṃdhārayati khāt patat
GE07mbh_06_u:092.031d-0365_01: nimīlya netre gṛhṇīyāt tathā jagrāha pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.032a: adbhutaṃ ca mahārāja tatra cakre vṛkodaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.032c: yat putrāṃs te 'vadhīt saṃkhye droṇaṃ caiva nyayodhayat
GE07mbh_06_u:092.033c: mṛgeṣv iva mahārāja caran vyāghro mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.034a: yathā vā paśumadhyastho drāvayeta paśūn vṛkaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.034c: vṛkodaras tava sutāṃs tathā vyadrāvayad raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:092.035a: gāṅgeyo bhagadattaś ca gautamaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.035c: pāṇḍavaṃ rabhasaṃ yuddhe vārayām āsur arjunam
GE07mbh_06_u:092.036a: astrair astrāṇi saṃvārya teṣāṃ so 'tiratho raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:092.036c: pravīrāṃs tava sainyeṣu preṣayām āsa mṛtyave
GE07mbh_06_u:092.037c: virathaṃ rathināṃ śreṣṭhaṃ kārayām āsa sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.041a: vyaṃsitaṃ vīkṣya nistriṃśaṃ saubhadreṇa raṇe tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:092.041c: sādhu sādhv iti sainyānāṃ praṇādo 'bhūd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:092.042a: dhṛṣṭadyumnamukhās tv anye tava sainyam ayodhayan
GE07mbh_06_u:092.043a: tatrākrando mahān āsīt tava teṣāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:092.043c: nighnatāṃ bhṛśam anyonyaṃ kurvatāṃ karma duṣkaram
GE07mbh_06_u:092.043d-0368_01: pravartam iva hārdikyaṃ ghoraṃ yuddham abhūt tataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.044a: anyonyaṃ hi raṇe śūrāḥ keśeṣv ākṣipya māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:092.044c: nakhair dantair ayudhyanta muṣṭibhir jānubhis tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:092.045a: bāhubhiś ca talaiś caiva nistriṃśaiś ca susaṃśitaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.046a: nyahanac ca pitā putraṃ putraś ca pitaraṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:092.048a: jātarūpamayaiḥ puṅkhai rājataiś ca śitāḥ śarāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.051a: apakṛttāś ca patitā musalāni gurūṇi ca
GE07mbh_06_u:092.051c: parighān paṭṭiśāṃś caiva bhiṇḍipālāṃś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:092.055c: saṃchannā vasudhā rājan parvatair iva sarvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.057a: parighair bhiṇḍipālaiś ca śataghnībhis tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:092.059b-0369_01: sudhṛtair lakuṭaiś caiva saṃvṛtā tatra medinī
GE07mbh_06_u:092.059d-0370_01: sāṅgadaiś ca bhujaiś caiva vipraviddhair alaṃkṛtaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.062a: vipraviddhaiḥ kalāpaiś ca patitaiś ca śarāsanaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.063c: vājibhiś ca hataiḥ kīrṇaiḥ srastajihvaiḥ saśoṇitaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.065a: srastahastaiś ca mātaṅgaiḥ śayānair vibabhau mahī
GE07mbh_06_u:092.065b-0371_01: śuśubhe dharaṇī rājan pradīptair iva parvataiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.065b-0371_02: srastair ābharaṇaiś caiva vibabhau tu tadā mahī
GE07mbh_06_u:092.066c: karaiḥ śabdaṃ vimuñcadbhiḥ śīkaraṃ ca muhur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.067a: nānārāgaiḥ kambalaiś ca paristomaiś ca dantinām
GE07mbh_06_u:092.069a: graiveyaiś citrarūpaiś ca rukmakakṣyābhir eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:092.069c: yantraiś ca bahudhā chinnais tomaraiś ca sakampanaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.069d-0373_01: rarāja subhṛśaṃ bhūmis tatra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:092.070c: sādināṃ ca bhujaiś chinnaiḥ patitaiḥ sāṅgadais tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:092.071a: prāsaiś ca vimalais tīkṣṇair vimalābhis tatharṣṭibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.071c: uṣṇīṣaiś ca tathā chinnaiḥ praviddhaiś ca tatas tataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:092.076a: evam ete mahāsene mṛdite tatra bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:092.076c: parasparaṃ samāsādya tava teṣāṃ ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:092.077a: teṣu śrānteṣu bhagneṣu mṛditeṣu ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:092.077c: rātriḥ samabhavad ghorā nāpaśyāma tato raṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:093.001a: tato duryodhano rājā śakuniś cāpi saubalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:093.001c: duḥśāsanaś ca putras te sūtaputraś ca durjayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:093.002c: kathaṃ pāṇḍusutā yuddhe jetavyāḥ sagaṇā iti
GE07mbh_06_u:093.003a: tato duryodhano rājā sarvāṃs tān āha mantriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:093.004a: droṇo bhīṣmaḥ kṛpaḥ śalyaḥ saumadattiś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:093.004c: na pārthān pratibādhante na jāne tatra kāraṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:093.005a: avadhyamānās te cāpi kṣapayanti balaṃ mama
GE07mbh_06_u:093.005c: so 'smi kṣīṇabalaḥ karṇa kṣīṇaśastraś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:093.005d-0374_01: droṇasya pramukhe vīrā hatās te bhrātaro mama
GE07mbh_06_u:093.005d-0374_02: bhīmasenena rādheya mama caiva ca paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:093.006a: nikṛtaḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ śūrair avadhyair daivatair api
GE07mbh_06_u:093.006c: so 'haṃ saṃśayam āpannaḥ prakariṣye kathaṃ raṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:093.006d-0375_03: sa śūraḥ sa ca vikrāntaḥ sūryaputraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_06_u:093.007c: mā śuco bharataśreṣṭha prakariṣye priyaṃ tava
GE07mbh_06_u:093.008c: nivṛtte yudhi gāṅgeye nyastaśastre ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:093.009c: paśyato yudhi bhīṣmasya śape satyena te nṛpa
GE07mbh_06_u:093.010a: pāṇḍaveṣu dayāṃ rājan sadā bhīṣmaḥ karoti vai
GE07mbh_06_u:093.010c: aśaktaś ca raṇe bhīṣmo jetum etān mahārathān
GE07mbh_06_u:093.011a: abhimānī raṇe bhīṣmo nityaṃ cāpi raṇapriyaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:093.011c: sa kathaṃ pāṇḍavān yuddhe jeṣyate tāta saṃgatān
GE07mbh_06_u:093.012a: sa tvaṃ śīghram ito gatvā bhīṣmasya śibiraṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:093.012c: anumānya raṇe bhīṣmaṃ śastraṃ nyāsaya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:093.013a: nyastaśastre tato bhīṣme nihatān paśya pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_06_u:093.014a: evam uktas tu karṇena putro duryodhanas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:093.014c: abravīd bhrātaraṃ tatra duḥśāsanam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:093.015a: anuyātraṃ yathā sajjaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati sarvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:093.016a: evam uktvā tato rājan karṇam āha janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:093.016c: anumānya raṇe bhīṣmam ito 'haṃ dvipadāṃ varam
GE07mbh_06_u:093.018a: niṣpapāta tatas tūrṇaṃ putras tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:093.018c: sahito bhrātṛbhiḥ sarvair devair iva śatakratuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:093.019c: ārohayad dhayaṃ tūrṇaṃ bhrātā duḥśāsanas tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:093.023a: taṃ prayāntaṃ naravyāghraṃ bhīṣmasya śibiraṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:093.023e: bhrātaraś ca maheṣvāsās tridaśā iva vāsavam
GE07mbh_06_u:093.024a: hayān anye samāruhya gajān anye ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:093.027a: dakṣiṇaṃ dakṣiṇaḥ kāle saṃbhṛtya svabhujaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:093.029a: saṃstūyamānaḥ sūtaiś ca māgadhaiś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:093.031a: sa taiḥ parivṛto rājā pradīpaiḥ kāñcanaiḥ śubhaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:093.031c: śuśubhe candramā yukto dīptair iva mahāgrahaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:093.033a: saṃprāpya tu tato rājā bhīṣmasya sadanaṃ śubham
GE07mbh_06_u:093.033c: avatīrya hayāc cāpi bhīṣmaṃ prāpya janeśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:093.035c: utsahema raṇe jetuṃ sendrān api surāsurān
GE07mbh_06_u:093.036c: tasmād arhasi gāṅgeya kṛpāṃ kartuṃ mayi prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:093.036e: jahi pāṇḍusutān vīrān mahendra iva dānavān
GE07mbh_06_u:093.037c: pāñcālān pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ karūṣāṃś ceti bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:093.038a: tad vacaḥ satyam evāstu jahi pārthān samāgatān
GE07mbh_06_u:093.038c: somakāṃś ca maheṣvāsān satyavāg bhava bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:093.039a: dayayā yadi vā rājan dveṣyabhāvān mama prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:093.041a: etāvad uktvā nṛpatiḥ putro duryodhanas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:093.041c: novāca vacanaṃ kiṃ cid bhīṣmaṃ bhīmaparākramam
GE07mbh_06_u:094.002c: śvasamāno yathā nāgaḥ praṇunno vai śalākayā
GE07mbh_06_u:094.003a: udvṛtya cakṣuṣī kopān nirdahann iva bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:094.003e: abravīt tava putraṃ tu sāmapūrvam idaṃ vacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:094.004a: kiṃ nu duryodhanaivaṃ māṃ vākśalyair upavidhyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:094.004c: ghaṭamānaṃ yathāśakti kurvāṇaṃ ca tava priyam
GE07mbh_06_u:094.005a: yadā tu pāṇḍavaḥ śūraḥ khāṇḍave 'gnim atarpayat
GE07mbh_06_u:094.005c: parājitya raṇe śakraṃ paryāptaṃ tan nidarśanam
GE07mbh_06_u:094.006a: yadā ca tvāṃ mahābāho gandharvair hṛtam ojasā
GE07mbh_06_u:094.007c: sūtaputre ca rādheye paryāptaṃ tan nidarśanam
GE07mbh_06_u:094.008a: yac ca naḥ sahitān sarvān virāṭanagare tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:094.008c: eka eva samudyātaḥ paryāptaṃ tan nidarśanam
GE07mbh_06_u:094.009a: droṇaṃ ca yudhi saṃrabdhaṃ māṃ ca nirjitya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:094.009c: karṇaṃ ca tvāṃ ca drauṇiṃ ca kṛpaṃ ca sumahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:094.009e: vāsāṃsi sa samādatta paryāptaṃ tan nidarśanam
GE07mbh_06_u:094.009f-0378_01: tathā drauṇiṃ maheṣvāsaṃ śāradvatam athāpi ca
GE07mbh_06_u:094.009f-0378_02: gograhe jitavān pūrvaṃ paryāptaṃ tan nidarśanam
GE07mbh_06_u:094.009f-0378_03: vijitya ca yadā karṇaṃ sadā puruṣamāninam
GE07mbh_06_u:094.009f-0378_04: uttarāyai dadau vastraṃ paryāptaṃ tan nidarśanam
GE07mbh_06_u:094.010c: jitavān samare pārthaḥ paryāptaṃ tan nidarśanam
GE07mbh_06_u:094.011a: ko hi śakto raṇe jetuṃ pāṇḍavaṃ rabhasaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:094.011c: tvaṃ tu mohān na jānīṣe vācyāvācyaṃ suyodhana
GE07mbh_06_u:094.012a: mumūrṣur hi naraḥ sarvān vṛkṣān paśyati kāñcanān
GE07mbh_06_u:094.012c: tathā tvam api gāndhāre viparītāni paśyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:094.013a: svayaṃ vairaṃ mahat kṛtvā pāṇḍavaiḥ sahasṛñjayaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:094.013c: yudhyasva tān adya raṇe paśyāmaḥ puruṣo bhava
GE07mbh_06_u:094.013d-0381_01: aśakyāḥ pāṇḍavā jetuṃ devair api savāsavaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:094.014a: ahaṃ tu somakān sarvān sapāñcālān samāgatān
GE07mbh_06_u:094.015a: tair vāhaṃ nihataḥ saṃkhye gamiṣye yamasādanam
GE07mbh_06_u:094.015c: tān vā nihatya saṃgrāme prītiṃ dāsyāmi vai tava
GE07mbh_06_u:094.016a: pūrvaṃ hi strī samutpannā śikhaṇḍī rājaveśmani
GE07mbh_06_u:094.016c: varadānāt pumāñ jātaḥ saiṣā vai strī śikhaṇḍinī
GE07mbh_06_u:094.017a: tām ahaṃ na haniṣyāmi prāṇatyāge 'pi bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:094.017c: yāsau prāṅ nirmitā dhātrā saiṣā vai strī śikhaṇḍinī
GE07mbh_06_u:094.018a: sukhaṃ svapihi gāndhāre śvo 'smi kartā mahāraṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:094.018c: yaj janāḥ kathayiṣyanti yāvat sthāsyati medinī
GE07mbh_06_u:094.019a: evam uktas tava suto nirjagāma janeśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:094.019c: abhivādya guruṃ mūrdhnā prayayau svaṃ niveśanam
GE07mbh_06_u:094.020a: āgamya tu tato rājā visṛjya ca mahājanam
GE07mbh_06_u:094.020e: praviṣṭaḥ sa niśāṃ tāṃ ca gamayām āsa pārthivaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:095.001a: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ prātar utthāya vai nṛpaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:095.001e: adya bhīṣmo raṇe kruddho nihaniṣyati somakān
GE07mbh_06_u:095.002a: duryodhanasya tac chrutvā rātrau vilapitaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_06_u:095.002c: manyamānaḥ sa taṃ rājan pratyādeśam ivātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:095.004a: iṅgitena tu taj jñātvā gāṅgeyena vicintitam
GE07mbh_06_u:095.007c: sa no guptaḥ sukhāya syād dhanyāt pārthāṃś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:095.008a: abravīc ca viśuddhātmā nāhaṃ hanyāṃ śikhaṇḍinam
GE07mbh_06_u:095.008c: strīpūrvako hy asau jātas tasmād varjyo raṇe mayā
GE07mbh_06_u:095.009a: lokas tad veda yad ahaṃ pituḥ priyacikīrṣayā
GE07mbh_06_u:095.009c: rājyaṃ sphītaṃ mahābāho striyaś ca tyaktavān purā
GE07mbh_06_u:095.010a: naiva cāhaṃ striyaṃ jātu na strīpūrvaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:095.010c: hanyāṃ yudhi naraśreṣṭha satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_06_u:095.011a: ayaṃ strīpūrvako rājañ śikhaṇḍī yadi te śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:095.011c: udyoge kathitaṃ yat tat tathā jātā śikhaṇḍinī
GE07mbh_06_u:095.012a: kanyā bhūtvā pumāñ jātaḥ sa ca yotsyati bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:095.012c: tasyāhaṃ pramukhe bāṇān na muñceyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:095.013a: yuddhe tu kṣatriyāṃs tāta pāṇḍavānāṃ jayaiṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:095.014a: evaṃ māṃ bharataśreṣṭho gāṅgeyaḥ prāha śāstravit
GE07mbh_06_u:095.015a: arakṣyamāṇaṃ hi vṛko hanyāt siṃhaṃ mahāvane
GE07mbh_06_u:095.015d-0382_01: mā siṃham iva kākena hataṃ bhīṣmaṃ śikhaṇḍinā
GE07mbh_06_u:095.016a: mātulaḥ śakuniḥ śalyaḥ kṛpo droṇo viviṃśatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:095.016c: yattā rakṣantu gāṅgeyaṃ tasmin gupte dhruvo jayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:095.017a: etac chrutvā tu rājāno duryodhanavacas tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:095.018a: putrāś ca tava gāṅgeyaṃ parivārya yayur mudā
GE07mbh_06_u:095.018c: kampayanto bhuvaṃ dyāṃ ca kṣobhayantaś ca pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_06_u:095.019a: tai rathaiś ca susaṃyuktair dantibhiś ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:095.020c: sarve te sma vyatiṣṭhanta rakṣantas taṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:095.021a: tato duryodhano rājā punar bhrātaram abravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:095.021c: savyaṃ cakraṃ yudhāmanyur uttamaujāś ca dakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:095.022c: yathā bhīṣmaṃ na no hanyād duḥśāsana tathā kuru
GE07mbh_06_u:095.023a: bhrātus tad vacanaṃ śrutvā putro duḥśāsanas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:095.023c: bhīṣmaṃ pramukhataḥ kṛtvā prayayau senayā saha
GE07mbh_06_u:095.024a: bhīṣmaṃ tu rathavaṃśena dṛṣṭvā tam abhisaṃvṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:095.024c: arjuno rathināṃ śreṣṭho dhṛṣṭadyumnam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_06_u:095.025c: sthāpayasvādya pāñcālya tasya goptāham apy uta
GE07mbh_06_u:095.026a: tataḥ śāṃtanavo bhīṣmo niryayau senayā saha
GE07mbh_06_u:095.027a: kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca śaibyaś caiva mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:095.027c: śakuniḥ saindhavaś caiva kāmbojaś ca sudakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:095.028a: bhīṣmeṇa sahitāḥ sarve putraiś ca tava bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:095.029a: droṇo bhūriśravāḥ śalyo bhagadattaś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:095.029c: dakṣiṇaṃ pakṣam āśritya sthitā vyūhasya daṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:095.030c: mahatyā senayā yuktā vāmaṃ pakṣam apālayan
GE07mbh_06_u:095.031c: vyūhamadhye sthito rājan pāṇḍavān prati bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:095.033a: evam ete tadā vyūhaṃ kṛtvā bhārata tāvakāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:095.034a: tathā yudhiṣṭhiro rājā bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:095.034c: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca mādrīputrāv ubhāv api
GE07mbh_06_u:095.035a: dhṛṣṭadyumno virāṭaś ca sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:095.035d-0383_01: anye ca bahavaḥ śūrāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:095.036a: śikhaṇḍī vijayaś caiva rākṣasaś ca ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:095.036e: sthitā raṇe mahārāja mahatyā senayā vṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:095.037c: kekayā bhrātaraḥ pañca sthitā yuddhāya daṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:095.038c: pāṇḍavāḥ samare śūrāḥ sthitā yuddhāya māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:095.039a: tāvakās tu raṇe yattāḥ sahasenā narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:095.039c: abhyudyayū raṇe pārthān bhīṣmaṃ kṛtvāgrato nṛpa
GE07mbh_06_u:095.046a: vavuś ca tumulā vātāḥ śaṃsantaḥ sumahad bhayam
GE07mbh_06_u:095.046c: ghorāś ca ghoranirhrādāḥ śivās tatra vavāśire
GE07mbh_06_u:095.047a: diśaḥ prajvalitā rājan pāṃsuvarṣaṃ papāta ca
GE07mbh_06_u:095.048a: rudatāṃ vāhanānāṃ ca netrebhyaḥ prāpataj jalam
GE07mbh_06_u:095.048c: susruvuś ca śakṛnmūtraṃ pradhyāyanto viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:095.050c: śvānaś ca vividhair nādair bhaṣantas tatra tasthire
GE07mbh_06_u:095.051a: jvalitāś ca maholkā vai samāhatya divākaram
GE07mbh_06_u:095.051c: nipetuḥ sahasā bhūmau vedayānā mahad bhayam
GE07mbh_06_u:095.053c: babhūva ghoṣas tumulaś camūnāṃ; vātoddhutānām iva sāgarāṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:096.002a: na śekuḥ samare kruddhaṃ saubhadram arisūdanam
GE07mbh_06_u:096.003a: tena muktā raṇe rājañ śarāḥ śatrunibarhaṇāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.004c: saubhadraḥ samare kruddhaḥ preṣayām āsa sāyakān
GE07mbh_06_u:096.005a: rathinaṃ ca rathāt tūrṇaṃ hayapṛṣṭhāc ca sādinam
GE07mbh_06_u:096.005c: gajārohāṃś ca sagajān pātayām āsa phālguniḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.006a: tasya tat kurvataḥ karma mahat saṃkhye 'dbhutaṃ nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.006c: pūjayāṃ cakrire hṛṣṭāḥ praśaśaṃsuś ca phālgunim
GE07mbh_06_u:096.007a: tāny anīkāni saubhadro drāvayan bahv aśobhata
GE07mbh_06_u:096.008c: trātāraṃ nādhyagacchanta paṅke magnā iva dvipāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.009c: abhimanyuḥ sthito rājan vidhūmo 'gnir iva jvalan
GE07mbh_06_u:096.010a: na cainaṃ tāvakāḥ sarve viṣehur arighātinam
GE07mbh_06_u:096.012a: hemapṛṣṭhaṃ dhanuś cāsya dadṛśe carato diśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.013a: śarāś ca niśitāḥ pītā niścaranti sma saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:096.013c: vanāt phulladrumād rājan bhramarāṇām iva vrajāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.015a: mohayitvā kṛpaṃ droṇaṃ drauṇiṃ ca sa bṛhadbalam
GE07mbh_06_u:096.015c: saindhavaṃ ca maheṣvāsaṃ vyacaral laghu suṣṭhu ca
GE07mbh_06_u:096.017a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā kṣatriyāḥ śūrāḥ pratapantaṃ śarārcibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.017c: dviphalgunam imaṃ lokaṃ menire tasya karmabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.018c: babhrāma tatra tatraiva yoṣin madavaśād iva
GE07mbh_06_u:096.019a: drāvayitvā ca tat sainyaṃ kampayitvā mahārathān
GE07mbh_06_u:096.019c: nandayām āsa suhṛdo mayaṃ jitveva vāsavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.021a: taṃ śrutvā ninadaṃ ghoraṃ tava sainyasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:096.022a: eṣa kārṣṇir maheṣvāso dvitīya iva phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.022c: camūṃ drāvayate krodhād vṛtro devacamūm iva
GE07mbh_06_u:096.023a: tasya nānyaṃ prapaśyāmi saṃyuge bheṣajaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:096.024a: sa gatvā tvaritaṃ vīraṃ jahi saubhadram āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:096.025a: sa evam ukto balavān rākṣasendraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_06_u:096.025c: prayayau samare tūrṇaṃ tava putrasya śāsanāt
GE07mbh_06_u:096.026a: tasya śabdena mahatā pāṇḍavānāṃ mahad balam
GE07mbh_06_u:096.027a: bahavaś ca narā rājaṃs tasya nādena bhīṣitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.028c: nṛtyann iva rathopasthe tad rakṣaḥ samupādravat
GE07mbh_06_u:096.029a: tataḥ sa rākṣasaḥ kruddhaḥ saṃprāpyaivārjuniṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:096.029c: nātidūre sthitas tasya drāvayām āsa vai camūm
GE07mbh_06_u:096.030c: pratyudyayau raṇe rakṣo devasenā yathā balim
GE07mbh_06_u:096.031a: vimardaḥ sumahān āsīt tasya sainyasya māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:096.032c: vyadrāvayad raṇe rakṣo darśayad vai parākramam
GE07mbh_06_u:096.033a: sā vadhyamānā ca tathā pāṇḍavānām anīkinī
GE07mbh_06_u:096.034a: tāṃ pramṛdya tataḥ senāṃ padminīṃ vāraṇo yathā
GE07mbh_06_u:096.035a: te tu kruddhā maheṣvāsā draupadeyāḥ prahāriṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.035c: rākṣasaṃ dudruvuḥ sarve grahāḥ pañca yathā ravim
GE07mbh_06_u:096.036a: vīryavadbhis tatas tais tu pīḍito rākṣasottamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.036c: yathā yugakṣaye ghore candramāḥ pañcabhir grahaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.037a: prativindhyas tato rakṣo bibheda niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.040a: tatas te bhrātaraḥ pañca rākṣasendraṃ mahāhave
GE07mbh_06_u:096.041a: sa nirbhinnaḥ śarair ghorair bhujagaiḥ kopitair iva
GE07mbh_06_u:096.041c: alambuso bhṛśaṃ rājan nāgendra iva cukrudhe
GE07mbh_06_u:096.041d-0386_01: nirbhiṇṇas tu śarair ghorair dīpyamānaḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.041d-0386_02: alaṃbuso bhṛśaṃ bhāti ulkābhir iva kuñjaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.042c: praviveśa tamo dīrghaṃ pīḍitas tair mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.043c: ciccheda sāyakais teṣāṃ dhvajāṃś caiva dhanūṃṣi ca
GE07mbh_06_u:096.044a: ekaikaṃ ca tribhir bāṇair ājaghāna smayann iva
GE07mbh_06_u:096.045a: tvaramāṇaś ca saṃkruddho hayāṃs teṣāṃ mahātmanām
GE07mbh_06_u:096.045c: jaghāna rākṣasaḥ kruddhaḥ sārathīṃś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.046a: bibheda ca susaṃhṛṣṭaḥ punaś cainān susaṃśitaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.047a: virathāṃś ca maheṣvāsān kṛtvā tatra sa rākṣasaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:096.048a: tān arditān raṇe tena rākṣasena durātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:096.049c: dadṛśus tāvakāḥ sarve pāṇḍavāś ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.002c: tan mamācakṣva tattvena yathā vṛttaṃ sma saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:097.003a: dhanaṃjayaś ca kiṃ cakre mama sainyeṣu saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:097.003c: bhīmo vā balināṃ śreṣṭho rākṣaso vā ghaṭotkacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.004a: nakulaḥ sahadevo vā sātyakir vā mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.004c: etad ācakṣva me sarvaṃ kuśalo hy asi saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:097.006a: arjunaś ca yathā saṃkhye bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.006c: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca raṇe cakruḥ parākramam
GE07mbh_06_u:097.009a: saubhadro 'pi raṇe rājan siṃhavad vinadan muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.010c: rathābhyāṃ rathināṃ śreṣṭhau yathā vai devadānavau
GE07mbh_06_u:097.011a: tataḥ kārṣṇir mahārāja niśitaiḥ sāyakais tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.011c: ārśyaśṛṅgiṃ raṇe viddhvā punar vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.012c: hṛdi vivyādha vegena tottrair iva mahādvipam
GE07mbh_06_u:097.013c: arjunasya sutaṃ saṃkhye pīḍayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:097.015a: te tasya viviśus tūrṇaṃ kāyaṃ nirbhidya marmaṇi
GE07mbh_06_u:097.015e: puṣpitaiḥ kiṃśukai rājan saṃstīrṇa iva parvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.016a: sa dhārayañ śarān hemapuṅkhān api mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.018a: tena te viśikhā muktā yamadaṇḍopamāḥ śitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.020a: saubhadras tu raṇe rakṣaḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.020c: cakre vimukham āsādya mayaṃ śakra ivāhave
GE07mbh_06_u:097.021a: vimukhaṃ ca tato rakṣo vadhyamānaṃ raṇe 'riṇā
GE07mbh_06_u:097.022a: tatas te tamasā sarve hṛtā hy āsan mahītale
GE07mbh_06_u:097.022c: nābhimanyum apaśyanta naiva svān na parān raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:097.023a: abhimanyuś ca tad dṛṣṭvā ghorarūpaṃ mahat tamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.024a: tataḥ prakāśam abhavaj jagat sarvaṃ mahīpate
GE07mbh_06_u:097.024c: tāṃ cāpi jaghnivān māyāṃ rākṣasasya durātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.026a: bahvīs tathānyā māyāś ca prayuktās tena rakṣasā
GE07mbh_06_u:097.027a: hatamāyaṃ tato rakṣo vadhyamānaṃ ca sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.027c: rathaṃ tatraiva saṃtyajya prādravan mahato bhayāt
GE07mbh_06_u:097.028b-0389_01: saubhadraś ca mahābāhuḥ samare ca jitaśramaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.028c: ārjuniḥ samare sainyaṃ tāvakaṃ saṃmamarda ha
GE07mbh_06_u:097.030c: ekaṃ subahavo yuddhe tatakṣuḥ sāyakair dṛḍham
GE07mbh_06_u:097.031a: sa teṣāṃ rathināṃ vīraḥ pitus tulyaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.032a: ubhayoḥ sadṛśaṃ karma sa pitur mātulasya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:097.033a: tato dhanaṃjayo rājan vinighnaṃs tava sainikān
GE07mbh_06_u:097.034a: tathaiva samare rājan pitā devavratas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:097.034c: āsasāda raṇe pārthaṃ svarbhānur iva bhāskaram
GE07mbh_06_u:097.035a: tataḥ sarathanāgāśvāḥ putrās tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:097.035c: parivavrū raṇe bhīṣmaṃ jugupuś ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.037a: śāradvatas tato rājan bhīṣmasya pramukhe sthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:097.038a: patyudgamyātha vivyādha sātyakis taṃ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.040a: śaineyo 'pi tataḥ kruddho bhṛśaṃ viddho mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.042c: abhyadravad raṇe drauṇiṃ rāhuḥ khe śaśinaṃ yathā
GE07mbh_06_u:097.043a: tasya droṇasutaś cāpaṃ dvidhā ciccheda bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:097.044c: drauṇiṃ ṣaṣṭyā mahārāja bāhvor urasi cārpayat
GE07mbh_06_u:097.045a: sa viddho vyathitaś caiva muhūrtaṃ kaśmalāyutaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.047a: śaineyaṃ sa tu nirbhidya prāviśad dharaṇītalam
GE07mbh_06_u:097.048c: ciccheda samare drauṇiḥ siṃhanādaṃ nanāda ca
GE07mbh_06_u:097.049a: punaś cainaṃ śarair ghoraiś chādayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:097.050a: sātyakiś ca mahārāja śarajālaṃ nihatya tat
GE07mbh_06_u:097.051a: tāpayām āsa ca drauṇiṃ śaineyaḥ paravīrahā
GE07mbh_06_u:097.052a: śarāṇāṃ ca sahasreṇa punar enaṃ samudyatam
GE07mbh_06_u:097.052c: sātyakiś chādayām āsa nanāda ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.053a: dṛṣṭvā putraṃ tathā grastaṃ rāhuṇeva niśākaram
GE07mbh_06_u:097.055a: sātyakis tu raṇe jitvā guruputraṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:097.056c: abhyadravad raṇe kruddho droṇaṃ prati mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:097.057a: tato droṇaś ca pārthaś ca sameyātāṃ mahāmṛdhe
GE07mbh_06_u:097.057c: yathā budhaś ca śukraś ca mahārāja nabhastale
GE07mbh_06_u:098.001a: kathaṃ droṇo maheṣvāsaḥ pāṇḍavaś ca dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:098.001c: samīyatū raṇe śūrau tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:098.002a: priyo hi pāṇḍavo nityaṃ bhāradvājasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:098.002c: ācāryaś ca raṇe nityaṃ priyaḥ pārthasya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:098.003a: tāv ubhau rathinau saṃkhye dṛptau siṃhāv ivotkaṭau
GE07mbh_06_u:098.004a: na droṇaḥ samare pārthaṃ jānīte priyam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:098.004c: kṣatradharmaṃ puraskṛtya pārtho vā gurum āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:098.004d-0390_01: tathaiva pāṇḍavo droṇaṃ vetty eva priyam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:098.005a: na kṣatriyā raṇe rājan varjayanti parasparam
GE07mbh_06_u:098.005c: nirmaryādaṃ hi yudhyante pitṛbhir bhrātṛbhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:098.006a: raṇe bhārata pārthena droṇo viddhas tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:098.007a: śaravṛṣṭyā punaḥ pārthaś chādayām āsa taṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:098.008c: vārayām āsa rājendra nacirād iva bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:098.010a: trigartarāḍ api kruddho bhṛśam āyamya kārmukam
GE07mbh_06_u:098.010c: chādayām āsa samare pārthaṃ bāṇair ayomukhaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:098.011a: tābhyāṃ muktāḥ śarā rājann antarikṣe virejire
GE07mbh_06_u:098.012a: te śarāḥ prāpya kaunteyaṃ samastā viviśuḥ prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:098.013a: arjunas tu raṇe nādaṃ vinadya rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:098.014e: mumucuḥ śaravṛṣṭiṃ ca pāṇḍavasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:098.015a: śaravṛṣṭiṃ tatas tāṃ tu śaravarṣeṇa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:098.017a: yad eko vārayām āsa māruto 'bhragaṇān iva
GE07mbh_06_u:098.018a: atha kruddho raṇe pārthas trigartān prati bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:098.019c: pātayan vai tarugaṇān vinighnaṃś caiva sainikān
GE07mbh_06_u:098.020c: śailam anyan mahārāja ghoram astraṃ mumoca ha
GE07mbh_06_u:098.021a: droṇena yudhi nirmukte tasminn astre mahāmṛdhe
GE07mbh_06_u:098.021c: praśaśāma tato vāyuḥ prasannāś cābhavan diśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:098.023a: tato duryodhano rājā kṛpaś ca rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:098.023c: aśvatthāmā tataḥ śalyaḥ kāmbojaś ca sudakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:098.025a: tathaiva bhagadattaś ca śrutāyuś ca mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:098.026a: bhūriśravāḥ śalaś caiva saubalaś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:098.027a: bhīṣmas tu sahitaḥ sarvair dhārtarāṣṭrasya sainikaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:098.028c: lelihan sṛkkiṇī vīro mṛgarāḍ iva kānane
GE07mbh_06_u:098.029a: tatas tu rathināṃ śreṣṭho gadāṃ gṛhya mahāhave
GE07mbh_06_u:098.029c: avaplutya rathāt tūrṇaṃ tava sainyam abhīṣayat
GE07mbh_06_u:098.029d-0391_02: tasthau sa sagado bhīmaḥ saśṛṅga iva parvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:098.030a: tam udvīkṣya gadāhastaṃ tatas te gajasādinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:098.033c: ārtanādaṃ raṇe cakrur garjanto jaladā iva
GE07mbh_06_u:098.034a: bahudhā dāritaś caiva viṣāṇais tatra dantibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:098.034d-0392_01: sādināṃ śastravṛṣṭiṃ ca vyadhamad gadayā tataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:098.037a: evaṃ te vadhyamānās tu hataśeṣā mahāgajāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:098.037c: prādravanta diśo rājan vimṛdnantaḥ svakaṃ balam
GE07mbh_06_u:099.003a: saṃmamarda ca tat sainyaṃ pitā devavratas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:099.003c: dhānyānām iva lūnānāṃ prakaraṃ gogaṇā iva
GE07mbh_06_u:099.004a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaḥ śikhaṇḍī ca virāṭo drupadas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:099.004c: bhīṣmam āsādya samare śarair jaghnur mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:099.005a: dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ tato viddhvā virāṭaṃ ca tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:099.005c: drupadasya ca nārācaṃ preṣayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:099.007a: śikhaṇḍī taṃ ca vivyādha bharatānāṃ pitāmaham
GE07mbh_06_u:099.007c: strīmayaṃ manasā dhyātvā nāsmai prāharad acyutaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:099.008a: dhṛṣṭadyumnas tu samare krodhād agnir iva jvalan
GE07mbh_06_u:099.008c: pitāmahaṃ tribhir bāṇair bāhvor urasi cārpayat
GE07mbh_06_u:099.011a: tān pratyavidhyad gāṅgeyas tribhis tribhir ajihmagaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:099.011c: drupadasya ca bhallena dhanuś ciccheda māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:099.012a: so 'nyat kārmukam ādāya bhīṣmaṃ vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:099.012c: sārathiṃ ca tribhir bāṇaiḥ suśitai raṇamūrdhani
GE07mbh_06_u:099.013a: tato bhīmo mahārāja draupadyāḥ pañca cātmajāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:099.013c: kekayā bhrātaraḥ pañca sātyakiś caiva sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:099.016a: tatrāsīt sumahad yuddhaṃ tava teṣāṃ ca saṃkulam
GE07mbh_06_u:099.018c: astraiś ca vividhair ghorais tatra tatra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:099.019a: rathāś ca rathibhir hīnā hatasārathayas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:099.020a: mardamānā narān rājan hayāṃś ca subahūn raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:099.021a: rathinaś ca rathair hīnā varmiṇas tejasā yutāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:099.022c: ṛddhyā vaiśravaṇaṃ cāti nayena ca bṛhaspatim
GE07mbh_06_u:099.023a: sarvalokeśvarāḥ śūrās tatra tatra viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:099.025a: varmabhiś cāmaraiś chatraiḥ patākābhiś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:099.025c: kakṣyābhir atha tottraiś ca ghaṇṭābhis tomarais tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:099.026a: viśīrṇair vipradhāvanto dṛśyante sma diśo daśa
GE07mbh_06_u:099.027a: tathaiva dantibhir hīnān gajārohān viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:099.030c: yayau vimṛdnaṃs tarasā padātīn vājinas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:099.030d-0394_01: aśvān aśvaiś ca saṃmardya rathaiś ca rathinas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:099.031a: tathaiva ca rathān rājan saṃmamarda raṇe gajaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:099.031c: rathaś caiva samāsādya padātiṃ turagaṃ tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:099.032a: vyamṛdnāt samare rājaṃs turagāṃś ca narān raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:099.032c: evaṃ te bahudhā rājan pramṛdnantaḥ parasparam
GE07mbh_06_u:099.032d-0395_01: dṛśyante sma mahābāho tatra tatra mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:099.033a: tasmin raudre tathā yuddhe vartamāne mahābhaye
GE07mbh_06_u:099.037c: praterur bahavo rājan bhayaṃ tyaktvā mahāhave
GE07mbh_06_u:099.039a: prākrośan kṣatriyās tatra dṛṣṭvā tad vaiśasaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:099.041a: evaṃ bahuvidhā vācaḥ śrūyante smātra bhārata

GE07mbh_06_u:099.045a: yat purā na nigṛhṇīṣe vāryamāṇo mahātmabhiḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:099.046c: rakṣanti samare prāṇān kauravā vā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:099.047a: etasmāt kāraṇād ghoro vartate sma janakṣayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:099.047c: daivād vā puruṣavyāghra tava cāpanayān nṛpa
GE07mbh_06_u:100.002a: suśarmāpi tato bāṇaiḥ pārthaṃ vivyādha saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:100.002c: vāsudevaṃ ca saptatyā pārthaṃ ca navabhiḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:100.004c: vyadravanta raṇe rājan bhaye jāte mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:100.005a: utsṛjya turagān ke cid rathān ke cic ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:100.005c: gajān anye samutsṛjya prādravanta diśo daśa
GE07mbh_06_u:100.006c: tvarayā parayā yuktāḥ prādravanta viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:100.006d-0399_01: kaśābhis tāḍayām āsuḥ pārṣṇibhiś ca mahur muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:100.006d-0399_03: tathā tottranipātaiś ca aṅkuśānāṃ ca vibhramaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:100.006d-0399_05: rathinaś ca pratodaiś ca vāgbhiś caiva punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:100.006d-0399_06: bhartsayanto hayān rājan prādravanti diśo daśa
GE07mbh_06_u:100.007c: nirapekṣā vyadhāvanta tena tena sma bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:100.008d-0400_01: putrāṃś ca patitān bhūmau mātulāṃś ca pitṝṃs tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:100.008d-0400_02: sodarāṃś cāvamardantaḥ pradrutās tatra tatra vai
GE07mbh_06_u:100.009a: tad balaṃ pradrutaṃ dṛṣṭvā putro duryodhanas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:100.011a: sa ekaḥ samare tasthau kiran bahuvidhāñ śarān
GE07mbh_06_u:100.011c: bhrātṛbhiḥ sahitaḥ sarvaiḥ śeṣā vipradrutā narāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:100.015a: ekībhūtās tataḥ sarve kuravaḥ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:100.016c: atiṣṭhad āhave śūraḥ kiran bāṇān sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:100.017a: tathaiva drupado rājā droṇaṃ viddhvā śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:100.017c: punar vivyādha saptatyā sārathiṃ cāsya saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:100.019c: citrasenaṃ tribhir bāṇair vivyādha hṛdaye bhṛśam
GE07mbh_06_u:100.020a: samāgatau tau tu raṇe mahāmātrau vyarocatām
GE07mbh_06_u:100.021a: tasyāśvāṃś caturo hatvā sūtaṃ ca navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:100.022a: hatāśvāt tu rathāt tūrṇam avaplutya mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:100.022c: āruroha rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ durmukhasya viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:100.023a: droṇaś ca drupadaṃ viddhvā śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:100.025a: bhīmasenas tu rājānaṃ muhūrtād iva bāhlikam
GE07mbh_06_u:100.028a: sa viddhvā bhārataṃ ṣaṣṭyā niśitair lomavāhibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:100.032a: vārṣṇeyas tu tato rājan svāṃ śaktiṃ ghoradarśanām
GE07mbh_06_u:100.034a: tām āpatantīṃ sahasā dvidhā ciccheda bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:100.035a: chittvā tu śaktiṃ gāṅgeyaḥ sātyakiṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:101.001a: dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmaṃ raṇe kruddhaṃ pāṇḍavair abhisaṃvṛtam
GE07mbh_06_u:101.001c: yathā meghair mahārāja tapānte divi bhāskaram
GE07mbh_06_u:101.003c: tasya kāryaṃ tvayā vīra rakṣaṇaṃ sumahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:101.004c: nihanyāt samare yattān pāñcālān pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:101.005c: goptā hy eṣa maheṣvāso bhīṣmo 'smākaṃ pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:101.007a: evam uktas tu samare putro duḥśāsanas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:101.007c: parivārya sthito bhīṣmaṃ sainyena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:101.010a: nakulaṃ sahadevaṃ ca dharmarājaṃ ca pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_06_u:101.012c: khurāhatā dharā rājaṃś cakampe ca nanāda ca
GE07mbh_06_u:101.013a: khuraśabdaś ca sumahān vājināṃ śuśruve tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:101.014a: utpatadbhiś ca tais tatra samuddhūtaṃ mahad rajaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:101.015a: vegavadbhir hayais tais tu kṣobhitaṃ pāṇḍavaṃ balam
GE07mbh_06_u:101.015c: nipatadbhir mahāvegair haṃsair iva mahat saraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:101.015e: heṣatāṃ caiva śabdena na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:101.015f-0402_01: antardadhe mahāñ śabdas tena śabdena mohitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:101.016a: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_06_u:101.018a: tatas te rathino rājañ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:101.019c: nāgair iva mahānāgā yathā syur girigahvare
GE07mbh_06_u:101.022a: sasādino hayā rājaṃs tatra tatra niṣūditāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:101.023a: vadhyamānā hayās te tu prādravanta bhayārditāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:101.023d-0403_01: evaṃ tu saubalaṃ sainyaṃ prabhagnaṃ sarvatodiśam
GE07mbh_06_u:101.024a: pāṇḍavās tu mahārāja jitvā śatrūn mahāhave
GE07mbh_06_u:101.024c: dadhmuḥ śaṅkhāṃś ca bherīś ca tāḍayām āsur āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:101.025a: tato duryodhano dṛṣṭvā dīnaṃ sainyam avasthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:101.026a: eṣa pāṇḍusuto jyeṣṭho jitvā mātula māmakān
GE07mbh_06_u:101.026c: paśyatāṃ no mahābāho senāṃ drāvayate balī
GE07mbh_06_u:101.028a: putrasya tava tad vākyaṃ śrutvā śalyaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_06_u:101.029a: tad āpatad vai sahasā śalyasya sumahad balam
GE07mbh_06_u:101.030e: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca tribhis tribhir ajihmagaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:101.031a: madrarājo 'pi tān sarvān ājaghāna tribhis tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:101.031c: yudhiṣṭhiraṃ punaḥ ṣaṣṭyā vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:101.031e: mādrīputrau ca saṃrabdhau dvābhyāṃ dvābhyām atāḍayat
GE07mbh_06_u:101.032a: tato bhīmo mahābāhur dṛṣṭvā rājānam āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:101.032f-0405_01: āpatann eva bhīmas tu madrarājam atāḍayat
GE07mbh_06_u:101.032f-0405_03: tato bhīṣmaś ca droṇaś ca sainyena mahatā vṛtau
GE07mbh_06_u:102.001a: tataḥ pitā tava kruddho niśitaiḥ sāyakottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.002a: bhīmaṃ dvādaśabhir viddhvā sātyakiṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.002c: nakulaṃ ca tribhir bāṇaiḥ sahadevaṃ ca saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.004a: taṃ dvādaśārdhair nakulo mādhavaś ca tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.004b-0407_01: sahadevaś ca saptatyā pārthaś ca navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.004c: dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca saptatyā bhīmasenaś ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.005a: droṇas tu sātyakiṃ viddhvā bhīmasenam avidhyata
GE07mbh_06_u:102.006a: tau ca taṃ pratyavidhyetāṃ tribhis tribhir ajihmagaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.007e: saṃgrāme nājahur bhīṣmaṃ vadhyamānāḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.010d-0409_01: yathā hi sumahān agniḥ kakṣe carati sānilaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.010d-0409_02: tathā bhīṣmo mahārāja divyam astram udīrayan
GE07mbh_06_u:102.012a: apātayad dhvajāṃś caiva rathinaś ca śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.013a: nirmanuṣyān rathān rājan gajān aśvāṃś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:102.015a: amoghā hy apatan bāṇāḥ pitus te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:102.016a: hatavīrān rathān rājan saṃyuktāñ javanair hayaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.019a: bhagnākṣopaskarān kāṃś cid bhagnacakrāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.020a: savarūthai rathair bhagnai rathibhiś ca nipātitaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.020c: śaraiḥ sukavacaiś chinnaiḥ paṭṭiśaiś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:102.021a: gadābhir musalaiś caiva nistriṃśaiś ca śilīmukhaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.021c: anukarṣair upāsaṅgaiś cakrair bhagnaiś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:102.022a: bāhubhiḥ kārmukaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ śirobhiś ca sakuṇḍalaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.022c: talatrair aṅgulitraiś ca dhvajaiś ca vinipātitaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.022e: cāpaiś ca bahudhā chinnaiḥ samāstīryata medinī
GE07mbh_06_u:102.023a: hatārohā gajā rājan hayāś ca hatasādinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.024a: yatamānāś ca te vīrā dravamāṇān mahārathān
GE07mbh_06_u:102.025c: abhajyata mahārāja na ca dvau saha dhāvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.027a: jaghānātra pitā putraṃ putraś ca pitaraṃ tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:102.030c: uvāca pārthaṃ bībhatsuṃ nigṛhya ratham uttamam
GE07mbh_06_u:102.031a: ayaṃ sa kālaḥ saṃprāptaḥ pārtha yaḥ kāṅkṣitas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:102.031c: praharāsmai naravyāghra na cen mohāt pramuhyase
GE07mbh_06_u:102.032a: yat purā kathitaṃ vīra tvayā rājñāṃ samāgame
GE07mbh_06_u:102.033c: sānubandhān haniṣyāmi ye māṃ yotsyanti saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:102.034a: iti tat kuru kaunteya satyaṃ vākyam ariṃdama
GE07mbh_06_u:102.035c: akāma iva bībhatsur idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:102.036a: avadhyānāṃ vadhaṃ kṛtvā rājyaṃ vā narakottaram
GE07mbh_06_u:102.036c: duḥkhāni vanavāse vā kiṃ nu me sukṛtaṃ bhavet
GE07mbh_06_u:102.037a: codayāśvān yato bhīṣmaḥ kariṣye vacanaṃ tava
GE07mbh_06_u:102.038c: yato bhīṣmas tato rājan duṣprekṣyo raśmivān iva
GE07mbh_06_u:102.039a: tatas tat punar āvṛttaṃ yudhiṣṭhirabalaṃ mahat
GE07mbh_06_u:102.040a: tato bhīṣmaḥ kuruśreṣṭhaḥ siṃhavad vinadan muhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.041a: kṣaṇena sa rathas tasya sahayaḥ sahasārathiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.041c: śaravarṣeṇa mahatā na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:102.042a: vāsudevas tv asaṃbhrānto dhairyam āsthāya sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.042c: codayām āsa tān aśvān vitunnān bhīṣmasāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.043a: tataḥ pārtho dhanur gṛhya divyaṃ jaladanisvanam
GE07mbh_06_u:102.043c: pātayām āsa bhīṣmasya dhanuś chittvā śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.044a: sa cchinnadhanvā kauravyaḥ punar anyan mahad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.045c: athāsya tad api kruddhaś ciccheda dhanur arjunaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.046a: tasya tat pūjayām āsa lāghavaṃ śaṃtanoḥ sutaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.046c: sādhu pārtha mahābāho sādhu kuntīsuteti ca
GE07mbh_06_u:102.047c: mumoca samare bhīṣmaḥ śarān pārtharathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:102.048c: moghān kurvañ śarāṃs tasya maṇḍalāni vidarśayan
GE07mbh_06_u:102.049d-0411_02: pāṇḍavānāṃ ca mukhyasya kurūṇāṃ pravarasya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:102.050c: bhīṣmaṃ ca śaravarṣāṇi sṛjantam aniśaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:102.052a: yugāntam iva kurvāṇaṃ bhīṣmaṃ yaudhiṣṭhire bale
GE07mbh_06_u:102.052d-0412_01: vāsudevas tu saṃkruddho roṣāj jajvāla saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:102.054c: dārayann iva padbhyāṃ sa jagatīṃ jagatīśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.055c: grasann iva ca cetāṃsi tāvakānāṃ mahāhave
GE07mbh_06_u:102.056c: hato bhīṣmo hato bhīṣma iti tatra sma sainikāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.058a: sa siṃha iva mātaṅgaṃ yūtharṣabha ivarṣabham
GE07mbh_06_u:102.059c: asaṃbhramaṃ raṇe bhīṣmo vicakarṣa mahad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.060a: ehy ehi puṇḍarīkākṣa devadeva namo 'stu te
GE07mbh_06_u:102.061a: tvayā hi deva saṃgrāme hatasyāpi mamānagha
GE07mbh_06_u:102.061c: śreya eva paraṃ kṛṣṇa loke 'muṣminn ihaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:102.061f-0414_01: praharasva yatheṣṭaṃ vai dāso 'smi tava cānagha
GE07mbh_06_u:102.061f-0415_02: yo yogibhiś ca duṣprāpyaḥ sa ghātārtham ihāgataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.062a: anvag eva tataḥ pārthas tam anudrutya keśavam
GE07mbh_06_u:102.064a: pārthas tu viṣṭabhya balāc caraṇau paravīrahā
GE07mbh_06_u:102.064c: nijaghrāha hṛṣīkeśaṃ kathaṃ cid daśame pade
GE07mbh_06_u:102.066c: yat tvayā kathitaṃ pūrvaṃ na yotsyāmīti keśava
GE07mbh_06_u:102.067c: mamaiṣa bhāraḥ sarvo hi haniṣyāmi yatavratam
GE07mbh_06_u:102.068a: śape mādhava sakhyena satyena sukṛtena ca
GE07mbh_06_u:102.070a: mādhavas tu vacaḥ śrutvā phalgunasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.070c: nakiṃcid uktvā sakrodha āruroha rathaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.071a: tau rathasthau naravyāghrau bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.072a: prāṇāṃś cādatta yodhānāṃ pitā devavratas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:102.073a: yathā kurūṇāṃ sainyāni babhañja yudhi pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.073c: tathā pāṇḍavasainyāni babhañja yudhi te pitā
GE07mbh_06_u:102.074c: nirīkṣituṃ na śekus te bhīṣmam apratimaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:102.076c: pipīlikā iva kṣuṇṇā durbalā balinā raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:102.076d-0420_02: samare mṛditāḥ sarve pāṇḍavāḥ saha sṛñjayaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.077a: mahārathaṃ bhārata duṣpradharṣaṃ; śaraughiṇaṃ pratapantaṃ narendrān
GE07mbh_06_u:102.077c: bhīṣmaṃ na śekuḥ prativīkṣituṃ te; śarārciṣaṃ sūryam ivātapantam
GE07mbh_06_u:102.078a: vimṛdnatas tasya tu pāṇḍusenām; astaṃ jagāmātha sahasraraśmiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:102.078c: tato balānāṃ śramakarśitānāṃ; mano 'vahāraṃ prati saṃbabhūva
GE07mbh_06_u:103.001a: yudhyatām eva teṣāṃ tu bhāskare 'stam upāgate
GE07mbh_06_u:103.001c: saṃdhyā samabhavad ghorā nāpaśyāma tato raṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.002a: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā saṃdhyāṃ saṃdṛśya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:103.003c: bhīṣmaṃ ca yudhi saṃrabdham anuyāntaṃ mahārathān
GE07mbh_06_u:103.004a: somakāṃś ca jitān dṛṣṭvā nirutsāhān mahārathān
GE07mbh_06_u:103.005c: tathaiva tava sainyānām avahāro hy abhūt tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:103.007a: bhīṣmasya samare karma cintayānās tu pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.007c: nālabhanta tadā śāntiṃ bhṛśaṃ bhīṣmeṇa pīḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.008a: bhīṣmo 'pi samare jitvā pāṇḍavān saha sṛñjayaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.008c: pūjyamānas tava sutair vandyamānaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:103.010a: tasmin rātrimukhe ghore pāṇḍavā vṛṣṇibhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:103.012a: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā mantrayitvā ciraṃ nṛpa
GE07mbh_06_u:103.012c: vāsudevaṃ samudvīkṣya vākyam etad uvāca ha
GE07mbh_06_u:103.015a: yathā ghoro mahānāgas takṣako vai viṣolbaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.015c: tathā bhīṣmo raṇe kṛṣṇa tīkṣṇaśastraḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_06_u:103.016a: gṛhītacāpaḥ samare vimuñcaṃś ca śitāñ śarān
GE07mbh_06_u:103.016c: śakyo jetuṃ yamaḥ kruddho vajrapāṇiś ca devarāṭ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.017a: varuṇaḥ pāśabhṛd vāpi sagado vā dhaneśvaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.017c: na tu bhīṣmaḥ susaṃkruddhaḥ śakyo jetuṃ mahāhave
GE07mbh_06_u:103.018a: so 'ham evaṃ gate kṛṣṇa nimagnaḥ śokasāgare
GE07mbh_06_u:103.019a: vanaṃ yāsyāmi durdharṣa śreyo me tatra vai gatam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.019c: na yuddhaṃ rocaye kṛṣṇa hanti bhīṣmo hi naḥ sadā
GE07mbh_06_u:103.020c: ekato mṛtyum abhyeti tathāhaṃ bhīṣmam īyivān
GE07mbh_06_u:103.021c: bhrātaraś caiva me śūrāḥ sāyakair bhṛśapīḍitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.023a: jīvitaṃ bahu manye 'haṃ jīvitaṃ hy adya durlabham
GE07mbh_06_u:103.024a: yadi te 'ham anugrāhyo bhrātṛbhiḥ saha keśava
GE07mbh_06_u:103.025a: etac chrutvā vacas tasya kāruṇyād bahuvistaram
GE07mbh_06_u:103.026a: dharmaputra viṣādaṃ tvaṃ mā kṛthāḥ satyasaṃgara
GE07mbh_06_u:103.026c: yasya te bhrātaraḥ śūrā durjayāḥ śatrusūdanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.028a: māṃ vā niyuṅkṣva sauhārdād yotsye bhīṣmeṇa pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_06_u:103.028c: tvatprayukto hy ahaṃ rājan kiṃ na kuryāṃ mahāhave
GE07mbh_06_u:103.030a: yadi bhīṣme hate rājañ jayaṃ paśyasi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_06_u:103.031a: paśya me vikramaṃ rājan mahendrasyeva saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:103.032a: yaḥ śatruḥ pāṇḍuputrāṇāṃ macchatruḥ sa na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.032c: madarthā bhavadarthā ye ye madīyās tavaiva te
GE07mbh_06_u:103.033a: tava bhrātā mama sakhā saṃbandhī śiṣya eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:103.033c: māṃsāny utkṛtya vai dadyām arjunārthe mahīpate
GE07mbh_06_u:103.034a: eṣa cāpi naravyāghro matkṛte jīvitaṃ tyajet
GE07mbh_06_u:103.034c: eṣa naḥ samayas tāta tārayema parasparam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.034e: sa māṃ niyuṅkṣva rājendra yāvad dvīpo bhavāmy aham
GE07mbh_06_u:103.035a: pratijñātam upaplavye yat tat pārthena pūrvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.036a: parirakṣyaṃ ca mama tad vacaḥ pārthasya dhīmataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.036c: anujñātaṃ tu pārthena mayā kāryaṃ na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.037a: atha vā phalgunasyaiṣa bhāraḥ parimito raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:103.038a: aśakyam api kuryād dhi raṇe pārthaḥ samudyataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.038e: nihanyād arjunaḥ saṃkhye kim u bhīṣmaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:103.040a: evam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi mādhava
GE07mbh_06_u:103.040c: sarve hy ete na paryāptās tava veganivāraṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:103.041c: yasya me puruṣavyāghra bhavān nātho mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.042a: sendrān api raṇe devāñ jayeyaṃ jayatāṃ vara
GE07mbh_06_u:103.042c: tvayā nāthena govinda kim u bhīṣmaṃ mahāhave
GE07mbh_06_u:103.043a: na tu tvām anṛtaṃ kartum utsahe svārthagauravāt
GE07mbh_06_u:103.044a: samayas tu kṛtaḥ kaś cid bhīṣmeṇa mama mādhava
GE07mbh_06_u:103.044c: mantrayiṣye tavārthāya na tu yotsye kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:103.044e: duryodhanārthe yotsyāmi satyam etad iti prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:103.045a: sa hi rājyasya me dātā mantrasyaiva ca mādhava
GE07mbh_06_u:103.046a: tad vayaṃ sahitā gatvā bhīṣmam āśu narottamam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.046c: rucite tava vārṣṇeya mantraṃ pṛcchāma kauravam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.047a: sa vakṣyati hitaṃ vākyaṃ tathyaṃ caiva janārdana
GE07mbh_06_u:103.047c: yathā sa vakṣyate kṛṣṇa tathā kartāsmi saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:103.048a: sa no jayasya dātā ca mantrasya ca dhṛtavrataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.048c: bālāḥ pitrā vihīnāś ca tena saṃvardhitā vayam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.049a: taṃ cet pitāmahaṃ vṛddhaṃ hantum icchāmi mādhava
GE07mbh_06_u:103.049b-0424_01: yasyāṅge krīḍitaṃ nityaṃ bālye ca parivardhitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.049b-0424_03: taṃ hantum udyatāḥ kṛṣṇa rājyahetor vayaṃ yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:103.049c: pituḥ pitaram iṣṭaṃ vai dhig astu kṣatrajīvikām
GE07mbh_06_u:103.049d-0425_01: satyaṃ bṛhaspater vākyaṃ devānām agrataḥ kila
GE07mbh_06_u:103.049d-0425_02: bhāṣitaṃ guruṇā pūrvaṃ tan nibodha janārdana
GE07mbh_06_u:103.049d-0425_03: putraḥ pitaram āsādya pitā putraṃ ca mānada
GE07mbh_06_u:103.050c: rocate me mahābāho satataṃ tava bhāṣitam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.051e: vaktum arhati satyaṃ sa tvayā pṛṣṭo viśeṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.052a: te vayaṃ tatra gacchāmaḥ praṣṭuṃ kurupitāmaham
GE07mbh_06_u:103.052c: praṇamya śirasā cainaṃ mantraṃ pṛcchāma mādhava
GE07mbh_06_u:103.052e: sa no dāsyati yaṃ mantraṃ tena yotsyāmahe parān
GE07mbh_06_u:103.053a: evaṃ saṃmantrya vai vīrāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ pāṇḍupūrvaja
GE07mbh_06_u:103.053c: jagmus te sahitāḥ sarve vāsudevaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:103.054a: praviśya ca tadā bhīṣmaṃ śirobhiḥ pratipedire
GE07mbh_06_u:103.054e: praṇamya śirasā cainaṃ bhīṣmaṃ śaraṇam anvayuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.054f-0426_02: mūrdhni caitān upāghrāya aṅkam āropayat tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:103.055c: svāgataṃ tava vārṣṇeya svāgataṃ te dhanaṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:103.056a: kiṃ kāryaṃ vaḥ karomy adya yuṣmatprītivivardhanam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.056b-0427_01: yuddhād anyatra he vatsāḥ prīyantāṃ mā viśaṅkatha
GE07mbh_06_u:103.056c: sarvātmanā ca kartāsmi yady api syāt suduṣkaram
GE07mbh_06_u:103.057a: tathā bruvāṇaṃ gāṅgeyaṃ prītiyuktaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.057d-0428_01: yathā pṛcchasi mām adya kathaṃ tan me ca vā vibho
GE07mbh_06_u:103.058a: kathaṃ jayema dharmajña kathaṃ rājyaṃ labhemahi
GE07mbh_06_u:103.058c: prajānāṃ saṃkṣayo na syāt kathaṃ tan me vadābhibho
GE07mbh_06_u:103.059a: bhavān hi no vadhopāyaṃ bravītu svayam ātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.059c: bhavantaṃ samare rājan viṣahema kathaṃ vayam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.060a: na hi te sūkṣmam apy asti randhraṃ kurupitāmaha
GE07mbh_06_u:103.061a: nādadānaṃ saṃdadhānaṃ vikarṣantaṃ dhanur na ca
GE07mbh_06_u:103.061c: paśyāmas tvā mahābāho rathe sūryam iva sthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.062c: ka ivotsahate hantuṃ tvāṃ pumān bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:103.063c: kṣayaṃ nītā hi pṛtanā bhavatā mahatī mama
GE07mbh_06_u:103.064a: yathā yudhi jayeyaṃ tvāṃ yathā rājyaṃ bhaven mama
GE07mbh_06_u:103.064c: bhavet sainyasya vā śāntis tan me brūhi pitāmaha
GE07mbh_06_u:103.065c: na kathaṃ cana kaunteya mayi jīvati saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:103.065e: yuṣmāsu dṛśyate vṛddhiḥ satyam etad bravīmi vaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.066a: nirjite mayi yuddhe tu dhruvaṃ jeṣyatha kauravān
GE07mbh_06_u:103.066c: kṣipraṃ mayi praharata yadīcchatha raṇe jayam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.067a: evaṃ hi sukṛtaṃ manye bhavatāṃ vidito hy aham
GE07mbh_06_u:103.067c: hate mayi hataṃ sarvaṃ tasmād evaṃ vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:103.068a: brūhi tasmād upāyaṃ no yathā yuddhe jayemahi
GE07mbh_06_u:103.069a: śakyo vajradharo jetuṃ varuṇo 'tha yamas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:103.069c: na bhavān samare śakyaḥ sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.070a: satyam etan mahābāho yathā vadasi pāṇḍava
GE07mbh_06_u:103.070c: nāhaṃ śakyo raṇe jetuṃ sendrair api surāsuraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.071c: nyastaśastraṃ tu māṃ rājan hanyur yudhi mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.072c: dravamāṇe ca bhīte ca tavāsmīti ca vādini
GE07mbh_06_u:103.073c: aprasūte ca duṣprekṣye na yuddhaṃ rocate mama
GE07mbh_06_u:103.074a: imaṃ ca śṛṇu me pārtha saṃkalpaṃ pūrvacintitam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.074c: amaṅgalyadhvajaṃ dṛṣṭvā na yudhyeyaṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:103.075a: ya eṣa draupado rājaṃs tava sainye mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.075b-0430_01: apumāṃs tasya putras tu pūrvam āsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:103.076a: yathābhavac ca strī pūrvaṃ paścāt puṃstvam upāgataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.076c: jānanti ca bhavanto 'pi sarvam etad yathātatham
GE07mbh_06_u:103.077c: mām eva viśikhais tūrṇam abhidravatu daṃśitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.078c: na prahartum abhīpsāmi gṛhīteṣuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:103.079a: tad antaraṃ samāsādya pāṇḍavo māṃ dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.080a: na taṃ paśyāmi lokeṣu yo māṃ hanyāt samudyatam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.080c: ṛte kṛṣṇān mahābhāgāt pāṇḍavād vā dhanaṃjayāt
GE07mbh_06_u:103.081a: eṣa tasmāt purodhāya kaṃ cid anyaṃ mamāgrataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.081c: māṃ pātayatu bībhatsur evaṃ te vijayo bhavet
GE07mbh_06_u:103.082a: etat kuruṣva kaunteya yathoktaṃ vacanaṃ mama
GE07mbh_06_u:103.083a: te 'nujñātās tataḥ pārthā jagmuḥ svaśibiraṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:103.086a: krīḍatā hi mayā bālye vāsudeva mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.087c: tātety avocaṃ pitaraṃ pituḥ pāṇḍor mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.088a: nāhaṃ tātas tava pitus tāto 'smi tava bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:103.088c: iti mām abravīd bālye yaḥ sa vadhyaḥ kathaṃ mayā
GE07mbh_06_u:103.089a: kāmaṃ vadhyatu me sainyaṃ nāhaṃ yotsye mahātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:103.089c: jayo vāstu vadho vā me kathaṃ vā kṛṣṇa manyase
GE07mbh_06_u:103.089d-0431_01: katham asmadvidhaḥ kṛṣṇa jānan dharmaṃ sanātanam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.089d-0431_02: nyastaśastre ca vṛddhe ca prahared dhi pitāmahe
GE07mbh_06_u:103.090a: pratijñāya vadhaṃ jiṣṇo purā bhīṣmasya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:103.090c: kṣatradharme sthitaḥ pārtha kathaṃ nainaṃ haniṣyasi
GE07mbh_06_u:103.091a: pātayainaṃ rathāt pārtha vajrāhatam iva drumam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.091c: nāhatvā yudhi gāṅgeyaṃ vijayas te bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_06_u:103.092a: diṣṭam etat purā devair bhaviṣyaty avaśasya te
GE07mbh_06_u:103.092c: hantā bhīṣmasya pūrvendra iti tan na tad anyathā
GE07mbh_06_u:103.093a: na hi bhīṣmaṃ durādharṣaṃ vyāttānanam ivāntakam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.093c: tvad anyaḥ śaknuyād dhantum api vajradharaḥ svayam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.094a: jahi bhīṣmaṃ mahābāho śṛṇu cedaṃ vaco mama
GE07mbh_06_u:103.095a: jyāyāṃsam api cec chakra guṇair api samanvitam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.097a: śikhaṇḍī nidhanaṃ kṛṣṇa bhīṣmasya bhavitā dhruvam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.097c: dṛṣṭvaiva hi sadā bhīṣmaḥ pāñcālyaṃ vinivartate
GE07mbh_06_u:103.098a: te vayaṃ pramukhe tasya sthāpayitvā śikhaṇḍinam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.099c: śikhaṇḍy api yudhāṃ śreṣṭho bhīṣmam evābhiyāsyatu
GE07mbh_06_u:103.100a: śrutaṃ te kurumukhyasya nāhaṃ hanyāṃ śikhaṇḍinam
GE07mbh_06_u:103.100c: kanyā hy eṣā purā jātā puruṣaḥ samapadyata saṃjaya uvāca
GE07mbh_06_u:103.101a: ity evaṃ niścayaṃ kṛtvā pāṇḍavāḥ sahamādhavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:103.101d-0434_01: svān svān gṛhān abhigatās tāṃ rātrim avasan sukham
GE07mbh_06_u:104.001c: pāṇḍavāś ca tathā bhīṣmaṃ tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:104.004c: śikhaṇḍī sarvasainyānām agra āsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:104.005c: pṛṣṭhato draupadeyāś ca saubhadraś caiva vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:104.006a: sātyakiś cekitānaś ca teṣāṃ goptā mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:104.007a: tato yudhiṣṭhiro rājā yamābhyāṃ sahitaḥ prabhuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:104.008a: virāṭas tu tataḥ paścāt svena sainyena saṃvṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:104.008c: drupadaś ca mahārāja tataḥ paścād upādravat
GE07mbh_06_u:104.009a: kekayā bhrātaraḥ pañca dhṛṣṭaketuś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:104.010a: evaṃ vyūhya mahat sainyaṃ pāṇḍavās tava vāhinīm
GE07mbh_06_u:104.011a: tathaiva kuravo rājan bhīṣmaṃ kṛtvā mahābalam
GE07mbh_06_u:104.012c: tato droṇo maheṣvāsaḥ putraś cāsya mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:104.013c: kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca bhagadattam anuvratau
GE07mbh_06_u:104.014c: māgadhaś ca jayatsenaḥ saubalaś ca bṛhadbalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:104.015c: jaghanaṃ pālayām āsus tava sainyasya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:104.016a: divase divase prāpte bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo yudhi
GE07mbh_06_u:104.016c: āsurān akarod vyūhān paiśācān atha rākṣasān
GE07mbh_06_u:104.017a: tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tava teṣāṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:104.019a: tatra bhārata bhīmena pīḍitās tāvakāḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:104.020a: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca sātyakiś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:104.020c: tava sainyaṃ samāsādya pīḍayām āsur ojasā
GE07mbh_06_u:104.022a: tatas tu tāvakaṃ sainyaṃ vadhyamānaṃ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:104.024a: pīḍyamānaṃ balaṃ pārthair dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmaḥ parākramī
GE07mbh_06_u:104.024c: yad akārṣīd raṇe kruddhas tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:104.025a: kathaṃ vā pāṇḍavān yuddhe pratyudyātaḥ paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:104.025c: vinighnan somakān vīrāṃs tan mamācakṣva saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:104.026a: ācakṣe te mahārāja yad akārṣīt pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:104.028c: nāmṛṣyata tadā bhīṣmaḥ sainyaghātaṃ raṇe paraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:104.029a: sa pāṇḍavān maheṣvāsaḥ pāñcālāṃś ca sasṛñjayān
GE07mbh_06_u:104.030a: sa pāṇḍavānāṃ pravarān pañca rājan mahārathān
GE07mbh_06_u:104.030c: āttaśastrān raṇe yattān vārayām āsa sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:104.030e: nārācair vatsadantaiś ca śitair añjalikais tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:104.031a: nijaghne samare kruddho hastyaśvam amitaṃ bahu
GE07mbh_06_u:104.032c: gajārohān gajebhyaś ca pareṣāṃ vidadhad bhayam
GE07mbh_06_u:104.033a: tam ekaṃ samare bhīṣmaṃ tvaramāṇaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:104.034c: dikṣv adṛśyata sarvāsu ghoraṃ saṃdhārayan vapuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:104.036a: tad dṛṣṭvā samare karma tava putrā viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:104.037a: pārthā vimanaso bhūtvā praikṣanta pitaraṃ tava
GE07mbh_06_u:104.037e: na cainaṃ vārayām āsur vyāttānanam ivāntakam
GE07mbh_06_u:104.039a: taṃ śikhaṇḍī tribhir bāṇair abhyavidhyat stanāntare
GE07mbh_06_u:104.040a: sa tenātibhṛśaṃ viddhaḥ prekṣya bhīṣmaḥ śikhaṇḍinam
GE07mbh_06_u:104.040c: anicchann api saṃkruddhaḥ prahasann idam abravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:104.041a: kāmam abhyasa vā mā vā na tvāṃ yotsye kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:104.041c: yaiva hi tvaṃ kṛtā dhātrā saiva hi tvaṃ śikhaṇḍinī
GE07mbh_06_u:104.042a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā śikhaṇḍī krodhamūrchitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:104.043c: mayā śrutaṃ ca te yuddhaṃ jāmadagnyena vai saha
GE07mbh_06_u:104.044a: divyaś ca te prabhāvo 'yaṃ sa mayā bahuśaḥ śrutaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:104.044c: jānann api prabhāvaṃ te yotsye 'dyāhaṃ tvayā saha
GE07mbh_06_u:104.045a: pāṇḍavānāṃ priyaṃ kurvann ātmanaś ca narottama
GE07mbh_06_u:104.046a: dhruvaṃ ca tvā haniṣyāmi śape satyena te 'grataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:104.046c: etac chrutvā vaco mahyaṃ yat kṣamaṃ tat samācara
GE07mbh_06_u:104.047a: kāmam abhyasa vā mā vā na me jīvan vimokṣyase
GE07mbh_06_u:104.048a: evam uktvā tato bhīṣmaṃ pañcabhir nataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:104.049a: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā savyasācī paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:104.050a: ahaṃ tvām anuyāsyāmi parān vidrāvayañ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:104.051a: na hi te saṃyuge pīḍāṃ śaktaḥ kartuṃ mahābalaḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:105.023e: tava saṃdhārayan putram abravīc chaṃtanoḥ sutaḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:106.001a: arjunas tu raṇe rājan dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmasya vikramam

GE07mbh_06_u:106.033a: lalāṭasthais tu tair bāṇaiḥ śuśubhe pāṇḍavottamaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:106.033c: yathā merur mahārāja śṛṅgair atyartham ucchritaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:106.034c: vyarājata raṇe pārthaḥ kiṃśukaḥ puṣpavān iva
GE07mbh_06_u:106.035a: duḥśāsanaṃ tataḥ kruddhaḥ pīḍayām āsa pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:106.036a: pīḍyamāno balavatā putras tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:106.037a: tasya pārtho dhanuś chittvā tvaramāṇaḥ parākramī
GE07mbh_06_u:106.037c: ājaghāna tataḥ paścāt putraṃ te navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:106.038a: so 'nyat kārmukam ādāya bhīṣmasya pramukhe sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:106.040a: aprāptān eva tān bāṇāṃś ciccheda tanayas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:106.040e: pārthaṃ ca niśitair bāṇair avidhyat tanayas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:106.041a: tataḥ kruddho raṇe pārthaḥ śarān saṃdhāya kārmuke

GE07mbh_06_u:106.044c: avārayat tataḥ śūro bhūya eva parākramī

GE07mbh_06_u:107.002a: mādhavas tu susaṃkruddho rākṣasaṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:107.018c: punar eva catuḥṣaṣṭyā rājan vivyādha taṃ nṛpam

GE07mbh_06_u:107.022c: tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tava teṣāṃ ca bhārata

GE07mbh_06_u:107.033a: nakulo 'pi bhṛśaṃ viddhas tava putreṇa dhanvinā

GE07mbh_06_u:108.006c: nīcair gṛdhrā nilīyante bhāratānāṃ camūṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:108.008a: kaṅkā gṛdhrā balākāś ca vyāharanti muhur muhuḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:108.011c: kampante ca hasante ca nṛtyanti ca rudanti ca
GE07mbh_06_u:108.013c: dhārtarāṣṭrasya sainyeṣu na ca bhrājanti daṃśitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:108.014a: senayor ubhayoś caiva samantāc chrūyate mahān

GE07mbh_06_u:108.018a: abravīc ca purā bhīṣmo nāhaṃ hanyāṃ śikhaṇḍinam

GE07mbh_06_u:108.022c: dūrapātī dṛḍheṣuś ca nimittajñaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:108.029d-0453_03: tat tapaḥ saphalaṃ ceha kairāte savyasācinā

GE07mbh_06_u:108.030c: ihaiva dṛśyate rājño bhrātā yasya dhanaṃjayaḥ
