GE07mbh_06_u:109.001a: bhagadattaḥ kṛpaḥ śalyaḥ kṛtavarmā ca sātvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.002a: citraseno vikarṇaś ca tathā durmarṣaṇo yuvā
GE07mbh_06_u:109.003c: bhīṣmasya samare rājan prārthayānā mahad yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.004a: śalyas tu navabhir bāṇair bhīmasenam atāḍayat
GE07mbh_06_u:109.004c: kṛtavarmā tribhir bāṇaiḥ kṛpaś ca navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.005a: citraseno vikarṇaś ca bhagadattaś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:109.006e: durmarṣaṇaś ca viṃśatyā pāṇḍavaṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.007a: sa tān sarvān mahārāja bhrājamānān pṛthak pṛthak
GE07mbh_06_u:109.008c: kṛpasya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ madhye ciccheda bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:109.009a: vindānuvindau ca tathā tribhis tribhir atāḍayat
GE07mbh_06_u:109.009c: durmarṣaṇaṃ ca viṃśatyā citrasenaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.010a: vikarṇaṃ daśabhir bāṇaiḥ pañcabhiś ca jayadratham
GE07mbh_06_u:109.010c: viddhvā bhīmo 'nadad dhṛṣṭaḥ saindhavaṃ ca punas tribhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.010d-0456_01: droṇasya ca dhanur bhīmas tribhir bāṇair acicchide
GE07mbh_06_u:109.011a: athānyad dhanur ādāya gautamo rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.011c: bhīmaṃ vivyādha saṃrabdho daśabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.012a: sa viddho bahubhir bāṇais tottrair iva mahādvipaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.012e: gautamaṃ tāḍayām āsa śarair bahubhir āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:109.013a: saindhavasya tathāśvāṃś ca sārathiṃ ca tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.014a: hatāśvāt tu rathāt tūrṇam avaplutya mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.015a: tasya bhīmo dhanurmadhye dvābhyāṃ ciccheda bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:109.017a: atyadbhutaṃ raṇe karma kṛtavāṃs tatra pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.018e: bhīmaṃ vivyādha saptatyā tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:109.019a: kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca bhagadattaś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:109.020a: durmarṣaṇo vikarṇaś ca sindhurājaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:109.020c: bhīmaṃ te vivyadhus tūrṇaṃ śalyahetor ariṃdamāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.021a: sa tu tān prativivyādha pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.021c: śalyaṃ vivyādha saptatyā punaś ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.022a: taṃ śalyo navabhir viddhvā punar vivyādha pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.022c: sārathiṃ cāsya bhallena gāḍhaṃ vivyādha marmaṇi
GE07mbh_06_u:109.023c: madrarājaṃ tribhir bāṇair bāhvor urasi cārpayat
GE07mbh_06_u:109.024c: tāḍayām āsa samare siṃhavac ca nanāda ca
GE07mbh_06_u:109.025a: te hi yattā maheṣvāsāḥ pāṇḍavaṃ yuddhadurmadam
GE07mbh_06_u:109.025c: tribhis tribhir akuṇṭhāgrair bhṛśaṃ marmasv atāḍayan
GE07mbh_06_u:109.026d-0457_02: madreśvaraṃ tribhir bāṇair bhṛśaṃ viddhvā mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.027a: śalyaṃ ca navabhir bāṇair bhṛśaṃ viddhvā mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.027c: prāgjyotiṣaṃ śatenājau rājan vivyādha vai dṛḍham
GE07mbh_06_u:109.028a: tatas tu saśaraṃ cāpaṃ sātvatasya mahātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.029d-0458_03: atha bhīmo mahābāhuḥ kruddhaḥ sarvān mahārathān
GE07mbh_06_u:109.030a: bhīmas tu samare viddhvā śalyaṃ navabhir āyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.031a: dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ ca vivyādha gautamaprabhṛtīn rathān
GE07mbh_06_u:109.031c: te tu taṃ samare rājan vivyadhur niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.032a: sa tathā pīḍyamāno 'pi sarvatas tair mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.032c: matvā tṛṇena tāṃs tulyān vicacāra gatavyathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.033a: te cāpi rathināṃ śreṣṭhā bhīmāya niśitāñ śarān
GE07mbh_06_u:109.035a: tomaraṃ saindhavo rājā paṭṭiśaṃ ca mahābhujaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.035c: śataghnīṃ ca kṛpo rājañ śaraṃ śalyaś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:109.036d-0459_02: vivyādha samare vīras tribhis tribhir ajihmagaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.036d-0459_04: kṣurapreṇa dvidhā cakre prahasann iva bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:109.036d-0459_06: ciccheda samare vīro hy asaṃbhrāntarathaḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.036d-0459_07: sa ciccheda śataghnīṃ ca saindhaveneritāṃ bhṛśam
GE07mbh_06_u:109.037c: paṭṭiśaṃ ca tribhir bāṇaiś ciccheda tilakāṇḍavat
GE07mbh_06_u:109.038a: sa bibheda śataghnīṃ ca navabhiḥ kaṅkapatribhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.040c: tāṃś ca sarvān maheṣvāsāṃs tribhis tribhir atāḍayat
GE07mbh_06_u:109.041c: jagāma sa rathenājau bhīmaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:109.041e: nighnantaṃ samare śatrūn yodhayānaṃ ca sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.042a: tau tu tatra mahātmānau sametau vīkṣya pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_06_u:109.043a: athārjuno raṇe bhīṣmaṃ yodhayan vai mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:109.044a: āsasāda raṇe yodhāṃs tāvakān daśa bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:109.044c: ye sma bhīmaṃ raṇe rājan yodhayanto vyavasthitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.046a: suśarman gaccha śīghraṃ tvaṃ balaughaiḥ parivāritaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.047a: tac chrutvā śāsanaṃ tasya trigartaḥ prasthalādhipaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:109.047c: abhidrutya raṇe bhīmam arjunaṃ caiva dhanvinau
GE07mbh_06_u:109.048c: tataḥ pravavṛte yuddham arjunasya paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:110.001a: arjunas tu raṇe śalyaṃ yatamānaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:110.002a: suśarmāṇaṃ kṛpaṃ caiva tribhis tribhir avidhyata
GE07mbh_06_u:110.002c: prāgjyotiṣaṃ ca samare saindhavaṃ ca jayadratham
GE07mbh_06_u:110.003a: citrasenaṃ vikarṇaṃ ca kṛtavarmāṇam eva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:110.003c: durmarṣaṇaṃ ca rājendra āvantyau ca mahārathau
GE07mbh_06_u:110.004c: śarair atiratho yuddhe pīḍayan vāhinīṃ tava
GE07mbh_06_u:110.005a: jayadratho raṇe pārthaṃ bhittvā bhārata sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.006a: śalyaś ca samare jiṣṇuṃ kṛpaś ca rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.007a: citrasenādayaś caiva putrās tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:110.007c: pañcabhiḥ pañcabhis tūrṇaṃ saṃyuge niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.007e: ājaghnur arjunaṃ saṃkhye bhīmasenaṃ ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:110.008a: tau tatra rathināṃ śreṣṭhau kaunteyau bharatarṣabhau
GE07mbh_06_u:110.009a: suśarmāpi raṇe pārthaṃ viddhvā bahubhir āyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.009c: nanāda balavan nādaṃ nādayan vai nabhastalam
GE07mbh_06_u:110.011a: teṣāṃ tu rathināṃ madhye kaunteyau rathināṃ varau
GE07mbh_06_u:110.011e: āmiṣepsū gavāṃ madhye siṃhāv iva balotkaṭau
GE07mbh_06_u:110.012a: chittvā dhanūṃṣi vīrāṇāṃ śarāṃś ca bahudhā raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:110.012c: pātayām āsatur vīrau śirāṃsi śataśo nṛṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:110.013a: rathāś ca bahavo bhagnā hayāś ca śataśo hatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.013c: gajāś ca sagajārohāḥ petur urvyāṃ mahāmṛdhe
GE07mbh_06_u:110.014a: rathinaḥ sādinaś caiva tatra tatra nisūditāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.015c: rathaiś ca bahudhā bhagnaiḥ samāstīryata medinī
GE07mbh_06_u:110.016a: chatraiś ca bahudhā chinnair dhvajaiś ca vinipātitaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.016c: aṅkuśair apaviddhaiś ca paristomaiś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:110.016d-0461_01: ghaṇṭābhiś ca kaśābhiś ca samāstīryata medinī
GE07mbh_06_u:110.017a: keyūrair aṅgadair hārai rāṅkavair mṛditais tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:110.019c: śaraiḥ saṃvārya tān vīrān nijaghāna balaṃ tava
GE07mbh_06_u:110.020a: putras tu tava taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhīmārjunasamāgamam
GE07mbh_06_u:110.021a: kṛpaś ca kṛtavarmā ca saindhavaś ca jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.022a: tato bhīmo maheṣvāsaḥ phalgunaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.022c: kauravāṇāṃ camūṃ ghorāṃ bhṛśaṃ dudruvatū raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:110.024c: pārthaḥ samantāt samare preṣayām āsa mṛtyave
GE07mbh_06_u:110.025a: śalyas tu samare jiṣṇuṃ krīḍann iva mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.026a: tasya pārtho dhanuś chittvā hastāvāpaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.026c: athainaṃ sāyakais tīkṣṇair bhṛśaṃ vivyādha marmaṇi
GE07mbh_06_u:110.027c: madreśvaro raṇe jiṣṇuṃ tāḍayām āsa roṣitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.028a: tribhiḥ śarair mahārāja vāsudevaṃ ca pañcabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.028c: bhīmasenaṃ ca navabhir bāhvor urasi cārpayat
GE07mbh_06_u:110.029a: tato droṇo mahārāja māgadhaś ca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.030a: yatra pārtho mahārāja bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.031a: jayatsenas tu samare bhīmaṃ bhīmāyudhaṃ yuvā
GE07mbh_06_u:110.032a: taṃ bhīmo daśabhir viddhvā punar vivyādha saptabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.034a: droṇas tu vivaraṃ labdhvā bhīmasenaṃ śilīmukhaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.034c: vivyādha bāṇaiḥ suśitaiḥ pañcaṣaṣṭyā tam āyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.035a: taṃ bhīmaḥ samaraślāghī guruṃ pitṛsamaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:110.035c: vivyādha navabhir bhallais tathā ṣaṣṭyā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:110.036a: arjunas tu suśarmāṇaṃ viddhvā bahubhir āyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.036c: vyadhamat tasya tat sainyaṃ mahābhrāṇi yathānilaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.037a: tato bhīṣmaś ca rājā ca saubalaś ca bṛhadbalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.038a: tathaiva pāṇḍavāḥ śūrā dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.040c: ayodhayan raṇe bhīṣmaṃ saṃhatāḥ saha sṛñjayaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:110.042c: tatra pāṇḍusutaiḥ sārdhaṃ bhīṣmasya vijayaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:110.043a: tāvakānāṃ raṇe bhīṣmo glaha āsīd viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:110.043c: tatra hi dyūtam āyātaṃ vijayāyetarāya vā
GE07mbh_06_u:110.045c: bhīṣmam evābhyayāt tūrṇaṃ prāṇāṃs tyaktvā mahāhave
GE07mbh_06_u:110.046a: bhīṣmo 'pi rathināṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pratijagrāha tāṃ camūm
GE07mbh_06_u:111.002a: kuravaś ca kathaṃ yuddhe pāṇḍavān pratyavārayan
GE07mbh_06_u:111.003c: yathā ca tad abhūd yuddhaṃ tat te vakṣyāmi śṛṇvataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:111.006c: arjunaṃ ca sapāñcālyaṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃśayitā janāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:111.008a: tasminn ayutaśo rājan bhūyaś ca sa paraṃtapaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:111.009c: te hatās tatra bhīṣmeṇa śūrāḥ sarve 'nivartinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:111.011a: sa kṣipraṃ vadham anvicchann ātmano 'bhimukhaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:111.013c: śṛṇu me vacanaṃ tāta dharmyaṃ svargyaṃ ca jalpataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:111.014c: ghnataś ca me gataḥ kālaḥ subahūn prāṇino raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:111.015a: tasmāt pārthaṃ purodhāya pāñcālān sṛñjayāṃs tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:111.015c: madvadhe kriyatāṃ yatno mama ced icchasi priyam
GE07mbh_06_u:111.016a: tasya tan matam ājñāya pāṇḍavaḥ satyadarśanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:111.016c: bhīṣmaṃ pratiyayau yattaḥ saṃgrāme saha sṛñjayaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:111.017a: dhṛṣṭadyumnas tato rājan pāṇḍavaś ca yudhiṣṭhiraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:111.017c: śrutvā bhīṣmasya tāṃ vācaṃ codayām āsatur balam
GE07mbh_06_u:111.019c: bhīmasenaś ca samare pālayiṣyati vo dhruvam
GE07mbh_06_u:111.020a: na vai bhīṣmād bhayaṃ kiṃ cit kartavyaṃ yudhi sṛñjayāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:111.021a: tathā tu samayaṃ kṛtvā daśame 'hani pāṇḍavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:111.022c: bhīṣmasya pātane yatnaṃ paramaṃ te samāsthitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:111.024a: duḥśāsanaś ca balavān saha sarvaiḥ sahodaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:111.025a: tatas tu tāvakāḥ śūrāḥ puraskṛtya yatavratam
GE07mbh_06_u:111.027a: droṇaputraṃ śiner naptā dhṛṣṭaketus tu pauravam
GE07mbh_06_u:111.030c: droṇaṃ prati yayau yattaḥ pāñcālyaḥ saha somakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:111.032a: śikhaṇḍinaṃ ca putrās te pāṇḍavaṃ ca dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_06_u:111.034c: tāvakānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā śāṃtanavaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:111.035c: prādurāsīn mahāñ śabdo dikṣu sarvāsu bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:111.039c: rathagoṣaś ca saṃjagmuḥ senayor ubhayor api
GE07mbh_06_u:111.041a: anyonyaṃ rathinaḥ petur vājinaś ca mahāhave
GE07mbh_06_u:111.041c: kuñjarāḥ kuñjarāñ jaghnuḥ padātīṃś ca padātayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:111.042a: tad āsīt sumahad yuddhaṃ kurūṇāṃ pāṇḍavaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:111.043a: tayoḥ samāgamo ghoro babhūva yudhi bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:112.002c: ājaghāna raṇe kruddhaḥ punaś cainaṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.003a: tasya śaktiṃ raṇe kārṣṇir mṛtyor ghorām iva svasām
GE07mbh_06_u:112.004a: tām āpatantīṃ sahasā ghorarūpāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:112.004c: dvidhā ciccheda te putraḥ kṣurapreṇa mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.005a: tāṃ śaktiṃ patitāṃ dṛṣṭvā kārṣṇiḥ paramakopanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.005c: duryodhanaṃ tribhir bāṇair bāhvor urasi cārpayat
GE07mbh_06_u:112.006a: punaś cainaṃ śarair ghorair ājaghāna stanāntare
GE07mbh_06_u:112.007a: tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ citrarūpaṃ ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:112.011a: aśvatthāmā tu samare sātyakiṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.011c: triṃśatā ca punas tūrṇaṃ bāhvor urasi cārpayat
GE07mbh_06_u:112.013a: pauravo dhṛṣṭaketuṃ ca śarair āsādya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:112.015a: pauravas tu dhanuś chittvā dhṛṣṭaketor mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.015c: nanāda balavan nādaṃ vivyādha daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.016a: so 'nyat kārmukam ādāya pauravaṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.017a: tau tu tatra maheṣvāsau mahāmātrau mahārathau
GE07mbh_06_u:112.018a: anyonyasya dhanuś chittvā hayān hatvā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:112.020a: pragṛhya vimalau rājaṃs tāv anyonyam abhidrutau
GE07mbh_06_u:112.022c: tāḍayām āsa saṃkruddhas tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:112.025a: tataḥ svaratham āropya pauravaṃ tanayas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:112.027c: punar vivyādha taṃ ṣaṣṭyā punaś ca navabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.028a: suśarmā tu raṇe kruddhas tava putraṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:112.028c: daśabhir daśabhiś caiva vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.029a: citrasenaś ca taṃ rājaṃs triṃśatā nataparvaṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:112.029c: ājaghāna raṇe kruddhaḥ sa ca taṃ pratyavidhyata
GE07mbh_06_u:112.029e: bhīṣmasya samare rājan yaśo mānaṃ ca vardhayan
GE07mbh_06_u:112.030c: ārjuniṃ kosalendras tu viddhvā pañcabhir āyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.031a: bṛhadbalaṃ ca saubhadro viddhvā navabhir āyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.031c: nākampayata saṃgrāme vivyādha ca punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.032a: kausalyasya punaś cāpi dhanuś ciccheda phālguṇiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.033c: phālguniṃ samare kruddho vivyādha bahubhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.037c: virejur vasudhāṃ prāpya vikīrṇā iva parvatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.038c: mahatyā senayā guptaṃ pīḍayām āsa saṃgataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.040c: navabhiḥ sāyakais tīkṣṇais triṃśatā punar ardayat
GE07mbh_06_u:112.044a: tato droṇo mahārāja pārṣatasya mahad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.045c: droṇasya miṣato yuddhe preṣayām āsa sāyakān
GE07mbh_06_u:112.046a: tāñ śarāñ śarasaṃghais tu saṃnivārya mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.048c: śaraiḥ pañcāśatā droṇo vārayām āsa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:112.049a: sā chinnā bahudhā rājan droṇacāpacyutaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.051a: tāṃ droṇo navabhir bāṇaiś ciccheda yudhi bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:112.051c: pārṣataṃ ca maheṣvāsaṃ pīḍayām āsa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:112.052a: evam etan mahad yuddhaṃ droṇapārṣatayor abhūt
GE07mbh_06_u:112.053a: arjunaḥ prāpya gāṅgeyaṃ pīḍayan niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.053c: abhyadravata saṃyattaṃ vane mattam iva dvipam
GE07mbh_06_u:112.054a: pratyudyayau ca taṃ pārthaṃ bhagadattaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_06_u:112.057a: arjunas tu raṇe nāgam āyāntaṃ rajatopamam
GE07mbh_06_u:112.058a: śikhaṇḍinaṃ ca kaunteyo yāhi yāhīty acodayat
GE07mbh_06_u:112.058c: bhīṣmaṃ prati mahārāja jahy enam iti cābravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:112.059c: prayayau tvarito rājan drupadasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:112.061a: tatas te tāvakāḥ śūrāḥ pāṇḍavaṃ rabhasaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:112.063c: iṣubhis tūrṇam avyagro bahubhiḥ sa samācinot
GE07mbh_06_u:112.064a: somakāṃś ca raṇe bhīṣmo jaghne pārthapadānugān
GE07mbh_06_u:112.066a: yathā hi sumahān agniḥ kakṣe carati sānilaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.066c: tathā jajvāla bhīṣmo 'pi divyāny astrāṇy udīrayan
GE07mbh_06_u:112.067c: nādayan sa diśo bhīṣmaḥ pradiśaś ca mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.068a: pātayan rathino rājan gajāṃś ca saha sādibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.069a: nirmanuṣyān rathān rājan gajān aśvāṃś ca saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:112.069c: cakāra sa tadā bhīṣmaḥ sarvaśastrabhṛtāṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.071a: amoghā hy apatan bāṇāḥ pitus te manujeśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:112.072a: nirmanuṣyān rathān rājan suyuktāñ javanair hayaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.075c: yaḥ saṃprāpya raṇe bhīṣmaṃ jīvite sma mano dadhe
GE07mbh_06_u:112.076a: tāṃś ca sarvān raṇe yodhān pretarājapuraṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:112.076c: nītān amanyanta janā dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmasya vikramam
GE07mbh_06_u:112.077a: na kaś cid enaṃ samare pratyudyāti mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.078a: śikhaṇḍī tu raṇe bhīṣmam āsādya bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:112.080a: strītvaṃ tat saṃsmaran rājan sarvalokasya paśyataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.080c: na jaghāna raṇe bhīṣmaḥ sa ca taṃ nāvabuddhavān
GE07mbh_06_u:112.082a: kiṃ te vivakṣayā vīra jahi bhīṣmaṃ mahāratham
GE07mbh_06_u:112.082c: na hy anyam anupaśyāmi kaṃ cid yaudhiṣṭhire bale
GE07mbh_06_u:112.083a: yaḥ śaktaḥ samare bhīṣmaṃ yodhayeta pitāmaham
GE07mbh_06_u:112.083c: ṛte tvāṃ puruṣavyāghra satyam etad bravīmi te
GE07mbh_06_u:112.084a: evam uktas tu pārthena śikhaṇḍī bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:112.085a: acintayitvā tān bāṇān pitā devavratas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:112.085c: arjunaṃ samare kruddhaṃ vārayām āsa sāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.086a: tathaiva ca camūṃ sarvāṃ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.087a: tathaiva pāṇḍavā rājan sainyena mahatā vṛtāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.087c: bhīṣmaṃ pracchādayām āsur meghā iva divākaram
GE07mbh_06_u:112.088c: nirdadāha raṇe śūrān vanaṃ vahnir iva jvalan
GE07mbh_06_u:112.089c: ayodhayata yat pārthaṃ jugopa ca yatavratam
GE07mbh_06_u:112.090a: karmaṇā tena samare tava putrasya dhanvinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.091a: yad ekaḥ samare pārthān sānugān samayodhayat
GE07mbh_06_u:112.091c: na cainaṃ pāṇḍavā yuddhe vāyarām āsur ulbaṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:112.092c: sādinaś ca mahārāja dantinaś ca mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.094a: yathāgnir indhanaṃ prāpya jvaled dīptārcir ulbaṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.094c: tathā jajvāla putras te pāṇḍavān vai vinirdahan
GE07mbh_06_u:112.095c: jetuṃ notsahate kaś cin nāpy udyātuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:112.096a: sa hi taṃ samare rājan vijitya vijayo 'rjunaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.097e: arjunaṃ ca raṇe rājan yodhayan sa vyarājata
GE07mbh_06_u:112.098a: śikhaṇḍī tu raṇe rājan vivyādhaiva pitāmaham
GE07mbh_06_u:112.099a: na ca te 'sya rujaṃ cakruḥ pitus tava janeśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:112.099b-0466_01: jaghāna bāṇān gāṅgeyas tathā muktāñ śikhaṇḍinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.099c: smayamānaś ca gāṅgeyas tān bāṇāñ jagṛhe tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:112.100a: uṣṇārto hi naro yadvaj jaladhārāḥ pratīcchati
GE07mbh_06_u:112.101a: taṃ kṣatriyā mahārāja dadṛśur ghoram āhave
GE07mbh_06_u:112.103a: bhīṣmo vaḥ samare sarvān palayiṣyati dharmavit
GE07mbh_06_u:112.103c: te bhayaṃ sumahat tvaktvā pāṇḍavān pratiyudhyata
GE07mbh_06_u:112.104a: eṣa tālena dīptena bhīṣmas tiṣṭhati pālayan
GE07mbh_06_u:112.104c: sarveṣāṃ dhārtarāṣṭrāṇāṃ raṇe śarma ca varma ca
GE07mbh_06_u:112.105c: kim u pārthā mahātmānaṃ martyabhūtās tathābalāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.105e: tasmād dravata he yodhāḥ phalgunaṃ prāpya saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:112.106a: aham adya raṇe yatto yodhayiṣyāmi phalgunam
GE07mbh_06_u:112.107a: tac chrutvā tu vaco rājaṃs tava putrasya dhanvinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.108a: te videhāḥ kaliṅgāś ca dāśerakagaṇaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:112.108c: abhipetur niṣādāś ca sauvīrāś ca mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:112.109a: bāhlikā daradāś caiva prācyodīcyāś ca mālavāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.110a: śālvāśrayās trigartāś ca ambaṣṭhāḥ kekayaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:112.110c: abhipetū raṇe pārthaṃ pataṃgā iva pāvakam
GE07mbh_06_u:112.110d-0467_01: śalabhā iva rājendra pārtham apratimaṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:112.111a: sa tān sarvān sahānīkān mahārāja mahārathān
GE07mbh_06_u:112.112a: sa tair astrair mahāvegair dadāhāśu mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.115a: sadhvajā rathinaḥ petur hayārohā hayaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:112.116c: vidravadbhiś ca bahudhā balai rājñāṃ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.118a: te tu bhittvā tava sutaṃ duḥśāsanam ayomukhāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.118c: dharaṇīṃ viviśuḥ sarve valmīkam iva pannagāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.118e: hayāṃś cāsya tato jaghne sārathiṃ ca nyapātayat
GE07mbh_06_u:112.119a: viviṃśatiṃ ca viṃśatyā virathaṃ kṛtavān prabho
GE07mbh_06_u:112.120a: kṛpaṃ śalyaṃ vikarṇaṃ ca viddhvā bahubhir āyasaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.121a: evaṃ te virathāḥ pañca kṛpaḥ śalyaś ca māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:112.121c: duḥśāsano vikarṇaś ca tathaiva ca viviṃśatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.122a: pūrvāhṇe tu tathā rājan parājitya mahārathān
GE07mbh_06_u:112.122c: prajajvāla raṇe pārtho vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.123c: anyān api mahārāja pātayām āsa pārthivān
GE07mbh_06_u:112.125a: gajāś ca rathasaṃghāś ca bahudhā rathibhir hatāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.125c: rathāś ca nihatā nāgair nāgā hayapadātibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.130c: channam āyodhanaṃ reje raktābhram iva śāradam
GE07mbh_06_u:112.131a: śvānaḥ kākāś ca gṛdhrāś ca vṛkā gomāyubhiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:112.131c: praṇedur bhakṣyam āsādya vikṛtāś ca mṛgadvijāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.132a: vavur bahuvidhāś caiva dikṣu sarvāsu mārutāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.133a: kāñcanāni ca dāmāni patākāś ca mahādhanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.134e: sapatākāś ca mātaṅgā diśo jagmuḥ śarāturāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.136a: tato bhīṣmo mahārāja divyam astram udīrayan
GE07mbh_06_u:112.137a: taṃ śikhaṇḍī raṇe yattam abhyadhāvata daṃśitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:112.137c: saṃjahāra tato bhīṣmas tad astraṃ pāvakopamam
GE07mbh_06_u:112.138a: etasminn eva kāle tu kaunteyaḥ śvetavāhanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.002a: na hy anīkam anīkena samasajjata saṃkule
GE07mbh_06_u:113.002c: na rathā rathibhiḥ sārdhaṃ na padātāḥ padātibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.003a: aśvā nāśvair ayudhyanta na gajā gajayodhibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.005a: tataḥ śalyaḥ kṛpaś caiva citrasenaś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:113.005c: duḥśāsano vikarṇaś ca rathān āsthāya satvarāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.006c: trātāraṃ nādhyagacchad vai majjamāneva naur jale
GE07mbh_06_u:113.007a: yathā hi śaiśiraḥ kālo gavāṃ marmāṇi kṛntati
GE07mbh_06_u:113.007c: tathā pāṇḍusutānāṃ vai bhīṣmo marmāṇy akṛntata
GE07mbh_06_u:113.007d-0470_01: somakāḥ sṛñjayaiḥ sārdhaṃ sarve te yuddhadurmadāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.008a: atīva tava sainyasya pārthena ca mahātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:113.009c: iṣubhis tāḍyamānāś ca nārācaiś ca sahasraśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.010a: petur ārtasvaraṃ kṛtvā tatra tatra mahāgajāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.011a: channam āyodhanaṃ reje śirobhiś ca sakuṇḍalaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.011e: bhīṣme ca yudhi vikrānte pāṇḍave ca dhanaṃjaye
GE07mbh_06_u:113.012a: te parākrāntam ālokya rājan yudhi pitāmaham
GE07mbh_06_u:113.013a: icchanto nidhanaṃ yuddhe svargaṃ kṛtvā parāyaṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:113.014c: kleśān kṛtān saputreṇa tvayā pūrvaṃ narādhipa
GE07mbh_06_u:113.015c: tāvakāṃs tava putrāṃś ca yodhayanti sma hṛṣṭavat
GE07mbh_06_u:113.016a: senāpatis tu samare prāha senāṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.018a: vadhyamānas tato rājan pitā śāṃtanavas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:113.019a: tasya kīrtimatas tāta purā rāmeṇa dhīmatā
GE07mbh_06_u:113.020a: sa tāṃ śikṣām adhiṣṭhāya kṛtvā parabalakṣayam
GE07mbh_06_u:113.021a: tasmiṃs tu divase prāpte daśame bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:113.021e: gajāśvam amitaṃ hatvā hatāḥ sapta mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.023a: tathā dantisahasraṃ ca hayānām ayutaṃ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.023c: śikṣābalena nihataṃ pitrā tava viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:113.025a: śatānīkaṃ ca samare hatvā bhīṣmaḥ pratāpavān
GE07mbh_06_u:113.026a: ye ca ke cana pārthānām abhiyātā dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_06_u:113.026c: rājāno bhīṣmam āsādya gatās te yamasādanam
GE07mbh_06_u:113.027a: evaṃ daśa diśo bhīṣmaḥ śarajālaiḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.028a: sa kṛtvā sumahat karma tasmin vai daśame 'hani
GE07mbh_06_u:113.029a: na cainaṃ pārthivā rājañ śekuḥ ke cin nirīkṣitum
GE07mbh_06_u:113.029c: madhyaṃ prāptaṃ yathā grīṣme tapantaṃ bhāskaraṃ divi
GE07mbh_06_u:113.030a: yathā daityacamūṃ śakras tāpayām āsa saṃyuge
GE07mbh_06_u:113.030c: tathā bhīṣmaḥ pāṇḍaveyāṃs tāpayām āsa bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:113.031a: tathā ca taṃ parākrāntam ālokya madhusūdanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.032a: eṣa śāṃtanavo bhīṣmaḥ senayor antare sthitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.032c: nānihatya balād enaṃ vijayas te bhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_06_u:113.033c: na hi bhīṣmaśarān anyaḥ soḍhum utsahate vibho
GE07mbh_06_u:113.034a: tatas tasmin kṣaṇe rājaṃś codito vānaradhvajaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.034c: sadhvajaṃ sarathaṃ sāśvaṃ bhīṣmam antardadhe śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.036a: tena pāñcālarājaś ca dhṛṣṭaketuś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:113.036c: pāṇḍavo bhīmasenaś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.037a: yamau ca cekitānaś ca kekayāḥ pañca caiva ha
GE07mbh_06_u:113.038a: draupadeyāḥ śikhaṇḍī ca kuntibhojaś ca vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:113.038c: suśarmā ca virāṭaś ca pāṇḍaveyā mahābalāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.039a: ete cānye ca bahavaḥ pīḍitā bhīṣmasāyakaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.042a: sātyakiś cekitānaś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.042c: virāṭo drupadaś caiva mādrīputrau ca pāṇḍavau
GE07mbh_06_u:113.043a: abhimanyuś ca samare draupadyāḥ pañca cātmajāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.045a: vidhūya tān bāṇagaṇān ye muktāḥ pārthivottamaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.045e: kṛtvā śaravighātaṃ ca krīḍann iva pitāmahaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:113.048c: tam ekaṃ chādayām āsur meghā iva divākaram
GE07mbh_06_u:113.049a: tatas tasya ca teṣāṃ ca yuddhe devāsuropame
GE07mbh_06_u:114.001a: evaṃ te paṇḍavāḥ sarve puraskṛtya śikhaṇḍinam
GE07mbh_06_u:114.002c: mudgarair musalaiḥ prāsaiḥ kṣepaṇībhiś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.003c: nārācair vatsadantaiś ca bhuśuṇḍībhiś ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:114.007c: dṛśyate sma narendrāṇāṃ punar madhyagataś caran
GE07mbh_06_u:114.008a: tataḥ pāñcālarājaṃ ca dhṛṣṭaketum atītya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:114.009a: tataḥ sātyakibhīmau ca pāṇḍavaṃ ca dhanaṃjayam
GE07mbh_06_u:114.009c: drupadaṃ ca virāṭaṃ ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaṃ ca pārṣatam
GE07mbh_06_u:114.010c: ṣaḍ etān ṣaḍbhir ānarchad bhāskarapratimaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.011a: tasya te niśitān bāṇān saṃnivārya mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.011c: daśabhir daśabhir bhīṣmam ardayām āsur ojasā
GE07mbh_06_u:114.012a: śikhaṇḍī tu raṇe bāṇān yān mumoca mahāvrate
GE07mbh_06_u:114.012c: te bhīṣmaṃ viviśus tūrṇaṃ svarṇapuṅkhāḥ śilāśitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.014c: droṇaś ca kṛtavarmā ca saindhavaś ca jayadrathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.015a: bhūriśravāḥ śalaḥ śalyo bhagadattas tathaiva ca
GE07mbh_06_u:114.016c: abhipetur bhṛśaṃ kruddhāś chādayanta sma pāṇḍavān
GE07mbh_06_u:114.017a: teṣām āpatatāṃ śabdaḥ śuśruve phalgunaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:114.018c: ity āsīt tumulaḥ śabdaḥ phalgunasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:114.019a: taṃ śabdaṃ tumulaṃ śrutvā pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.020a: sātyakir bhīmasenaś ca dhṛṣṭadyumnaś ca pārṣataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.023e: sārathiṃ daśabhiś cāsya dhvajaṃ caikena cicchide
GE07mbh_06_u:114.023f-0474_01: dhanuś caikena bāṇena cicchide samare tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:114.024c: tad apy asya śitair bhallais tribhiś ciccheda phalgunaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.025a: evaṃ sa pāṇḍavaḥ kruddha āttam āttaṃ punaḥ punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.026c: śaktiṃ jagrāha saṃkruddho girīṇām api dāraṇīm
GE07mbh_06_u:114.026e: tāṃ ca cikṣepa saṃkruddhaḥ phalgunasya rathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:114.026f-0474A_01: preṣayām āsa śaktiṃ ca yamadaṃṣṭropamāṃ dṛḍhām
GE07mbh_06_u:114.027a: tām āpatantīṃ saṃprekṣya jvalantīm aśanīm iva
GE07mbh_06_u:114.028a: tasya ciccheda tāṃ śaktiṃ pañcadhā pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.030a: chinnāṃ tāṃ śaktim ālokya bhīṣmaḥ krodhasamanvitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.031c: yady eṣāṃ na bhaved goptā viṣvakseno mahābalaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.031d-0475_01: ajayyaś caiva sarveṣāṃ lokānām iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.032c: avadhyatvāc ca pāṇḍūnāṃ strībhāvāc ca śikhaṇḍinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.033a: pitrā tuṣṭena me pūrvaṃ yadā kālīm udāvahat
GE07mbh_06_u:114.033e: tasmān mṛtyum ahaṃ manye prāptakālam ivātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.034c: ṛṣayo vasavaś caiva viyatsthā bhīṣmam abruvan

GE07mbh_06_u:114.036c: anulomaḥ sugandhī ca pṛṣataiś ca samanvitaḥ

GE07mbh_06_u:114.038c: ṛte bhīṣmaṃ mahābāhuṃ māṃ cāpi munitejasā
GE07mbh_06_u:114.039a: saṃbhramaś ca mahān āsīt tridaśānāṃ viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:114.040a: iti devagaṇānāṃ ca śrutvā vākyaṃ mahāmanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.043a: tataḥ prahasya bībhatsur vyākṣipan gāṇḍivaṃ dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.045a: evam anyair api bhṛśaṃ vadhyamāno mahāraṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:114.045b-0476_01: tān apy āśu śarair bhīṣmaḥ pravivyādha mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.045b-0476_02: taiś ca muktāñ śarān bhīṣmo yudhi satyaparākramaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.045b-0476_04: śikhaṇḍī tu raṇe bāṇān yān mumoca mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.045c: na cakrus te rujaṃ tasya rukmapuṅkhāḥ śilāśitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.047a: athainaṃ daśabhir viddhvā dhvajam ekena cicchide
GE07mbh_06_u:114.048c: tad apy asya śitair bhallais tridhā tribhir upānudat
GE07mbh_06_u:114.049a: evam asya dhanūṃṣy ājau ciccheda subahūny api
GE07mbh_06_u:114.051a: eṣa pārtho raṇe kruddhaḥ pāṇḍavānāṃ mahārathaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.052a: na caiṣa śakyaḥ samare jetuṃ vajrabhṛtā api
GE07mbh_06_u:114.052e: māṃ caiva śaktā nirjetuṃ kim u martyāḥ sudurbalāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.052f-0478_01: na cāham api śaktas tu sarvair api mahārathaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.052f-0478_02: ṛte 'rjunaṃ susaṃkruddhair etat satyaṃ bravīmi te
GE07mbh_06_u:114.053a: evaṃ tayoḥ saṃvadatoḥ phalguno niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.056c: musalānīva me ghnanti neme bāṇāḥ śikhaṇḍinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.057c: mama prāṇān ārujanti neme bāṇāḥ śikhaṇḍinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.060a: kṛntanti mama gātrāṇi māghamāse gavām iva
GE07mbh_06_u:114.060c: arjunasya ime bāṇā neme bāṇāḥ śikhaṇḍinaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.061a: sarve hy api na me duḥkhaṃ kuryur anye narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.062a: iti bruvañ śāṃtanavo didhakṣur iva pāṇḍavam
GE07mbh_06_u:114.063a: tām asya viśikhaiś chittvā tridhā tribhir apātayat
GE07mbh_06_u:114.064c: khaḍgaṃ cānyataraṃ prepsur mṛtyor agre jayāya vā
GE07mbh_06_u:114.065a: tasya tac chatadhā carma vyadhamad daṃśitātmanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.066a: vinadyoccaiḥ siṃha iva svāny anīkāny acodayat
GE07mbh_06_u:114.066c: abhidravata gāṅgeyaṃ māṃ vo 'stu bhayam aṇv api
GE07mbh_06_u:114.067a: atha te tomaraiḥ prāsair bāṇaughaiś ca samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.068a: vatsadantaiś ca bhallaiś ca tam ekam abhidudruvuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.069a: tathaiva tava putrāś ca rājan bhīṣmajayaiṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.069c: tam ekam abhyavartanta siṃhanādāṃś ca nedire
GE07mbh_06_u:114.070a: tatrāsīt tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ tāvakānāṃ paraiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:114.071a: āsīd gāṅga ivāvarto muhūrtam udadher iva
GE07mbh_06_u:114.072c: samaṃ ca viṣamaṃ caiva na prājñāyata kiṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:114.073a: yodhānām ayutaṃ hatvā tasmin sa daśame 'hani
GE07mbh_06_u:114.074a: tataḥ senāmukhe tasmin sthitaḥ pārtho dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.076b-0480_01: pāṇḍavaiḥ pañcabhiḥ sārdhaṃ sātyakena ca dhanvinā
GE07mbh_06_u:114.076b-0480_05: tāvakāḥ samare rājañ jahur bhīṣmaṃ mahāmṛdhe
GE07mbh_06_u:114.077a: śālvāśrayās trigartāś ca ambaṣṭhāḥ kekayaiḥ saha
GE07mbh_06_u:114.077e: saṃgrāme na jahur bhīṣmaṃ yudhyamānaṃ kirīṭinā
GE07mbh_06_u:114.078a: tatas tam ekaṃ bahavaḥ parivārya samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.079c: ity āsīt tumulaḥ śabdo rājan bhīṣmarathaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:114.081a: evaṃ vibho tava pitā śarair viśakalīkṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.082a: hā heti divi devānāṃ pārthivānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.082c: patamāne rathād bhīṣme babhūva sumahān svanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.083c: saha bhīṣmeṇa sarveṣāṃ prāpatan hṛdayāni naḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.085c: rathāt prapatitaṃ cainaṃ divyo bhāvaḥ samāviśat
GE07mbh_06_u:114.086c: patan sa dadṛśe cāpi kharvitaṃ ca divākaram
GE07mbh_06_u:114.087a: saṃjñāṃ caivālabhad vīraḥ kālaṃ saṃcintya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:114.087c: antarikṣe ca śuśrāva divyāṃ vācaṃ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.089a: sthito 'smīti ca gāṅgeyas tac chrutvā vākyam abravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:114.089c: dhārayām āsa ca prāṇān patito 'pi hi bhūtale
GE07mbh_06_u:114.090a: tasya tan matam ājñāya gaṅgā himavataḥ sutā
GE07mbh_06_u:114.090c: maharṣīn haṃsarūpeṇa preṣayām āsa tatra vai
GE07mbh_06_u:114.092a: te tu bhīṣmaṃ samāsādya munayo haṃsarūpiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.093a: te taṃ dṛṣṭvā mahātmānaṃ kṛtvā cāpi pradakṣiṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:114.094c: bhīṣma eva mahātmā san saṃsthātā dakṣiṇāyane
GE07mbh_06_u:114.095a: ity uktvā prasthitān haṃsān dakṣiṇām abhito diśam
GE07mbh_06_u:114.095c: saṃprekṣya vai mahābuddhiś cintayitvā ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:114.096a: tān abravīc chāṃtanavo nāhaṃ gantā kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:114.096c: dakṣiṇāvṛtta āditye etan me manasi sthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:114.097a: gamiṣyāmi svakaṃ sthānam āsīd yan me purātanam
GE07mbh_06_u:114.097c: udagāvṛtta āditye haṃsāḥ satyaṃ bravīmi vaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.098c: aiśvaryabhūtaḥ prāṇānām utsarge niyato hy aham
GE07mbh_06_u:114.099a: yaś ca datto varo mahyaṃ pitrā tena mahātmanā
GE07mbh_06_u:114.099c: chandato mṛtyur ity evaṃ tasya cāstu varas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:114.100a: dhārayiṣye tataḥ prāṇān utsarge niyate sati
GE07mbh_06_u:114.100c: ity uktvā tāṃs tadā haṃsān aśeta śaratalpagaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.101a: evaṃ kurūṇāṃ patite śṛṅge bhīṣme mahaujasi
GE07mbh_06_u:114.102c: na kiṃ cit pratyapadyanta putrās te bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:114.102e: saṃmohaś caiva tumulaḥ kurūṇām abhavat tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:114.103c: viṣādāc ca ciraṃ kālam atiṣṭhan vigatendriyāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.104a: dadhyuś caiva mahārāja na yuddhe dadhire manaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.105a: avadhye śaṃtanoḥ putre hate bhīṣme mahaujasi
GE07mbh_06_u:114.105b-0481_01: duḥkhārtās te tadā rājan kurūṇāṃ patayo 'bhavan
GE07mbh_06_u:114.105c: abhāvaḥ sumahān rājan kurūn āgād atandritaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.106a: hatapravīrāś ca vayaṃ nikṛttāś ca śitaiḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:114.107a: pāṇḍavās tu jayaṃ labdhvā paratra ca parāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_06_u:114.108c: āsphoṭayām āsa bhṛśaṃ bhīmaseno nanarta ca
GE07mbh_06_u:114.110a: prākrośan prāpataṃś cānye jagmur mohaṃ tathāpare
GE07mbh_06_u:114.111c: bharatānāṃ ca ye pūrve te cainaṃ praśaśaṃsire
GE07mbh_06_u:115.001a: katham āsaṃs tadā yodhā hīnā bhīṣmeṇa saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:115.002a: tadaiva nihatān manye kurūn anyāṃś ca pārthivān
GE07mbh_06_u:115.002c: na prāharad yadā bhīṣmo ghṛṇitvād drupadātmaje
GE07mbh_06_u:115.003a: tato duḥkhataraṃ manye kim anyat prabhaviṣyati
GE07mbh_06_u:115.003c: yad adya pitaraṃ śrutvā nihataṃ mama durmateḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:115.004c: śrutvā vinihataṃ bhīṣmaṃ śatadhā yan na dīryate
GE07mbh_06_u:115.005a: punaḥ punar na mṛṣyāmi hataṃ devavrataṃ raṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:115.005c: na hato jāmadagnyena divyair astraiḥ sma yaḥ purā
GE07mbh_06_u:115.006a: yad adya nihatenājau bhīṣmeṇa jayam icchatā
GE07mbh_06_u:115.006c: ceṣṭitaṃ narasiṃhena tan me kathaya saṃjaya
GE07mbh_06_u:115.008a: sa śete śaratalpastho medinīm aspṛśaṃs tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:115.009a: hā heti tumulaḥ śabdo bhūtānāṃ samapadyata
GE07mbh_06_u:115.010a: ubhayoḥ senayo rājan kṣatriyān bhayam āviśat
GE07mbh_06_u:115.010e: kuravaḥ paryavartanta pāṇḍavāś ca viśāṃ pate
GE07mbh_06_u:115.011a: khaṃ tamovṛtam āsīc ca nāsīd bhānumataḥ prabhā
GE07mbh_06_u:115.011c: rarāsa pṛthivī caiva bhīṣme śāṃtanave hate
GE07mbh_06_u:115.012a: ayaṃ brahmavidāṃ śreṣṭho ayaṃ brahmavidāṃ gatiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:115.013a: ayaṃ pitaram ājñāya kāmārtaṃ śaṃtanuṃ purā
GE07mbh_06_u:115.015c: na kiṃ cit pratyapadyanta putrās tava ca bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:115.016c: atiṣṭhan vrīḍitāś caiva hriyā yuktā hy adhomukhāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:115.017a: pāṇḍavāś ca jayaṃ labdhvā saṃgrāmaśirasi sthitāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:115.019c: saṃmohaś cāpi tumulaḥ kurūṇām abhavat tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:115.021a: dṛṣṭvā ca patitaṃ bhīṣmaṃ putro duḥśāsanas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:115.021d-0484_01: āgatas tvaramāṇas tu balena mahatā vṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:115.023c: duḥśāsanaṃ mahārāja kim ayaṃ vakṣyatīti vai
GE07mbh_06_u:115.024a: tato droṇāya nihataṃ bhīṣmam ācaṣṭa kauravaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:115.024c: droṇas tad apriyaṃ śrutvā sahasā nyapatad rathāt
GE07mbh_06_u:115.025c: nivārayām āsa tadā svāny anīkāni māriṣa
GE07mbh_06_u:115.029a: te tu bhīṣmaṃ samāsādya śayānaṃ bharatarṣabham
GE07mbh_06_u:115.030a: atha pāṇḍūn kurūṃś caiva praṇipatyāgrataḥ sthitān
GE07mbh_06_u:115.031a: svāgataṃ vo mahābhāgāḥ svāgataṃ vo mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:115.032a: abhinandya sa tān evaṃ śirasā lambatābravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:115.032b-0486_01: paripārśve tava sutān sthitān udvīkṣya bhārata
GE07mbh_06_u:115.032d-0487_01: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ bhīṣmād bhāgīrathīsutāt
GE07mbh_06_u:115.033a: tato nṛpāḥ samājahrus tanūni ca mṛdūni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:115.034a: abravīc ca naravyāghraḥ prahasann iva tān nṛpān
GE07mbh_06_u:115.036c: dīyatām upadhānaṃ vai yad yuktam iha manyase
GE07mbh_06_u:115.037a: sa saṃnyasya mahac cāpam abhivādya pitāmaham
GE07mbh_06_u:115.038c: preṣyo 'haṃ tava durdharṣa kriyatāṃ kiṃ pitāmaha
GE07mbh_06_u:115.039a: tam abravīc chāṃtanavaḥ śiro me tāta lambate
GE07mbh_06_u:115.039e: śayanasyānurūpaṃ hi śīghraṃ vīra prayaccha me
GE07mbh_06_u:115.040a: tvaṃ hi pārtha mahābāho śreṣṭhaḥ sarvadhanuṣmatām
GE07mbh_06_u:115.042c: tribhis tīkṣṇair mahāvegair udagṛhṇāc chiraḥ śaraiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:115.044b-0489_01: prāha sarvān samudvīkṣya bharatān bhārataṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:115.045c: yady anyathā pravartethāḥ śapeyaṃ tvām ahaṃ ruṣā
GE07mbh_06_u:115.047a: evam uktvā tu bībhatsuṃ sarvāṃs tān abravīd vacaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:115.047c: rājñaś ca rājaputrāṃś ca pāṇḍavenābhi saṃsthitān
GE07mbh_06_u:115.048a: śayeyam asyāṃ śayyāyāṃ yāvad āvartanaṃ raveḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:115.048c: ye tadā pārayiṣyanti te māṃ drakṣyanti vai nṛpāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:115.049e: vimokṣye 'haṃ tadā prāṇān suhṛdaḥ supriyān api
GE07mbh_06_u:115.052a: tān dṛṣṭvā jāhnavīputraḥ provāca vacanaṃ tadā
GE07mbh_06_u:115.053a: evaṃgate na hīdānīṃ vaidyaiḥ kāryam ihāsti me
GE07mbh_06_u:115.053b-0491_02: uvāca putro gaṃgāyā na vaidyaiḥ kāryam asti me
GE07mbh_06_u:115.054c: etair eva śaraiś cāhaṃ dagdhavyo 'nte narādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:115.055a: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ tasya putro duryodhanas tava
GE07mbh_06_u:115.057a: upadhānaṃ tato dattvā pitus tava janeśvara
GE07mbh_06_u:115.057c: sahitāḥ pāṇḍavāḥ sarve kuravaś ca mahārathāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:115.059a: vidhāya rakṣāṃ bhīṣmasya sarva eva samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:115.061a: diṣṭyā jayasi kauravya diṣṭyā bhīṣmo nipātitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:115.062c: tvāṃ tu cakṣurhaṇaṃ prāpya dagdho ghoreṇa cakṣuṣā
GE07mbh_06_u:115.063c: tava prasādād vijayaḥ krodhāt tava parājayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:115.063e: tvaṃ hi naḥ śaraṇaṃ kṛṣṇa bhaktānām abhayaṃkaraḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:115.064a: anāścaryo jayas teṣāṃ yeṣāṃ tvam asi keśava
GE07mbh_06_u:115.064c: raṣkitā samare nityaṃ nityaṃ cāpi hite rataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:115.064e: sarvathā tvāṃ samāsādya nāścaryam iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.003a: kanyāś candanacūrṇaiś ca lājair mālyaiś ca sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.003c: striyo bālās tathā vṛddhāḥ prekṣakāś ca pṛthagjanāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.005a: upāramya ca yuddhebhyaḥ saṃnāhān vipramucya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:116.008a: vibabhau ca nṛpāṇāṃ sā pitāmaham upāsatām
GE07mbh_06_u:116.009a: bhīṣmas tu vedanāṃ dhairyān nigṛhya bharatarṣabha
GE07mbh_06_u:116.011a: tatas te kṣatriyā rājan samājahruḥ samantataḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.011c: bhakṣyān uccāvacāṃs tatra vārikumbhāṃś ca śītalān
GE07mbh_06_u:116.012a: upanītaṃ ca tad dṛṣṭvā bhīṣmaḥ śāṃtanavo 'bravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:116.012c: nādya tāta mayā śakyaṃ bhogān kāṃś cana mānuṣān
GE07mbh_06_u:116.012d-0497_01: nedaṃ mama jalaṃ yogyaṃ pātuṃ naiva kṣamo hy aham
GE07mbh_06_u:116.013d-0498_01: evam uktvā tatovāca bhīṣmaḥ śaraśataiś citaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.013d-0498_02: payaḥ pāsyāmi gopālā gomayaṃ na tu gomayam
GE07mbh_06_u:116.015c: atiṣṭhat prāñjaliḥ prahvaḥ kiṃ karomīti cābravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:116.016a: taṃ dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavaṃ rājann abhivādyāgrataḥ sthitam
GE07mbh_06_u:116.018b-0499_01: gomukhaiḥ pīḍyamānasya gaur naṣṭo mama gopate
GE07mbh_06_u:116.018b-0499_02: gorasaṃ pātum icchāmi gobhir yac ca na dūṣitam
GE07mbh_06_u:116.018c: tvaṃ hi śakto maheṣvāsa dātum ambho yathāvidhi
GE07mbh_06_u:116.019a: arjunas tu tathety uktvā ratham āruhya vīryavān
GE07mbh_06_u:116.019c: adhijyaṃ balavat kṛtvā gāṇḍīvaṃ vyākṣipad dhanuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.020c: vitresuḥ sarvabhūtāni śrutvā sarve ca pārthivāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.021a: tataḥ pradakṣiṇaṃ kṛtvā rathena rathināṃ varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.022a: saṃdhāya ca śaraṃ dīptam abhimantrya mahāyaśāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.022e: avidhyat pṛthivīṃ pārthaḥ pārśve bhīṣmasya dakṣiṇe
GE07mbh_06_u:116.023a: utpapāta tato dhārā vimalā vāriṇaḥ śivā
GE07mbh_06_u:116.025c: vismayaṃ paramaṃ jagmus tatas te vasudhādhipāḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.026a: tat karma prekṣya bībhatsor atimānuṣam adbhutam
GE07mbh_06_u:116.028a: tṛptaḥ śāṃtanavaś cāpi rājan bībhatsum abravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:116.030c: yan notsahati devendraḥ saha devair api dhruvam
GE07mbh_06_u:116.031a: vidus tvāṃ nidhanaṃ pārtha sarvakṣatrasya tadvidaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.031c: dhanurdharāṇām ekas tvaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pravaro nṛṣu
GE07mbh_06_u:116.032a: manuṣyā jagati śreṣṭhāḥ pakṣiṇāṃ garuḍo varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.032c: sarasāṃ sāgaraḥ śreṣṭho gaur variṣṭhā catuṣpadām
GE07mbh_06_u:116.033a: ādityas tejasāṃ śreṣṭho girīṇāṃ himavān varaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.033c: jātīnāṃ brāhmaṇaḥ śreṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhas tvam asi dhanvinām
GE07mbh_06_u:116.034a: na vai śrutaṃ dhārtarāṣṭreṇa vākyaṃ; saṃbodhyamānaṃ vidureṇa caiva
GE07mbh_06_u:116.034c: droṇena rāmeṇa janārdanena; muhur muhuḥ saṃjayenāpi coktam
GE07mbh_06_u:116.035a: parītabuddhir hi visaṃjñakalpo; duryodhano nābhyanandad vaco me
GE07mbh_06_u:116.035c: sa śeṣyate vai nihataś cirāya; śāstrātigo bhīmabalābhibhūtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.036a: tataḥ śrutvā tad vacaḥ kauravendro; duryodhano dīnamanā babhūva
GE07mbh_06_u:116.036c: tam abravīc chāṃtanavo 'bhivīkṣya; nibodha rājan bhava vītamanyuḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.037a: dṛṣṭaṃ duryodhanedaṃ te yathā pārthena dhīmatā
GE07mbh_06_u:116.037e: etasya kartā loke 'smin nānyaḥ kaś cana vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:116.038a: āgneyaṃ vāruṇaṃ saumyaṃ vāyavyam atha vaiṣṇavam
GE07mbh_06_u:116.038e: dhātus tvaṣṭuś ca savitur divyāny astrāṇi sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.039a: sarvasmin mānuṣe loke vetty eko hi dhanaṃjayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.039c: kṛṣṇo vā devakīputro nānyo vai veda kaś cana
GE07mbh_06_u:116.039e: na śakyāḥ pāṇḍavās tāta yuddhe jetuṃ kathaṃ cana
GE07mbh_06_u:116.040e: kṛtinā samare rājan saṃdhis te tāta yujyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:116.041c: tāvat pārthena śūreṇa saṃdhis te tāta yujyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:116.042a: yāvac camūṃ na te śeṣāṃ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.042c: nāśayaty arjunas tāvat saṃdhis te tāta yujyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:116.043c: nṛpāś ca bahavo rājaṃs tāvat saṃdhiḥ prayujyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:116.044a: na nirdahati te yāvat krodhadīptekṣaṇaś camūm
GE07mbh_06_u:116.044c: yudhiṣṭhiro hi tāvad vai saṃdhis te tāta yujyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:116.045a: nakulaḥ sahadevaś ca bhīmasenaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.045b-0500_01: yāvat kṣatraṃ na nighnanti tāvat saṃdhir vidhīyatām
GE07mbh_06_u:116.045c: yāvac camūṃ mahārāja nāśayanti na sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.045e: tāvat te pāṇḍavaiḥ sārdhaṃ saubhrātraṃ tāta rocatām
GE07mbh_06_u:116.046a: yuddhaṃ madantam evāstu tāta saṃśāmya pāṇḍavaiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.046c: etat te rocatāṃ vākyaṃ yad ukto 'si mayānagha
GE07mbh_06_u:116.046e: etat kṣemam ahaṃ manye tava caiva kulasya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:116.047a: tyaktvā manyum upaśāmyasva pārthaiḥ; paryāptam etad yat kṛtaṃ phalgunena
GE07mbh_06_u:116.047c: bhīṣmasyāntād astu vaḥ sauhṛdaṃ vā; saṃpraśleṣaḥ sādhu rājan prasīda
GE07mbh_06_u:116.048c: mā mitradhruk pārthivānāṃ jaghanyaḥ; pāpāṃ kīrtiṃ prāpsyase kauravendra
GE07mbh_06_u:116.049a: mamāvasānāc chāntir astu prajānāṃ; saṃgacchantāṃ pārthivāḥ prītimantaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:116.049c: pitā putraṃ mātulaṃ bhāgineyo; bhrātā caiva bhrātaraṃ praitu rājan
GE07mbh_06_u:116.050a: na ced evaṃ prāptakālaṃ vaco me; mohāviṣṭaḥ pratipatsyasy abuddhyā
GE07mbh_06_u:116.050c: bhīṣmasyāntād etadantāḥ stha sarve; satyām etāṃ bhāratīm īrayāmi
GE07mbh_06_u:116.051a: etad vākyaṃ sauhṛdād āpageyo; madhye rājñāṃ bhārataṃ śrāvayitvā
GE07mbh_06_u:116.051c: tūṣṇīm āsīc chalyasaṃtaptamarmā; yatvātmānaṃ vedanāṃ saṃnigṛhya
GE07mbh_06_u:116.051d-0503_02: nārocayata putras te mumūrṣur iva bheṣajam
GE07mbh_06_u:117.001a: tatas te pārthivāḥ sarve jagmuḥ svān ālayān punaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:117.002a: śrutvā tu nihataṃ bhīṣmaṃ rādheyaḥ puruṣarṣabhaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:117.004a: nimīlitākṣaṃ taṃ vīraṃ sāśrukaṇṭhas tadā vṛṣaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:117.004b-0504_01: bhīṣma bhīṣma mahābāho ity uvāca mahādyutiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:117.005c: dveṣyo 'tyantam anāgāḥ sann iti cainam uvāca ha
GE07mbh_06_u:117.006a: tac chrutvā kuruvṛddhaḥ sa balāt saṃvṛttalocanaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:117.006c: śanair udvīkṣya sasneham idaṃ vacanam abravīt
GE07mbh_06_u:117.007a: rahitaṃ dhiṣṇyam ālokya samutsārya ca rakṣiṇaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:117.008a: ehy ehi me vipratīpa spardhase tvaṃ mayā saha
GE07mbh_06_u:117.008c: yadi māṃ nābhigacchethā na te śreyo bhaved dhruvam
GE07mbh_06_u:117.009a: kaunteyas tvaṃ na rādheyo vidito nāradān mama
GE07mbh_06_u:117.009c: kṛṣṇadvaipāyanāc caiva keśavāc ca na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:117.010a: na ca dveṣo 'sti me tāta tvayi satyaṃ bravīmi te
GE07mbh_06_u:117.011a: akasmāt pāṇḍavān hi tvaṃ dviṣasīti matir mama
GE07mbh_06_u:117.011d-0506_01: jāto 'si dharmalopena tatas te buddhir īdṛśī
GE07mbh_06_u:117.012a: jānāmi samare vīryaṃ śatrubhir duḥsahaṃ tava
GE07mbh_06_u:117.012c: brahmaṇyatāṃ ca śauryaṃ ca dāne ca paramāṃ gatim
GE07mbh_06_u:117.013a: na tvayā sadṛśaḥ kaś cit puruṣeṣv amaropama
GE07mbh_06_u:117.013c: kulabhedaṃ ca matvāhaṃ sadā paruṣam uktavān
GE07mbh_06_u:117.016a: tathā ca balavān rājā jarāsaṃdho durāsadaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:117.018a: vyapanīto 'dya manyur me yas tvāṃ prati purā kṛtaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:117.019c: saṃgaccha tair mahābāho mama ced icchasi priyam
GE07mbh_06_u:117.021a: jānāmy ahaṃ mahāprājña sarvam etan na saṃśayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:117.021c: yathā vadasi durdharṣa kaunteyo 'haṃ na sūtajaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:117.022a: avakīrṇas tv ahaṃ kuntyā sūtena ca vivardhitaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:117.022c: bhuktvā duryodhanaiśvaryaṃ na mithyā kartum utsahe
GE07mbh_06_u:117.023a: vasu caiva śarīraṃ ca yad udāraṃ tathā yaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:117.023f-0509_01: mā caitad vyādhimaraṇaṃ kṣatraṃ syād iti kaurava
GE07mbh_06_u:117.024a: avaśyabhāvī vai yo 'rtho na sa śakyo nivartitum
GE07mbh_06_u:117.026a: pāṇḍavā vāsudevaś ca viditā mama sarvaśaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:117.026c: ajeyāḥ puruṣair anyair iti tāṃś cotsahāmahe
GE07mbh_06_u:117.026d-0510_01: vijayiṣye raṇe pāṇḍūn iti me niścitaṃ matam
GE07mbh_06_u:117.026d-0510_02: na cec chakyam avasraṣṭuṃ vairam etat sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:117.027a: anujānīṣva māṃ tāta yuddhe prītamanāḥ sadā
GE07mbh_06_u:117.027c: anujñātas tvayā vīra yudhyeyam iti me matiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:117.028a: duruktaṃ vipratīpaṃ vā saṃrambhāc cāpalāt tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:117.028c: yan mayāpakṛtaṃ kiṃ cit tad anukṣantum arhasi
GE07mbh_06_u:117.029a: na cec chakyam athotsraṣṭuṃ vairam etat sudāruṇam
GE07mbh_06_u:117.030a: vimanyur gatasaṃrambhaḥ kuru karma nṛpasya hi
GE07mbh_06_u:117.031a: ahaṃ tvām anujānāmi yad icchasi tad āpnuhi
GE07mbh_06_u:117.032c: dharmo hi yuddhāc chreyo 'nyat kṣatriyasya na vidyate
GE07mbh_06_u:117.033a: praśame hi kṛto yatnaḥ sucirāt suciraṃ mayā
GE07mbh_06_u:117.033c: na caiva śakitaḥ kartuṃ yato dharmas tato jayaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:117.034a: evaṃ bruvantaṃ gāṅgeyam abhivādya prasādya ca
GE07mbh_06_u:117.034c: rādheyo ratham āruhya prāyāt tava sutaṃ prati
GE07mbh_06_u:117.034d-0512_01: ya idaṃ śṛṇuyād bhaktyā bhīṣmaparva mahādbhutam
GE07mbh_06_u:117.034d-0512_03: bhīṣmaparva idaṃ śrutvā śatabhojyaṃ tu dāpayet
GE07mbh_06_u:117.034d-0512_05: etad vai parvadānaṃ ca dattvā svarṇādidakṣiṇām
GE07mbh_06_u:117.034d-0512_09: bhīṣmaparva idaṃ śrutvā pūjayed yas tu vācakam
GE07mbh_06_u:117.034d-0512_10: tena brahmā ca rudraś ca viṣṇuś ca vasavas tathā
GE07mbh_06_u:117.034d-0512_11: pūjitā ṛṣayaḥ sarve pitaraś ca sahāgnibhiḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:117.034d-0512_14: pañca ślokasahasrāṇi tathā hy aṣṭau śatāni ca
GE07mbh_06_u:117.034d-0512_15: ślokāś ca caturāśītiḥ proktā vyāsena dhīmatā
GE07mbh_06_u:117.034d-0513_01: śraddhayā parayā yukto bhīṣmaparva śṛṇoti yaḥ
GE07mbh_06_u:117.034d-0513_02: mucyate brahmahatyāyā jayaṃ vai labhate dhruvam
GE07mbh_06_u:117.034d-0513_04: pūjayec caiva vaktāraṃ bhīṣmaparvaṇi vai gṛhī
